         ST    @15,SCTPTR                                          0380 00829000
*       END;                        /* STOP WHEN FAILING STEP REACHED   00830000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 00831000
@DE00376 C     ERROR,@CF00078                                      0381 00832000
         BNL   @DC00376                                            0381 00833000
         L     @05,SCTPTR                                          0381 00834000
         CLC   SCTSNUMB(1,@05),JCTSNUMB(JCTPTR)                    0381 00835000
         BL    @DL00376                                            0381 00836000
@DC00376 DS    0H                                                  0382 00837000
*     END;                          /*                       @YM07086*/ 00838000
*   ELSE                                                           0383 00839000
*     DO;                           /* IF RESTART JOB        @YM07086*/ 00840000
         B     @RC00373                                            0383 00841000
@RF00373 DS    0H                                                  0384 00842000
*       VIRTUAL=LCTSCTVA;           /* SVA OF CURRENT SCT    @YM07086*/ 00843000
         SLR   VIRTUAL,VIRTUAL                                     0384 00844000
         ICM   VIRTUAL,7,LCTSCTVA(LCTPTR)                          0384 00845000
*       IF ERROR<BAD THEN           /* IF NO ERROR           @YM07086*/ 00846000
         C     ERROR,@CF00078                                      0385 00847000
         BNL   @RF00385                                            0385 00848000
*         CALL JOURNAL;             /* JNL CURRENT SCT       @YM07086*/ 00849000
         BAL   @14,JOURNAL                                         0386 00850000
*       SCTPTR=VIRTUAL+PRFX;        /* IN CORE SCTPTR        @YM07086*/ 00851000
@RF00385 LR    @03,VIRTUAL                                         0387 00852000
         AL    @03,PRFX                                            0387 00853000
         ST    @03,SCTPTR                                          0387 00854000
*       CALL RUNSIOT;               /* JNL SIOT,JFCB,&       @YM07086*/ 00855000
         BAL   @14,RUNSIOT                                         0388 00856000
*     END;                          /* JFCBX                 @YM07086*/ 00857000
*   IF JSCBJRBA=NOTHING&LCTRFBCR=OF THEN/*                  @YM07086*/ 00858000
@RC00373 CLC   JSCBJRBA(8,JSCBPTR),NOTHING                         0390 00859000
         BE    @RF00390                                            0390 00860000
         TM    LCTRFBCR(LCTPTR),B'01000000'                        0390 00861000
         BNZ   @RF00390                                            0390 00862000
*     CALL JHRUPDT;                 /* TO UPDATE JHR         @YM07086*/ 00863000
         BAL   @14,JHRUPDT                                         0391 00864000
*   END RUNCHAIN;                                                  0392 00865000
@EL00008 DS    0H                                                  0392 00866000
@EF00008 DS    0H                                                  0392 00867000
@ER00008 LM    @14,@09,@SA00008                                    0392 00868000
         LM    @11,@12,@SA00008+48                                 0392 00869000
         BR    @14                                                 0392 00870000
*                                                                  0393 00871000
*/****************************************************************** */ 00872000
*/*                                                                  */ 00873000
*/* THIS ROUTINE WIIL JOURNAL ALL SIOTS THAT CHAINED OFF OF  @YM07086*/ 00874000
*/* SCT AND ALL OF THE JFCB AND JFCBXS OR JFCBES THAT ARE    @Z40MPSJ*/ 00875000
*/* CHAINED OFF OF EACH SIOTS.                               @YM07086*/ 00876000
*/* FOR AUTO RESTART JOBS (BOTH STEP AND CHECKPOINT),        @YM08147*/ 00877000
*/* SOME VIO BLOCKS FOR THE NON-FAILING STEPS WILL BE        @YM08147*/ 00878000
*/* JOURNALLED.  FOR CHECKPOINT RESTART JOBS, IN ADDITION TO @YM08147*/ 00879000
*/* THE ABOVE , THE VIO BLOCKS WILL ALSO BE JOURNALLED AFTER @YM08147*/ 00880000
*/* THE ALLOCATION OF THE FAILING STEP.                      @YM08147*/ 00881000
*/*                                                                  */ 00882000
*/********************************************************************/ 00883000
*                                                                  0393 00884000
*RUNSIOT:                                                          0393 00885000
*   PROCEDURE;                                                     0393 00886000
RUNSIOT  STM   @14,@09,@SA00009                                    0393 00887000
         STM   @11,@12,@SA00009+48                                 0393 00888000
*   VIRTUAL=SCTFSIOT;               /* OBTAIN PTR TO 1ST SIOT      0394 00889000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 00890000
         L     @03,SCTPTR                                          0394 00891000
         SLR   VIRTUAL,VIRTUAL                                     0394 00892000
         ICM   VIRTUAL,7,SCTFSIOT(@03)                             0394 00893000
*   DO WHILE VIRTUAL=NO&ERROR<BAD; /* CONTINUE IF NO ERROR  @YM07086*/ 00894000
         B     @DE00395                                            0395 00895000
@DL00395 DS    0H                                                  0396 00896000
*     CALL JOURNAL;                 /* JOURNAL SIOT          @YM07086*/ 00897000
         BAL   @14,JOURNAL                                         0396 00898000
*     SIOTPTR=VIRTUAL+PRFX;         /* SKIP THE PREFIX       @YM07086*/ 00899000
         LR    @04,VIRTUAL                                         0397 00900000
         AL    @04,PRFX                                            0397 00901000
         ST    @04,SIOTPTR                                         0397 00902000
*     VIRTUAL=SIOTPTR->SCTPJFCB;    /* OBTAIN PTR TO JFCB    @YM07086*/ 00903000
         SLR   VIRTUAL,VIRTUAL                                     0398 00904000
         ICM   VIRTUAL,7,SCTPJFCB(@04)                             0398 00905000
*     CALL JOURNAL;                 /* JOURNAL JFCB          @YM07086*/ 00906000
         BAL   @14,JOURNAL                                         0399 00907000
*     JFCBPTR=VIRTUAL+PRFX;         /* SKIP THE PREFIX       @YM07086*/ 00908000
         LR    JFCBPTR,VIRTUAL                                     0400 00909000
         AL    JFCBPTR,PRFX                                        0400 00910000
*     VIRTUAL=JFCBEXAD;             /* OBTAIN PTR TO 1ST JFCBX OR  0401 00911000
*                                      JFCBE                 @Z40MPSJ*/ 00912000
         L     VIRTUAL,JFCBEXAD-1(,JFCBPTR)                        0401 00913000
         LA    VIRTUAL,0(,VIRTUAL)                                 0401 00914000
*     DO WHILE VIRTUAL=NO&ERROR<BAD;/* CONTINUE IF NO ERROR @YM07086*/ 00915000
         B     @DE00402                                            0402 00916000
@DL00402 DS    0H                                                  0403 00917000
*       CALL JOURNAL;               /* JOURNAL JFCBX OR JFCBE      0403 00918000
*                                                            @Z40MPSJ*/ 00919000
         BAL   @14,JOURNAL                                         0403 00920000
*       VIRTUAL=VIRTUAL+PRFX;       /* SKIP THE PREFIX       @YM07086*/ 00921000
         AL    VIRTUAL,PRFX                                        0404 00922000

         ICM   @04,7,JFCBEXTR(VIRTUAL)                             0406 00930000
         LR    VIRTUAL,@04                                         0406 00931000
*       ELSE                        /* ELSE                  @Z40MPSJ*/ 00932000
*         VIRTUAL=VIRTUAL->JFCBXTTR;/* OBTAIN PTR TO NXT JFCBX     0407 00933000

@RF00405 SLR   @04,@04                                             0407 00936000

         LR    VIRTUAL,@04                                         0407 00938000
*     END;                          /*                       @YM07086*/ 00939000
@RC00405 DS    0H                                                  0408 00940000
@DE00402 LTR   VIRTUAL,VIRTUAL                                     0408 00941000

*     IF JSCBJRBA=NOTHING&SIOVAMDS=ON/* JNL VIO BLKS FOR    @YM08147*/ 00946000

         L     @15,VDSDSPCT(,VDSCBPTR)                             0423 00994000

         XC    DRTBK(235),DRTBK                                    0427 01007000

         STCM  @15,7,DRTPTR                                        0428 01009000

         LA    @14,52                                              0430 01013000

         MVI   DRTBLK+1,C' '                                       0431 01017000
         MVC   DRTBLK+2(217),DRTBLK+1                              0431 01018000
         BCTR  @14,0                                               0431 01019000

*                 DRTRBN=VBPHRBN;   /* INSERT BLK RBN        @YM08147*/ 01021000

*                 VIRTUAL=ADDR(DRTBK);/* SET UP ADDR FOR JNL @YM08147*/ 01024000
         LA    VIRTUAL,DRTBK                                       0433 01025000
*                 CALL JOURNAL;     /* WRITE TO JOB JNL      @YM08147*/ 01026000
         BAL   @14,JOURNAL                                         0434 01027000
*                 IF SAVERBN<VBPHRBN THEN/* SAVE RBN IF HIGHER     0435 01028000
*                                                            @YM08147*/ 01029000
         L     @05,VBPHRBN(,VBPHPTR)                               0435 01030000
         CL    @05,SAVERBN                                         0435 01031000
         BNH   @RF00435                                            0435 01032000
*                   SAVERBN=VBPHRBN;/*                       @YM08147*/ 01033000
         ST    @05,SAVERBN                                         0436 01034000
*               END;                /*                       @YM08147*/ 01035000
@RF00435 DS    0H                                                  0438 01036000
*             QMPAPTR=JSCBQMPI;     /* OBTAIN PTR TO QMPA    @YM08147*/ 01037000
@RF00425 L     QMPAPTR,JSCBQMPI(,JSCBPTR)                          0438 01038000
*             IF QMRBN<SAVERBN THEN /* RESET RBN IN QMPA     @YM08147*/ 01039000
         L     @05,SAVERBN                                         0439 01040000
         C     @05,QMRBN(,QMPAPTR)                                 0439 01041000
         BNH   @RF00439                                            0439 01042000
*               QMRBN=SAVERBN;      /* IF HIGHER             @YM08147*/ 01043000
         ST    @05,QMRBN(,QMPAPTR)                                 0440 01044000
*           END;                    /*                       @YM08147*/ 01045000
@RF00439 DS    0H                                                  0442 01046000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA03885*/ 01047000
@RF00412 DS    0H                                                  0443 01048000
*     VIRTUAL=SIOTPTR->SCTPSIOT;    /* OBTAIN PTR TO NXT SIOT      0443 01049000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 01050000
@RF00409 L     @03,SIOTPTR                                         0443 01051000
         SLR   VIRTUAL,VIRTUAL                                     0443 01052000
         ICM   VIRTUAL,7,SCTPSIOT(@03)                             0443 01053000
*   END;                            /*                       @YM07086*/ 01054000
@DE00395 LTR   VIRTUAL,VIRTUAL                                     0444 01055000
         BZ    @DC00395                                            0444 01056000
         C     ERROR,@CF00078                                      0444 01057000
         BL    @DL00395                                            0444 01058000
@DC00395 DS    0H                                                  0445 01059000
*   END RUNSIOT;                                                   0445 01060000
@EL00009 DS    0H                                                  0445 01061000
@EF00009 DS    0H                                                  0445 01062000
@ER00009 LM    @14,@09,@SA00009                                    0445 01063000
         LM    @11,@12,@SA00009+48                                 0445 01064000
         BR    @14                                                 0445 01065000
*                                                                  0446 01066000
*/********************************************************************/ 01067000
*/*                                                                  */ 01068000
*/*  THIS FUNCTION IS IMPLEMENTED TO ALLOW NON-SWA CONTROL BLOCKS TO */ 01069000
*/*  BE JOURNALLED WITHOUT GOING THROUGH SWA MANAGER.  THE BLOCKS    */ 01070000
*/*  BEING JOURNALLED VIA THIS FUNCTION ARE : THE STEP HEADER RECORD */ 01071000
*/*  OR VAM CONTROL BLOCKS.                                          */ 01072000
*/*                                                                  */ 01073000
*/********************************************************************/ 01074000
*                                                                  0446 01075000
*DRTWRT:                                                           0446 01076000
*   PROCEDURE;                                                     0446 01077000
DRTWRT   STM   @14,@09,@SA00010                                    0446 01078000
         STM   @11,@12,@SA00010+48                                 0446 01079000
*   PARMXPTR=JNLPPTRX;              /* INIT PTR TO FIRST JNLPARM EXT    01080000
*                                                            @Z40FPPJ*/ 01081000
         L     PARMXPTR,JNLPPTRX(,JNLPTR)                          0447 01082000
*   RFY                                                            0448 01083000
*     JNLPARMX BASED(PARMXPTR);     /* SET NEW BASE FOR PARM EXT   0448 01084000
*                                                            @VS41821*/ 01085000
*   DO WHILE(PARMXPTR=NO&ERROR<BAD);/* JOURNAL A CHAIN OF BLOCKS IF    01086000
*                                      ONE EXISTS            @Z40FPPJ*/ 01087000
         B     @DE00449                                            0449 01088000
@DL00449 DS    0H                                                  0450 01089000
*     DRTBK=DRTBK&&DRTBK;           /* CLEAR SPACE                   */ 01090000
         XC    DRTBK(235),DRTBK                                    0450 01091000
*     I=FIVE;                       /* CHECK FOR VALID ID            */ 01092000
         LA    @05,5                                               0451 01093000
         STH   @05,I                                               0451 01094000
*     J=JNLPID+ONE;                                                0452 01095000
         LA    J,1                                                 0452 01096000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0452 01097000
         IC    @15,JNLPID(,PARMXPTR)                               0452 01098000
         ALR   J,@15                                               0452 01099000
*     TEMP1=TEMPLATE(J)&TEST(I);                                   0453 01100000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0453 01101000
         IC    @15,TEST-1(@05)                                     0453 01102000
         SLR   @05,@05                                             0453 01103000
         IC    @05,TEMPLATE-1(J)                                   0453 01104000
         NR    @05,@15                                             0453 01105000
         STC   @05,TEMP1                                           0453 01106000
*     IF TEMP1=TEST(I) THEN                                        0454 01107000
         CR    @05,@15                                             0454 01108000
         BNE   @RF00454                                            0454 01109000
*       DO;                                                        0455 01110000
*         IF JNLPID=SHRID|JNLPID=JHRID THEN/* SHR OR JHR     @YM07086*/ 01111000
         CLI   JNLPID(PARMXPTR),192                                0456 01112000
         BE    @RT00456                                            0456 01113000
         CLI   JNLPID(PARMXPTR),193                                0456 01114000
         BNE   @RF00456                                            0456 01115000
@RT00456 DS    0H                                                  0457 01116000
*           DRTRBN(ONE:FOUR)=ZERO;  /* SET RBN TO ZERO       @YM07086*/ 01117000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0457 01118000
         STCM  @15,15,DRTRBN                                       0457 01119000
*         ELSE                                                     0458 01120000
*           DO;                                                    0458 01121000
         B     @RC00456                                            0458 01122000
@RF00456 DS    0H                                                  0459 01123000
*             IF JNLRBN=ZERO THEN   /* BLOCK 1ST TIME TO BE -        */ 01124000
         L     @15,JNLRBN(,PARMXPTR)                               0459 01125000
         LTR   @15,@15                                             0459 01126000
         BNZ   @RF00459                                            0459 01127000
*               DO;                 /* JOURANLLED                    */ 01128000
*                 QMPAPTR=JSCBQMPI; /* OBTAIN SWA QMPA PTR           */ 01129000
         L     QMPAPTR,JSCBQMPI(,JSCBPTR)                          0461 01130000
*                 TEMP=QMRBN;       /* OBTAIN LAST ASSIGNED RBN      */ 01131000
         L     TEMP,QMRBN(,QMPAPTR)                                0462 01132000
*LOOP:                                                             0463 01133000
*                 TEMP2=TEMP+ONE;   /* PLUS ONE IF DOES NOT MATCH    */ 01134000
LOOP     LA    @15,1                                               0463 01135000
         ALR   @15,TEMP                                            0463 01136000
         ST    @15,TEMP2                                           0463 01137000
*                 CS(TEMP,TEMP2,QMRBN);/* COMPARE AND SWAP           */ 01138000
         CS    TEMP,@15,QMRBN(QMPAPTR)                             0464 01139000
*                 BC(4,LOOP);                                      0465 01140000
         BC    4,LOOP                                              0465 01141000
*                 GEN(IC R2,CALLRKEY );/* RESTORE CALLER KEY - REG 2 */ 01142000
         IC R2,CALLRKEY                                                 01143000
*                 GEN(MODESET KEYADDR=(2));/* RESTORE CALLER'S KEY   */ 01144000
         MODESET KEYADDR=(2)                                            01145000
*                 JNLRBN=QMRBN;                                    0468 01146000
         L     @05,QMRBN(,QMPAPTR)                                 0468 01147000
         ST    @05,JNLRBN(,PARMXPTR)                               0468 01148000
*                 GEN(MODESET EXTKEY=SCHED );/* RESET KEY TO ONE     */ 01149000
         MODESET EXTKEY=SCHED                                           01150000
*               END;                                               0470 01151000
*             DRTRBN(ONE:FOUR)=JNLRBN;/* INSERT RBN INTO PREFIX      */ 01152000
@RF00459 MVC   DRTRBN(4),JNLRBN(PARMXPTR)                          0471 01153000
*           END;                                                   0472 01154000
*         DRTPTR=JNLBLKAD;          /* PTR TO THE BLOCK              */ 01155000
@RC00456 L     @04,JNLBLKAD(,PARMXPTR)                             0473 01156000
         STCM  @04,7,DRTPTR                                        0473 01157000
*         DRTID=JNLPID;             /* INSERT BLOCK ID               */ 01158000
         IC    @15,JNLPID(,PARMXPTR)                               0474 01159000
         STC   @15,DRTID                                           0474 01160000
*         DRTLNG=JNLPRLNG;          /* LENGTH OF BLK PLUS PREFIX     */ 01161000
         L     @15,JNLPRLNG-1(,PARMXPTR)                           0475 01162000
         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0475 01163000
         STCM  @15,7,DRTLNG                                        0475 01164000
*         DRTBLK(ONE:JNLPRLNG)=JNLBLKAD->TEMPBLK(ONE:JNLPRLNG);/*  0476 01165000
*                                                            @Z40FPPJ*/ 01166000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               0476 01167000
         EX    @15,@SM02710                                        0476 01168000
*         VIRTUAL=ADDR(DRTBK);      /* PASS THE PTR OF THE BLK       */ 01169000
         LA    VIRTUAL,DRTBK                                       0477 01170000
*         CALL JOURNAL;             /* JOURNAL THE BLOCK             */ 01171000
         BAL   @14,JOURNAL                                         0478 01172000
*       END;                                                       0479 01173000
*     ELSE                                                         0480 01174000
*       DO;                                                        0480 01175000
         B     @RC00454                                            0480 01176000
@RF00454 DS    0H                                                  0481 01177000
*         CALL ERRMSG;              /* ATTEMPT TO JOURNAL -          */ 01178000
         BAL   @14,ERRMSG                                          0481 01179000
*         ERROR=NOJL;               /* UNAUTHORIZED BLOCK            */ 01180000
         LA    ERROR,3                                             0482 01181000
*       END;                                                       0483 01182000
*     PARMXPTR=JNLNBLK;             /* POINT TO NEXT BLK     @Z40FPPJ*/ 01183000
@RC00454 L     PARMXPTR,JNLNBLK(,PARMXPTR)                         0484 01184000
*   END;                            /* NO MORE BLKS OR ERR   @Z40FPPJ*/ 01185000
@DE00449 LTR   PARMXPTR,PARMXPTR                                   0485 01186000
         BZ    @DC00449                                            0485 01187000
         C     ERROR,@CF00078                                      0485 01188000
         BL    @DL00449                                            0485 01189000
@DC00449 DS    0H                                                  0486 01190000
*   END DRTWRT;                                                    0486 01191000
@EL00010 DS    0H                                                  0486 01192000
@EF00010 DS    0H                                                  0486 01193000
@ER00010 LM    @14,@09,@SA00010                                    0486 01194000
         LM    @11,@12,@SA00010+48                                 0486 01195000
         BR    @14                                                 0486 01196000
@PB00010 DS    0H                                                  0486 01197000
*   END IEFXB500                                                   0487 01198000
*                                                                  0487 01199000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 01200000

         END   IEFXB500,(C'PLS2054',0701,76097)                         03832000
./  ADD  SSI=80590387,NAME=IEFXB601
         TITLE 'JOURNAL MERGE ROUTINE                                  *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEFXB601 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IEFXB601  78.059'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @11,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  LA    @09,4095(,@11)                                      0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@11                                         0001 00013000
         USING @PSTART+4095,@09                                    0001 00014000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00015000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00016000
         LR    @12,@01                                             0001 00017000
         USING @DATD,@12                                           0001 00018000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00019000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0001 00020000
         ST    @12,8(,@13)                                         0001 00021000
         LR    @13,@12                                             0001 00022000
         MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                                  0001 00023000
JSCBDISP EQU 188                                                        00024000
JSCBAOS1 EQU  72                                                        00025000
JSCBAOS2 EQU 192                                                        00026000
*                                                                  0295 00027000
*/* THIS IS THE CONTROL PROCEDURE FOR THE JOURNAL MERGE ROUTINE.IT   */ 00028000
*/* PERFORMS FIELD INITIALIZATION,DETERMINES THE TYPE OF RESTART     */ 00029000
*/* BEING REQUESTED AND PASSES CONTROL TO THE APPROPRIATE MERGE      */ 00030000
*/* ROUTINE.UPON RETURN IF AN ERROR HAS BEEN ENCOUNTERED CONTROL IS  */ 00031000
*/* PASSED TO AN ERROR PROCESSING ROUTINE.IF NO ERROR CONTROL IS     */ 00032000
*/* PASSED TO AN ADDRESS UPDATING ROUTINE TO UPDATE ALL CHAIN POINTER*/ 00033000
*/* FIELDS.THE FINAL ROUTINE TO RECEIVE CONTROL PERFORMS REQUIRED    */ 00034000
*/* CLEANUP PROCESSING.UPON RETURN FROM CLEANUP JOURNAL MERGE RETURNS*/ 00035000
*/* TO ITS CALLER WITH A RETURN CODE INDICATING SUCCESS OR FAILURE.  */ 00036000
*                                                                  0295 00037000
*   LASTSCT=LASTSCT&&LASTSCT;       /* ZERO SCT HOLDER               */ 00038000
         L     @03,LASTSCT                                         0295 00039000
         LR    @15,@03                                             0295 00040000
         XR    @15,@03                                             0295 00041000
         ST    @15,LASTSCT                                         0295 00042000
*   SAVESTAT=SAVESTAT&&SAVESTAT;    /* ZERO STATUS HOLDER            */ 00043000
         XC    SAVESTAT(1),SAVESTAT                                0296 00044000
*   CHKPTID=' ';                    /* CHECKID TO BLANKS     @YM07086*/ 00045000
         MVI   CHKPTID+1,C' '                                      0297 00046000
         MVC   CHKPTID+2(14),CHKPTID+1                             0297 00047000
         MVI   CHKPTID,C' '                                        0297 00048000
*   BEGINRBA=BEGINRBA&&BEGINRBA;    /* INITIALIZE JNL.RBA    @YM07086*/ 00049000
         XC    BEGINRBA(8),BEGINRBA                                0298 00050000
*   ALLOCRBA=ALLOCRBA&&ALLOCRBA;    /* INITIALIZE ALLOC. RBA @YM07086*/ 00051000
         XC    ALLOCRBA(8),ALLOCRBA                                0299 00052000
*   FIRSTJHR=OFFSW;                 /* INITIALIZE JHR SWITCH @YM07086*/ 00053000
         NI    FIRSTJHR,B'11111101'                                0300 00054000
*   BEGINPDS=ZERO;                  /* INITIALIZE PDSNTAB PTR        */ 00055000
         SLR   @03,@03                                             0301 00056000
         ST    @03,BEGINPDS                                        0301 00057000
*   FAILSTEP=OFFSW;                 /* INITIALIZE FAILING STEP SW.   */ 00058000
         NI    FAILSTEP,B'01111111'                                0302 00059000
*   RCAREA=ZERO;                    /* INITIALIZE INTERNAL AREA      */ 00060000
         SLR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0303 00061000
*   MSGSW=ZERO;                     /* INITIALIZE INTERNAL AREA      */ 00062000
         ST    @03,MSGSW                                           0304 00063000
*   JCTPTR=ZERO;                    /* INITIALIZE JCTPTR     @ZA13822*/ 00064000
         ST    @03,JCTPTR                                          0305 00065000
*   SHRFOUND=OFFSW;                 /* INITIALIZ SHRFOUND    @ZA13822*/ 00066000
         NI    SHRFOUND,B'01111111'                                0306 00067000

*   RESPECIFY                                                      0315 00088000
*     IFGRPL BASED(RPLPTR);         /* SET RPL PTR. BASE             */ 00089000
*   CALL READREC;                   /* READ A RECORD FROM JOURNAL    */ 00090000

         B     @RC00352                                            0357 00233000

*                 LCTRFBSM=OFFSW;   /* TURN OFF CALL IEFXB601 SWITCH    00235000

*                 LCTRFBRV=OFFSW;   /* TURN OFF SPECIAL WARMSTART  0359 00237000

         SLR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0361 00244000
*               END;                /* END NEW JOB PROC      @ZA13822*/ 00245000
*           END;                    /* END NEW JOB PROCESSING      0363 00246000
*                                                            @ZA13822*/ 00247000
*         ELSE                      /* OTHER THAN FIRST STEP @ZA13822*/ 00248000
*           DO;                     /* PROCESS AS JNL ERROR  @ZA13822*/ 00249000

@RF00344 DS    0H                                                  0365 00251000
*             JSCBJNLE=ON;          /* SET JNL ERROR BIT ON  @ZA13822*/ 00252000

         B     @RC00341                                            0369 00262000

*VAMPROC:                                                          0374 00284000
*   PROC;                           /* PROCESS FOR VAM BLOCKS        */ 00285000
@EL00001 L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0374 00286000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0374 00287000

         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00289000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0374 00290000
         BR    @14                                                 0374 00291000
VAMPROC  STM   @14,@04,@SA00002                                    0374 00292000
         STM   @06,@12,@SA00002+28                                 0374 00293000
*/* VAMPROC IS ENTERED WHENEVER A VDSCB OR A DSPCT HEADER IS FOUND   */ 00294000
*/* ON THE JOURNAL.IT CREATES A PARAMETER LIST DESCRIBING THE CONTROL*/ 00295000
*/* BLOCK AND THEN PASSES CONTROL TO EITHER THE WI OR VBP MERGE      */ 00296000
*/* ROUTINE.UPON RETURN IF THIS IS THE FIRST MERGE OF THE BLOCK IT   */ 00297000
*/* CREATES AN ENTRY IN THE VAT.IF AN ERROR WAS ENCOUNTERED IN THE   */ 00298000
*/* MERGE PROCESS A SWA ERROR INDICATION IS SET PRIOR TO RETURN.     */ 00299000
*                                                                  0375 00300000
*   IF JNLRBN>SAVERBN THEN          /* SAVE RBN IF HIGHER@YM08147    */ 00301000
         L     @10,JNLRBN                                          0375 00302000
         C     @10,SAVERBN                                         0375 00303000
         BNH   @RF00375                                            0375 00304000
*     SAVERBN=JNLRBN;               /* THAN CURRENT RBN      @YM08147*/ 00305000
         ST    @10,SAVERBN                                         0376 00306000
*   VAMBLKAD=ADDR(JNLBLK);          /* ADDRESS OF CONTROL BLOCK      */ 00307000
@RF00375 LA    @10,JNLBLK                                          0377 00308000
         ST    @10,VAMBLKAD                                        0377 00309000
*   VAMBLKID=JNLID;                 /* ID OF CONTROL BLOCK           */ 00310000
         MVC   VAMBLKID(1),JNLID                                   0378 00311000
*   VAMLNGTH=JNLLNGTH;              /* LENGTH OF CONTROL BLOCK       */ 00312000
         MVC   VAMLNGTH(3),JNLLNGTH                                0379 00313000
*   VAMRBN=JNLRBN;                  /* RBN OF CONTROL BLOCK          */ 00314000
         L     @10,JNLRBN                                          0380 00315000
         ST    @10,VAMRBN                                          0380 00316000
*   VAMNVA=VATNVA(BLKENTRY);                                       0381 00317000
         LR    @10,BLKENTRY                                        0381 00318000
         MH    @10,@CH02079                                        0381 00319000
         ALR   @10,VATPTR                                          0381 00320000
         ICM   @08,15,VATNVA-14(@10)                               0381 00321000
         ST    @08,VAMNVA                                          0381 00322000
*   VAMGETAD=ZERO;                  /* ZERO GETMAIN ADDRESS FIELD    */ 00323000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0382 00324000
         ST    @10,VAMGETAD                                        0382 00325000
*   IF JNLID=VDSCBID THEN           /* IF VDSCB CALL WI MERGE        */ 00326000
         CLI   JNLID,X'FC'                                         0383 00327000
         BNE   @RF00383                                            0383 00328000
*     CALL IDDWIMRG(MRGEPARM);                                     0384 00329000
         LA    @10,MRGEPARM                                        0384 00330000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0384 00331000
         L     @15,@CV02872                                        0384 00332000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0384 00333000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0384 00334000
*   ELSE                                                           0385 00335000
*     CALL IDAVBPJ2(MRGEPARM);      /* DSPCT HEADER CALL VBP MERGE   */ 00336000
         B     @RC00383                                            0385 00337000
@RF00383 LA    @10,MRGEPARM                                        0385 00338000
         ST    @10,@AL00001                                        0385 00339000
         L     @15,@CV02873                                        0385 00340000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0385 00341000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0385 00342000
*   IF RETCODE=ZERO THEN           /* ERROR DURING MERGE PROCESS    */ 00343000
@RC00383 LTR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0386 00344000
         BZ    @RF00386                                            0386 00345000
*     DO;                                                          0387 00346000
*       RCAREA=SWAERR;              /* SET ERROR CODE                */ 00347000
         LA    RCAREA,8                                            0388 00348000
*       PUTENTRY=OFFSW;             /* TERMINATE LOOP                */ 00349000
         NI    PUTENTRY,B'10111111'                                0389 00350000
*     END;                                                         0390 00351000
*   IF(VAMGETAD=ZERO&RCAREA=ZERO) THEN/* DO ONLY IF NO ERROR        */ 00352000
@RF00386 L     @10,VAMGETAD                                        0391 00353000
         SLR   @08,@08                                             0391 00354000
         CR    @10,@08                                             0391 00355000
         BE    @RF00391                                            0391 00356000
         CR    RCAREA,@08                                          0391 00357000
         BNE   @RF00391                                            0391 00358000
*     DO;                                                          0392 00359000
*       VATOVA(BLKENTRY)=JNLVA;     /* FILL IN OLD VIRTUAL ADDRESS   */ 00360000
         LR    @08,BLKENTRY                                        0393 00361000
         MH    @08,@CH02079                                        0393 00362000
         L     @06,JNLVA-1                                         0393 00363000
         LA    @06,0(,@06)                                         0393 00364000
         ST    @08,@TF00001                                        0393 00365000
         ALR   @08,VATPTR                                          0393 00366000
         STCM  @06,15,VATOVA-14(@08)                               0393 00367000
*       VATNVA(BLKENTRY)=VAMGETAD;  /* ADDRESS RETURNED BY MERGE     */ 00368000
         LR    @08,VATPTR                                          0394 00369000
         AL    @08,@TF00001                                        0394 00370000
         STCM  @10,15,VATNVA-14(@08)                               0394 00371000
*       VATRBN(BLKENTRY)=JNLRBN;    /* FILL IN RBN IN VAT ENTRY      */ 00372000
         L     @10,JNLRBN                                          0395 00373000
         LR    @08,VATPTR                                          0395 00374000
         AL    @08,@TF00001                                        0395 00375000
         BCTR  @08,0                                               0395 00376000
         BCTR  @08,0                                               0395 00377000
         STCM  @10,15,VATRBN-12(@08)                               0395 00378000
*       VATBLKID(BLKENTRY)=JNLID;   /* FILL IN BLOCK ID IN VAT       */ 00379000
         LR    @10,VATPTR                                          0396 00380000
         AL    @10,@TF00001                                        0396 00381000
         MVC   VATBLKID-14(1,@10),JNLID                            0396 00382000
*       IF JNLID=DSPCTHID THEN      /* IS THIS A DSPCT HEADER?       */ 00383000
         CLI   JNLID,X'FE'                                         0397 00384000
         BNE   @RF00397                                            0397 00385000
*         VATNUPDT(BLKENTRY)=ON;    /* NO NEED TO UPDATE BLOCK       */ 00386000
         LR    @10,VATPTR                                          0398 00387000
         AL    @10,@TF00001                                        0398 00388000
         OI    VATNUPDT-14(@10),B'10000000'                        0398 00389000
*       PUTENTRY=OFFSW;             /* TERMINATE LOOP                */ 00390000
@RF00397 DS    0H                                                  0400 00391000
*       ENTMADE=ON;                 /* ENTRY MADE IN VAT             */ 00392000
         OI    ENTMADE,B'00100000'                                 0400 00393000
         NI    PUTENTRY,B'10111111'                                0400 00394000
*     END;                                                         0401 00395000
*   END VAMPROC;                                                   0402 00396000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0402 00397000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0402 00398000
@ER00002 LM    @14,@04,@SA00002                                    0402 00399000
         LM    @06,@12,@SA00002+28                                 0402 00400000
         BR    @14                                                 0402 00401000
*SYSMERGE:                                                         0403 00402000
*   PROC;                           /* SYSTEM RESTART MERGE          */ 00403000
SYSMERGE STM   @14,@01,@SA00003                                    0403 00404000
         STM   @03,@04,@SA00003+16                                 0403 00405000
         ST    @06,@SA00003+24                                     0403 00406000
         STM   @08,@09,@SA00003+28                                 0403 00407000
         STM   @11,@12,@SA00003+36                                 0403 00408000
*/* SYSMERGE IS ENTERED TO PERFORM CONTROL BLOCK MERGING FOR SYSTEM  */ 00409000
*/* RESTARTS,CONTINUE RESTARTS,OR FOR NON-FAILING STEP MERGES FOR    */ 00410000
*/* AUTO. STEP OR AUTO. CHECKPOINT RESTARTS.IT PASSES CONTROL TO     */ 00411000
*/* READREC TO READ A RECORD FROM THE JOURNAL.UPON SUCCESSFUL RETURN */ 00412000
*/* IT PASSES CONTROL TO VATPUT TO PLACE THE BLOCKS ENTRY IN THE VAT.*/ 00413000
*/* UPON SUCCESSFUL RETURN IT PASSES CONTROL TO READLOC TO DETERMINE */ 00414000
*/* THE ACTUAL LOCATION OF THE BLOCK IN SWA. UPON SUCCESSFUL RETURN  */ 00415000
*/* IT SCANS A TABLE OF TEMPLATES TO DETERMINES THE FIELDS THAT MUST */ 00416000
*/* BE MERGED AND THEN PASSES CONTROL TO FLDMERGE TO PERFORM ACTUAL  */ 00417000
*/* FIELD MERGING.                                                   */ 00418000
*/*                                                                  */ 00419000
*/* ANY ERROR ENCOUNTERED BY SYSMERGE OR ANY OF ITS CALLED ROUTINES  */ 00420000
*/* WILL CAUSE THE RESTART TO BE TERMINATED AND AN ERROR INDICATION  */ 00421000
*/* SENT BACK TO THE MAIN PROCEDURE IDENTIFYING THE TYPE OF ERROR    */ 00422000
*/* READ RECORDS UNTIL END OF FILE OR ERROR OCCURS,OR A STEP HEADER  */ 00423000
*/* RECORD IS ENCOUNTERED FOR AN AUTOMATIC RESTART.                  */ 00424000
*                                                                  0404 00425000
*   DO WHILE(RCAREA=ZERO&(FAILSTEP=OFFSW|JNLID=ISJEID));          0404 00426000
         B     @DE00404                                            0404 00427000
@DL00404 DS    0H                                                  0405 00428000
*     CALL READREC;                 /* READ A RECORD FROM JOURNAL    */ 00429000
         BAL   @14,READREC                                         0405 00430000
*     IF(RCAREA=ZERO&JNLID=ISJEID) THEN/* MERGE CONTROL BLOCKS      */ 00431000
         LTR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0406 00432000
         BNZ   @RF00406                                            0406 00433000
         CLI   JNLID,X'C0'                                         0406 00434000
         BE    @RF00406                                            0406 00435000
*       DO;                                                        0407 00436000
*         CALL VATPUT;              /* PUT ENTRY IN THE VAT          */ 00437000
         BAL   @14,VATPUT                                          0408 00438000
*         IF(RCAREA=ZERO&ENTMADE=ON&JNLID=VDSCBID&JNLID=DSPCTHID)     00439000
*           THEN                                                   0409 00440000
         LTR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0409 00441000
         BNZ   @RF00409                                            0409 00442000
         TM    ENTMADE,B'00100000'                                 0409 00443000
         BNO   @RF00409                                            0409 00444000
         CLI   JNLID,X'FC'                                         0409 00445000
         BE    @RF00409                                            0409 00446000
         CLI   JNLID,X'FE'                                         0409 00447000
         BE    @RF00409                                            0409 00448000
*           DO;                                                    0410 00449000
*             CALL READLOC;         /* ISSUE READ LOCATE FOR BLK.    */ 00450000
         BAL   @14,READLOC                                         0411 00451000
*/* DEPENDING UPON TYPE OF BLOCK RETURNED BY THE READ SELECT THE     */ 00452000
*/* PROPER TEMPLATE TO PERFORM FIELD MERGING.                        */ 00453000
*                                                                  0412 00454000
*             IF SWBLKID=ISIOTID THEN/* IS THIS A SIOT               */ 00455000
         L     @06,SWEPAPTR                                        0412 00456000
         CLI   SWBLKID(@06),X'03'                                  0412 00457000
         BNE   @RF00412                                            0412 00458000
*               IF VATDYNAM(BLKENTRY)=ON THEN/* IS THIS A DYNAMIC  0413 00459000
*                                      SIOT                          */ 00460000
         LR    @06,BLKENTRY                                        0413 00461000
         MH    @06,@CH02079                                        0413 00462000
         ALR   @06,VATPTR                                          0413 00463000
         TM    VATDYNAM-14(@06),B'01000000'                        0413 00464000
         BNO   @RF00413                                            0413 00465000
*                 UPDTID=IDSIOTID;  /* YES CHANGE ID FOR UPDATE      */ 00466000
         MVI   UPDTID,X'FF'                                        0414 00467000
*               ELSE                                               0415 00468000
*                 UPDTID=SWBLKID;   /* USE ID RETURNED BY READ       */ 00469000
         B     @RC00413                                            0415 00470000
@RF00413 L     @06,SWEPAPTR                                        0415 00471000

*             ELSE                                                 0416 00473000
*               UPDTID=SWBLKID;     /* USE ID RETURNED BY READ       */ 00474000
         B     @RC00412                                            0416 00475000
@RF00412 L     @06,SWEPAPTR                                        0416 00476000
         MVC   UPDTID(1),SWBLKID(@06)                              0416 00477000
*             TEMPPTR=ZERO;         /* ZERO THE TEMPLATE POINTER     */ 00478000
@RC00412 SLR   TEMPPTR,TEMPPTR                                     0417 00479000
*/*      FOR AUTO STEP OR AUTO CKPT RESTART JCT MUST BE MERGED       */ 00480000
*/*      DIFFERENTLY THEN FOR SYSTEM RESTART.                        */ 00481000
*                                                                  0418 00482000
*             IF(UPDTID=IJCTID&(MELRSTRT=AUTOSTEP|MELRSTRT=AUTOCKPT))   00483000
*               THEN                                               0418 00484000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'00'                                        0418 00485000
         BNE   @RF00418                                            0418 00486000
         L     @03,@PC00001                                        0418 00487000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@03),X'80'                                 0418 00488000
         BE    @RT00418                                            0418 00489000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@03),X'40'                                 0418 00490000
         BNE   @RF00418                                            0418 00491000
@RT00418 DS    0H                                                  0419 00492000
*               DO;                                                0419 00493000
*                 IF MELRSTRT=AUTOSTEP THEN/* IS THIS AUTO STEP    0420 00494000
*                                      RESTART                       */ 00495000
         L     @06,@PC00001                                        0420 00496000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@06),X'80'                                 0420 00497000
         BNE   @RF00420                                            0420 00498000
*                   DO;                                            0421 00499000
*                     TEMPPTR=ADDR(JCTFST);/* ADDRESS OF JCT TEMPLATE*/ 00500000
         LA    TEMPPTR,JCTFST                                      0422 00501000
*                     ENTREE=DIM(JCTFST);/* NUMBER OF ENTREES TO   0423 00502000
*                                      MERGE                         */ 00503000
         MVC   ENTREE(4),@CF00058                                  0423 00504000
*                   END;                                           0424 00505000
*                 ELSE                                             0425 00506000
*                   DO;             /* THIS IS AUTO CKPT.            */ 00507000
         B     @RC00420                                            0425 00508000
@RF00420 DS    0H                                                  0426 00509000
*                     TEMPPTR=ADDR(JCTFCR);/* ADDRESS OF JCT TEMPLATE*/ 00510000
         LA    TEMPPTR,JCTFCR                                      0426 00511000
*                     ENTREE=DIM(JCTFCR);/* NUMBER OF ENTREES TO   0427 00512000
*                                      MERGE                         */ 00513000
         MVC   ENTREE(4),@CF02079                                  0427 00514000
*                   END;                                           0428 00515000
*                 JNLBLKAD=ADDR(JNLBLK);/* ADDRESS OF JOURNAL BLOCK  */ 00516000
@RC00420 LA    JNLBLKAD,JNLBLK                                     0429 00517000
*                 JCTPDIP=JNLBLKAD->JCTPDIP;/* RESTORE PDI POINTER   */ 00518000
         L     @15,JCTPTR                                          0430 00519000
         MVC   JCTPDIP(3,@15),JCTPDIP(JNLBLKAD)                    0430 00520000
*                 JCTGDGNT=JNLBLKAD->JCTGDGNT;/* RESTORE GDG NAME  0431 00521000
*                                      TBL.PTR                       */ 00522000
         MVC   JCTGDGNT(3,@15),JCTGDGNT(JNLBLKAD)                  0431 00523000
*               END;                                               0432 00524000
*             ELSE                                                 0433 00525000
*                                                                  0433 00526000
*/* SCAN TABLE OF TEMPLATES UNTIL A MATCH IS FOUND                   */ 00527000
*                                                                  0433 00528000
*               DO TEMPNO=ONE TO DIM(TEMPSRFM) WHILE(TEMPPTR=ZERO);     00529000
         B     @RC00418                                            0433 00530000
@RF00418 LA    TEMPNO,1                                            0433 00531000
@DL00433 LTR   TEMPPTR,TEMPPTR                                     0433 00532000
         BNZ   @DC00433                                            0433 00533000
*                 IF TEMPSRID(TEMPNO)=UPDTID THEN/* DO THE ID'S    0434 00534000
*                                      MATCH?                        */ 00535000
         LR    @15,TEMPNO                                          0434 00536000
         MH    @15,@CH00769                                        0434 00537000
         LA    @14,TEMPSRID-5(@15)                                 0434 00538000
         CLC   0(1,@14),UPDTID                                     0434 00539000
         BNE   @RF00434                                            0434 00540000
*                   DO;                                            0435 00541000
*                     TEMPPTR=TEMPSRAD(TEMPNO);/* TEMPLATE ADDRESS   */ 00542000
         L     TEMPPTR,TEMPSRAD-6(@15)                             0436 00543000
         LA    TEMPPTR,0(,TEMPPTR)                                 0436 00544000
*                     ENTREE=TEMPSRNO(TEMPNO);/* NO. OF FIELDS TO  0437 00545000
*                                      UPDATE                        */ 00546000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0437 00547000
         IC    @14,TEMPSRNO-5(@15)                                 0437 00548000
         ST    @14,ENTREE                                          0437 00549000
*                   END;                                           0438 00550000
*               END;                                               0439 00551000
@RF00434 AL    TEMPNO,@CF00085                                     0439 00552000
         C     TEMPNO,@CF00033                                     0439 00553000
         BNH   @DL00433                                            0439 00554000
@DC00433 DS    0H                                                  0440 00555000
*             IF TEMPPTR=ZERO THEN  /* TEMPLATE MATCH NOT FOUND      */ 00556000
@RC00418 LTR   TEMPPTR,TEMPPTR                                     0440 00557000
         BNZ   @RF00440                                            0440 00558000
*               RCAREA=SWAERR;      /* SET ERROR CODE                */ 00559000
         LA    RCAREA,8                                            0441 00560000
*             ELSE                                                 0442 00561000
*               CALL FLDMERGE;      /* MERGE REQUIRED FIELDS         */ 00562000
         B     @RC00440                                            0442 00563000
@RF00440 BAL   @14,FLDMERGE                                        0442 00564000
*             IF UPDTID=ISIOTID THEN/* IS THIS A SIOT?       @YM06109*/ 00565000
@RC00440 CLI   UPDTID,X'03'                                        0443 00566000
         BNE   @RF00443                                            0443 00567000
*               SIOTDSPD=ON;        /* TURN ON DISP.PROCESSED        */ 00568000
         L     @06,SIOTPTR                                         0444 00569000
         OI    SIOTDSPD(@06),B'01000000'                           0444 00570000
*             IF(UPDTID=IJCTID&MELRSTRT=SYSRSTRT&INALLOC=ON) THEN  0445 00571000
@RF00443 CLI   UPDTID,X'00'                                        0445 00572000
         BNE   @RF00445                                            0445 00573000
         L     @06,@PC00001                                        0445 00574000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@06),X'08'                                 0445 00575000
         BNE   @RF00445                                            0445 00576000
         TM    INALLOC,B'00000100'                                 0445 00577000
         BNO   @RF00445                                            0445 00578000
*               JCTVULDP=ZERO;      /* ZERO VUT POINTER              */ 00579000
         L     @06,JCTPTR                                          0446 00580000
         SLR   @03,@03                                             0446 00581000
         STCM  @03,7,JCTVULDP(@06)                                 0446 00582000
*             IF(MELRSTRT=AUTOCKPT&UPDTID=IJCTID) THEN/* IS THIS A 0447 00583000
*                                      JCT?                          */ 00584000
@RF00445 L     @06,@PC00001                                        0447 00585000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@06),X'40'                                 0447 00586000
         BNE   @RF00447                                            0447 00587000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'00'                                        0447 00588000
         BNE   @RF00447                                            0447 00589000
*               CHKPTID=JCTCKIDT;   /* SAVE CHECKPOINT ID.@YM07086   */ 00590000
         L     @06,JCTPTR                                          0448 00591000
         MVC   CHKPTID(16),JCTCKIDT(@06)                           0448 00592000
*           END;                                                   0449 00593000
*       END;                                                       0450 00594000
*     ELSE                          /* THIS IS A STEP HEADER RCD.    */ 00595000
*       IF MELSCTNO=SHRSNUMB THEN   /* IS IT FOR FAILING STEP?       */ 00596000
         B     @RC00406                                            0451 00597000
@RF00406 L     @06,@PC00001                                        0451 00598000
         LA    @03,JNLBLK                                          0451 00599000
         LH    @06,MELSCTNO(,@06)                                  0451 00600000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0451 00601000
         ICM   @15,3,SHRSNUMB(@03)                                 0451 00602000
         CR    @06,@15                                             0451 00603000
         BNE   @RF00451                                            0451 00604000
*         FAILSTEP=ON;              /* FAILING STEP FOUND            */ 00605000
         OI    FAILSTEP,B'10000000'                                0452 00606000
*   END;                                                           0453 00607000
@RF00451 DS    0H                                                  0453 00608000
@RC00406 DS    0H                                                  0453 00609000
@DE00404 LTR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0453 00610000
         BNZ   @DC00404                                            0453 00611000
         TM    FAILSTEP,B'10000000'                                0453 00612000
         BZ    @DL00404                                            0453 00613000
         CLI   JNLID,X'C0'                                         0453 00614000
         BNE   @DL00404                                            0453 00615000
@DC00404 DS    0H                                                  0454 00616000
*   END SYSMERGE;                                                  0454 00617000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0454 00618000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0454 00619000
@ER00003 LM    @14,@01,@SA00003                                    0454 00620000
         LM    @03,@04,@SA00003+16                                 0454 00621000
         L     @06,@SA00003+24                                     0454 00622000
         LM    @08,@09,@SA00003+28                                 0454 00623000
         LM    @11,@12,@SA00003+36                                 0454 00624000
         BR    @14                                                 0454 00625000
*READLOC:                                                          0455 00626000
*   PROC;                           /* PERFORMS READ LOCATE ON BLK   */ 00627000
READLOC  STM   @14,@09,@SA00004                                    0455 00628000
         STM   @11,@12,@SA00004+48                                 0455 00629000
*/* READLOC IS ENTERED WHENEVER THE LOCATION OF A CONTROL BLOCK IN   */ 00630000
*/* SWA IS REQUIRED. THE ROUTINE USES THE SWA MANAGER READ LOCATE    */ 00631000
*/* FUNCTION TO DETERMINE THE CONTROL BLOCKS LOCATION AND RETURNS    */ 00632000
*/* THE ADDRESS TO THE CALLER.                                       */ 00633000
*                                                                  0456 00634000
*   SWEPAPTR=ADDR(LOCEPA);          /* INITIALIZE EPA POINTER        */ 00635000
         LA    @08,LOCEPA                                          0456 00636000
         ST    @08,SWEPAPTR                                        0456 00637000
*   SWVA=VATRNVA(BLKENTRY);         /* FILL IN SWA ADDRESS IN EPA    */ 00638000
         LR    @06,BLKENTRY                                        0457 00639000
         MH    @06,@CH02079                                        0457 00640000
         ALR   @06,VATPTR                                          0457 00641000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@08),VATRNVA-14(@06)                         0457 00642000
*   SWCHNPTR=ZERO;                  /* EPA CHAIN POINTER ZEROED      */ 00643000
*                                                                  0458 00644000
         SLR   @06,@06                                             0458 00645000
         ST    @06,SWCHNPTR(,@08)                                  0458 00646000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00647000
*   /*                                                               */ 00648000
*   /* ?SWAREQ (RL) EPA (SWEPAPTR);                                  */ 00649000
*   /*                                                               */ 00650000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00651000
*                                                                  0459 00652000
*   CALL SWAMGR(SWEPAPTR,'RL');     /* ISSUE READ LOCATE             */ 00653000
         LA    @08,SWEPAPTR                                        0459 00654000
         ST    @08,@AL00001                                        0459 00655000
         LA    @08,@CC02923                                        0459 00656000
         ST    @08,@AL00001+4                                      0459 00657000
         L     @08,CVTPTR                                          0459 00658000
         L     @08,CVTJESCT(,@08)                                  0459 00659000
         L     @15,JESWAA(,@08)                                    0459 00660000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0459 00661000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0459 00662000
*   SWAPTR=SWBLKPTR;                /* INITIALIZE SWA POINTER        */ 00663000
         L     @08,SWEPAPTR                                        0460 00664000
         L     @06,SWBLKPTR(,@08)                                  0460 00665000
         ST    @06,SWAPTR                                          0460 00666000
*   IF SWBLKID=IJCTID THEN          /* SAVE ADDRESS OF JCT           */ 00667000
         CLI   SWBLKID(@08),X'00'                                  0461 00668000
         BNE   @RF00461                                            0461 00669000
*     JCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;                                             0462 00670000
         ST    @06,JCTPTR                                          0462 00671000
*   IF SWBLKID=IJFCBID THEN         /* IS THIS A JFCB?       @YM07074*/ 00672000
@RF00461 L     @08,SWEPAPTR                                        0463 00673000
         CLI   SWBLKID(@08),X'1C'                                  0463 00674000
         BNE   @RF00463                                            0463 00675000
*     JFCBPTR=SWBLKPTR;             /* INITIALIZE JFCB PTR@YM07074   */ 00676000
         L     JFCBPTR,SWBLKPTR(,@08)                              0464 00677000
*   IF SWBLKID=ISCTID THEN          /* IS THIS AN SCT?               */ 00678000
@RF00463 L     @08,SWEPAPTR                                        0465 00679000
         CLI   SWBLKID(@08),X'02'                                  0465 00680000
         BNE   @RF00465                                            0465 00681000
*     DO;                                                          0466 00682000
*       SCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;            /* INITIALIZE PTR.               */ 00683000
         L     @08,SWBLKPTR(,@08)                                  0467 00684000
         ST    @08,SCTPTR                                          0467 00685000
*       LASTSCT=VATNVA(BLKENTRY);   /* SAVE SVA                      */ 00686000
         LR    @08,BLKENTRY                                        0468 00687000
         MH    @08,@CH02079                                        0468 00688000
         ALR   @08,VATPTR                                          0468 00689000
         ICM   @06,15,VATNVA-14(@08)                               0468 00690000
         ST    @06,LASTSCT                                         0468 00691000
*     END;                                                         0469 00692000
*   IF SWBLKID=ISIOTID THEN         /* IS THIS A SIOT?       @YM06109*/ 00693000
@RF00465 L     @08,SWEPAPTR                                        0470 00694000
         CLI   SWBLKID(@08),X'03'                                  0470 00695000
         BNE   @RF00470                                            0470 00696000
*     SIOTPTR=SWBLKPTR;             /* INITIALIZE SIOT POINTER       */ 00697000
         L     @08,SWBLKPTR(,@08)                                  0471 00698000
         ST    @08,SIOTPTR                                         0471 00699000
*   END READLOC;                                                   0472 00700000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0472 00701000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0472 00702000
@ER00004 LM    @14,@09,@SA00004                                    0472 00703000
         LM    @11,@12,@SA00004+48                                 0472 00704000
         BR    @14                                                 0472 00705000
*READREC:                                                          0473 00706000
*   PROC;                           /* USED TO READ FROM JOURNAL     */ 00707000
READREC  STM   @14,@04,@SA00005                                    0473 00708000
         STM   @06,@12,@SA00005+28                                 0473 00709000
*/* READREC IS ENTERED WHENEVER A CONTROL BLOCK MUST BE READ FROM THE*/ 00710000
*/* JOURNAL.AFTER INITIALIZING REQUIRED FIELDS IN THE RPL READREC    */ 00711000
*/* ISSUES THE GET MACRO INSTRUCTION.                                */ 00712000
*/* ANY ERROR ENCOUNTERED WILL RESULT IN THE JOURNAL ERROR INDICATOR */ 00713000
*/* BEING SET.                                                       */ 00714000
*                                                                  0474 00715000
*   RECFOUND=OFFSW;                 /* INITIALIZE LOOP CONTROL SW.   */ 00716000
         NI    RECFOUND,B'11111110'                                0474 00717000
*   DO WHILE(RECFOUND=OFFSW);       /* READ UNTIL NON-JHR FOUND      */ 00718000
         B     @DE00475                                            0475 00719000
@DL00475 DS    0H                                                  0476 00720000
*     RPLAREA=ADDR(JNLBUF);         /* ADDRESS OF JOURNAL BUFFER     */ 00721000
         LA    @10,JNLBUF                                          0476 00722000
         ST    @10,RPLAREA(,RPLPTR)                                0476 00723000
*     RPLBUFL=BUFLNGTH;             /* LENGTH OF JOURNAL BUFFER      */ 00724000
         MVC   RPLBUFL(4,RPLPTR),@CF02638                          0477 00725000
*     RPLSEQ=ON;                    /* SEQUENTIAL ACCESS             */ 00726000
         OI    RPLSEQ(RPLPTR),B'00100000'                          0478 00727000
*     RPLADR=ON;                    /* ACCESS BY ADDRESS             */ 00728000
         OI    RPLADR(RPLPTR),B'01000000'                          0479 00729000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0480 00730000
*       R2 RESTRICTED;              /* RESTRICT REGISTER 2           */ 00731000
*     R2=JSCBJNLR;                  /* ADDRESS OF JOURNAL RPL        */ 00732000
         L     R2,JSCBJNLR(,JSCBPTR)                               0481 00733000
*     GEN;                                                         0482 00734000
        GET   RPL=(R2)                ISSUE GET TO THE JOB JOURNAL      00735000
*     IF(RETCODE=ZERO|(JNLID=JHRID&FIRSTJHR=ON)) THEN/*     @YM07086*/ 00736000
         LTR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0483 00737000
         BNZ   @RT00483                                            0483 00738000
         CLI   JNLID,X'C1'                                         0483 00739000
         BNE   @RF00483                                            0483 00740000
         TM    FIRSTJHR,B'00000010'                                0483 00741000
         BNO   @RF00483                                            0483 00742000
@RT00483 DS    0H                                                  0484 00743000
*       DO;                         /* OPERATION CHECK FOR EOF       */ 00744000
*         RECFOUND=ON;              /* GET OUT OF READ LOOP          */ 00745000
*                                                                  0485 00746000
         OI    RECFOUND,B'00000001'                                0485 00747000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00748000
*         /*                                                         */ 00749000
*         /* IF RPL INDICATES PHYSICAL END OF FILE OR SECOND JOB HDR */ 00750000
*         /* RECORD INDICATES LOGICAL END OF FILE THEN STOP READING. */ 00751000
*         /* IF RPL INDICATES OTHER THAN PHYSICAL END OF FILE,THIS IS*/ 00752000
*         /* AN ERROR CONDITION.                                     */ 00753000
*         /*                                                         */ 00754000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00755000
*                                                                  0486 00756000
*         IF((RPLERRCD=RPLEODER&RETCODE=JOURNEND)|JNLID=JHRID) THEN     00757000
         CLI   RPLERRCD(RPLPTR),4                                  0486 00758000
         BNE   @GL00023                                            0486 00759000
         C     RETCODE,@CF00058                                    0486 00760000
         BE    @RT00486                                            0486 00761000
@GL00023 CLI   JNLID,X'C1'                                         0486 00762000
         BNE   @RF00486                                            0486 00763000
@RT00486 DS    0H                                                  0487 00764000
*           RCAREA=ENDFILE;         /* STOP READ PROCESS     @YM07086*/ 00765000
         LA    RCAREA,28                                           0487 00766000
*         ELSE                                                     0488 00767000
*           RCAREA=JOURNERR;        /* INDICATES ERROR COND.         */ 00768000
         B     @RC00486                                            0488 00769000
@RF00486 LA    RCAREA,4                                            0488 00770000
*       END;                                                       0489 00771000
*     ELSE                                                         0490 00772000
*       DO;                                                        0490 00773000
         B     @RC00483                                            0490 00774000
@RF00483 DS    0H                                                  0491 00775000
*         IF(JNLID=JHRID&FIRSTJHR=OFFSW) THEN/* FIRST JHR?   @YM07086*/ 00776000
         CLI   JNLID,X'C1'                                         0491 00777000
         BNE   @RF00491                                            0491 00778000
         TM    FIRSTJHR,B'00000010'                                0491 00779000
         BNZ   @RF00491                                            0491 00780000
*           DO;                                                    0492 00781000
*             FIRSTJHR=ON;          /* FIRST JHR FOUND       @YM07086*/ 00782000
         OI    FIRSTJHR,B'00000010'                                0493 00783000
*             JSCBFRBA=RPLRBAR;     /* SAVE RBA OF FIRST JHR @YM07086*/ 00784000
         MVC   JSCBFRBA(8,JSCBPTR),RPLRBAR(RPLPTR)                 0494 00785000
*             IF JHRJRBA=BEGINRBA THEN/* PUT OUT AFTER RESTART    0495 00786000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 00787000
         LA    @10,JNLBLK                                          0495 00788000
         CLC   JHRJRBA(8,@10),BEGINRBA                             0495 00789000
         BE    @RF00495                                            0495 00790000
*               DO;                                                0496 00791000
*                 RPLRBAR=JHRJRBA;  /* RBA FOR JNL. POINT    @YM07086*/ 00792000
         MVC   RPLRBAR(8,RPLPTR),JHRJRBA(@10)                      0497 00793000
*                 RPLARG=ADDR(RPLRBAR);/* ADDRESS OF RBA     @YM07086*/ 00794000
         LA    @10,RPLRBAR(,RPLPTR)                                0498 00795000
         ST    @10,RPLARG(,RPLPTR)                                 0498 00796000
*                 R2=JSCBJNLR;      /* INITIALIZE RPL POINTER      0499 00797000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 00798000
         L     R2,JSCBJNLR(,JSCBPTR)                               0499 00799000
*                 GEN(POINT RPL=(R2));/* ISSUE POINT         @YM07086*/ 00800000
         POINT RPL=(R2)                                                 00801000
*                 IF RETCODE=ZERO THEN/* ERROR DURING POINT@YM07086 */ 00802000
         LTR   RETCODE,RETCODE                                     0501 00803000
         BZ    @RF00501                                            0501 00804000
*                   DO;                                            0502 00805000
*                     JSCBJNLE=ON;  /* TURN ON JOURNAL ERROR BIT   0503 00806000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 00807000
         OI    JSCBJNLE(JSCBPTR),B'00100000'                       0503 00808000
*                     RCAREA=JOURNERR;/* INDICATES JOURNAL ERROR     */ 00809000
         LA    RCAREA,4                                            0504 00810000
*                     RECFOUND=ON;  /* GET OUT OF READ LOOP  @YM07086*/ 00811000
         OI    RECFOUND,B'00000001'                                0505 00812000
*                   END;                                           0506 00813000
*                 ALLOCRBA=JHRALRBA;/* RBA OF ALLOCATION BLOCKS    0507 00814000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 00815000
@RF00501 LA    @10,JNLBLK                                          0507 00816000
         MVC   ALLOCRBA(8),JHRALRBA(@10)                           0507 00817000
*               END;                                               0508 00818000
*           END;                                                   0509 00819000
*         ELSE                                                     0510 00820000
*           RECFOUND=ON;            /* NON-JHR FOUND         @YM07086*/ 00821000
         B     @RC00491                                            0510 00822000
@RF00491 OI    RECFOUND,B'00000001'                                0510 00823000
*         IF JNLID=IJFCBID THEN     /* IS THIS A JFCB?       @YM07074*/ 00824000
@RC00491 CLI   JNLID,X'1C'                                         0511 00825000
         BNE   @RF00511                                            0511 00826000
*           OJFCBPTR=ADDR(JNLBLK);  /* INITIALIZE JFCB PTR@YM07074   */ 00827000
         LA    @10,JNLBLK                                          0512 00828000
         ST    @10,OJFCBPTR                                        0512 00829000
*         IF(MELRSTRT=SYSRSTRT&JNLID=IJCTID) THEN/* JCT AND SYSTEM 0513 00830000
*                                      RESTART                       */ 00831000
@RF00511 L     @10,@PC00001                                        0513 00832000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@10),X'08'                                 0513 00833000
         BNE   @RF00513                                            0513 00834000
         CLI   JNLID,X'00'                                         0513 00835000
         BNE   @RF00513                                            0513 00836000
*           DO;                                                    0514 00837000
*             JNLBLKAD=ADDR(JNLBLK);/* SAVE JNL.JCT PTR.             */ 00838000
         LA    JNLBLKAD,JNLBLK                                     0515 00839000
*             SAVESTAT=JNLBLKAD->JCTJSB;/* SAVE JOB STATUS           */ 00840000

         STC   @10,SAVESTAT                                        0516 00842000
*           END;                                                   0517 00843000
*       END;                                                       0518 00844000
@RF00513 DS    0H                                                  0519 00845000
*   END;                                                           0519 00846000
@RC00483 DS    0H                                                  0519 00847000
@DE00475 TM    RECFOUND,B'00000001'                                0519 00848000
         BZ    @DL00475                                            0519 00849000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0520 00850000
*     R2 UNRESTRICTED;              /* UNRESTRICT REGISTER 2         */ 00851000
*   END READREC;                    /* END OF READ OPERATION         */ 00852000

@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0521 00854000
