*FLDMERGE:                                                         0522 00858000
*   PROC;                           /* USED FOR FIELD MERGING        */ 00859000
FLDMERGE STM   @14,@12,@SA00006                                    0522 00860000
*/* FLDMERGE IS A GENERALIZED ROUTINE THAT PERFORMS THE ACTUAL FIELD */ 00861000
*/* MERGING FROM THE CONTROL BLOCK ON THE JOURNAL TO THE ONE IN SWA. */ 00862000
*/* IT IS TEMPLATE DRIVEN AND MERGES FIELDS BASED ON THE TEMPLATE    */ 00863000
*/* STRUCTURE.THE TEMPLATES MAP THE DISPLACEMENTS AND LENGTHS OF ALL */ 00864000
*/* FIELDS REQUIRING MERGING FOR ALL JOURNALLED CONTROL BLOCKS.      */ 00865000
*                                                                  0523 00866000
*   IF(JNLID=IJFCBID&MELRSTRT=SYSRSTRT) THEN/* JFCB AND AUTO RESTART*/ 00867000
         CLI   JNLID,X'1C'                                         0523 00868000
         BNE   @RF00523                                            0523 00869000
         L     @08,@PC00001                                        0523 00870000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@08),X'08'                                 0523 00871000
         BE    @RF00523                                            0523 00872000
*     IF JFCTEMP=ON THEN            /* IS THIS A TEMPORARY DS?       */ 00873000
         TM    JFCTEMP(JFCBPTR),B'00000001'                        0524 00874000
         BNO   @RF00524                                            0524 00875000
*       IF JFCBDSNM(ONE:FORTY4)=OJFCBPTR->JFCBDSNM(ONE:FORTY4) THEN    00876000
         L     @08,OJFCBPTR                                        0525 00877000
         CLC   JFCBDSNM(44,JFCBPTR),JFCBDSNM(@08)                  0525 00878000
         BE    @RF00525                                            0525 00879000
*         CALL PDSPUT;              /* IF NAMES NE MAKE ENTRY      0526 00880000
*                                                            @YM07074*/ 00881000
         BAL   @14,PDSPUT                                          0526 00882000
*   DO NUMBER=ONE TO ENTREE;        /* NUMBER OF FIELDS TO MERGE     */ 00883000
@RF00525 DS    0H                                                  0527 00884000
@RF00524 DS    0H                                                  0527 00885000
@RF00523 LA    NUMBER,1                                            0527 00886000
         B     @DE00527                                            0527 00887000
@DL00527 DS    0H                                                  0528 00888000
*     BEGINFLD=FLDDISPL(NUMBER)+ONE;/* BEGINNING BYTE OF FIELD       */ 00889000
         LR    @08,NUMBER                                          0528 00890000
         ALR   @08,@08                                             0528 00891000
         LR    @07,TEMPPTR                                         0528 00892000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0528 00893000
         SLR   @05,@05                                             0528 00894000
         IC    @05,FLDDISPL-1(@08,@07)                             0528 00895000
         LA    BEGINFLD,1                                          0528 00896000
         ALR   BEGINFLD,@05                                        0528 00897000
*     ENDFIELD=FLDDISPL(NUMBER)+FLDLNGTH(NUMBER);/* END BYTE IN FIELD*/ 00898000
         BCTR  @08,0                                               0529 00899000
         BCTR  @08,0                                               0529 00900000
         SLR   ENDFIELD,ENDFIELD                                   0529 00901000
         IC    ENDFIELD,FLDLNGTH(@08,TEMPPTR)                      0529 00902000
         ALR   @05,ENDFIELD                                        0529 00903000
         LR    ENDFIELD,@05                                        0529 00904000
*     SWAAREA(BEGINFLD:ENDFIELD)=   /* MERGE FIELD FROM JOB          */ 00905000
*         JNLBLK(BEGINFLD:ENDFIELD);/* JOURNAL BLK. TO SWA           */ 00906000
         L     @08,SWAPTR                                          0530 00907000
         ALR   @08,BEGINFLD                                        0530 00908000
         BCTR  @08,0                                               0530 00909000
         LR    @07,ENDFIELD                                        0530 00910000
         SLR   @07,BEGINFLD                                        0530 00911000
         LA    @05,JNLBLK-1(BEGINFLD)                              0530 00912000
         EX    @07,@SM02995                                        0530 00913000
*   END;                            /* DO ALL REQUIRED FIELDS        */ 00914000
         AL    NUMBER,@CF00085                                     0531 00915000
@DE00527 C     NUMBER,ENTREE                                       0531 00916000
         BNH   @DL00527                                            0531 00917000
*   END FLDMERGE;                                                  0532 00918000
@EL00006 DS    0H                                                  0532 00919000
@EF00006 DS    0H                                                  0532 00920000
@ER00006 LM    @14,@12,@SA00006                                    0532 00921000
         BR    @14                                                 0532 00922000
*PTRUPDTE:                                                         0533 00923000
*   PROC;                           /* USED FOR PTR. UPDATING        */ 00924000
PTRUPDTE STM   @14,@04,@SA00007                                    0533 00925000
         STM   @06,@09,@SA00007+28                                 0533 00926000
         STM   @11,@12,@SA00007+44                                 0533 00927000
*/* PTRUPDTE IS A GENERALIZED ROUTINE THAT PERFORMS ACTUAL CHAIN     */ 00928000
*/* POINTER UPDATING.IT IS TEMPLATE DRIVEN AND BASED ON THE TEMPLATE */ 00929000
*/* IT ACCESSES THE CONTROL BLOCK IN SWA AND CONSTRUCT A TABLE       */ 00930000
*/* CONTAINING ALL THE POINTERS REQUIRING UPDATING FOR A PARTICULAR  */ 00931000
*/* CONTROL BLOCK.IT THEN PASSES CONTROL TO UPDATE AND UPON RETURN   */ 00932000
*/* HAS A TABLE OF UPDATED POINTERS WHICH ARE REPLACED IN THE CONTROL*/ 00933000
*/* BLOCK.                                                           */ 00934000
*                                                                  0534 00935000
*   VOLSVA=OFFSW;                   /* TURN OFF FF SVA SWITCH        */ 00936000
         NI    VOLSVA,B'11101111'                                  0534 00937000
*   XCPTR=ADDR(FIELD);              /* ADDRESS OF FIELD TABLE        */ 00938000
         LA    XCPTR,FIELD                                         0535 00939000
*/*      ZERO THE ENTIRE TABLE PRIOR TO INSERTING SVA                */ 00940000
*                                                                  0536 00941000
*   XCAREA(ONE:ENDTAB)=XCAREA(ONE:ENDTAB)&&XCAREA(ONE:ENDTAB);     0536 00942000
         XC    XCAREA(228,XCPTR),XCAREA(XCPTR)                     0536 00943000
*   XCPTR=ADDR(FIELD1);             /* ADDRESS OF FIELD1 TABLE       */ 00944000
         LA    XCPTR,FIELD1                                        0537 00945000
*/*      ZERO THE ENTIRE TABLE PRIOR TO INSERTING SVA                */ 00946000
*                                                                  0538 00947000
*   XCAREA(ONE:ENDTAB)=XCAREA(ONE:ENDTAB)&&XCAREA(ONE:ENDTAB);     0538 00948000
         XC    XCAREA(228,XCPTR),XCAREA(XCPTR)                     0538 00949000
*   DO NUMBER=ONE TO ENTREE;        /* NUMBER OF PTRS.TO UPDATE      */ 00950000
         LA    NUMBER,1                                            0539 00951000
         B     @DE00539                                            0539 00952000
@DL00539 DS    0H                                                  0540 00953000
*     BEGINFLD=FLDDISPL(NUMBER)+ONE;/* BEGINNING BYTE OF PTR.        */ 00954000
         LR    @07,NUMBER                                          0540 00955000
         ALR   @07,@07                                             0540 00956000
         LR    @01,TEMPPTR                                         0540 00957000
         BCTR  @01,0                                               0540 00958000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0540 00959000
         IC    @15,FLDDISPL-1(@07,@01)                             0540 00960000
         LA    BEGINFLD,1                                          0540 00961000
         ALR   BEGINFLD,@15                                        0540 00962000
*     ENDFIELD=FLDDISPL(NUMBER)+FLDLNGTH(NUMBER);/* END BYTE IN PTR. */ 00963000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0541 00964000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0541 00965000
         SLR   ENDFIELD,ENDFIELD                                   0541 00966000
         IC    ENDFIELD,FLDLNGTH(@07,TEMPPTR)                      0541 00967000
         ALR   @15,ENDFIELD                                        0541 00968000
         LR    ENDFIELD,@15                                        0541 00969000
*     FIELD(NUMBER)=SWAAREA(BEGINFLD:ENDFIELD);/* SAVE OLD PTR.      */ 00970000
         LR    @07,NUMBER                                          0542 00971000
         SLA   @07,2                                               0542 00972000
         LA    @01,FIELD-4(@07)                                    0542 00973000
         MVI   1(@01),C' '                                         0542 00974000
         MVC   2(2,@01),1(@01)                                     0542 00975000
         LR    @15,ENDFIELD                                        0542 00976000
         SLR   @15,BEGINFLD                                        0542 00977000
         L     @14,SWAPTR                                          0542 00978000
         ALR   @14,BEGINFLD                                        0542 00979000
         BCTR  @14,0                                               0542 00980000
         EX    @15,@SM02998                                        0542 00981000
*     ENDFIELD=ENDFIELD-BEGINFLD;   /* DETERMINE LENGTH OF MOVE      */ 00982000
         SLR   ENDFIELD,BEGINFLD                                   0543 00983000
*     IF ENDFIELD=FTWO THEN         /* IS FIELD THREE BYTES LONG     */ 00984000
         C     ENDFIELD,@CF00097                                   0544 00985000
         BNE   @RF00544                                            0544 00986000
*       FIELD(NUMBER,FOUR:FOUR)=ZERO;/* ZERO LAST BYTE IN TABLE      */ 00987000
         SLR   @04,@04                                             0545 00988000
         STC   @04,FIELD-1(@07)                                    0545 00989000
*   END;                                                           0546 00990000
@RF00544 AL    NUMBER,@CF00085                                     0546 00991000
@DE00539 C     NUMBER,ENTREE                                       0546 00992000
         BNH   @DL00539                                            0546 00993000
*   NUMBER=ENTREE;                  /* RESTORE NUMBER OF PTRS.       */ 00994000
         L     NUMBER,ENTREE                                       0547 00995000
*   IF UPDTID=IJFCBID THEN          /* IS BLOCK A JFCB?              */ 00996000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'1C'                                        0548 00997000
         BNE   @RF00548                                            0548 00998000
*     DO;                                                          0549 00999000
*       JFCBPTR=SWAPTR;             /* INITIALIZE JFCB POINTER       */ 01000000
         L     JFCBPTR,SWAPTR                                      0550 01001000
*       IF JFCBVOLS(ONE:ONE)=FOXFOX THEN/* IS THERE AN SVA PRESENT   */ 01002000
         CLI   JFCBVOLS(JFCBPTR),X'FF'                             0551 01003000
         BNE   @RF00551                                            0551 01004000
*         DO;                                                      0552 01005000
*           NUMBER=NUMBER+ONE;      /* INCREMENT NO. OF POINTERS     */ 01006000
         AL    NUMBER,@CF00085                                     0553 01007000
*           FIELD(NUMBER)=JFCBVOLS(TWO:FOUR);/* PLACE OLD SVA IN TBL.*/ 01008000
         LR    @07,NUMBER                                          0554 01009000
         SLA   @07,2                                               0554 01010000

*           FIELD(NUMBER,FOUR:FOUR)=ZERO;/* ZERO LAST BYTE IN TABLE  */ 01014000
         SLR   @04,@04                                             0555 01015000

*           VOLSVA=ON;              /* JFCBVOLS CONTAINS AN SVA      */ 01017000
         OI    VOLSVA,B'00010000'                                  0556 01018000
*         END;                                                     0557 01019000
*     END;                                                         0558 01020000
@RF00551 DS    0H                                                  0559 01021000
*   IF(UPDTID=IDSIOTID|UPDTID=ISIOTID) THEN/* IS THIS A SIOT?        */ 01022000
@RF00548 CLI   UPDTID,X'FF'                                        0559 01023000
         BE    @RT00559                                            0559 01024000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'03'                                        0559 01025000
         BNE   @RF00559                                            0559 01026000
@RT00559 DS    0H                                                  0560 01027000
*     DO;                                                          0560 01028000
*       SIOTPTR=SWAPTR;             /* INITIALIZE SIOT PTR.          */ 01029000
         L     @07,SWAPTR                                          0561 01030000
         ST    @07,SIOTPTR                                         0561 01031000
*       IF SIOVAMDS=ON THEN         /* IS THE SIOT FOR VAM?          */ 01032000
         TM    SIOVAMDS(@07),B'00100000'                           0562 01033000
         BNO   @RF00562                                            0562 01034000
*         DO;                                                      0563 01035000
*           NUMBER=NUMBER+ONE;      /* INCREMENT NO. OF POINTERS     */ 01036000
         AL    NUMBER,@CF00085                                     0564 01037000
*           FIELD(NUMBER)=SIOUCBAD; /* UPDATE UCB POINTER            */ 01038000
         LR    @04,NUMBER                                          0565 01039000
         SLA   @04,2                                               0565 01040000

         LA    @07,0(,@07)                                         0565 01042000
         LA    @02,FIELD-4(@04)                                    0565 01043000
         STCM  @07,15,0(@02)                                       0565 01044000
*         END;                                                     0566 01045000
*     END;                                                         0567 01046000
@RF00562 DS    0H                                                  0568 01047000
*   CALL UPDATE;                    /* UPDATE PTR. FIELDS IN BLOCK   */ 01048000
@RF00559 BAL   @14,UPDATE                                          0568 01049000
*   IF(RCAREA=ZERO&VOLSVA=ON) THEN  /* DID JFCBVOLS CONTAIN SVA      */ 01050000

         BNZ   @RF00569                                            0569 01052000
         TM    VOLSVA,B'00010000'                                  0569 01053000
         BNO   @RF00569                                            0569 01054000
*     JFCBVOLS(TWO:FOUR)=FIELD1(ENTREE+ONE);/* UPDATE THE SVA        */ 01055000
         L     @08,ENTREE                                          0570 01056000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0570 01057000
         LA    @07,FIELD1(@08)                                     0570 01058000
         MVC   JFCBVOLS+1(3,JFCBPTR),0(@07)                        0570 01059000
*   IF(RCAREA=ZERO&(UPDTID=IDSIOTID|UPDTID=ISIOTID)) THEN         0571 01060000
@RF00569 LTR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0571 01061000
         BZ    @RF00571                                            0571 01062000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'FF'                                        0571 01063000
         BE    @RT00571                                            0571 01064000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'03'                                        0571 01065000
         BNE   @RF00571                                            0571 01066000
@RT00571 DS    0H                                                  0572 01067000
*     IF(SIOVAMDS=ON&MELRSTRT=CONTINUE) THEN/* IS THIS A VAM SIOT   */ 01068000
         L     @08,SIOTPTR                                         0572 01069000
         TM    SIOVAMDS(@08),B'00100000'                           0572 01070000
         BNO   @RF00572                                            0572 01071000
         L     @08,@PC00001                                        0572 01072000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@08),X'20'                                 0572 01073000
         BE    @RF00572                                            0572 01074000
*       DO;                                                        0573 01075000
*         DO BLKENTRY=ONE TO NUMBER;/* CHECK THE UNMATCHED SVA       */ 01076000
         LA    BLKENTRY,1                                          0574 01077000

@DL00574 DS    0H                                                  0575 01079000
*           IF FIELD(BLKENTRY)=ZERO THEN/* INDICATES UNMATCHED SVA  */ 01080000
         SLR   @08,@08                                             0575 01081000
         LR    @04,BLKENTRY                                        0575 01082000
         SLA   @04,2                                               0575 01083000
         LA    @02,FIELD-4(@04)                                    0575 01084000
         ICM   @04,15,0(@02)                                       0575 01085000
         CLR   @04,@08                                             0575 01086000
         BE    @RF00575                                            0575 01087000
*             IF SIOUCBAD=FIELD(BLKENTRY) THEN/* IS IT THE UCB ADDR.?*/ 01088000
         L     @02,SIOTPTR                                         0576 01089000

         LA    @15,0(,@15)                                         0576 01091000
         CLR   @04,@15                                             0576 01092000
         BNE   @RF00576                                            0576 01093000
*               DO;                                                0577 01094000
*                 SIOUCBAD=ZERO;    /* ZERO UCB ADDRESS FIELD        */ 01095000
         STCM  @08,7,SIOUCBAD(@02)                                 0578 01096000
*                 RCAREA=ZERO;      /* THIS IS RECOVERABLE           */ 01097000
         SLR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0579 01098000
*               END;                                               0580 01099000
*             ELSE                                                 0581 01100000
*               BLKENTRY=NUMBER;    /* UNMATCHED SVA IS NOT UCB      */ 01101000
         B     @RC00576                                            0581 01102000
@RF00576 LR    BLKENTRY,NUMBER                                     0581 01103000
*         END;                                                     0582 01104000
@RC00576 DS    0H                                                  0582 01105000
@RF00575 AL    BLKENTRY,@CF00085                                   0582 01106000
@DE00574 CR    BLKENTRY,NUMBER                                     0582 01107000
         BNH   @DL00574                                            0582 01108000
*       END;                                                       0583 01109000
*   IF(RCAREA=ZERO&NUMBER>ENTREE&(UPDTID=IDSIOTID|UPDTID=ISIOTID)) THEN 01110000
@RF00572 DS    0H                                                  0584 01111000
@RF00571 LTR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0584 01112000
         BNZ   @RF00584                                            0584 01113000
         C     NUMBER,ENTREE                                       0584 01114000
         BNH   @RF00584                                            0584 01115000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'FF'                                        0584 01116000
         BE    @RT00584                                            0584 01117000
         CLI   UPDTID,X'03'                                        0584 01118000
         BNE   @RF00584                                            0584 01119000
@RT00584 DS    0H                                                  0585 01120000
*     SIOUCBAD=FIELD1(ENTREE+ONE);  /* UPDATE UCB ADDRESS            */ 01121000
         L     @08,ENTREE                                          0585 01122000
         SLA   @08,2                                               0585 01123000
         LA    @07,FIELD1(@08)                                     0585 01124000
         ICM   @08,15,0(@07)                                       0585 01125000
         L     @07,SIOTPTR                                         0585 01126000
         STCM  @08,7,SIOUCBAD(@07)                                 0585 01127000
*   DO NUMBER=ONE TO ENTREE WHILE(RCAREA=ZERO);/* RESTORE NEW PTRS   */ 01128000
@RF00584 LA    NUMBER,1                                            0586 01129000
         B     @DE00586                                            0586 01130000
@DL00586 LTR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       0586 01131000
         BNZ   @DC00586                                            0586 01132000
*     BEGINFLD=FLDDISPL(NUMBER)+ONE;/* BEGINNING BYTE OF PTR.        */ 01133000
         LR    @08,NUMBER                                          0587 01134000
         ALR   @08,@08                                             0587 01135000
         LR    @07,TEMPPTR                                         0587 01136000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0587 01137000

*     ENDFIELD=FLDDISPL(NUMBER)+FLDLNGTH(NUMBER);/* END BYTE IN PTR. */ 01142000

*VATPUT:                                                           0592 01171000
*   PROC;                           /* PLACES ENTRIES IN VAT         */ 01172000
VATPUT   STM   @14,@01,@SA00008                                    0592 01173000
         STM   @03,@04,@SA00008+16                                 0592 01174000
         ST    @06,@SA00008+24                                     0592 01175000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00008+28                                 0592 01176000
*/* VATPUT IS ENTERED WHENEVER A CONTROL BLOCK ENTRY MUST BE MADE IN */ 01177000
*/* THE VAT.IF AN ENTRY ALREADY EXISTS THE OLD VIRTUAL ADDRESS IS    */ 01178000
*/* MOVED INTO THE BLOCKS ENTRY.IF NO ENTRY EXISTS,IF REQUIRED,THE   */ 01179000
*/* ENTIRE CONTROL BLOCKS ENTRY IS MADE IN THE VAT. IF THERE IS NO   */ 01180000
*/* SPACE LEFT IN THE CURRENT VAT AN EXTENSION IS GOTTEN AS OFTEN AS */ 01181000
*/* REQUIRED.                                                        */ 01182000
*                                                                  0593 01183000
*   ENTMADE=OFFSW;                  /* TURN OFF ENTRY MADE SWITCH    */ 01184000
*   PUTENTRY=ON;                    /* PUT ENTRY IN VAT              */ 01185000
         OI    PUTENTRY,B'01000000'                                0594 01186000
         NI    ENTMADE,B'11011111'                                 0594 01187000
*   IF FAILSTEP=ON THEN             /* IS THIS THE FAILING STEP?     */ 01188000
         TM    FAILSTEP,B'10000000'                                0595 01189000
         BNO   @RF00595                                            0595 01190000
*     DO;                                                          0596 01191000
*       IF(JNLID=IGDGNTID|JNLID=IPDIBLID) THEN                     0597 01192000

*         PUTENTRY=OFFSW;           /* DONT PROCESS FOR FAIL STEP    */ 01198000

         NI    PUTENTRY,B'10111111'                                0598 01200000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01201000
*       /*                                                           */ 01202000
*       /* FOR THE FAILING STEP VAM CONTROL BLOCKS ARE NOT PROCESSED */ 01203000
*       /* IF THIS IS AN AUTOMATIC STEP RESTART.                     */ 01204000
*       /*                                                           */ 01205000
*       /*************************************************************/ 01206000
*                                                                  0599 01207000

         BE    @GL00037                                            0599 01210000

*   CVATPTR=VATPTR;                 /* SAVE CURRENT VAT POINTER      */ 01220000

*   VATPTR=JSCBVATA;                /* RELOAD ORIGINAL VAT POINTER   */ 01234000

*       IF VATRBN(BLKENTRY)=JNLRBN THEN/* DO THE RBN'S MATCH?        */ 01244000

*         DO;                                                      0611 01254000
*           PUTENTRY=OFFSW;         /* TURN OFF LOOP CNTRL.SWITCH    */ 01255000

*           IF VATBLKID(BLKENTRY)=JNLID THEN/* DO THE ID'S MATCH?    */ 01257000

         BNE   @RF00613                                            0613 01261000
*             IF(JNLID=VDSCBID|JNLID=DSPCTHID) THEN/* IS THIS VAM? 0614 01262000

*                 CALL VAMPROC;     /* YES,CALL VAM PROCESS  @YM07084*/ 01272000

*             ELSE                                                 0619 01275000

*                 IF FAILSTEP=ON THEN/* FAILING STEP FOUND           */ 01295000

*                   END;                                           0628 01313000

*         END;                                                     0631 01319000

*     END;                                                         0632 01321000

*/*   IF THE VAT AND ALL EXTENSIONS HAVE BEEN SEARCHED AND THE       */ 01344000
*/*   CONTROL BLOCK IS AN UNMATCHED JCT OR SCT THIS IS AN ERROR. AN  */ 01345000
*/*   ERROR CODE IS SET AND THE PROCEDURE EXITS.                     */ 01346000

*                                                                  0637 01348000
*   IF((JNLID=IJCTID|JNLID=ISCTID|JNLID=IACTID)&PUTENTRY=ON) THEN  0637 01349000

*                                                                  0676 01470000

*ASGNRITE:                                                         0699 01564000
*   PROC;                           /* ASSIGNS AND WRITES BLOCK      */ 01565000
ASGNRITE STM   @14,@03,@SA00009                                    0699 01566000
         STM   @05,@12,@SA00009+24                                 0699 01567000
*/* ASGNRITE IS CALLED WHENEVER IT IS REQUIRED TO ASSIGN AND WRITE   */ 01568000
*/* A CONTROL BLOCK TO SWA.THIS ROUTINE INITIALIZES THE QMPA WITH    */ 01569000
*/* THE INFORMATION REQUIRED TO USE THE SWA MANAGER ASSIGN AND WRITE */ 01570000
*/* FUNCTIONS AND THEN ISSUES IEFQMREQ.FOR THE ASSIGN FUNCTION IT    */ 01571000
*/* MANIPULATES QMRBN IN THE QMPA TO INSURE THAT THE CONTROL BLOCK   */ 01572000
*/* HAS THE SAME RBN IT INITIALLY HAD.                               */ 01573000
*                                                                  0700 01574000
*   QMPOP=ASGN;                     /* ASSIGN FUNCTION CODE          */ 01575000
         L     @10,QMPAPTR                                         0700 01576000
         MVI   QMPOP(@10),X'01'                                    0700 01577000
*   IF JNLRBN>SAVERBN THEN          /* SAVE RBN IF HIGHER            */ 01578000
         L     @10,JNLRBN                                          0701 01579000
         C     @10,SAVERBN                                         0701 01580000
         BNH   @RF00701                                            0701 01581000
*     SAVERBN=JNLRBN;               /* THEN CURRENTLY SAVED ONE      */ 01582000
         ST    @10,SAVERBN                                         0702 01583000
*   QMRBN=JNLRBN-ONE;               /* SPECIFIC RBN TO USE           */ 01584000
@RF00701 L     @10,QMPAPTR                                         0703 01585000
         L     @08,JNLRBN                                          0703 01586000
         BCTR  @08,0                                               0703 01587000
         ST    @08,QMRBN(,@10)                                     0703 01588000
*   QMPCMNC=ONEASGN;                /* NUMBER OF RECORDS TO ASSIGN   */ 01589000
         MVI   QMPCMNC(@10),X'10'                                  0704 01590000
*   R1=QMPAPTR;                     /* LOAD QMPA POINTER             */ 01591000
         LR    R1,@10                                              0705 01592000
*   GEN(IEFQMREQ);                  /* CALL SWA MANAGER              */ 01593000
         IEFQMREQ                                                       01594000
*   EPAPTR=QMPACL;                  /* INITIALIZE EPA POINTER        */ 01595000
         L     @10,QMPAPTR                                         0707 01596000
         L     EPAPTR,QMPACL-1(,@10)                               0707 01597000
         LA    EPAPTR,0(,EPAPTR)                                   0707 01598000
*   QMPOP=RITE;                     /* WRITE FUNCTION CODE           */ 01599000
         MVI   QMPOP(@10),X'03'                                    0708 01600000
*   QMPCMNC=ONERITE;                /* WRITE ONE RECORD              */ 01601000
         MVI   QMPCMNC(@10),X'01'                                  0709 01602000
*   SWROWVA=SWASNVA;                /* SVA FOR WRITE OPERATION       */ 01603000
         MVC   SWROWVA(3,EPAPTR),SWASNVA(EPAPTR)                   0710 01604000
*   SWWRTID=JNLID;                  /* CONTROL BLOCK ID              */ 01605000
         MVC   SWWRTID(1,EPAPTR),JNLID                             0711 01606000
*   SWBUFPTR=ADDR(JNLBLK);          /* BUFFER CONTAINING JNL.BLOCK   */ 01607000
         LA    @08,JNLBLK                                          0712 01608000
         ST    @08,SWBUFPTR(,EPAPTR)                               0712 01609000
*   R1=QMPAPTR;                     /* LOAD QMPA POINTER             */ 01610000
         LR    R1,@10                                              0713 01611000
*   GEN(IEFQMREQ);                  /* CALL SWA MANAGER              */ 01612000
         IEFQMREQ                                                       01613000
*   MYSWA(ONE:ONE76)=MYSWA(ONE:ONE76)&&MYSWA(ONE:ONE76);/* ZERO SWA  */ 01614000
         SLR   @10,@10                                             0715 01615000
         ICM   @10,7,SWROWVA(EPAPTR)                               0715 01616000
         XC    MYSWA(176,@10),MYSWA(@10)                           0715 01617000
*   END ASGNRITE;                                                  0716 01618000
@EL00009 DS    0H                                                  0716 01619000
@EF00009 DS    0H                                                  0716 01620000
@ER00009 LM    @14,@03,@SA00009                                    0716 01621000
         LM    @05,@12,@SA00009+24                                 0716 01622000
         BR    @14                                                 0716 01623000
*VATBUILD:                                                         0717 01624000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA);       /* GETS VAT OR VATX              */ 01625000
VATBUILD STM   @14,@01,12(@13)                                     0717 01626000
         STM   @03,@12,32(@13)                                     0717 01627000
*/* VATBUILD IS CALLED WHENEVER A VAT EXTENSION IS REQUIRED.IT ISSUES*/ 01628000
*/* A GETMAIN FOR 800 BYTES,ZEROES THE AREA AND INSURES THAT THE     */ 01629000
*/* EXTENSION IS CHAINED TO THE PREVIOUS TABLE VIA FORWARD AND       */ 01630000
*/* BACKWARD CHAINING.                                               */ 01631000
*                                                                  0718 01632000
*   LEN=TABSIZE;                    /* LENGTH OF VAT EXTENSION       */ 01633000
         LA    LEN,800                                             0718 01634000
*   GEN(GETMAIN R,LV=(LEN));        /* GET SPACE FOR VAT EXTENSION   */ 01635000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(LEN)                                             01636000
*   VATX=R1;                        /* SAVE ADDRESS OF EXTENSION     */ 01637000
         ST    R1,VATX(,VATPTR)                                    0720 01638000
*   OVATPTR=VATPTR;                 /* SAVE PREVIOUS VAT POINTER     */ 01639000
         LR    OVATPTR,VATPTR                                      0721 01640000
*   VATPTR=R1;                      /* RESET VATPTR. TO EXTENSION    */ 01641000
         LR    VATPTR,R1                                           0722 01642000
*   XCPTR=VATPTR;                   /* SET PTR FOR ZEROING TABLE     */ 01643000
         LR    XCPTR,VATPTR                                        0723 01644000
*   DO R=ONE TO THREE;              /* INITIALIZE TABLE ENTRIES TO   */ 01645000
         LA    R,1                                                 0724 01646000
@DL00724 DS    0H                                                  0725 01647000
*     XCAREA=XCAREA&&XCAREA;        /* ZERO                          */ 01648000
         XC    XCAREA(256,XCPTR),XCAREA(XCPTR)                     0725 01649000
*     XCPTR=XCPTR+LENGTH(XCAREA);   /* ADJUST POINTER                */ 01650000
         AL    XCPTR,@CF00708                                      0726 01651000
*   END;                                                           0727 01652000
         AL    R,@CF00085                                          0727 01653000
         C     R,@CF00316                                          0727 01654000
         BNH   @DL00724                                            0727 01655000
*   XCAREA(ONE:TABLEFT)=XCAREA(ONE:TABLEFT)&&XCAREA(ONE:TABLEFT);  0728 01656000
         XC    XCAREA(32,XCPTR),XCAREA(XCPTR)                      0728 01657000
*   VATBPTR=OVATPTR;                /* SAVE ADDR. OF PREVIOUS VAT    */ 01658000
         ST    OVATPTR,VATBPTR(,VATPTR)                            0729 01659000
*   END VATBUILD;                                                  0730 01660000
@EL00010 DS    0H                                                  0730 01661000
@EF00010 DS    0H                                                  0730 01662000
@ER00010 LM    @14,@01,12(@13)                                     0730 01663000
         LM    @03,@12,32(@13)                                     0730 01664000
         BR    @14                                                 0730 01665000
*ERRPROC:                                                          0731 01666000
*   PROC;                                                          0731 01667000
*                                                                  0731 01668000
ERRPROC  STM   @14,@12,@SA00011                                    0731 01669000
*/* ERRPROC IS ENTERED WHENEVER AN ERROR IS ENCOUNTERED EITHER SWA   */ 01670000
*/* OR JOURNAL.IT ACCESSES A MESSAGE MODULE AND DEPENDING UPON THE   */ 01671000
*/* TYPE OF ERROR ISSUES THE APPROPRIATE MESSAGE TO THE PROGRAMMER.  */ 01672000
*/* ADDITIONALLY IF THE RESTART IS AUTO STEP OR AUTO CHECKPOINT THE  */ 01673000
*/* OPERATOR IS INFORMED THAT THE JOB HAS BEEN CANCELLED.            */ 01674000
*                                                                  0732 01675000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0732 01676000
*     R2 RESTRICTED;                /* RESTRICT REGISTER 2           */ 01677000
*   R2=ADDR(IEFXB603);              /* GET MESSAGE MODULE ADDRESS    */ 01678000
         L     R2,@CV02874                                         0733 01679000
*   R2=R2+SIXTEEN;                  /* PTR. TO MESSAGE TABLE         */ 01680000
         AL    R2,@CF00038                                         0734 01681000
*   GEN DATA;                                                      0735 01682000
*   IF RCAREA=SWAERR THEN           /* WAS IT A SWA ERROR?           */ 01683000
         C     RCAREA,@CF00058                                     0736 01684000
         BNE   @RF00736                                            0736 01685000
*     DO WHILE(ID='MG02');         /* LOOK FOR PROPER MESSAGE       */ 01686000
         B     @DE00737                                            0737 01687000
@DL00737 DS    0H                                                  0738 01688000
*       R2=R2+ENTRYLEN;             /* INCREMENT TO NEXT ENTRY       */ 01689000
         AL    R2,@CF00058                                         0738 01690000
*     END;                                                         0739 01691000
@DE00737 CLC   ID(4,R2),@CC02950                                   0739 01692000
         BNE   @DL00737                                            0739 01693000
*   ELSE                                                           0740 01694000
*     IF RCAREA=JOURNERR THEN       /* WAS IT A JOURNAL ERROR?       */ 01695000
         B     @RC00736                                            0740 01696000
@RF00736 C     RCAREA,@CF00078                                     0740 01697000
         BNE   @RF00740                                            0740 01698000
*       DO WHILE(ID='MG03');       /* LOOK FOR PROPER MESSAGE       */ 01699000
         B     @DE00741                                            0741 01700000
@DL00741 DS    0H                                                  0742 01701000
*         R2=R2+ENTRYLEN;           /* INCREMENT TO PROPER ENTRY     */ 01702000
         AL    R2,@CF00058                                         0742 01703000
*       END;                                                       0743 01704000
@DE00741 CLC   ID(4,R2),@CC02951                                   0743 01705000
         BNE   @DL00741                                            0743 01706000
*   MSG(ONE:LNGTH)=MESS1(ONE:LNGTH);/* MOVE WTO LIST INTO BUFFER     */ 01707000
@RF00740 DS    0H                                                  0744 01708000
@RC00736 LA    @10,WTOLIST                                         0744 01709000
         SLR   @07,@07                                             0744 01710000
         IC    @07,LNGTH(,R2)                                      0744 01711000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0744 01712000
         L     @04,ADDRESS-1(,R2)                                  0744 01713000
         EX    @07,@SM03003                                        0744 01714000
*   R1=ADDR(MSG);                   /* ADDRESS OF WTO LIST           */ 01715000
         LA    R1,WTOLIST                                          0745 01716000
*   GEN(WTO MF=(E,(R1)));           /* ISSUE WTO MACRO               */ 01717000
         WTO MF=(E,(R1))                                                01718000
*   IF(MELRSTRT=AUTOSTEP|MELRSTRT=AUTOCKPT) THEN                   0747 01719000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0747 01720000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@10),X'80'                                 0747 01721000
         BE    @RT00747                                            0747 01722000
         CLI   MELRSTRT(@10),X'40'                                 0747 01723000
         BNE   @RF00747                                            0747 01724000
@RT00747 DS    0H                                                  0748 01725000
*     DO;                           /* IF AUTOMATIC RESTART THEN     */ 01726000
*       DO WHILE(ID='MG09');       /* SEND MESSAGE TO OPERATOR      */ 01727000
         B     @DE00749                                            0749 01728000
@DL00749 DS    0H                                                  0750 01729000
*         R2=R2+ENTRYLEN;                                          0750 01730000
         AL    R2,@CF00058                                         0750 01731000
*       END;                                                       0751 01732000
@DE00749 CLC   ID(4,R2),@CC02952                                   0751 01733000
         BNE   @DL00749                                            0751 01734000
*       MSG(ONE:LNGTH)=MESS1(ONE:LNGTH);/* MOVE WTO LIST INTO BUFFER */ 01735000
         LA    @10,WTOLIST                                         0752 01736000
         SLR   @07,@07                                             0752 01737000
         IC    @07,LNGTH(,R2)                                      0752 01738000
         BCTR  @07,0                                               0752 01739000
         L     @04,ADDRESS-1(,R2)                                  0752 01740000
         EX    @07,@SM03003                                        0752 01741000
*       JCTPTR=LCTJCTAD;            /* INITIALIZE JCT POINTER        */ 01742000
         L     @10,LCTJCTAD(,LCTPTR)                               0753 01743000
         ST    @10,JCTPTR                                          0753 01744000
*       MSG(JOBBEGIN:JOBEND)=JCTJNAME;/* PLACE JOB NANE IN MESSAGE   */ 01745000
         LA    @07,WTOLIST                                         0754 01746000
         MVC   MSG+38(8,@07),JCTJNAME(@10)                         0754 01747000
*       R1=ADDR(MSG);               /* ADDRESS OF WTO LIST           */ 01748000
         LA    R1,WTOLIST                                          0755 01749000
*       GEN(WTO MF=(E,(R1)));       /* ISSUE WTO MACRO               */ 01750000
         WTO MF=(E,(R1))                                                01751000
*     END;                                                         0757 01752000
*   JSCBJNLE=ON;                    /* TURN ON JOURNAL ERROR BIT     */ 01753000
@RF00747 OI    JSCBJNLE(JSCBPTR),B'00100000'                       0758 01754000
*   MSGSW=ONE;                      /* SET TO INDICATE MSG.WRITTEN   */ 01755000
         MVC   MSGSW(4),@CF00085                                   0759 01756000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0760 01757000
*     R2 UNRESTRICTED;              /* UNRESTRICT REGISTER 2         */ 01758000
*   END ERRPROC;                                                   0761 01759000
@EL00011 DS    0H                                                  0761 01760000
@EF00011 DS    0H                                                  0761 01761000
@ER00011 LM    @14,@12,@SA00011                                    0761 01762000
         BR    @14                                                 0761 01763000
*UPDATE:                                                           0762 01764000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA);       /* USED TO UPDATE CHAIN PTRS.    */ 01765000
UPDATE   STM   @14,@04,12(@13)                                     0762 01766000
         STM   @06,@12,44(@13)                                     0762 01767000
*/* UPDATE IS ENTERED DURING CHAIN POINTER UPDATING.IT ATTEMPTS TO   */ 01768000
*/* MATCH THE OLD VIRTUAL ADDRESSES PASSED AGAINST THE OLD VIRTUAL   */ 01769000
*/* ADDRESS FIELDS IN THE VAT AND ITS EXTENSIONS.WHEN A MATCH IS     */ 01770000
*/* ENCOUNTERED THE CORRESPONDING NEW VIRTUAL ADDRESS IS MOVED INTO  */ 01771000
*/* A SEPARATE TABLE FOR SUBSEQUENT PROCESSING.                      */ 01772000
*                                                                  0763 01773000
*   VATPTR=JSCBVATA;                /* ADDRESS OF FIRST VAT          */ 01774000
         L     VATPTR,JSCBVATA(,JSCBPTR)                           0763 01775000
*   DO WHILE(VATX>ZERO);            /* FIND LAST VAT EXTENSION       */ 01776000
         B     @DE00764                                            0764 01777000
@DL00764 DS    0H                                                  0765 01778000
*     VATPTR=VATX;                                                 0765 01779000
         L     VATPTR,VATX(,VATPTR)                                0765 01780000
*   END;                                                           0766 01781000
@DE00764 L     @10,VATX(,VATPTR)                                   0766 01782000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0766 01783000
         BP    @DL00764                                            0766 01784000
*   COUNTER=ZERO;                   /* INITIALIZE FIELD COUNTER      */ 01785000
         SLR   COUNTER,COUNTER                                     0767 01786000
*   DO BLKENTRY=ONE TO NUMBER;      /* SCAN FOR A MATCH ON VATROVA   */ 01787000
         LA    BLKENTRY,1                                          0768 01788000
         B     @DE00768                                            0768 01789000
@DL00768 DS    0H                                                  0769 01790000
*     IF FIELD(BLKENTRY)=ZERO THEN  /* OLD SVA IS ZERO               */ 01791000
         LR    @10,BLKENTRY                                        0769 01792000
         SLA   @10,2                                               0769 01793000
         LA    @08,FIELD-4(@10)                                    0769 01794000
         ICM   @06,15,0(@08)                                       0769 01795000
         LTR   @06,@06                                             0769 01796000
         BNZ   @RF00769                                            0769 01797000
*       DO;                                                        0770 01798000
*         FIELD1(BLKENTRY)=FIELD(BLKENTRY);/* SET NEW SVA TO ZERO    */ 01799000
         LA    @08,FIELD1-4(@10)                                   0771 01800000
         LA    @06,FIELD-4(@10)                                    0771 01801000
         MVC   0(4,@08),0(@06)                                     0771 01802000
*         COUNTER=COUNTER+ONE;      /* INCREMENT FIELD COUNTER       */ 01803000
         AL    COUNTER,@CF00085                                    0772 01804000
*       END;                                                       0773 01805000
*   END;                                                           0774 01806000
*                                                                  0774 01807000
@RF00769 AL    BLKENTRY,@CF00085                                   0774 01808000
@DE00768 CR    BLKENTRY,NUMBER                                     0774 01809000
         BNH   @DL00768                                            0774 01810000
*/********************************************************************/ 01811000
*/* SCAN ALL VAT EXTENSIONS UNTIL THERE ARE NO MORE,AN ERROR IS      */ 01812000
*/* ENCOUNTERED,OR ALL FIELDS HAVE BEEN MATCHED.                     */ 01813000
*/********************************************************************/ 01814000
*                                                                  0775 01815000
*   DO WHILE(VATPTR=ZERO&COUNTER=NUMBER);                        0775 01816000
         B     @DE00775                                            0775 01817000
@DL00775 DS    0H                                                  0776 01818000
*     DO SVAENTRY=VATNO TO ONE BY-ONE WHILE(COUNTER=NUMBER);      0776 01819000
         SLR   SVAENTRY,SVAENTRY                                   0776 01820000
         IC    SVAENTRY,VATNO(,VATPTR)                             0776 01821000
         B     @DE00776                                            0776 01822000
@DL00776 CR    COUNTER,NUMBER                                      0776 01823000
         BE    @DC00776                                            0776 01824000
*       DO BLKENTRY=ONE TO NUMBER;  /* SCAN FOR A MATCH ON VATROVA   */ 01825000
         LA    BLKENTRY,1                                          0777 01826000
         B     @DE00777                                            0777 01827000
@DL00777 DS    0H                                                  0778 01828000
*/* IF A MATCH IS FOUND FOR THE OLD SVA IN THE VAT CHECK TO SEE THAT */ 01829000
*/* IT HAS NOT BEEN MATCHED PREVIOUSLY.IF IT HAS THEN IGNORE ENTRY   */ 01830000
*                                                                  0778 01831000
*         IF(FIELD(BLKENTRY)=VATOVA(SVAENTRY)&FIELD(BLKENTRY)=ZERO)    01832000
*           THEN                                                   0778 01833000
         LR    @10,BLKENTRY                                        0778 01834000
         SLA   @10,2                                               0778 01835000
         LA    @08,FIELD-4(@10)                                    0778 01836000
         ICM   @15,15,0(@08)                                       0778 01837000
         LR    @08,SVAENTRY                                        0778 01838000
         MH    @08,@CH02079                                        0778 01839000
         ST    @08,@TF00001                                        0778 01840000
         ALR   @08,VATPTR                                          0778 01841000
         ICM   @14,15,VATOVA-14(@08)                               0778 01842000
         CLR   @15,@14                                             0778 01843000
         BNE   @RF00778                                            0778 01844000
         SLR   @08,@08                                             0778 01845000
         CLR   @15,@08                                             0778 01846000
         BE    @RF00778                                            0778 01847000
*           IF FIELD1(BLKENTRY)=ZERO THEN/* IS THERE A NEW SVA       */ 01848000
         LA    @01,FIELD1-4(@10)                                   0779 01849000
         ICM   @00,15,0(@01)                                       0779 01850000
         CLR   @08,@00                                             0779 01851000
         BNE   @RF00779                                            0779 01852000
*             DO;                                                  0780 01853000
*               FIELD1(BLKENTRY)=VATNVA(SVAENTRY);/* FILL IN NEW SVA */ 01854000
         LR    @01,VATPTR                                          0781 01855000
         AL    @01,@TF00001                                        0781 01856000
         ICM   @00,15,VATNVA-14(@01)                               0781 01857000
         LA    @01,FIELD1-4(@10)                                   0781 01858000
         STCM  @00,15,0(@01)                                       0781 01859000
*               FIELD(BLKENTRY)=ZERO;/* ZERO OLD SVA WHEN MATCHED    */ 01860000
         LA    @01,FIELD-4(@10)                                    0782 01861000
         STCM  @08,15,0(@01)                                       0782 01862000
*               COUNTER=COUNTER+ONE;/* INCREMENT FIELD COUNTER       */ 01863000
         AL    COUNTER,@CF00085                                    0783 01864000
*             END;                                                 0784 01865000
*       END;                                                       0785 01866000
@RF00779 DS    0H                                                  0785 01867000
@RF00778 AL    BLKENTRY,@CF00085                                   0785 01868000
@DE00777 CR    BLKENTRY,NUMBER                                     0785 01869000
         BNH   @DL00777                                            0785 01870000
*     END;                                                         0786 01871000
         BCTR  SVAENTRY,0                                          0786 01872000
@DE00776 LTR   SVAENTRY,SVAENTRY                                   0786 01873000
         BP    @DL00776                                            0786 01874000
@DC00776 DS    0H                                                  0787 01875000
*     IF COUNTER=NUMBER THEN       /* ALL FIELDS NOT MATCHED,ANY    */ 01876000
         CR    COUNTER,NUMBER                                      0787 01877000
         BE    @RF00787                                            0787 01878000
*       VATPTR=VATBPTR;             /* MORE EXTENSIONS               */ 01879000
         L     VATPTR,VATBPTR(,VATPTR)                             0788 01880000
*   END;                                                           0789 01881000
@RF00787 DS    0H                                                  0789 01882000
@DE00775 LTR   VATPTR,VATPTR                                       0789 01883000
         BZ    @DC00775                                            0789 01884000
         CR    COUNTER,NUMBER                                      0789 01885000
         BNE   @DL00775                                            0789 01886000
@DC00775 DS    0H                                                  0790 01887000
*   IF COUNTER=NUMBER THEN         /* ALL EXTENSIONS SCANNED AND    */ 01888000
         CR    COUNTER,NUMBER                                      0790 01889000
         BE    @RF00790                                            0790 01890000
*     RCAREA=SWAERR;                /* ALL SVA'S NOT MATCHED-ERROR   */ 01891000
         LA    RCAREA,8                                            0791 01892000
*   END UPDATE;                                                    0792 01893000
@EL00012 DS    0H                                                  0792 01894000
@EF00012 DS    0H                                                  0792 01895000
@ER00012 LM    @14,@04,12(@13)                                     0792 01896000
         LM    @06,@12,44(@13)                                     0792 01897000
         BR    @14                                                 0792 01898000
*CLEANUP:                                                          0793 01899000
*   PROC;                           /* FREE VAT AND ANY EXTENSIONS   */ 01900000
CLEANUP  STM   @14,@04,@SA00013                                    0793 01901000
         STM   @06,@12,@SA00013+28                                 0793 01902000
*/* CLEANUP IS ENTERED PRIOR TO CONCLUDING JOURNAL MERGE PROCESSING  */ 01903000
*/* THE ROUTINE FREES THE VAT AND ALL EXTENSIONS.IF PROCESSING ENDED */ 01904000
*/* SUCCESSFULLY FOR AUTO STEP OR CHECKPOINT RESTART IT REPOSITIONS  */ 01905000
*/* THE JOB JOURNAL AND SYSTEM MESSAGE DATA SETS.IT PROPAGATES THE   */ 01906000
*/* JOB STATUS BYTE FROM THE JCT TO THE JSCB,RESTORES THE HIGHEST RBN*/ 01907000
*/* USED AND SETS A SUCCESSFUL RETURN CODE.FOR CONTINUE RESTART      */ 01908000
*/* IT POINTS THE JCT TO THE PROPER SCT.                             */ 01909000
*/*                                                                  */ 01910000
*/* IF CLEANUP WAS ENTERED BECAUSE OF AN ERROR,AFTER FREEING THE VAT */ 01911000
*/* AND ALL EXTENSIONS IT EXITS WITH AN ERROR RETURN CODE.           */ 01912000
*                                                                  0794 01913000
*   VATPTR=JSCBVATA;                /* GET ADDRESS OF FIRST VAT      */ 01914000
         L     VATPTR,JSCBVATA(,JSCBPTR)                           0794 01915000
*   DO WHILE(VATPTR=ZERO);         /* FREE VAT AND ANY EXTENSIONS   */ 01916000
         B     @DE00795                                            0795 01917000
@DL00795 DS    0H                                                  0796 01918000
*     R1=VATPTR;                    /* AREA TO FREE                  */ 01919000
         LR    R1,VATPTR                                           0796 01920000
*     VATPTR=VATX;                  /* GET EXTENSION PTR.            */ 01921000
         L     VATPTR,VATX(,VATPTR)                                0797 01922000
*     LEN=TABSIZE;                  /* LENGTH OF TABLE TO FREE       */ 01923000
         LA    LEN,800                                             0798 01924000
*     GEN(FREEMAIN R,LV=(LEN),A=(R1));/* FREE VAT OR EXTENSION       */ 01925000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(LEN),A=(R1)                                     01926000
*   END;                                                           0800 01927000
@DE00795 SLR   @10,@10                                             0800 01928000

*CKPTMRGE:                                                         0853 02097000
*   PROC;                           /* CKPT.MERGE FAILING STEP       */ 02098000
CKPTMRGE STM   @14,@01,@SA00014                                    0853 02099000

*/* CKPTMERGE IS ENTERED TO PERFORM MERGE PROCESSING FOR THE FAILING */ 02104000
*/* STEP IN THE EVENT OF AN AUTO. CHECKPOINT RESTART.                */ 02105000
*/* CONTROL FLOW IS IDENTICAL TO THAT DESCRIBED FOR SYSMERGE.        */ 02106000

*ADDRUPDT:                                                         1020 02604000
*   PROC;                           /* UPDATE CONTROL ROUTINE        */ 02605000
ADDRUPDT STM   @14,@04,@SA00016                                    1020 02606000
         STM   @06,@12,@SA00016+28                                 1020 02607000
*/* ADDRUPDT IS ENTERED DURING CHAIN POINTER UPDATING.SCANNING DOWN  */ 02608000
*/* THE VAT AND ALL EXTENSIONS IT USES SWA MANAGER TO DETERMINE THE  */ 02609000
*/* LOCATION OF THE BLOCK IN SWA VIA READ LOCATE,SCANS DOWN A TABLE  */ 02610000
*/* OF TEMPLATES TO DETERMINE THE PROPER ONE FOR THE CONTROL BLOCK   */ 02611000
*/* BASED ON CONTROL BLOCK ID AND THEN PASSES THE INFORMATION TO     */ 02612000
*/* PTRUPDTE.THIS IS DONE FOR EACH CONTROL BLOCK IN THE VAT AND ITS  */ 02613000
*/* EXTENSIONS.                                                      */ 02614000
*                                                                  1021 02615000
*   RCAREA=ZERO;                    /* REINITIALIZE RETURN CODE      */ 02616000
         SLR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       1021 02617000
*   VATPTR=JSCBVATA;                /* INITIALIZE VAT POINTER        */ 02618000
         L     VATPTR,JSCBVATA(,JSCBPTR)                           1022 02619000
*/*                                                                  */ 02620000
*/* UPDATE CHAIN POINTERS IN ALL THE BLOCKS LISTED IN THE VAT AND    */ 02621000
*/* EXTENSIONS THAT HAVE BEEN OVERLAYED FROM THE JOB JOURNAL CONTINUE*/ 02622000
*/* THE PROCESS UNTIL ALL EXTENSIONS ARE PROCESSED OR UNTIL AN ERROR */ 02623000
*/* IS ENCOUNTERED.                                                  */ 02624000
*/*                                                                  */ 02625000
*                                                                  1023 02626000
*   DO WHILE(VATPTR=ZERO&RCAREA=ZERO);                            1023 02627000
         B     @DE01023                                            1023 02628000
@DL01023 DS    0H                                                  1024 02629000
*     DO VATCOUNT=ONE TO VATNO WHILE(RCAREA=ZERO);/* PROCESS THE VAT */ 02630000
         LA    VATCOUNT,1                                          1024 02631000
         B     @DE01024                                            1024 02632000
@DL01024 LTR   RCAREA,RCAREA                                       1024 02633000
         BNZ   @DC01024                                            1024 02634000
*       IF(VATNUPDT(VATCOUNT)=OFFSW&VATROVA(VATCOUNT)=ZERO) THEN  1025 02635000
         LR    @03,VATCOUNT                                        1025 02636000
         MH    @03,@CH02079                                        1025 02637000
         ST    @03,@TF00001                                        1025 02638000
         ALR   @03,VATPTR                                          1025 02639000
         TM    VATNUPDT-14(@03),B'10000000'                        1025 02640000
         BNZ   @RF01025                                            1025 02641000
         L     @03,@TF00001                                        1025 02642000
         L     @03,VATROVA-15(@03,VATPTR)                          1025 02643000
         LA    @03,0(,@03)                                         1025 02644000
         LTR   @03,@03                                             1025 02645000
         BZ    @RF01025                                            1025 02646000
*         DO;                                                      1026 02647000
*           IF VATBLKID(VATCOUNT)=VDSCBID THEN/* IS THIS A VAM BLOCK?*/ 02648000
         LR    @03,VATPTR                                          1027 02649000
         AL    @03,@TF00001                                        1027 02650000
         CLI   VATBLKID-14(@03),X'FC'                              1027 02651000
         BNE   @RF01027                                            1027 02652000
*             DO;                                                  1028 02653000
*               UPDTID=VATBLKID(VATCOUNT);/* FILL IN CONTROL BLOCK ID*/ 02654000
         LR    @07,VATPTR                                          1029 02655000
         AL    @07,@TF00001                                        1029 02656000
         MVC   UPDTID(1),VATBLKID-14(@07)                          1029 02657000
*               SWAPTR=VATNVA(VATCOUNT);/* FILL IN BLOCK ADDRESS     */ 02658000
         LR    @07,VATPTR                                          1030 02659000
         AL    @07,@TF00001                                        1030 02660000
         ICM   @03,15,VATNVA-14(@07)                               1030 02661000
         ST    @03,SWAPTR                                          1030 02662000
*               TEMPPTR=ZERO;       /* ZERO TEMPLATE POINTER         */ 02663000
         SLR   TEMPPTR,TEMPPTR                                     1031 02664000
*             END;                                                 1032 02665000
*           ELSE                                                   1033 02666000
*             DO;                   /* BLOCK REQUIRES UPDATING       */ 02667000
         B     @RC01027                                            1033 02668000
@RF01027 DS    0H                                                  1034 02669000
*               SWEPAPTR=ADDR(LOCEPA);/* INITIALIZE EPA PTR          */ 02670000
         LA    @03,LOCEPA                                          1034 02671000
         ST    @03,SWEPAPTR                                        1034 02672000
*               SWVA=VATRNVA(VATCOUNT);/* FILL IN SWA ADDRESS IN EPA */ 02673000
         LR    @15,VATCOUNT                                        1035 02674000
         MH    @15,@CH02079                                        1035 02675000
         ALR   @15,VATPTR                                          1035 02676000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@03),VATRNVA-14(@15)                         1035 02677000
*               SWCHNPTR=ZERO;      /* EPA CHAIN POINTER ZEROED      */ 02678000
*                                                                  1036 02679000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             1036 02680000
         ST    @15,SWCHNPTR(,@03)                                  1036 02681000
*               /*****************************************************/ 02682000
*               /*                                                   */ 02683000
*               /* ?SWAREQ (RL) EPA (SWEPAPTR);                      */ 02684000
*               /*                                                   */ 02685000
*               /*****************************************************/ 02686000
*                                                                  1037 02687000
*               CALL SWAMGR(SWEPAPTR,'RL');/* ISSUE READ LOCATE      */ 02688000
         LA    @03,SWEPAPTR                                        1037 02689000
         ST    @03,@AL00001                                        1037 02690000
         LA    @03,@CC02923                                        1037 02691000
         ST    @03,@AL00001+4                                      1037 02692000
         L     @03,CVTPTR                                          1037 02693000
         L     @03,CVTJESCT(,@03)                                  1037 02694000
         L     @15,JESWAA(,@03)                                    1037 02695000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        1037 02696000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1037 02697000
*               SWAPTR=SWBLKPTR;    /* INITIALIZE SWA POINTER        */ 02698000
         L     @03,SWEPAPTR                                        1038 02699000
         L     @15,SWBLKPTR(,@03)                                  1038 02700000
         ST    @15,SWAPTR                                          1038 02701000
*/*                                                                  */ 02702000
*/* DEPENDING UPON THE TYPE OF CONTROL BLOCK RETURNED BY THE READ    */ 02703000
*/* LOCATE A TEMPLATE CONTAINING LENGTHS AND DISPLACEMENTS OF POINTER*/ 02704000
*/* FIELDS IS ACCESSED AND PASSED AS INPUT TO ANOTHER SUBROUTINE     */ 02705000
*/* WHICH PERFORMS THE ACTUAL UPDATING                               */ 02706000
*/*                                                                  */ 02707000
*                                                                  1039 02708000
*               IF SWBLKID=ISIOTID THEN/* IS THIS A SIOT             */ 02709000
         CLI   SWBLKID(@03),X'03'                                  1039 02710000
         BNE   @RF01039                                            1039 02711000
*                 IF VATDYNAM(VATCOUNT)=ON THEN/* IS THIS A DYNAMIC     02712000
*                                      SIOT                          */ 02713000
         LR    @03,VATCOUNT                                        1040 02714000
         MH    @03,@CH02079                                        1040 02715000
         ALR   @03,VATPTR                                          1040 02716000
         TM    VATDYNAM-14(@03),B'01000000'                        1040 02717000
         BNO   @RF01040                                            1040 02718000
*                   UPDTID=IDSIOTID;/* YES,CHANGE ID FOR UPDATE      */ 02719000
         MVI   UPDTID,X'FF'                                        1041 02720000
*                 ELSE                                             1042 02721000
*                   UPDTID=SWBLKID; /* USE ID RETURNED BY READ       */ 02722000
         B     @RC01040                                            1042 02723000
@RF01040 L     @03,SWEPAPTR                                        1042 02724000
         MVC   UPDTID(1),SWBLKID(@03)                              1042 02725000
*               ELSE                                               1043 02726000
*                 UPDTID=SWBLKID;   /* USE ID RETURNED BY READ       */ 02727000
         B     @RC01039                                            1043 02728000
@RF01039 L     @03,SWEPAPTR                                        1043 02729000
         MVC   UPDTID(1),SWBLKID(@03)                              1043 02730000
*               TEMPPTR=ZERO;       /* ZERO TEMPLATE POINTER         */ 02731000
@RC01039 SLR   TEMPPTR,TEMPPTR                                     1044 02732000
*             END;                                                 1045 02733000
*                                                                  1045 02734000
*/*                                                                  */ 02735000
*/* SCAN TABLE OF TEMPLATES UNTIL A MATCH IS FOUND                   */ 02736000
*/*                                                                  */ 02737000
*                                                                  1046 02738000
*           DO TEMPNO=ONE TO DIM(TEMPUPDT) WHILE(TEMPPTR=ZERO);    1046 02739000
@RC01027 LA    TEMPNO,1                                            1046 02740000
@DL01046 LTR   TEMPPTR,TEMPPTR                                     1046 02741000
         BNZ   @DC01046                                            1046 02742000
*             IF TEMPUPID(TEMPNO)=UPDTID THEN/* DO THE ID'S MATCH?   */ 02743000
         LR    @07,TEMPNO                                          1047 02744000
         MH    @07,@CH00769                                        1047 02745000
         LA    @01,TEMPUPID-5(@07)                                 1047 02746000
         CLC   0(1,@01),UPDTID                                     1047 02747000
         BNE   @RF01047                                            1047 02748000
*               DO;                                                1048 02749000
*                 TEMPPTR=TEMPUPAD(TEMPNO);/* TEMPLATE ADDRESS       */ 02750000
         L     TEMPPTR,TEMPUPAD-6(@07)                             1049 02751000
         LA    TEMPPTR,0(,TEMPPTR)                                 1049 02752000
*                 ENTREE=TEMPUPNO(TEMPNO);/* NO.OF FIELDS TO UPDATE  */ 02753000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             1050 02754000
         IC    @15,TEMPUPNO-5(@07)                                 1050 02755000
         ST    @15,ENTREE                                          1050 02756000
*               END;                                               1051 02757000
*           END;                                                   1052 02758000
@RF01047 AL    TEMPNO,@CF00085                                     1052 02759000
         C     TEMPNO,@CF00033                                     1052 02760000
         BNH   @DL01046                                            1052 02761000
@DC01046 DS    0H                                                  1053 02762000
*           IF TEMPPTR=ZERO THEN    /* NO TEMPLATE PRESENT           */ 02763000
         LTR   TEMPPTR,TEMPPTR                                     1053 02764000
         BNZ   @RF01053                                            1053 02765000
*             RCAREA=SWAERR;        /* SET ERROR CODE                */ 02766000
         LA    RCAREA,8                                            1054 02767000
*           ELSE                                                   1055 02768000
*             DO;                                                  1055 02769000
         B     @RC01053                                            1055 02770000
@RF01053 DS    0H                                                  1056 02771000
*               SAVEVAT=VATPTR;     /* SAVE CURRENT VATPTR@YM06550   */ 02772000
         LR    SAVEVAT,VATPTR                                      1056 02773000
*               CALL PTRUPDTE;      /* CALL PTR. UPDATE ROUTINE    1057 02774000
*                                                            @YM06550*/ 02775000
         BAL   @14,PTRUPDTE                                        1057 02776000
*               VATPTR=SAVEVAT;     /* RESTORE CURRENT VATPTR        */ 02777000
         LR    VATPTR,SAVEVAT                                      1058 02778000
*             END;                                                 1059 02779000
*         END;                                                     1060 02780000
@RC01053 DS    0H                                                  1061 02781000
*       IF(VATROVA(VATCOUNT)=ZERO&VATBLKID(VATCOUNT)=IJFCBID) THEN 1061 02782000
@RF01025 LR    @03,VATCOUNT                                        1061 02783000
         MH    @03,@CH02079                                        1061 02784000
         L     @15,VATROVA-15(@03,VATPTR)                          1061 02785000

*         IF MELRSTRT=SYSRSTRT THEN/* AUTO RESTARTS SCAN PDSNTAB  1062 02792000

*           DO;                                                    1063 02797000
*             BLKENTRY=VATCOUNT;    /* BLOCKS LOCATION IN VAT        */ 02798000

*             CALL READLOC;         /* READ BLOCK FROM SWA           */ 02800000

*             IF(JFCTEMP=ON&(JFCDISP='01'B|JFCDISP='10'B)) THEN    1066 02802000

@RT01066 DS    0H                                                  1067 02813000
*               CALL PDSSCAN;       /* TRY TO MATCH NAME     @YM07074*/ 02814000
         BAL   @14,PDSSCAN                                         1067 02815000
*           END;                                                   1068 02816000
@RF01066 DS    0H                                                  1069 02817000
*     END;                                                         1069 02818000
@RF01062 DS    0H                                                  1069 02819000
@RF01061 AL    VATCOUNT,@CF00085                                   1069 02820000
@DE01024 SLR   @03,@03                                             1069 02821000
         IC    @03,VATNO(,VATPTR)                                  1069 02822000
         CR    VATCOUNT,@03                                        1069 02823000
         BNH   @DL01024                                            1069 02824000

*     VATPTR=VATX;                  /* POINT TO EXTENSION OF ANY     */ 02826000

*   END;                                                           1071 02828000

         BE    @DC01023                                            1071 02831000
         CR    RCAREA,@04                                          1071 02832000
         BE    @DL01023                                            1071 02833000
@DC01023 DS    0H                                                  1072 02834000
*   END ADDRUPDT;                                                  1072 02835000
@EL00016 DS    0H                                                  1072 02836000
@EF00016 DS    0H                                                  1072 02837000
@ER00016 LM    @14,@04,@SA00016                                    1072 02838000
         LM    @06,@12,@SA00016+28                                 1072 02839000
         BR    @14                                                 1072 02840000
*PDSBUILD:                                                         1073 02841000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA);       /* BUILDS PDSNTAB                */ 02842000
PDSBUILD STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     1073 02843000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE BUILDS A PASSED DATA SET NAME TABLE TO CONTAIN THE*/ 02844000
*/* OLD AND NEW NAMES THAT HAVE BEEN GENERATED BY THE SYSTEM FOR     */ 02845000
*/* TEMPORARY PASSED DATA SETS.                                      */ 02846000
*                                                                  1074 02847000
*   LEN=PDSNSIZE;                   /* SIZE OF PDSNTAB       @YM07074*/ 02848000
         L     LEN,@CF02887                                        1074 02849000
*   GEN(GETMAIN R,LV=(LEN));        /* GET REQUIRED SPACE@YM07074    */ 02850000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(LEN)                                             02851000
*   IF BEGINPDS=ZERO THEN           /* FIRST PDSNTAB?        @YM07074*/ 02852000
         L     @10,BEGINPDS                                        1076 02853000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             1076 02854000
         BNZ   @RF01076                                            1076 02855000
*     BEGINPDS=R1;                  /* SAVE ADDRESS          @YM07074*/ 02856000
         ST    R1,BEGINPDS                                         1077 02857000
*   ELSE                                                           1078 02858000
*     PDSNX=R1;                     /* SAVE EXTENSION ADDRESS      1078 02859000
*                                                            @YM07074*/ 02860000

@RF01076 L     @10,PDSNPTR                                         1078 02862000

*   PDSNPTR=R1;                     /* INITIALIZE PDSNTAB PTR.     1079 02864000
*                                                            @YM07074*/ 02865000
@RC01076 ST    R1,PDSNPTR                                          1079 02866000
*   XCPTR=PDSNPTR;                  /* PREPARE TO ZERO TABLE @YM07074*/ 02867000
         L     @10,PDSNPTR                                         1080 02868000
         LR    XCPTR,@10                                           1080 02869000
*   DO R=ONE TO SIXTEEN;            /*                       @YM07074*/ 02870000
         LA    R,1                                                 1081 02871000
@DL01081 DS    0H                                                  1082 02872000
*     XCAREA=XCAREA&&XCAREA;        /*                       @YM07074*/ 02873000
         XC    XCAREA(256,XCPTR),XCAREA(XCPTR)                     1082 02874000
*     XCPTR=XCPTR+LENGTH(XCAREA);   /*                       @YM07074*/ 02875000
         AL    XCPTR,@CF00708                                      1083 02876000
*   END;                                                           1084 02877000
         AL    R,@CF00085                                          1084 02878000
         C     R,@CF00038                                          1084 02879000
         BNH   @DL01081                                            1084 02880000
*   END PDSBUILD;                                                  1085 02881000
@EL00017 DS    0H                                                  1085 02882000
@EF00017 DS    0H                                                  1085 02883000
@ER00017 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     1085 02884000
         BR    @14                                                 1085 02885000
*PDSPUT:                                                           1086 02886000
*   PROC;                           /* PUTS ENTREES IN PDSNTAB       */ 02887000
PDSPUT   STM   @14,@12,@SA00018                                    1086 02888000
*   IF(BEGINPDS=ZERO|PDSNNO=MAXPDS) THEN/* IF NO PDSNTAB OR NO SPACE    02889000
*                                                            @YM07074*/ 02890000
         L     @08,BEGINPDS                                        1087 02891000
         LTR   @08,@08                                             1087 02892000
         BZ    @RT01087                                            1087 02893000
         L     @08,PDSNPTR                                         1087 02894000
         CLI   PDSNNO(@08),46                                      1087 02895000
         BNE   @RF01087                                            1087 02896000
@RT01087 DS    0H                                                  1088 02897000
*     CALL PDSBUILD;                /* BUILD A NEW PDSNTAB   @YM07074*/ 02898000
         BAL   @14,PDSBUILD                                        1088 02899000
*   PDSNNO=PDSNNO+ONE;              /* INCREMENT ENTREE COUNTER    1089 02900000
*                                                            @YM07074*/ 02901000
@RF01087 L     @08,PDSNPTR                                         1089 02902000

         SLR   @14,@14                                             1089 02904000
         IC    @14,PDSNNO(,@08)                                    1089 02905000
         ALR   @15,@14                                             1089 02906000
         STC   @15,PDSNNO(,@08)                                    1089 02907000
*   OLDDSN(PDSNNO,ONE:FORTY4)=OJFCBPTR->JFCBDSNM(ONE:FORTY4);/*    1090 02908000
*                                                            @YM07074*/ 02909000

*   NEWDSN(PDSNNO,ONE:FORTY4)=JFCBDSNM(ONE:FORTY4);/*        @YM07074*/ 02916000

         AL    @08,@CF03008                                        1091 02918000

*   END PDSPUT;                                                    1092 02920000
