*PDSSCAN:                                                          1093 02925000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA);                                      1093 02926000
*                                                                  1093 02927000
PDSSCAN  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     1093 02928000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE SCANS THE PDSNTAB AND REPLACES NEW PASSED DATA SET*/ 02929000
*/* NAMES IN STEPS SUBSEQUENT TO THE FAILING STEP WITH THE NAMES THEY*/ 02930000
*/* HAD DURING THE ORIGINAL EXECUTION OF THE JOB.                    */ 02931000
*                                                                  1094 02932000
*   PDSNPTR=BEGINPDS;               /* GET FIRST PDSNTAB ADDRESS   1094 02933000
*                                                            @YM07074*/ 02934000
         L     @08,BEGINPDS                                        1094 02935000
         ST    @08,PDSNPTR                                         1094 02936000
*   DO WHILE(PDSNPTR>ZERO);         /* SCAN PDSNTAB AND EXT. @YM07074*/ 02937000
         B     @DE01095                                            1095 02938000
@DL01095 DS    0H                                                  1096 02939000
*     DO SLOT=ONE TO PDSNNO;        /* SCAN EACH ENTRY       @YM07074*/ 02940000
         LA    SLOT,1                                              1096 02941000
         B     @DE01096                                            1096 02942000
@DL01096 DS    0H                                                  1097 02943000
*       IF NEWDSN(SLOT,ONE:FORTY4)=JFCBDSNM(ONE:FORTY4)/*    @YM07074*/ 02944000
*         THEN                                                     1097 02945000
         L     @08,PDSNPTR                                         1097 02946000
         LR    @03,SLOT                                            1097 02947000
         MH    @03,@CH02355                                        1097 02948000
         ST    @03,@TF00001                                        1097 02949000
         ALR   @03,@08                                             1097 02950000
         AL    @03,@CF03008                                        1097 02951000
         CLC   NEWDSN-49(44,@03),JFCBDSNM(JFCBPTR)                 1097 02952000
         BNE   @RF01097                                            1097 02953000
*         JFCBDSNM(ONE:FORTY4)=OLDDSN(SLOT,ONE:FORTY4);/*    @YM07074*/ 02954000
         AL    @08,@TF00001                                        1098 02955000
         AL    @08,@CF03007                                        1098 02956000
         MVC   JFCBDSNM(44,JFCBPTR),OLDDSN-5(@08)                  1098 02957000
*     END;                          /*                       @YM07074*/ 02958000
@RF01097 AL    SLOT,@CF00085                                       1099 02959000
@DE01096 L     @08,PDSNPTR                                         1099 02960000
         SLR   @03,@03                                             1099 02961000
         IC    @03,PDSNNO(,@08)                                    1099 02962000
         CR    SLOT,@03                                            1099 02963000
         BNH   @DL01096                                            1099 02964000
*     PDSNPTR=PDSNX;                /*                       @YM07074*/ 02965000
         L     @08,PDSNPTR                                         1100 02966000

         ST    @08,PDSNPTR                                         1100 02968000
*   END PDSSCAN;                    /*                       @YM07074*/ 02969000
@DE01095 L     @08,PDSNPTR                                         1101 02970000
         LTR   @08,@08                                             1101 02971000
         BP    @DL01095                                            1101 02972000
@EL00019 DS    0H                                                  1102 02973000
@EF00019 DS    0H                                                  1102 02974000
@ER00019 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     1102 02975000

*   END IEFXB601                                                   1103 02977000

./  ADD  SSI=30232760,NAME=IEFXB602
         TITLE 'RESTART INTERFACE ROUTINE                            '  00001000
IEFXB602 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00002000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00003000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00004000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00005000
         DC    AL2(@EP00001-@MAINENT)                                   00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IEFXB602  73.023'                                 0001 00008000
IEF602   DS    0H                                                  0001 00009000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00010000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00011000
         DC    AL2(@EP00059-IEF602)                                     00012000
         ENTRY IEF602                                                   00013000
         DROP  @15                                                      00014000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00015000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00016000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00017000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00018000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00019000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                               00020000
         LR    @11,@01                                             0001 00021000
         USING @DATD,@11                                           0001 00022000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00023000
         LM    @15,@01,16(@13)                                     0001 00024000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                         0001 00025000
         LR    @13,@11                                             0001 00026000
         XC    @ZTEMPS(@ZLEN),@ZTEMPS                                   00027000
         AH    @15,4(,@15)                                         0001 00028000
         BR    @15                                                 0001 00029000
@EP00001 DS    0H                                                  0002 00030000
JSCBDISP EQU 188                                                        00031000
JSCBAOS1 EQU  72                                                        00032000
JSCBAOS2 EQU 192                                                        00033000
*/*                                                                  */ 00034000
*/*                          END OF VAT                              */ 00035000
*IEF602: ENTRY;                        /* ALTERNATE ENTRY POINT      */ 00036000
@EP00059 DS    0H                                                  0060 00037000
*        QMPAPTR=R1;                   /* SET UP QMPA ADDRESSABILITY */ 00038000
         LR    QMPAPTR,R1                                          0060 00039000
*        TABLGOT=NOTON;                /* INITIALIZE EXTENSION SWITCH*/ 00040000
         NI    TABLGOT,B'01111111'                                 0061 00041000
*        JSCBPTR=TCBJSCB;              /* INITIALIZE JSCB POINTER    */ 00042000
         L     @10,CVTPTR                                          0062 00043000
         L     @10,CVTTCBP(,@10)                                   0062 00044000
         L     @10,TCBPTR(,@10)                                    0062 00045000
         MVC   JSCBPTR(4),TCBJSCB(@10)                             0062 00046000
*        RESPECIFY IEZJSCB BASED(JSCBPTR); /* SET NEW JSCBPTR        */ 00047000
*        IF JSCBACT=JSCBPTR THEN      /* INDICATES DAUGHTER JSCB    */ 00048000
         L     @10,JSCBPTR                                         0064 00049000
         CLC   JSCBACT(4,@10),JSCBPTR                              0064 00050000
         BE    @RF00064                                            0064 00051000
*          JSCBPTR=JSCBACT;            /* PRESENT,SWITCH POINTERS    */ 00052000
         L     @10,JSCBPTR                                         0065 00053000
         L     @10,JSCBACT(,@10)                                   0065 00054000
         ST    @10,JSCBPTR                                         0065 00055000
*        IF JSCBVATA=ZERO THEN         /* IF NO VAT EXISTS BUILD     */ 00056000
@RF00064 L     @10,JSCBPTR                                         0066 00057000
         L     @10,JSCBVATA(,@10)                                  0066 00058000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0066 00059000
         BNZ   @RF00066                                            0066 00060000
*          CALL VATBUILD;              /* FIRST TABLE                */ 00061000
         BAL   @14,VATBUILD                                        0067 00062000
*        ELSE                          /* OTHERWISE FIND PROPER TABLE*/ 00063000
*          DO;                         /*                            */ 00064000
         B     @RC00066                                            0068 00065000
@RF00066 DS    0H                                                  0069 00066000
*            VATPTR=JSCBVATA;          /* INITIALIZE PTR. TO VAT     */ 00067000
         L     @10,JSCBPTR                                         0069 00068000
         L     VATPTR,JSCBVATA(,@10)                               0069 00069000
*            DO WHILE(VATX=ZERO);     /* IS THERE AN EXTENSION      */ 00070000
         B     @DE00070                                            0070 00071000
@DL00070 DS    0H                                                  0071 00072000
*              VATPTR=VATX;            /* YES,SET PTR.TO EXTENSION   */ 00073000
         L     @10,VATX(,VATPTR)                                   0071 00074000
         LR    VATPTR,@10                                          0071 00075000
*            END;                                                  0072 00076000
@DE00070 L     @10,VATX(,VATPTR)                                   0072 00077000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0072 00078000
         BNZ   @DL00070                                            0072 00079000
*            IF VATNO=MAXENTRY THEN    /* PROPER TABLE FOUND,IF NO   */ 00080000
         CLI   VATNO(VATPTR),56                                    0073 00081000
         BNE   @RF00073                                            0073 00082000
*              CALL VATBUILD;          /* MORE ENTRIES GET AN EXT.   */ 00083000
         BAL   @14,VATBUILD                                        0074 00084000
*          END;                                                    0075 00085000
@RF00073 DS    0H                                                  0076 00086000
*        IF QMPOP=WRITE|QMPOP=RITEASGN THEN /* FOR WRITE OR WRITE    */ 00087000
@RC00066 CLI   QMPOP(QMPAPTR),X'03'                                0076 00088000
         BE    @RT00076                                            0076 00089000
         CLI   QMPOP(QMPAPTR),X'02'                                0076 00090000
         BNE   @RF00076                                            0076 00091000
@RT00076 DS    0H                                                  0077 00092000
*          DO;                              /* ASSIGN SAVE NUMBER OF */ 00093000
*            NUMWRITE=QMPCMNC;              /* RECORDS BEING WRITTEN */ 00094000
         MVC   NUMWRITE(1),QMPCMNC(QMPAPTR)                        0078 00095000
*            NUMWRITE=NUMWRITE&ZEROFOX;     /* TURN OFF RECORDS ASSGN*/ 00096000
         LA    @10,15                                              0079 00097000
         MVC   @ZT00003+3(1),NUMWRITE                              0079 00098000
         N     @10,@ZT00003                                        0079 00099000
         STC   @10,NUMWRITE                                        0079 00100000
*            BEGIN=VATNO+ONE;               /* FIRST ENTRY TO WRITE  */ 00101000
         LA    @10,1                                               0080 00102000
         MVC   @ZT00003+3(1),VATNO(VATPTR)                         0080 00103000
         A     @10,@ZT00003                                        0080 00104000
         ST    @10,BEGIN                                           0080 00105000
*            FINIS=BEGIN+NUMWRITE-ONE;      /* LAST ENTRY TO WRITE   */ 00106000
         SR    @10,@10                                             0081 00107000
         IC    @10,NUMWRITE                                        0081 00108000
         A     @10,BEGIN                                           0081 00109000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0081 00110000
         ST    @10,FINIS                                           0081 00111000
*            NEXTTBL=ZERO;                  /* NO SPILL OVER SWITCH  */ 00112000
         SR    @10,@10                                             0082 00113000
         ST    @10,NEXTTBL                                         0082 00114000
*            IF FINIS>MAXENTRY THEN         /* WILL LAST ENTRY FIT   */ 00115000
         L     @10,FINIS                                           0083 00116000
         CH    @10,@CH00761                                        0083 00117000
         BNH   @RF00083                                            0083 00118000
*                DO;                   /* INTO TABLE? IF NO          */ 00119000
*                  NEXTTBL=FINIS-MAXENTRY; /* NUMBER GOING INTO EXT. */ 00120000
         L     @10,FINIS                                           0085 00121000
         SH    @10,@CH00761                                        0085 00122000
         ST    @10,NEXTTBL                                         0085 00123000
*                  FINIS=MAXENTRY;     /* USE UP TO LAST ENTRY IN    */ 00124000
         MVC   FINIS(4),@CF00761                                   0086 00125000
*                END;                  /* CURRENT TABLE              */ 00126000
*            EPAPTR=QMPACL;            /* INITIALIZE EPA PTR         */ 00127000
@RF00083 L     @10,QMPACL-1(,QMPAPTR)                              0088 00128000
         LA    @10,0(,@10)                                         0088 00129000
         ST    @10,EPAPTR                                          0088 00130000
*            DO R=BEGIN TO FINIS;      /* SAVE VIRTUAL ADDRESSES     */ 00131000
         L     @10,BEGIN                                           0089 00132000
         B     @DE00089                                            0089 00133000
@DL00089 DS    0H                                                  0090 00134000
*              SPFXPTR=SWROWVA;        /* INITIALIZE SWA PREFIX PTR. */ 00135000
         L     @10,EPAPTR                                          0090 00136000
         MVC   @ZT00001+1(3),SWROWVA(@10)                          0090 00137000
         L     SPFXPTR,@ZT00001                                    0090 00138000
*              IF SWPWRT=ON THEN       /* HAS BLOCK BEEN WRITTEN?    */ 00139000
         TM    SWPWRT(SPFXPTR),B'10000000'                         0091 00140000
         BNO   @RF00091                                            0091 00141000
*                DO;                                               0092 00142000
*                  R=R-ONE;            /* YES,REUSE ENTRY SLOT       */ 00143000
         L     @10,R                                               0093 00144000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0093 00145000
         ST    @10,R                                               0093 00146000
*                  IF NEXTTBL=ZERO THEN /* DECREMENT NUMBER TO GO   */ 00147000
         L     @10,NEXTTBL                                         0094 00148000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0094 00149000
         BZ    @RF00094                                            0094 00150000
*                    NEXTTBL=NEXTTBL-ONE;/* INTO EXTENSION,IF ANY    */ 00151000
         L     @10,NEXTTBL                                         0095 00152000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0095 00153000
         ST    @10,NEXTTBL                                         0095 00154000
*                  ELSE                /* DECREMENT FINAL ENTRY SLOT */ 00155000
*                    FINIS=FINIS-ONE;                              0096 00156000
         B     @RC00094                                            0096 00157000
@RF00094 L     @10,FINIS                                           0096 00158000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0096 00159000
         ST    @10,FINIS                                           0096 00160000
*                END;                                              0097 00161000
@RC00094 DS    0H                                                  0098 00162000
*              ELSE                    /* ENTRY NOT WRITTEN BEFORE   */ 00163000
*                DO;                                               0098 00164000
         B     @RC00091                                            0098 00165000
@RF00091 DS    0H                                                  0099 00166000
*                  VATRNVA(R)=SWROWVA; /* SAVE VIRTUAL ADDRESS IN VAT*/ 00167000
         L     @10,R                                               0099 00168000
         MH    @10,@CH01383                                        0099 00169000
         L     @07,EPAPTR                                          0099 00170000
         MVC   @ZT00001+1(3),SWROWVA(@07)                          0099 00171000
         L     @07,@ZT00001                                        0099 00172000
         ST    @07,@TF00001                                        0099 00173000
         ALR   @10,VATPTR                                          0099 00174000
         MVC   VATRNVA-14(3,@10),@TF00001+1                        0099 00175000
*                  VATNO=VATNO+ONE;    /* INCREMENT TO NEXT ENTRY    */ 00176000
         LA    @10,1                                               0100 00177000
         MVC   @ZT00003+3(1),VATNO(VATPTR)                         0100 00178000
         A     @10,@ZT00003                                        0100 00179000
         STC   @10,VATNO(,VATPTR)                                  0100 00180000
*                END;                                              0101 00181000
*              EPAPTR=EPAPTR+LENGTH(SWAMMEPA); /* FIND NEXT EPA      */ 00182000
@RC00091 LA    @10,8                                               0102 00183000
         A     @10,EPAPTR                                          0102 00184000
         ST    @10,EPAPTR                                          0102 00185000
*            END;                                                  0103 00186000
         LA    @10,1                                               0103 00187000
         A     @10,R                                               0103 00188000
@DE00089 ST    @10,R                                               0103 00189000
         C     @10,FINIS                                           0103 00190000
         BNH   @DL00089                                            0103 00191000
*            IF NEXTTBL=ZERO THEN     /* IS THERE NEED FOR AN       */ 00192000
         L     @10,NEXTTBL                                         0104 00193000
         LTR   @10,@10                                             0104 00194000
         BZ    @RF00104                                            0104 00195000
*              DO;                     /* EXTENSION                  */ 00196000
*                CURVATAD=VATPTR;      /* SAVE OLD VAT PTR.          */ 00197000
         ST    VATPTR,CURVATAD                                     0106 00198000
*                CALL VATBUILD;        /* GET AN EXTENSION           */ 00199000
         BAL   @14,VATBUILD                                        0107 00200000
*                TABLGOT=ON;           /* INDICATES EXTENSION GOTTEN */ 00201000
         OI    TABLGOT,B'10000000'                                 0108 00202000
*                DO R=ONE TO NEXTTBL;  /* PLACE SPILL OVER INTO EXT. */ 00203000
         LA    @10,1                                               0109 00204000
         B     @DE00109                                            0109 00205000
@DL00109 DS    0H                                                  0110 00206000
*                  SPFXPTR=SWROWVA;    /* INITIALIZE SWA PREFIX PTR. */ 00207000
         L     @10,EPAPTR                                          0110 00208000
         MVC   @ZT00001+1(3),SWROWVA(@10)                          0110 00209000
         L     SPFXPTR,@ZT00001                                    0110 00210000
*                  IF SWPWRT=ON THEN   /* HAS BLOCK BEEN WRITTEN?    */ 00211000
         TM    SWPWRT(SPFXPTR),B'10000000'                         0111 00212000
         BNO   @RF00111                                            0111 00213000
*                    DO;                                           0112 00214000
*                      R=R-ONE;        /* YES,REUSE ENTRY SLOT       */ 00215000
         L     @10,R                                               0113 00216000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0113 00217000
         ST    @10,R                                               0113 00218000
*                      NEXTTBL=NEXTTBL-ONE; /* DECREMENT FINAL ENTRY */ 00219000
         L     @10,NEXTTBL                                         0114 00220000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0114 00221000
         ST    @10,NEXTTBL                                         0114 00222000
*                    END;                                          0115 00223000
*                  ELSE                                            0116 00224000
*                    DO;                                           0116 00225000
         B     @RC00111                                            0116 00226000

*  DCL                                                             0125 00259000

*GEN (BALR 14,15);                            /* GO TO SWA MANAGER   */ 00265000

@RT00130 DS    0H                                                  0131 00275000

*                    SPFXPTR=VATRNVA(R);/* INIT. PREFIX POINTER      */ 00286000

*VATBUILD: PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA,DONTSAVE(6));                   0152 00370000
VATBUILD STM   @14,@05,12(@13)                                     0152 00371000
         STM   @07,@12,48(@13)                                     0152 00372000
*        LEN=TABSIZE;                  /* LENGTH OF VAT              */ 00373000
         LA    LEN,800                                             0153 00374000
*        OVATPTR=ZERO;                 /* INITIALIZE OLD VAT POINTER */ 00375000
         SR    @10,@10                                             0154 00376000
         ST    @10,OVATPTR                                         0154 00377000
*        GEN (GETMAIN R,LV=(LEN));     /* GET SPACE FOR VAT OR VATX  */ 00378000

*        IF JSCBVATA=ZERO THEN         /* IS THERE A VAT ALREADY?    */ 00380000

*          DO;                         /* NO, THEN SAVE ADDR. IN JSCB*/ 00385000
*            JSCBVATA=R1;              /* AN INITIALIZE PTR FIELD    */ 00386000
         L     @10,JSCBPTR                                         0158 00387000

*            VATPTR=R1;                                            0159 00389000
         LR    VATPTR,R1                                           0159 00390000
*          END;                                                    0160 00391000
*        ELSE                          /* THERE IS A VAT ALREADY,SAVE*/ 00392000
*          DO;                         /* THE ADDR. OF THE EXTENSION */ 00393000
         B     @RC00156                                            0161 00394000
@RF00156 DS    0H                                                  0162 00395000
*            VATX=R1;                  /* AND RESET VATPTR TO POINT  */ 00396000

*            OVATPTR=VATPTR;           /* SAVE PREVIOUS VAT PTR.     */ 00398000
         ST    VATPTR,OVATPTR                                      0163 00399000
*            VATPTR=R1;                /* TO THE CURRENT EXTENSION   */ 00400000
         LR    VATPTR,R1                                           0164 00401000
*          END;                                                    0165 00402000
*        XCPTR=R1;                     /* SET PTR. FOR ZEROING TABLE */ 00403000
@RC00156 ST    R1,XCPTR                                            0166 00404000
*        DO R=ONE TO THREE;            /* INITIALIZE TABLE ENTRIES   */ 00405000

*        END;                                                      0170 00416000

MG08     WTO   'IEF209I  VIRTUAL STORAGE UNAVAILABLE FOR  ',           *00071000
               MF=L,ROUTCDE=(2,11),DESC=(6)                             00072000
LENGTH8  EQU   *                                                        00073000
MG09     WTO   'IEF169I RESTART CANCELLED FOR JOB JJJJJJJJ',           *00074000
               MF=L,ROUTCDE=2,DESC=6                                    00075000
LENGTH9  EQU   *                                                        00076000
MG10     WTO   'IHJ010I CHECKPOINT RESTART OF JOB JJJJJJJJ ABENDED',   *00077000
               MF=L,ROUTCDE=(2,11),DESC=6                               00078000
LENGTH10 EQU   *                                                        00079000
IEFXB603 CSECT                                                          00080000
@00      EQU   00                      EQUATES FOR REGISTERS 0-15       00081000
@01      EQU   01                                                       00082000
@02      EQU   02                                                       00083000
@03      EQU   03                                                       00084000
@04      EQU   04                                                       00085000
@05      EQU   05                                                       00086000
@06      EQU   06                                                       00087000
@07      EQU   07                                                       00088000
@08      EQU   08                                                       00089000
@09      EQU   09                                                       00090000
@10      EQU   10                                                       00091000
@11      EQU   11                                                       00092000
@12      EQU   12                                                       00093000
@13      EQU   13                                                       00094000
@14      EQU   14                                                       00095000
@15      EQU   15                                                       00096000
@ENDDATA EQU   *                                                        00097000
         END   IEFXB603                                                 00098000
./  ADD  SSI=60860774,NAME=IEFXB604
         TITLE 'STEP HEADER RECORD CREATE                              *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEFXB604 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IEFXB604  76.087'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00014000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @11,@01                                             0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@11                                           0001 00017000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00018000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0001 00019000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                         0001 00020000
         LR    @13,@11                                             0001 00021000
         XC    @ZTEMPS(@ZLEN),@ZTEMPS                                   00022000
         MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                                  0001 00023000
JSCBDISP EQU 188                                                        00024000
JSCBAOS1 EQU  72                                                        00025000
JSCBAOS2 EQU 192                                                        00026000
*                                                                  0090 00027000
*/********************************************************************/ 00028000
*/*                                                                  */ 00029000
*/*  THIS ROUTINE IS CALLED BY IEFSD162 JUST BEFORE JOB ENTERS       */ 00030000
*/*  ALLOCATION STATE.  THE MAIN FUNCTION IS TO DETERMINE WHETHER    */ 00031000
*/*  A STEP HEADER RECORD SHOULD BE BUILT FOR THIS STEP. THIS        */ 00032000
*/*  ROUTINE WILL SET JOB STATE TO 'IN ALLOCATION' , RESET ALL       */ 00033000
*/*  RESTART INDICATORS IN LCT AND JOURNAL THE JCT.                  */ 00034000
*/*                                                                  */ 00035000

         NI    LCTRFBSM(@10),B'00101111'                           0143 00215000
*                                                                  0144 00216000
*/********************************************************************/ 00217000
*/*                                                                  */ 00218000
*/*  THIS ROUTINE IS CALLED WHEN A STEP HEADER RECORD IS TO BE       */ 00219000
*/*  BUILT, THAT IS IF THE JOB IS NOT A RESTART JOB OR IF THE JOB    */ 00220000
*/*  IS A DEFERRED RESTART JOB.  THIS ROUTINE WILL BUILD THE STEP    */ 00221000
*/*  HEADER RECORD AND CALL IEFXB500 TO JOURNAL IT.                  */ 00222000
*/*                                                                  */ 00223000
*/********************************************************************/ 00224000
*                                                                  0144 00225000
*JNLSHR:                                                           0144 00226000
*   PROCEDURE;                                                     0144 00227000
@EL00001 L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0144 00228000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0144 00229000
         LR    @01,@11                                             0144 00230000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00231000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0144 00232000
         BR    @14                                                 0144 00233000
JNLSHR   STM   @14,@12,@SA00002                                    0144 00234000
*   SHR=SHR&&SHR;                                                  0145 00235000
         XC    SHR(18),SHR                                         0145 00236000
*   SHRMRBA=JSCBSMLR->RPLRBAR;      /* MOVE SYSTEM MSG RBA TO SHR    */ 00237000
         L     @10,JSCBSMLR(,JSCBPTR)                              0146 00238000
         MVC   SHRMRBA(8),RPLRBAR(@10)                             0146 00239000
*   SHRJRBA=JSCBJNLR->RPLRBAR;      /* MOVE JNL RBA TO SHR           */ 00240000
         L     @10,JSCBJNLR(,JSCBPTR)                              0147 00241000
         MVC   SHRJRBA(8),RPLRBAR(@10)                             0147 00242000
*   SHRSNUMB(TWO:TWO)=STEPNO;       /* INSERT STEPNO. INTO SHR     0148 00243000
*                                                            @YM07086*/ 00244000
         MVC   SHRSNUMB+1(1),STEPNO                                0148 00245000
*   JNLPTR=ADDR(PARMAREA);          /* SET UP BASE PTR FOR PARMLIST  */ 00246000
         LA    JNLPTR,PARMAREA                                     0149 00247000
*   JNLPARM=JNLPARM&&JNLPARM;       /* CLEAR PARAMETER AREA          */ 00248000
         XC    JNLPARM(8,JNLPTR),JNLPARM(JNLPTR)                   0150 00249000
*   JNLDRCT=ON;                     /* TO SET UP PARMLIST FOR DRCT   */ 00250000
         OI    JNLDRCT(JNLPTR),B'00010000'                         0151 00251000
*   JNLPPTRX=ADDR(JNLPARM)+LENGTH(JNLPARM);/* POINT TO JNLPARM     0152 00252000
*                                      EXTENSION             @Z40FPPJ*/ 00253000
         LA    @10,8                                               0152 00254000
         ALR   @10,JNLPTR                                          0152 00255000
         ST    @10,JNLPPTRX(,JNLPTR)                               0152 00256000
*   JNLPARMX=JNLPARMX&&JNLPARMX;    /* CLEAR EXTN AREA       @Z40FPPJ*/ 00257000
         XC    JNLPARMX(16,@10),JNLPARMX(@10)                      0153 00258000
*   JNLBLKAD=ADDR(SHR);             /* INSERT BLOCK ADDR     @Z40FPPJ*/ 00259000
         LA    @05,SHR                                             0154 00260000
         ST    @05,JNLBLKAD(,@10)                                  0154 00261000
*   JNLPID=BLKID;                   /* INSERT BLOCK ID               */ 00262000
         MVI   JNLPID(@10),X'C0'                                   0155 00263000
*   JNLPRLNG=LENGTH(SHR);           /* INSERT BLOCK LENGTH           */ 00264000
         MVC   JNLPRLNG(3,@10),@CF01978+1                          0156 00265000
*   CALL IEFXB500(JNLPARM);         /* TO JOURNAL STEP HEADER        */ 00266000
         ST    JNLPTR,@AL00001                                     0157 00267000
         L     @15,@CV01930                                        0157 00268000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        0157 00269000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0157 00270000
*   SAVERBA=JSCBJNLR->RPLRBAR;      /* SHR RBA SAVED         @YM07086*/ 00271000
         L     @10,JSCBJNLR(,JSCBPTR)                              0158 00272000
         MVC   SAVERBA(8),RPLRBAR(@10)                             0158 00273000
*   IF JSCBJNLE=OF THEN             /* NO JNL ERROR          @YM07086*/ 00274000
         TM    JSCBJNLE(JSCBPTR),B'00100000'                       0159 00275000
         BNZ   @RF00159                                            0159 00276000
*     IF LCTRFBCR=OF THEN           /* NOT CHKPT RESTART     @YM07086*/ 00277000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0160 00278000
         L     @10,LCTPTR(,@10)                                    0160 00279000
         TM    LCTRFBCR(@10),B'01000000'                           0160 00280000
         BNZ   @RF00160                                            0160 00281000
*       CALL JNLJCT;                /* JNL JCT IN ALLOC      @YM07086*/ 00282000
         BAL   @14,JNLJCT                                          0161 00283000
*   END JNLSHR;                                                    0162 00284000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0162 00285000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0162 00286000
@ER00002 LM    @14,@12,@SA00002                                    0162 00287000
         BR    @14                                                 0162 00288000
*                                                                  0163 00289000
*/********************************************************************/ 00290000
*/*                                                                  */ 00291000
*/*  THIS ROUTINE IS CALLED AFTER THE STEP HEADER RECORD IS          */ 00292000
*/*  JOURNALLED. THE UPDATED JCT WILL ALSO BE JOURNALLED IF THE JOB  */ 00293000
*/*  IS A AUTO STEP RESTART.                                         */ 00294000
*/*                                                                  */ 00295000
*/********************************************************************/ 00296000
*                                                                  0163 00297000
*JNLJCT:                                                           0163 00298000
*   PROC;                                                          0163 00299000
JNLJCT   STM   @14,@12,@SA00003                                    0163 00300000
*   JCTJSB=JCTJSB&CLEAR;            /* CLEAR JOB STATE BITS IN JCT   */ 00301000
         LA    @10,240                                             0164 00302000
         MVC   @ZT00003+3(1),JCTJSB(JCTPTR)                        0164 00303000
         N     @10,@ZT00003                                        0164 00304000
         STC   @10,JCTJSB(,JCTPTR)                                 0164 00305000
*   JCTJSBAL=ON;                    /* SET JOB IN ALLOC STATE        */ 00306000
         OI    JCTJSBAL(JCTPTR),B'00000100'                        0165 00307000
*   QMPAPTR=ADDR(QMGR1);            /* SET UP PTR TO QMPA            */ 00308000
         L     @10,@PC00001                                        0166 00309000
         L     @10,LCTPTR(,@10)                                    0166 00310000
         LA    QMPAPTR,QMGR1(,@10)                                 0166 00311000
*   QMPCMNC=RECNO;                                                 0167 00312000
         MVI   QMPCMNC(QMPAPTR),X'01'                              0167 00313000
*   QMSJNL=ON;                      /* SPECIAL JOURNAL BIT           */ 00314000
         OI    QMSJNL(QMPAPTR),B'00100000'                         0168 00315000
*   QMPACL=ADDR(EPA);               /* INSERT EPA PTR IN QMPA        */ 00316000
         LA    @05,EPA                                             0169 00317000
         ST    @05,@TF00001                                        0169 00318000
         MVC   QMPACL(3,QMPAPTR),@TF00001+1                        0169 00319000
*   QMPOP=SWAWRT;                   /* WRITE OP CODE                 */ 00320000
         MVI   QMPOP(QMPAPTR),X'03'                                0170 00321000
*   EPAPTR=ADDR(EPA);                                              0171 00322000
         LR    EPAPTR,@05                                          0171 00323000
*   SWBUFPTR=LCTJCTAD;              /* INSERT IN CORE JCT PTR        */ 00324000
         MVC   SWBUFPTR(4,EPAPTR),LCTJCTAD(@10)                    0172 00325000
*   SWROWVA=JCTDSKAD;               /* INSERT JCT SVA PTR            */ 00326000
         MVC   SWROWVA(3,EPAPTR),JCTDSKAD(JCTPTR)                  0173 00327000
*   SWWRTID=JCTIDENT;               /* INSERT JCT ID                 */ 00328000
         MVC   SWWRTID(1,EPAPTR),JCTIDENT(JCTPTR)                  0174 00329000
*   R1=QMPAPTR;                                                    0175 00330000
         LR    R1,QMPAPTR                                          0175 00331000
*   GEN(IEFQMREQ);                                                 0176 00332000
         IEFQMREQ                                                       00333000
*   QMSJNL=OF;                      /* TURN OFF OVERRIDE             */ 00334000
         NI    QMSJNL(QMPAPTR),B'11011111'                         0177 00335000
*   END JNLJCT;                                                    0178 00336000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0178 00337000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0178 00338000
@ER00003 LM    @14,@12,@SA00003                                    0178 00339000
         BR    @14                                                 0178 00340000
*                                                                  0179 00341000
*/********************************************************************/ 00342000
*/*                                                          @YM07086*/ 00343000
*/*  THIS ROUTINE CALLLS IEFXB500 TO JOURNAL JOB HEADER      @YM07086*/ 00344000
*/*  RECORD.                                                 @YM07086*/ 00345000

./  ADD  SSI=80590390,NAME=IEFXB609
         TITLE 'IEFXB609 (IEFDSDRP) 11/21/75                           *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEFXB609 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                                  0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                               0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                             0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                             0001 00007000
         DC    C'IEFXB609  78.059'                                 0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00010000
         BALR  @04,0                                               0001 00011000
@PSTART  LA    @05,4095(,@04)                                      0001 00012000
         LA    @06,4095(,@05)                                      0001 00013000
         LA    @10,4095(,@06)                                      0001 00014000
         USING @PSTART,@04                                         0001 00015000
         USING @PSTART+4095,@05                                    0001 00016000
         USING @PSTART+8190,@06                                    0001 00017000
         USING @PSTART+12285,@10                                   0001 00018000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00019000
         MODESET EXTKEY=SCHED,SAVEKEY=(2)                               00020000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00021000
         LR    @03,@01                                             0001 00022000
         LA    @08,4095(,@03)                                      0001 00023000
         USING @DATD,@03                                           0001 00024000
         USING @DATD+4095,@08                                      0001 00025000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00026000
         STC   @02,CALLKEY                                         0001 00027000
         MODESET KEYADDR=(2)                                            00028000
         LM    @00,@02,20(@13)                                     0001 00029000
         ST    @03,8(,@13)                                         0001 00030000
         LR    @13,@03                                             0001 00031000
         MODESET EXTKEY=ZERO                                            00032000
         MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                                  0001 00033000
         MODESET EXTKEY=SCHED                                           00034000
JSCBDISP EQU 188                                                        00035000
JSCBAOS1 EQU  72                                                        00036000
JSCBAOS2 EQU 192                                                        00037000
*                                      PROCESSING                    */ 00038000
*   CALL SETUP;                     /* INITIALIZATION                */ 00039000
         BAL   @14,SETUP                                           0318 00040000
*   CALL FINDCHEK;                  /* FINDS SIOT AND JFCB FOR CKPT     00041000
*                                      DATASET                       */ 00042000
         BAL   @14,FINDCHEK                                        0319 00043000
*   CALL ALOCCHEK;                  /* DYNAMICALLY ALLOCS THE CHKPT     00044000
*                                      DATASET                       */ 00045000
         BAL   @14,ALOCCHEK                                        0320 00046000
*   CALL OPENCHEK;                  /* PERFORM OPEN VIA IEFXB610     */ 00047000
         BAL   @14,OPENCHEK                                        0321 00048000
*   CALL RNAMEPGM;                  /* INSURES PROPER SCT STRUCTURE -   00049000
*                                      AND CHANGES PGMNAME TO      0322 00050000
*                                      IEFRSTRT............          */ 00051000
         BAL   @14,RNAMEPGM                                        0322 00052000
*   CALL CHRPROC;                   /* PROCESS CHECKPOINT HEADER   0323 00053000
*                                      RECORD                        */ 00054000
         BAL   @14,CHRPROC                                         0323 00055000
*   CALL MSGSETUP;                  /* CONSTRUCT SUCCESS MESSAGE     */ 00056000
         BAL   @14,MSGSETUP                                        0324 00057000
*   CALL DDNTPROC;                  /* PROCESS THE DDNAME TABLE -  0325 00058000
*                                      HANDLE SITUATION CAUSED BY  0325 00059000
*                                      DYN. UNALLOCATING JCL DATA  0325 00060000
*                                      SETS.                         */ 00061000
         BAL   @14,DDNTPROC                                        0325 00062000
*   CALL MERGMAIN;                                                 0326 00063000
*                                                                  0326 00064000
         BAL   @14,MERGMAIN                                        0326 00065000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00066000
*   /*                                                               */ 00067000
*   /* PROCESS THE TYPE 1 DSDRS AGAINST THE EXISTING SIOT/JFCB CHAIN.*/ 00068000
*   /* THIS PROC MAKES CALLS TO : READCHEK SIOTSCAN SIOTPROC JFCBPROC*/ 00069000
*   /* GDGNTJOB                                                      */ 00070000
*   /*                                                               */ 00071000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00072000
*                                                                  0327 00073000
*   CALL LEFTOVER;                  /* PROCESS ANY SIOTS THAT ARE  0327 00074000
*                                      LEFT                          */ 00075000
         BAL   @14,LEFTOVER                                        0327 00076000
*   CALL SCTXPROC;                  /* BUILD RESTART PARAMETER LIST  */ 00077000
         BAL   @14,SCTXPROC                                        0328 00078000
*   CALL FREECHEK;                  /* DYN UNALLOCATE CKPT D.S.      */ 00079000
         BAL   @14,FREECHEK                                        0329 00080000
*   CALL WRAPUP;                    /* ISSUE SUCESS MSG AND CLEAN UP */ 00081000
         BAL   @14,WRAPUP                                          0330 00082000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET EXTKEY(SCHED)         */ 00083000
*     SPKA(16);                     /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00084000
         LA    @12,16                                              0332 00085000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              0332 00086000
*   END;                            /* MODESET EXTKEY(SCHED) INSURE     00087000
*                                      SCHEDULER KEY                 */ 00088000
*   RETURN CODE(ZEROPTR);           /* RETURN TO INIT...RC = 0       */ 00089000
         IC    @02,CALLKEY                                         0334 00090000
         L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0334 00091000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0334 00092000
         LR    @01,@03                                             0334 00093000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00094000
         MODESET KEYADDR=(2)                                            00095000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0334 00096000
         L     @14,12(,@13)                                        0334 00097000
         LM    @00,@12,20(@13)                                     0334 00098000
         BR    @14                                                 0334 00099000
*SETUP:                                                            0335 00100000
*   PROC;                                                          0335 00101000
@EL00001 IC    @02,CALLKEY                                         0335 00102000
         L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0335 00103000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0335 00104000
         LR    @01,@03                                             0335 00105000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00106000
         MODESET KEYADDR=(2)                                            00107000
@ER00001 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0335 00108000
         BR    @14                                                 0335 00109000
SETUP    STM   @14,@12,@SA00002                                    0335 00110000
*   DCL                                                            0336 00111000
*     LENSTAE PTR(31) LOCAL STATIC GEND;                           0336 00112000
*   DCL                                                            0337 00113000
*     STAELIST CHAR(*) GEND BDY(WORD);                             0337 00114000
*   DCL                                                            0338 00115000
*     STAENTR BIT(1);                                              0338 00116000
*   DCL                                                            0339 00117000
*     STALIST1 CHAR(*) GEND LOCAL STATIC BDY(WORD);                0339 00118000
*   DCL                                                            0340 00119000
*     LISTREL PTR(24) DEF(STAELIST) POS(2);                        0340 00120000
*   DCL                                                            0341 00121000
*     STAEREGS CHAR(72) BDY(WORD);  /* SAVEAREA FOR REGS FOR STAE    */ 00122000
*   DCL                                                            0342 00123000
*     REGPTR PTR(31) ABNL;                                         0342 00124000
*   LCTPTR=ADDR(LCTPTR1);           /* SAVE INPUT PARAMETER          */ 00125000
         L     @12,@PC00001                                        0343 00126000
         ST    @12,LCTPTR                                          0343 00127000
*   TCBPTR=TCBCURN;                 /* ADRESSABILITY TCB             */ 00128000
         LA    @12,16                                              0344 00129000
         L     @12,CVTPTR(,@12)                                    0344 00130000
         L     @12,CVTTCBP(,@12)                                   0344 00131000
         MVC   TCBPTR(4),TCBCURN(@12)                              0344 00132000
*   STAELIST(1:LENSTAE)=STALIST1(1:LENSTAE);/* COPY FOR RE-ENT     0345 00133000
*                                                            @YM07326*/ 00134000
         L     @12,LENSTAE                                         0345 00135000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               0345 00136000
         EX    @12,@SM04554                                        0345 00137000
*   LISTREL=ADDR(STAEPROC);         /* PUT RELOCATABLE ADDR IN LIST  */ 00138000
         LA    @12,STAEPROC                                        0346 00139000
         STCM  @12,7,LISTREL                                       0346 00140000
*   GEN(STM 0,15,STAEREGS);         /* REGS FOR STAE EXIT            */ 00141000
         STM 0,15,STAEREGS                                              00142000
*   REGPTR=ADDR(STAEREGS);          /* INITIALIZE PTR FOR STAE EXIT  */ 00143000
         LA    @12,STAEREGS                                        0348 00144000
         ST    @12,REGPTR                                          0348 00145000
*   TCBPTR=TCBCURN;                 /* INIT TCB ADDR'ABILITY         */ 00146000
         LA    @12,16                                              0349 00147000
         L     @12,CVTPTR(,@12)                                    0349 00148000
         L     @12,CVTTCBP(,@12)                                   0349 00149000
         ICM   @11,15,TCBCURN(@12)                                 0349 00150000
         ST    @11,TCBPTR                                          0349 00151000
*   UNCATSW=NOTON;                  /* INIT SWITCH TO INDICATE     0350 00152000
*                                      UNALOCAT HAS NOT BEEN ENTERED    00153000
*                                                            @YM06575*/ 00154000
         NI    UNCATSW,B'01111111'                                 0350 00155000
*   LASTDSAB=ZEROPTR;               /* INDICATE NO DSABS     @YM30745*/ 00156000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0351 00157000
         ST    @12,LASTDSAB                                        0351 00158000
*   ALOCPARM=NOTON;                 /* INDICATE DYN ALLOC PARMS ARE     00159000
*                                      NOT INITIALIZED FOR STAE    0352 00160000
*                                                            @YM30745*/ 00161000
         NI    ALOCPARM,B'01111111'                                0352 00162000
*   SAVEJSCB=TCBJSCB->JSCBACT;      /* FOR USE BY STAEPROC   @YM08127*/ 00163000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@11)                                   0353 00164000
         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   0353 00165000
         ST    @12,SAVEJSCB                                        0353 00166000
*   GEN( ESTAE PARAM=REGPTR,MF=(E,STAELIST));                      0354 00167000
          ESTAE PARAM=REGPTR,MF=(E,STAELIST)                            00168000
*   STAENTR=NOTON;                  /* INIT FLAG                     */ 00169000
         NI    STAENTR,B'01111111'                                 0355 00170000
*   ADDR603=ADDR(IEFXB603);         /* PICK UP ADRESS OF MESSAGE   0356 00171000
*                                      MODULE                        */ 00172000
         L     @12,@CV04056                                        0356 00173000
         ST    @12,ADDR603                                         0356 00174000
*   IF LCTRFBDC=ON THEN             /* SET INDICATOR FOR RESTART TYPE*/ 00175000
         L     @12,LCTPTR                                          0357 00176000
         TM    LCTRFBDC(@12),B'00010000'                           0357 00177000
         BNO   @RF00357                                            0357 00178000
*     RESTYPE=ON;                   /* ON = DEFERRED                 */ 00179000
         OI    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 0358 00180000
*   ELSE                                                           0359 00181000
*     RESTYPE=NOTON;                /* OFF = AUTOMATIC               */ 00182000
         B     @RC00357                                            0359 00183000
@RF00357 NI    RESTYPE,B'01111111'                                 0359 00184000
*   QMPAPTR=ADDR(QMGR1);            /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR QMPA       */ 00185000
@RC00357 L     @12,LCTPTR                                          0360 00186000
         LA    @11,QMGR1(,@12)                                     0360 00187000
         ST    @11,QMPAPTR                                         0360 00188000
*   EPAPTR=ADDR(EPABUF);            /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR EPA        */ 00189000
         LA    @11,EPABUF                                          0361 00190000
         ST    @11,EPAPTR                                          0361 00191000
*   SWEPAPTR=ADDR(EPABUF);          /* EPA ADDRESSABILITY FOR MOVE   */ 00192000
         ST    @11,SWEPAPTR                                        0362 00193000
*   JCTPTR=LCTJCTAD;                /* INCORE JCT ADDRESS            */ 00194000
         L     @12,LCTJCTAD(,@12)                                  0363 00195000
         ST    @12,JCTPTR                                          0363 00196000
*   SWCHNPTR=ZEROPTR;               /* INDICATE LAST EPA             */ 00197000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0364 00198000
         ST    @09,SWCHNPTR(,@11)                                  0364 00199000
*   SWVA=JCTDSKAD;                  /* SETUP FOR READ OF SWA JCT     */ 00200000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@11),JCTDSKAD(@12)                           0365 00201000
*   CALL READSWA;                   /* CALL SWAMGR                   */ 00202000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0366 00203000
*   JCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;                /* NEW ADDRESSABILITY FOR JCT    */ 00204000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0367 00205000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0367 00206000
         ST    @12,JCTPTR                                          0367 00207000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(DCBDSORG,DCBDEVT,DCBGEN,DCBOFLGS,DCBLRECL);      0368 00208000
*   DCBCKPT=DCBGEN;                 /* COPY TO AUTO STORAGE FOR RENT */ 00209000
         MVC   DCBCKPT(96),DCBGEN                                  0369 00210000
*   DCBREG=ADDR(DCBCKPT);           /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR DCB        */ 00211000
         LA    @12,DCBCKPT                                         0370 00212000
         LR    DCBREG,@12                                          0370 00213000
*   DCBPARM=ADDR(DCBCKPT);          /* INIT VALUE FOR CLIST          */ 00214000
         ST    @12,DCBPARM                                         0371 00215000
*   GEN DATA;                                                      0372 00216000
*   GEN(USING IHADCB,DCBREG);       /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR DSECT      */ 00217000
         USING IHADCB,DCBREG                                            00218000
*   SYNFLAG=NOTON;                  /* INITIALIZE FLAG FOR SYNADEXIT */ 00219000
         NI    SYNFLAG,B'01111111'                                 0374 00220000
*   LALOCCTR=0;                     /* INIT NUM OF SIOTS TO ZERO     */ 00221000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0375 00222000
         STH   @12,LALOCCTR                                        0375 00223000
*   PROCSIOT=ZEROPTR;               /* INIT FOR SIOT SCAN PROC       */ 00224000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        0376 00225000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(STAELIST);                                       0377 00226000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(STALIST1,LENSTAE);                               0378 00227000
*                                                                  0378 00228000
*/******************************************                         */ 00229000
*                                                                  0379 00230000
*   GOTO SETUPOUT;                                                 0379 00231000
*                                                                  0379 00232000
         B     SETUPOUT                                            0379 00233000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00234000
*   /*                                                               */ 00235000
*   /* USED AS SYNAD EXIT                                            */ 00236000
*   /*                                                               */ 00237000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00238000
*                                                                  0380 00239000
*SYNEXIT:                                                          0380 00240000
*   SYNFLAG=ON;                     /* SHOW SYNAD EXIT ENTERED       */ 00241000
SYNEXIT  OI    SYNFLAG,B'10000000'                                 0380 00242000
*   GEN(BR 14);                     /* RETURN DIRECT TO DATA MGT   0381 00243000
*                                      &YM04748                      */ 00244000
         BR 14                                                          00245000
*/******************************************                         */ 00246000
*                                                                  0382 00247000
*SETUPOUT:                                                         0382 00248000
*   END SETUP;                                                     0382 00249000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0382 00250000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0382 00251000
@ER00002 LM    @14,@12,@SA00002                                    0382 00252000
         BR    @14                                                 0382 00253000
*FINDCHEK:                                                         0383 00254000
*   PROC;                                                          0383 00255000
*                                                                  0383 00256000
FINDCHEK STM   @14,@12,@SA00003                                    0383 00257000
*/*************************************************************      */ 00258000
*/* THE PURPOSE OF THIS ROUTINE IS TO FIND THE SIOT AND JFCB         */ 00259000
*/* FOR THE CHECKPOINT DATA SET AND INITIALIZE THE POINTERS TO       */ 00260000
*/* THESE BLOCKS FOR USE BY THE ALOCCHEK ROUTINE.                    */ 00261000
*/*************************************************************      */ 00262000
*                                                                  0384 00263000
*   DCL                                                            0384 00264000
*     CKPTSIOT PTR(31) ABNL;                                       0384 00265000
*   DCL                                                            0385 00266000
*     TTRSW BIT(1);                                                0385 00267000
*   IF RESTYPE=NOTON THEN           /* AUTO RESTART...               */ 00268000
         TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 0386 00269000
         BNZ   @RF00386                                            0386 00270000
*     DO;                                                          0387 00271000
*                                                                  0387 00272000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00273000
*       /*                                                           */ 00274000
*       /* FOLLOWING CODE IS NECESSARY TO FIND THE SIOT FOR THE CKPT */ 00275000
*       /* DS FOR AUTO RESTART. THE UNITTYPE FIELD FROM THE SIOT IS  */ 00276000
*       /* NEEDED FOR THE DYNALLOC PARM LIST.                        */ 00277000
*       /*                                                           */ 00278000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00279000
*                                                                  0388 00280000
*       SWVA=JCTSSTR;               /* PICK UP SCT ADDRESS           */ 00281000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0388 00282000
         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          0388 00283000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),JCTSSTR(@11)                            0388 00284000
*       REALADD=LENGTH(SWAPFX);     /* INIT LENGTH OF PREFIX         */ 00285000
         MVC   REALADD(3),@CF00052+1                               0389 00286000
*       CALL READSWA;               /* READ PROB PROG SCT            */ 00287000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0390 00288000
*       SCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;            /* ADDRESSABILITY SCT            */ 00289000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0391 00290000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0391 00291000
         ST    @12,SCTPTR                                          0391 00292000
*       TTRSW=NOTON;                                               0392 00293000
         NI    TTRSW,B'01111111'                                   0392 00294000
*       IF SCTFSIOT=ZEROPTR THEN   /* IF NO SIOTS, DONT TRY         */ 00295000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0393 00296000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTFSIOT(@12)                                 0393 00297000
         LTR   @11,@11                                             0393 00298000
         BZ    @RF00393                                            0393 00299000
*         DO;                       /* TO READ               @YM08163*/ 00300000
*           CKPTSIOT=SCTFSIOT;      /* PICK UP 1ST SIOT              */ 00301000
         ST    @11,CKPTSIOT                                        0395 00302000
*           DO WHILE TTRSW=NOTON;   /* LOOP TIL FOUND OR END         */ 00303000
         B     @DE00396                                            0396 00304000
@DL00396 DS    0H                                                  0397 00305000
*             IF EVAL(CKPTSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPJFCB=JCTCKTTR THEN    0397 00306000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       0397 00307000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0397 00308000
         L     @11,CKPTSIOT                                        0397 00309000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0397 00310000
         L     @09,JCTPTR                                          0397 00311000
         CLC   SCTPJFCB(3,@11),JCTCKTTR(@09)                       0397 00312000
         BNE   @RF00397                                            0397 00313000
*               DO;                                                0398 00314000
*                 SIOTPTR=(CKPTSIOT+REALADD);/* SET UP FOR ALLOCHEK  */ 00315000
         AL    @12,CKPTSIOT                                        0399 00316000
         ST    @12,SIOTPTR                                         0399 00317000
*                 TTRSW=ON;         /* STOP THE LOOP                 */ 00318000
         OI    TTRSW,B'10000000'                                   0400 00319000
*               END;                                               0401 00320000
*             ELSE                                                 0402 00321000
*               IF CKPTSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN                          0402 00322000
         B     @RC00397                                            0402 00323000
@RF00397 L     @12,CKPTSIOT                                        0402 00324000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          0402 00325000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0402 00326000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@11)                                 0402 00327000
         CR    @12,@09                                             0402 00328000
         BNE   @RF00402                                            0402 00329000
*                 DO;                                              0403 00330000
*                   CKPTSIOT=ZEROPTR;/* INDICATE NO CKPT SIOT        */ 00331000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0404 00332000
         ST    @12,CKPTSIOT                                        0404 00333000
*                   TTRSW=ON;       /* STOP THE LOOP                 */ 00334000
         OI    TTRSW,B'10000000'                                   0405 00335000
*                   IF EVAL(JCTCKTTR+REALADD)->JFCVRDS=ON THEN     0406 00336000
         L     @12,JCTPTR                                          0406 00337000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0406 00338000
         ICM   @11,7,JCTCKTTR(@12)                                 0406 00339000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       0406 00340000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0406 00341000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0406 00342000
         TM    JFCVRDS(@11),B'00000100'                            0406 00343000
         BNO   @RF00406                                            0406 00344000
*                     CALL VAMERR;  /* IF VAM WAS UNALLOCATED, NO UCB   00345000
*                                      ADDRESS CAN EVER BE RETRIEVED */ 00346000
         BAL   @14,VAMERR                                          0407 00347000
*                 END;                                             0408 00348000
*               ELSE                                               0409 00349000
*                 CKPTSIOT=(CKPTSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* GET NEXT  */ 00350000
         B     @RC00402                                            0409 00351000
@RF00402 L     @12,REALADD-1                                       0409 00352000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0409 00353000
         AL    @12,CKPTSIOT                                        0409 00354000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0409 00355000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTPSIOT(@12)                                 0409 00356000
         ST    @11,CKPTSIOT                                        0409 00357000
*           END;                                                   0410 00358000
@RC00402 DS    0H                                                  0410 00359000
@RC00397 DS    0H                                                  0410 00360000
@DE00396 TM    TTRSW,B'10000000'                                   0410 00361000
         BZ    @DL00396                                            0410 00362000
*         END;                      /*                       @YM08163*/ 00363000
*       SWVA=JCTCKTTR;              /* INIT FOR COMMON READ          */ 00364000
@RF00393 L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0412 00365000
         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          0412 00366000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),JCTCKTTR(@11)                           0412 00367000
*     END;                                                         0413 00368000
*   ELSE                                                           0414 00369000
*     DO;                           /* DEFERRED RESTART.....         */ 00370000
         B     @RC00386                                            0414 00371000
@RF00386 DS    0H                                                  0415 00372000
*       SWVA=JCTSSTR;               /* PICK UP DSDRP SCT             */ 00373000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0415 00374000
         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          0415 00375000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),JCTSSTR(@11)                            0415 00376000
*       CALL READSWA;               /* READ IT                       */ 00377000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0416 00378000
*       SCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;            /* ADDRESSABILITY SCT            */ 00379000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0417 00380000
         L     @11,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0417 00381000
         ST    @11,SCTPTR                                          0417 00382000
*       SWVA=SCTFSIOT;              /* PICK UP ADDR SIOT FOR CKPT DS */ 00383000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTFSIOT(@11)                           0418 00384000
*       CALL READSWA;                                              0419 00385000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0419 00386000
*       SIOTPTR=SWBLKPTR;           /* ADDRESSABILITY SIOT           */ 00387000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0420 00388000
         L     @11,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0420 00389000
         ST    @11,SIOTPTR                                         0420 00390000
*       SWVA=SCTANSCT;              /* GET P/P SCT FOR ALOCAT      0421 00391000
*                                                            @YM06575*/ 00392000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          0421 00393000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTANSCT(@11)                           0421 00394000
*       CALL READSWA;               /* READ IT               @YM06575*/ 00395000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0422 00396000
*       SCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;            /* ADDRESSABILITY SCT    @YM06575*/ 00397000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0423 00398000
         L     @11,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0423 00399000
         ST    @11,SCTPTR                                          0423 00400000
*       SWVA=SCTPJFCB;              /* SET UP FOR COMMON READ        */ 00401000
         L     @11,SIOTPTR                                         0424 00402000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTPJFCB(@11)                           0424 00403000
*       JCTCKFT=ON;                 /* TURN ON CKPT TAKEN BIT        */ 00404000
         L     @12,JCTPTR                                          0425 00405000
         OI    JCTCKFT(@12),B'00010000'                            0425 00406000
*     END;                                                         0426 00407000
*   CALL READSWA;                   /* READ JFCB                     */ 00408000
@RC00386 BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0427 00409000
*   JFCBPTR=SWBLKPTR;               /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR JFCB       */ 00410000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0428 00411000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0428 00412000
         ST    @12,JFCBPTR                                         0428 00413000
*   CALL ALOCAT;                    /* GO ALLOC ANY PVT CATALOGS   0429 00414000
*                                      NEEDED                @YM06575*/ 00415000
         BAL   @14,ALOCAT                                          0429 00416000
*   END FINDCHEK;                                                  0430 00417000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0430 00418000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0430 00419000
@ER00003 LM    @14,@12,@SA00003                                    0430 00420000
         BR    @14                                                 0430 00421000
*ALOCCHEK:                                                         0431 00422000
*   PROC;                                                          0431 00423000
*                                                                  0431 00424000
ALOCCHEK STM   @14,@12,@SA00004                                    0431 00425000
*/*************************************************************      */ 00426000
*/* THE PURPOSE OF THE ROUTINE IS TO DYNAMICALLY ALLOCATE THE        */ 00427000
*/* CHECKPOINT DATA SET.  SIOTPTR AND JFCBPTR WILL HAVE BEEN         */ 00428000
*/* INITIALIZED BY THE FINDCHEK PROCEDURE..                          */ 00429000
*/*************************************************************      */ 00430000
*                                                                  0432 00431000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0432 00432000
*     S99RBPTR BASED(ADDR(EDBRBPTR));                              0432 00433000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0433 00434000
*     S99RB BASED(S99RBPTR);                                       0433 00435000
*   DCL                                                            0434 00436000
*     ARITFLAG FIXED(31) DEFINED(S99FLAG2) BDY(BYTE);              0434 00437000
*   DCL                                                            0435 00438000
*     ARITFLG2 FIXED(15) DEFINED(S99FLAG1) BDY(BYTE);              0435 00439000
*   DCL                                                            0436 00440000
*     USEJCL BIT(1);                                               0436 00441000
*   DCL                                                            0437 00442000
*     SAVEDEVT CHAR(4);             /* HOLDER FOR DEVT               */ 00443000
*/****  GENERAL PARM LIST INFO  ***                                  */ 00444000
*                                                                  0438 00445000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   0438 00446000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 00447000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0439 00448000
*      (GPR02F) RESTRICTED;                                        0439 00449000
*     IPK;                          /* SAVE CURRENT PSW KEY          */ 00450000
         IPK                                                       0440 00451000
*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             0441 00452000
         STC   GPR02F,SAVEKEYA                                     0441 00453000
*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00454000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0442 00455000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              0442 00456000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    0443 00457000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      0443 00458000
*   END;                            /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   0444 00459000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR) SET KEY = 0  */ 00460000
*   EDBRBPTR=ADDR(EDB99RB);         /* INITIALIZE BASE               */ 00461000
         LA    @11,EDB99RB                                         0445 00462000
         ST    @11,EDBRBPTR                                        0445 00463000
*   S99RBPND=ON;                    /* INDICATE ONLY ONE RB          */ 00464000
         LA    @11,EDBRBPTR                                        0446 00465000
         OI    S99RBPND(@11),B'10000000'                           0446 00466000
*   S99RBLN=LENGTH(EDB99RB);        /* SET LENGTH OF RB              */ 00467000
         L     @11,S99RBPTR(,@11)                                  0447 00468000
         MVI   S99RBLN(@11),X'14'                                  0447 00469000
*   S99VERB=S99VRBAL;               /* SET VERB TO ALLOCATE          */ 00470000
         MVI   S99VERB(@11),X'01'                                  0448 00471000
*   S99TXTPP=ADDR(TUPLEDB);         /* POINT TO TXT UNIT PTR LIST    */ 00472000
