*/******* RESET JSCBACT TO FORCE DYNALLOC TO USE INIT SWA            */ 00847000
*                                                                  0574 00848000
*   SAVEJSCB=TCBJSCB->JSCBACT;      /* SAVE PTR FOR RESTORE          */ 00849000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          0574 00850000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   0574 00851000
         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   0574 00852000
         ST    @12,SAVEJSCB                                        0574 00853000
*   TCBJSCB->JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;       /* CHANGE JSCBACT TO INIT SWA    */ 00854000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          0575 00855000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   0575 00856000
         ST    @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   0575 00857000
*   PARMPTR=ADDR(S99RBPTR);         /* RE-INITIALIZE R1 FOR DYNALLOC */ 00858000
         LA    PARMPTR,EDBRBPTR                                    0576 00859000
*/*  MACDATE Y-2 73082                                               */ 00860000
*                                                                  0577 00861000
*   SVC(99);                        /* INVOKE DYNAMIC ALLOCATION     */ 00862000
         SVC   99                                                  0577 00863000
*   IF RCODE=ZEROPTR THEN                                         0578 00864000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0578 00865000
         CR    RCODE,@14                                           0578 00866000
         BE    @RF00578                                            0578 00867000
*     DO;                                                          0579 00868000
*       TCBJSCB->JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;  /*                       @YM08158*/ 00869000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          0580 00870000

         L     @11,SAVEJSCB                                        0580 00872000

*       RETCODE=RCODE;              /* SAVE RETURN CODE      @Z40MPSJ*/ 00874000
         ST    RCODE,RETCODE                                       0581 00875000

         LA    @12,EDBRBPTR                                        0583 00880000
         L     @12,S99RBPTR(,@12)                                  0583 00881000
         ST    @12,DFS99RBP                                        0583 00882000
*       DFRCP=ADDR(RETCODE);        /* PASS SVC 99 RETURN CODE     0584 00883000
*                                                            @Z40MPSJ*/ 00884000
         LA    @12,RETCODE                                         0584 00885000
         ST    @12,DFRCP                                           0584 00886000
*       DFJEFF02=ADDR(ZEROPTR);     /* PASS ZERO FOR INTERFACE     0585 00887000
*                                                            @Z40MPSJ*/ 00888000
         LA    @12,@CF00395                                        0585 00889000
         ST    @12,DFJEFF02                                        0585 00890000
*       DFIDP=ADDR(DYNFAIL);        /* PASS FAIL ID          @Z40MPSJ*/ 00891000
         LA    @12,DYNFAIL                                         0586 00892000
         ST    @12,DFIDP                                           0586 00893000
*       DFWTP=ON;                   /* REQUEST WTP MESSAGE   @Z40MPSJ*/ 00894000
         OI    DFWTP(@12),B'10000000'                              0587 00895000
*       DO;                         /* LINK EP(IKJEFF18) SF(DFPARMS) */ 00896000
*         I00601='00'X;             /* EP/DE FLAG                    */ 00897000
         MVI   I00601,X'00'                                        0589 00898000
*         I00602=ADDR(IKJEFF18);    /* ADDR OF EP/DE                 */ 00899000
         LA    @12,@CC04053                                        0590 00900000
         STCM  @12,7,I00602                                        0590 00901000
*         I00604=0;                 /* DCB PTR                       */ 00902000

*         I00603='00'X;             /* ERRET FLAG                    */ 00904000

*         RESPECIFY                                                0593 00906000
*          (GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                    0593 00907000

         LA    GPR01P,DFPARMS                                      0594 00909000

*          (GPR15P) RESTRICTED;                                    0595 00911000
*         GPR15P=ADDR(I006);        /* ADDR OF LINK LIST             */ 00912000
         LA    GPR15P,I006                                         0596 00913000

*          (GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                  0598 00917000
*         RESPECIFY                                                0599 00918000
*          (GPR15P) UNRESTRICTED;                                  0599 00919000
*       END;                        /* LINK EP(IKJEFF18) SF(DFPARMS) */ 00920000
*       CALL DYNERROR;                                             0601 00921000
         BAL   @14,DYNERROR                                        0601 00922000
*     END;                                                         0602 00923000
*   END ALOCCHEK;                                                  0603 00924000

@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0603 00926000
@ER00004 LM    @14,@12,@SA00004                                    0603 00927000
         BR    @14                                                 0603 00928000
*OPENCHEK:                                                         0604 00929000
*   PROC;                                                          0604 00930000
*                                                                  0604 00931000
OPENCHEK STM   @14,@12,@SA00005                                    0604 00932000
*/**************************************************************     */ 00933000
*/* THE FUNCTIONS OF THIS PROCEDURE ARE: FIND THE TIOT ENTRY FOR     */ 00934000
*/* THE SYSCHK DD ENTRY THAT WAS CREATED BY DYNAMIC ALLOCATION.      */ 00935000
*/* PICK UP THE NEW JFCB AND UCB ADDRESSES FOR FINAL INITIAL-        */ 00936000
*/* ZATION OF THE DCB FOR CHKPT DATA SET.  ATTACH IEFXB610 TO        */ 00937000
*/* PERFORM THE ACTUAL OPEN.  WAIT ON EITHER OF TWO ECBS.....        */ 00938000
*/* OPEN COMPLETE OR CANCEL FOR THE RESTARTING JOB.                  */ 00939000
*/**************************************************************     */ 00940000
*                                                                  0605 00941000
*   DCL                                                            0605 00942000
*     ADDR610 PTR(31) ABNL;                                        0605 00943000
*   DCL                                                            0606 00944000
*     ATT610 CHAR(*) GEND BDY(WORD);/* TELL COMPILER AVOUT ATTACHLIST*/ 00945000
*   DCL                                                            0607 00946000
*     ATT6101 CHAR(*) LOCAL STATIC GEND;                           0607 00947000
*   DCL                                                            0608 00948000
*     LENALIST PTR(31) LOCAL STATIC GEND;                          0608 00949000
*   DCL                                                            0609 00950000
*     NAMPTR PTR(31) DEFINED(ATT610);/* ADDR WORD 1 FOR RE-ENT       */ 00951000
*   DCL                                                            0610 00952000
*     ECBATT PTR(31) DEFINED(ATT610) POS(9);                       0610 00953000
*   DCL                                                            0611 00954000
*     NAMOFSET BIT(8) CONSTANT('1C'X);/* OFFSET OF NAME INLIST       */ 00955000
*   DCL                                                            0612 00956000
*     1 DSORGBITS BIT(16) DEF(DCBDSORG),                           0612 00957000
*      2 * BIT(6),                                                 0612 00958000
*      2 PARTBIT BIT(1),            /* PARTITIONED DSORG             */ 00959000
*      2 * BIT(9);                                                 0612 00960000
*   DCL                                                            0613 00961000
*     CKMEMNM CHAR(8) BDY(DWORD);   /* MNAME HOLDER FOR FIND         */ 00962000
*   DCL                                                            0614 00963000
*     1 OPENBITS BIT(8) DEF(DCBOFLGS),                             0614 00964000
*      2 * BIT(3),                                                 0614 00965000
*      2 GOODOPEN BIT(1),                                          0614 00966000
*      2 * BIT(4);                                                 0614 00967000
*   QDBPTR=JSCDSABQ;                /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR QDB          */ 00968000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          0615 00969000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   0615 00970000
         L     @12,JSCDSABQ(,@12)                                  0615 00971000

*   DSABPTR=QDBFELMP;               /* ADDR'ABILITY 1ST DSAB.        */ 00973000
         L     @12,QDBFELMP(,@12)                                  0616 00974000
         ST    @12,DSABPTR                                         0616 00975000
*   DCBREG=ADDR(DCBCKPT);           /* RE-INIT DCB POINTER           */ 00976000
         LA    DCBREG,DCBCKPT                                      0617 00977000
*   DO WHILE TIOEDDNM=SYSCHK;                                     0618 00978000

*     DSABPTR=DSABFCHN;             /* SEARCH TIOT ENTRIES UNTIL   0619 00981000
*                                      SYSCHK ENTRY( JUSTALLOCATED)     00982000
*                                      IS FOUND.                     */ 00983000

         ST    @12,DSABPTR                                         0619 00986000
*   END;                                                           0620 00987000
@DE00618 L     @12,DSABPTR                                         0620 00988000

*   JFCBPTR=TIOEJFCB;               /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR JFCB       */ 00992000

         ICM   @11,7,TIOEJFCB(@12)                                 0621 00994000

*   DCBDSORG=JFCDSORG;              /* MOVE IN DSORG...IF IT WAS   0622 00996000
*                                      SPECIFIED, SOFAR SO GOOD. IF     00997000
*                                      IT WAS NOT...LET OPEN FILL IT    00998000
*                                      FROM DSCB             @YM06573*/ 00999000
         MVC   DCBDSORG(2),JFCDSORG(@11)                           0622 01000000
*   UCBPTR=TIOEFSRT;                /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR UCB        */ 01001000

         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0623 01003000
         ST    @12,UCBPTR                                          0623 01004000
*/* LINES 261600 THROUGH 262800 DELETED               @YM04288       */ 01005000
*                                                                  0624 01006000
*   IF RESTYPE=ON THEN              /* IF DEFERRED...FINISH JCT INIT */ 01007000

         BNO   @RF00624                                            0624 01009000
*     DO;                           /* FOR AUTO AFTER DEFERRED       */ 01010000
*       JCTDEVT=UCBTYP;                                            0626 01011000
         L     @09,JCTPTR                                          0626 01012000
         MVC   JCTDEVT(4,@09),UCBTYP(@12)                          0626 01013000
*       JCTVOLSQ=DUMYVLSQ(2);                                      0627 01014000
         IC    @12,DUMYVLSQ+1(,@11)                                0627 01015000
         STC   @12,JCTVOLSQ(,@09)                                  0627 01016000
*     END;                                                         0628 01017000
*   CSCBPTR=LCTQDRTY;               /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR CSCB       */ 01018000

         L     @12,LCTQDRTY(,@12)                                  0629 01020000
         ST    @12,CSCBPTR                                         0629 01021000
*   OPENECB=ZEROPTR;                /* ZERO ECB                      */ 01022000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0630 01023000
         ST    @12,OPENECB                                         0630 01024000
*   ECB610=ZEROPTR;                 /* INITIALIZE IEFXB610'S ECB     */ 01025000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0631 01026000

*   ECBC1=ZEROPTR;                  /* ZERO ECB FOR WAIT IN SCTXPROC */ 01028000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0632 01029000

         LA    @12,ECB610                                          0634 01035000

*   ADOKECB=ADDR(OPENECB);          /* SET UP ECBLIST ADDRESSES      */ 01037000

*   ADCANECB=ADDR(CHCECB);          /* "                             */ 01040000

         LA    @12,CHCECB(,@12)                                    0636 01042000

*   HIORD=ON;                       /* TURN ON LAST ENTRY IN LIST BIT*/ 01044000
         OI    HIORD,B'10000000'                                   0637 01045000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0638 01046000
*     R1 RESTRICTED;                                               0638 01047000
*   R1=ADDR(PARM610);               /* PASS ADDR OF LIST TO 610      */ 01048000
         LA    R1,PARM610                                          0639 01049000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(ATT610);                                         0640 01050000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(ATT6101,LENALIST);                               0641 01051000
*   ATT610(1:LENALIST)=ATT6101(1:LENALIST);/* COPY TO AUTO STOR      */ 01052000
         L     @12,LENALIST                                        0642 01053000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               0642 01054000
         EX    @12,@SM04560                                        0642 01055000
*   NAMPTR=(ADDR(ATT610)+NAMOFSET);                                0643 01056000
         LA    @12,ATT610                                          0643 01057000
         AL    @12,@CF03876                                        0643 01058000
         ST    @12,NAMPTR                                          0643 01059000
*   ECBATT=ADECBC1;                 /* INSERT ECBADDR FOR ATTACH     */ 01060000
         L     @12,ADECBC1                                         0644 01061000
         ST    @12,ECBATT                                          0644 01062000
*   GEN(ATTACH SF=(E,ATT610));                                     0645 01063000
         ATTACH SF=(E,ATT610)                                           01064000
*   SAVETCB=R1;                     /* REMEMBER WHO TO DETACH        */ 01065000
         ST    R1,SAVETCB                                          0646 01066000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0647 01067000
         WAIT ECBLIST=ECBLIST1                                          01068000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0648 01069000
*     R1 UNRESTRICTED;                                             0648 01070000
*   IF CANPOST=ON THEN                                             0649 01071000
         L     @12,CSCBPTR                                         0649 01072000

*     DO;                           /* CANCEL WAS ISSUED             */ 01075000
*       DO;                         /* DETACH (SAVETCB)              */ 01076000

         LA    GPR01P,SAVETCB                                      0653 01080000
*         SVC(62);                  /* DETACH SVC                    */ 01081000

*       END;                        /* DETACH (SAVETCB)      @YM08127*/ 01085000
*       STAENTR=ON;                 /* SIGNAL CANPROC NO DETACH    0657 01086000
*                                                            @YM08127*/ 01087000
         OI    STAENTR,B'10000000'                                 0657 01088000
*       CALL CANPROC;               /* EXIT TO INIT - FLUSH  @YM08127*/ 01089000
         BAL   @14,CANPROC                                         0658 01090000
*     END;                                                         0659 01091000
*   TCBJSCB->JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;      /* RESTORE PP JSCB               */ 01092000
@RF00649 L     @12,TCBPTR                                          0660 01093000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   0660 01094000
         L     @11,SAVEJSCB                                        0660 01095000
         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   0660 01096000
*   IF POST610=ON THEN              /* 610 TOOK A DIVE               */ 01097000
         TM    POST610,B'01000000'                                 0661 01098000
         BNO   @RF00661                                            0661 01099000
*     CALL CANPROC;                                                0662 01100000
         BAL   @14,CANPROC                                         0662 01101000
*   IF GOODOPEN=ON THEN                                           0663 01102000
@RF00661 TM    GOODOPEN,B'00010000'                                0663 01103000
         BO    @RF00663                                            0663 01104000
*     CALL ERR32;                   /* OPEN NO GOOD                  */ 01105000
         BAL   @14,ERR32                                           0664 01106000
*   IF DSABCKVL=NOTON THEN                                         0665 01107000
@RF00663 L     @12,DSABPTR                                         0665 01108000
         TM    DSABCKVL(@12),B'01000000'                           0665 01109000
         BNZ   @RF00665                                            0665 01110000
*     CALL SCRTYERR;                /* DO NOT ALLOW RESTART IF OPEN     01111000
*                                      FOUND THE CKPT D.S. TO BE NOT    01112000
*                                      SECURE.                       */ 01113000
         BAL   @14,SCRTYERR                                        0666 01114000
*   IF PARTBIT=ON THEN              /* IF DATASET IS PARTITIONED...  */ 01115000
@RF00665 TM    PARTBIT,B'00000010'                                 0667 01116000
         BNO   @RF00667                                            0667 01117000
*     DO;                                                          0668 01118000
*       CKMEMNM=JCTCKIDT;           /* MEMBER FOR FIND       @YM06573*/ 01119000
         L     @12,JCTPTR                                          0669 01120000
         MVC   CKMEMNM(8),JCTCKIDT(@12)                            0669 01121000
*       GEN( FIND (DCBREG),CKMEMNM,D);                             0670 01122000
          FIND (DCBREG),CKMEMNM,D                                       01123000
*       IF RCODE=ZEROPTR THEN                                     0671 01124000
         LTR   RCODE,RCODE                                         0671 01125000
         BZ    @RF00671                                            0671 01126000
*         CALL ERR33;                                              0672 01127000
         BAL   @14,ERR33                                           0672 01128000
*     END;                                                         0673 01129000
@RF00671 DS    0H                                                  0674 01130000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)     */ 01131000
@RF00667 DS    0H                                                  0675 01132000
*     SPKA(SAVEKEYA);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 01133000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0675 01134000
         IC    @12,SAVEKEYA                                        0675 01135000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              0675 01136000
*   END;                            /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA) KEY    01137000
*                                      BACK TO SCHED                 */ 01138000
*   END OPENCHEK;                                                  0677 01139000
@EL00005 DS    0H                                                  0677 01140000
@EF00005 DS    0H                                                  0677 01141000
@ER00005 LM    @14,@12,@SA00005                                    0677 01142000
         BR    @14                                                 0677 01143000
*RNAMEPGM:                                                         0678 01144000
*   PROC;                                                          0678 01145000
*                                                                  0678 01146000
RNAMEPGM STM   @14,@12,@SA00006                                    0678 01147000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01148000
*/* THE PURPOSES OF THIS PROCEDURE ARE:                              */ 01149000
*/*       TO INSURE THE PROPER SCT STRUCTURE - FOR DEFERRED          */ 01150000
*/*       RESTART, THE DUMMY SCT IS REMOVED FROM THE CHAIN.          */ 01151000
*/*                                                                  */ 01152000
*/*       A BIT IS SET IN THE LCT TO INFORM IEFSD101         @ZA19269*/ 01153000
*/*       TO CHANGE THE SCT PROGRAM NAME TO 'IEFRSTRT TO INSURE      */ 01154000
*/*       THAT THE RESTART SVC GAINS CONTROL WHEN THE JOB IS         */ 01155000
*/*       INITIATED.                                                 */ 01156000
*/*       THE NAME IS CHANGED BY IEFSD101 AFTER PPT          @ZA19269*/ 01157000
*/*       PROCESSING USING THE REAL PROGRAM NAME THAT        @ZA19269*/ 01158000
*/*       WILL BE RESTARTED.                                 @ZA19269*/ 01159000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01160000
*                                                                  0679 01161000
*   SWVA=JCTSSTR;                   /* SET UP TO READ 1ST SCT        */ 01162000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0679 01163000
         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          0679 01164000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),JCTSSTR(@11)                            0679 01165000
*   CALL READSWA;                   /* READ 1ST SCT                  */ 01166000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0680 01167000
*   SCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;                /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR SCT        */ 01168000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0681 01169000
         L     @11,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0681 01170000
         ST    @11,SCTPTR                                          0681 01171000
*   IF RESTYPE=ON THEN              /* FOR DEFERRED RESTARTS CHAIN   */ 01172000
         TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 0682 01173000
         BNO   @RF00682                                            0682 01174000
*     DO;                           /* AROUND DSDRP STEP SCT         */ 01175000
*       LCTSCTVA=SCTANSCT;          /* SET LCT CURRENT SCT PTR TO  0684 01176000
*                                      PROB PGM SCT.                 */ 01177000
         L     @09,LCTPTR                                          0684 01178000
         MVC   LCTSCTVA(3,@09),SCTANSCT(@11)                       0684 01179000
*       JCTSSTR=SCTANSCT;           /* POINT JCT TO PP SCT           */ 01180000
         L     @09,JCTPTR                                          0685 01181000
         MVC   JCTSSTR(3,@09),SCTANSCT(@11)                        0685 01182000
*       JCTSDKAD=SCTANSCT;          /* POINT JCT TO PP SCT           */ 01183000
         MVC   JCTSDKAD(3,@09),SCTANSCT(@11)                       0686 01184000
*       SWVA=SCTANSCT;              /* SET UP TO READ PP SCT         */ 01185000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTANSCT(@11)                           0687 01186000
*       CALL READSWA;               /* READ PP SCT                   */ 01187000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0688 01188000
*       LCTSCTAD=SWBLKPTR;          /* SET LCT INCORE SCT PTR        */ 01189000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0689 01190000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0689 01191000
         L     @11,LCTPTR                                          0689 01192000
         ST    @12,LCTSCTAD(,@11)                                  0689 01193000
*       SCTPTR=SWBLKPTR;            /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR PP SCT     */ 01194000
         ST    @12,SCTPTR                                          0690 01195000
*     END;                                                         0691 01196000
*   SCTGOSTP=NOTON;                 /* TURN OFF GOSTEP *. REFERBACKS */ 01197000
@RF00682 L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0692 01198000
         NI    SCTGOSTP(@12),B'01111111'                           0692 01199000
*   LCTCKRST=ON;                    /* TELL IEFSD101 TO RENAME     0693 01200000
*                                      SCTPGMNM TO IEFRSTRT SO     0693 01201000
*                                      RESTART SVC WILL GET CONTROL     01202000
*                                      TO COMPLETE RESTART         0693 01203000
*                                      PROCESSING.           @ZA19269*/ 01204000
         L     @12,LCTPTR                                          0693 01205000
         OI    LCTCKRST(@12),B'00100000'                           0693 01206000
*   END RNAMEPGM;                                                  0694 01207000
@EL00006 DS    0H                                                  0694 01208000
@EF00006 DS    0H                                                  0694 01209000
@ER00006 LM    @14,@12,@SA00006                                    0694 01210000
         BR    @14                                                 0694 01211000
*                                                                  0695 01212000
*/* LINES 284400 THROUGH 288600 DELETED               @YMO4288       */ 01213000
*                                                                  0695 01214000
*CHRPROC:                                                          0695 01215000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 0695 01216000
*                                                                  0695 01217000
CHRPROC  STM   @14,@06,@SA00007                                    0695 01218000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00007+36                                 0695 01219000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01220000
*/* PURPOSE:   TO PROCESS PERTINENT INFORMATION IN THE               */ 01221000
*/*            CHECKPOINT HEADER RECORD AND SAVE THE CHR FOR         */ 01222000
*/*            INCLUSION IN THE RESTART PARAMETER LIST.              */ 01223000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01224000
*                                                                  0696 01225000
*   DCL                                                            0696 01226000
*     CHRMATCH BIT(1);                                             0696 01227000
*   DCL                                                            0697 01228000
*     FOURC FIXED(15) CONSTANT(400);                               0697 01229000
*   DCL                                                            0698 01230000
*     RECLEN FIXED(15) DEFINED(DCBLRECL);                          0698 01231000
*   READCHR=ON;                     /* INDICATE CHRPROC TO READCHEK  */ 01232000
         OI    READCHR,B'10000000'                                 0699 01233000
*   IOBUFAD=ADDR(IOBUF);            /* INITIALIZE PTR FOR 1ST READ   */ 01234000
         LA    IOBUFAD,IOBUF                                       0700 01235000
*   CHRPTR=IOBUFAD;                 /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR CHR        */ 01236000
         ST    IOBUFAD,CHRPTR                                      0701 01237000
*   CHRCHKID=BLANKS;                /* INSURE NO RANDOM MATCH...     */ 01238000
         L     @12,CHRPTR                                          0702 01239000
         MVI   CHRCHKID+8(@12),C' '                                0702 01240000
         MVC   CHRCHKID+9(7,@12),CHRCHKID+8(@12)                   0702 01241000
         MVC   CHRCHKID(8,@12),@CC03776                            0702 01242000
*   CHRMATCH=NOTON;                 /*                       @YM08138*/ 01243000
         NI    CHRMATCH,B'01111111'                                0703 01244000
*   DCBREG=ADDR(DCBCKPT);           /* INIT DCB ADDR         @YM08138*/ 01245000
         LA    DCBREG,DCBCKPT                                      0704 01246000
*   DO WHILE CHRMATCH=ON;          /* SCAN DATA SET UNTIL CHECKID   */ 01247000
         B     @DE00705                                            0705 01248000
@DL00705 DS    0H                                                  0706 01249000
*     CALL READCHEK;                /* MATCHES THE ONE SPECIFIED ON     01250000
*                                      THE USERS JCT PARAMETER       */ 01251000
         BAL   @14,READCHEK                                        0706 01252000
*     CHRPTR=IOBUFAD;               /* RE-INITIALIZE BUFFER POINTER  */ 01253000
         ST    IOBUFAD,CHRPTR                                      0707 01254000
*     IF(CHRCHKID=JCTCKIDT&RECLEN=FOURC) THEN/*              @YM08138*/ 01255000
         L     @12,CHRPTR                                          0708 01256000
         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          0708 01257000
         CLC   CHRCHKID(16,@12),JCTCKIDT(@11)                      0708 01258000
         BNE   @RF00708                                            0708 01259000
         CLC   RECLEN(2),@CH04201                                  0708 01260000
         BNE   @RF00708                                            0708 01261000
*       CHRMATCH=ON;                                               0709 01262000
         OI    CHRMATCH,B'10000000'                                0709 01263000
*   END;                                                           0710 01264000
@RF00708 DS    0H                                                  0710 01265000
@DE00705 TM    CHRMATCH,B'10000000'                                0710 01266000
         BNO   @DL00705                                            0710 01267000
*   GDAPTR=CVTGDA;                  /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR GDA        */ 01268000
         LA    @12,16                                              0711 01269000
         L     @12,CVTPTR(,@12)                                    0711 01270000
         L     @12,CVTGDA(,@12)                                    0711 01271000
         ST    @12,GDAPTR                                          0711 01272000
*   IF CHRPPM<PASTRT THEN           /* DO NOT ALLOW PROB PROG TO     */ 01273000
         L     @11,CHRPTR                                          0712 01274000
         CLC   CHRPPM(4,@11),PASTRT(@12)                           0712 01275000
         BNL   @RF00712                                            0712 01276000
*     CALL ADDRERR;                 /* RESTART AT AN ADDRESS THAT  0713 01277000
*                                      LIES BELOW AN EXPANDED NUC.   */ 01278000
         BAL   @14,ADDRERR                                         0713 01279000
*   IF(RESTYPE=NOTON                /* IF RESTART IS AUTOMATIC AND   */ 01280000
*       &JCTSYSCK=NOTON)            /* NOT AUTO AFTER DEFERRED, THEN */ 01281000
*     THEN                                                         0714 01282000
@RF00712 TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 0714 01283000
         BNZ   @RF00714                                            0714 01284000
         L     @12,JCTPTR                                          0714 01285000
         TM    JCTSYSCK(@12),B'10000000'                           0714 01286000
         BNZ   @RF00714                                            0714 01287000
*     AUTRSTRT=ON;                  /* TURN ON AUTO FLAG IN CHR......   01288000
*                                      ...WHICH BECOMES RESTART PLIST*/ 01289000
         L     @12,CHRPTR                                          0715 01290000
         OI    AUTRSTRT(@12),B'10000000'                           0715 01291000
*   JCTNRCKP=CHRCOUNT;              /* SAVE NUMBER OF CKPTS IN JCT   */ 01292000
@RF00714 L     @12,CHRPTR                                          0716 01293000
         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          0716 01294000
         MVC   JCTNRCKP(2,@11),CHRCOUNT(@12)                       0716 01295000
*   IF VEQRUSER=ON THEN             /* FORCE USER TO V = R IF V = R  */ 01296000
         TM    VEQRUSER(@12),B'00001000'                           0717 01297000
         BNO   @RF00717                                            0717 01298000
*     EAADDRBT=ON;                  /* WAS ORIGINALLY SPECIFIED.     */ 01299000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0718 01300000
         OI    EAADDRBT(@12),B'10000000'                           0718 01301000
*   SCTMSADR=CHRPPM;                /* SET PP START ADDR FOR INIT    */ 01302000
@RF00717 L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0719 01303000
         L     @11,CHRPTR                                          0719 01304000
         MVC   SCTMSADR(4,@12),CHRPPM(@11)                         0719 01305000
*   CHRPPEK=(CHRPPE+KROUND)/KBOUND; /* CONVERT CHECKPOINTED SIZE TO     01306000
*                                      'K' BOUNDARY.                 */ 01307000
         LA    @00,1023                                            0720 01308000
         ICM   @09,15,CHRPPE(@11)                                  0720 01309000
         ALR   @00,@09                                             0720 01310000
         SRDA  @00,32                                              0720 01311000
         D     @00,@CF04089                                        0720 01312000
         STH   @01,CHRPPEK                                         0720 01313000
*   IF CHRPPEK>SCTMSSZE THEN        /* GIVE THE USER THE GREATEST    */ 01314000
         CH    @01,SCTMSSZE(,@12)                                  0721 01315000
         BNH   @RF00721                                            0721 01316000
*     SCTMSSZE=CHRPPEK;             /* REGION SIZE USED. THIS ALLOWS    01317000
*                                      GREATER SIZE SPEC. ON RESTART    01318000
*                                      JCL.                          */ 01319000
         STH   @01,SCTMSSZE(,@12)                                  0722 01320000
*   SAVEDD=CHRDDNM;                 /* PREPARE FOR AUTO AFTER DEF    */ 01321000
@RF00721 L     @12,CHRPTR                                          0723 01322000
         MVC   SAVEDD(8),CHRDDNM(@12)                              0723 01323000
*   CHRSAVE=IHJCHR;                 /* SAVE CHR AS PART OF RESTART 0724 01324000
*                                      PARAMETER LIST                */ 01325000
         MVC   CHRSAVE(45),IHJCHR(@12)                             0724 01326000
*   READCHR=NOTON;                  /* INDICATE NOT CHR TO READCHEK  */ 01327000
         NI    READCHR,B'01111111'                                 0725 01328000
*   END CHRPROC;                                                   0726 01329000
@EL00007 DS    0H                                                  0726 01330000
@EF00007 DS    0H                                                  0726 01331000
@ER00007 LM    @14,@06,@SA00007                                    0726 01332000
         LM    @08,@12,@SA00007+36                                 0726 01333000
         BR    @14                                                 0726 01334000
*DDNTPROC:                                                         0727 01335000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 0727 01336000
*                                                                  0727 01337000
DDNTPROC STM   @14,@06,@SA00008                                    0727 01338000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00008+36                                 0727 01339000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01340000
*/*  THIS ROUTINE WILL READ THE DDNTS (IF ANY) FROM THE CKPT DS      */ 01341000
*/*     AND CHAIN AROUND THE SIOTS FOR DDNAMES FOUND IN THE          */ 01342000
*/*     DDNT.  AN INTERFACE TO THE DATASET RESERVATION ROUTINE       */ 01343000
*/*     WILL BE MADE TO UPDATE THE DATA SET ENQUEUE TABLE.           */ 01344000
*/*     REMAINING SIOTS WILL BE SCANNED TO SEE IF ANY REQUEST        */ 01345000
*/*     UNIT AFFINITY TO THE ONE BEING REMOVED.  THESE SIOTS WILL    */ 01346000
*/*     BE MARKED WITH THE REQUESTED NUMBER AS ZERO. THIS WILL       */ 01347000
*/*     INDICATE TO THE UTYPPROC THAT AFFINITY IS NOT ALLOWED.       */ 01348000
*/*     ALSO, IF THE REMAINING SIOTS HAVE A REQUEST FOR AFFINITY     */ 01349000
*/*      TO A DD NUMBER GREATER THAN THE ONE BEING REMOVED, THAT     */ 01350000
*/*     NUMBER WILL BE DECREMENTED BY ONE.                           */ 01351000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01352000
*/**************************************                             */ 01353000
*/* PREPARE THE PARM LIST FOR THE DATA                               */ 01354000
*/* SET RESERVATION ROUTINE (DSENQ).                                 */ 01355000
*/**************************************                             */ 01356000
*                                                                  0728 01357000
*   DCL                                                            0728 01358000
*     ALIASDSN CHAR(44);            /* HOLDER FOR ALIAS NAME FROM  0728 01359000
*                                      JFCBX                         */ 01360000
*   DCL                                                            0729 01361000
*     PHAZ3SW BIT(1);               /* INTERNAL FLAG                 */ 01362000
*   BITMAP=''B;                     /* INIT FUNCTION TO ZERO         */ 01363000
         XC    BITMAP(2),BITMAP                                    0730 01364000
*   DELEONLY=ON;                    /* FUNCTION = DELETE BUT NOT DEQ */ 01365000
         OI    DELEONLY,B'00010000'                                0731 01366000
*   PASSJCT=JCTPTR;                 /* SET INCORE JCT POINTER        */ 01367000
         L     @12,JCTPTR                                          0732 01368000
         ST    @12,PASSJCT                                         0732 01369000
*   DSNLEN=HEX2C;                   /* DATASET LENGTH = 44           */ 01370000
         MVC   DSNLEN(2),@CH03031                                  0733 01371000
*   PASSEPA=EPAPTR;                 /* PASS NONZERO EPAPTR   @ZA12430*/ 01372000
         L     @12,EPAPTR                                          0734 01373000
         ST    @12,PASSEPA                                         0734 01374000
*   PASSTCB=ZEROPTR;                /* N/A                           */ 01375000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0735 01376000
         ST    @12,PASSTCB                                         0735 01377000
*   STEPNO=SCTSNUMB;                /* SET STEP NUMBER               */ 01378000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          0736 01379000
         IC    @09,SCTSNUMB(,@11)                                  0736 01380000
         STC   @09,STEPNO                                          0736 01381000
*   PAD12=ZEROPTR;                  /* N/A                           */ 01382000
         STCM  @12,15,PAD12                                        0737 01383000
*   PAD13=ZEROPTR;                  /* N/A                           */ 01384000
         STCM  @12,15,PAD13                                        0738 01385000
*   PAD2=ZEROPTR;                   /* N/A                           */ 01386000
         ST    @12,PAD2                                            0739 01387000
*   RETPARM=ZEROPTR;                /* RETURN CODE AREA              */ 01388000
         ST    @12,RETPARM                                         0740 01389000
*/*     END OF DSENQ INITIALIZATION                                  */ 01390000
*                                                                  0741 01391000
*   REALADD=LENGTH(SWAPFX);         /* CONSTANT FOR ADDR TRANSLATION */ 01392000
         MVC   REALADD(3),@CF00052+1                               0741 01393000
*   DDNTPTR=IOBUFAD;                /* ADRESSABILITY FOR DDNT WHEN 0742 01394000
*                                      READ                          */ 01395000
         ST    IOBUFAD,DDNTPTR                                     0742 01396000
*   LOOPCTR=NOTON;                  /* SWITCH FOR LOOP CONTROL       */ 01397000
         NI    LOOPCTR,B'01111111'                                 0743 01398000
*   DO WHILE LOOPCTR=NOTON;                                        0744 01399000
         B     @DE00744                                            0744 01400000
@DL00744 DS    0H                                                  0745 01401000
*     CALL READCHEK;                /* READ POSSIBLE DDNT            */ 01402000
         BAL   @14,READCHEK                                        0745 01403000
*     DDNTPTR=IOBUFAD;              /* RESET BUFFER POINTER          */ 01404000
         ST    IOBUFAD,DDNTPTR                                     0746 01405000
*     IF DDNTIDNT=ONEHEX THEN      /* THIS IS NOT A DDNT            */ 01406000
         L     @12,DDNTPTR                                         0747 01407000
         CLC   DDNTIDNT(2,@12),@CH02945                            0747 01408000
         BE    @RF00747                                            0747 01409000
*       LOOPCTR=ON;                 /* NO DDNT PROCESSING TO BE DONE.   01410000
*                                      STOP THE LOOP.                */ 01411000
         OI    LOOPCTR,B'10000000'                                 0748 01412000
*     ELSE                                                         0749 01413000
*       DO;                                                        0749 01414000
         B     @RC00747                                            0749 01415000
@RF00747 DS    0H                                                  0750 01416000
*         DO INDEX=1 TO DDNTUSCT-1;                                0750 01417000
         LA    @12,1                                               0750 01418000
         B     @DE00750                                            0750 01419000
@DL00750 DS    0H                                                  0751 01420000
*           CALL DDNTSIOT;          /* DDNTSIOT WILL SEARCH FOR THE     01421000
*                                      SIOT THAT MATCHES THE DDNAME     01422000
*                                      IN THE DDNT, CHAIN AROUND IT,    01423000
*                                      AND RETURN A POINTER TO IT.   */ 01424000
         BAL   @14,DDNTSIOT                                        0751 01425000
*           IF SIOTSIOT=ZEROPTR THEN                              0752 01426000
         L     @12,SIOTSIOT-1                                      0752 01427000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0752 01428000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0752 01429000
         BZ    @RF00752                                            0752 01430000
*             DO;                                                  0753 01431000
*               SIOTPTR=(SIOTSIOT+REALADD);/* TRANSLAT SWAADD        */ 01432000
*                                                                  0754 01433000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       0754 01434000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0754 01435000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0754 01436000
         ST    @11,SIOTPTR                                         0754 01437000
*               /*****************************************************/ 01438000
*               /*                                                   */ 01439000
*               /* THE FOLLOWING CODE SCANS FOR UNIT AFFINITY        */ 01440000
*               /* REQUESTS AND UPDATES THE SIOTS TO REFLECT THE     */ 01441000
*               /* REMOVAL OF A SIOT FROM THE CHAIN.                 */ 01442000
*               /*                                                   */ 01443000
*               /*****************************************************/ 01444000
*                                                                  0755 01445000
*               IF SIOTSIOT=PREVLAST THEN/* DONT SEARCH FURTHER IF     01446000
*                                      THE ONE REMOVED WAS THE LAST     01447000
*                                      ONE.                          */ 01448000
         C     @12,PREVLAST                                        0755 01449000
         BE    @RF00755                                            0755 01450000
*                 DO;                                              0756 01451000
*                   TEMPSW=ON;      /* LOOP CONTROL                  */ 01452000
         OI    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  0757 01453000
*                   TEMPPTR=SCTPSIOT;/* PICK UP PTR TO NEXT SIOT     */ 01454000
         MVC   TEMPPTR(3),SCTPSIOT(@11)                            0758 01455000
*                   DO WHILE TEMPSW=ON;                            0759 01456000
         B     @DE00759                                            0759 01457000
@DL00759 DS    0H                                                  0760 01458000
*                     IF TEMPPTR=SCTLSIOT THEN/* CLOSE LOOP AFTER  0760 01459000
*                                      EXAMINING                     */ 01460000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0760 01461000
         CLC   TEMPPTR(3),SCTLSIOT(@12)                            0760 01462000
         BNE   @RF00760                                            0760 01463000
*                       TEMPSW=NOTON;/* LAST SIOT IN CHAIN           */ 01464000
         NI    TEMPSW,B'01111111'                                  0761 01465000
*                     TEMPPTR=TEMPPTR+REALADD;/* TEMPORARY SWA     0762 01466000
*                                      ADDRESSABILITY                */ 01467000
@RF00760 L     @12,TEMPPTR-1                                       0762 01468000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0762 01469000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       0762 01470000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0762 01471000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             0762 01472000
         STCM  @12,7,TEMPPTR                                       0762 01473000
*                     IF TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF=SCTDDINO THEN/* ON EQUAL     01474000
*                                      COMPARE                       */ 01475000
         L     @11,SIOTPTR                                         0763 01476000
         CLC   SIOTUNAF(2,@12),SCTDDINO(@11)                       0763 01477000
         BNE   @RF00763                                            0763 01478000
*                       TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF=0;/* SET THE REQUESTED   0764 01479000
*                                      NUMBER TO 0 FOR UTYPPROC.     */ 01480000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0764 01481000
         STH   @11,SIOTUNAF(,@12)                                  0764 01482000
*                     ELSE                                         0765 01483000
*                       IF TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF>SCTDDINO THEN/* FOR   0765 01484000
*                                      OTHER                         */ 01485000
         B     @RC00763                                            0765 01486000
@RF00763 L     @12,TEMPPTR-1                                       0765 01487000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0765 01488000
         LH    @11,SIOTUNAF(,@12)                                  0765 01489000
         L     @09,SIOTPTR                                         0765 01490000
         CH    @11,SCTDDINO(,@09)                                  0765 01491000
         BNH   @RF00765                                            0765 01492000
*                         TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF=/* REQUESTS, DECREMENT 0766 01493000
*                                      THE                           */ 01494000
*                             TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF-ONEHEX;/* NUMBER SO     01495000
*                                      THAT WHEN THE DD ENTRIES ARE     01496000
*                                      RENUMBERED THE PROPER AFFINITY   01497000
*                                      IS MADE.                      */ 01498000
         BCTR  @11,0                                               0766 01499000
         STH   @11,SIOTUNAF(,@12)                                  0766 01500000
*                     TEMPPTR=TEMPPTR->SCTPSIOT;/* GET NEXT  @YM07549*/ 01501000
@RF00765 DS    0H                                                  0767 01502000
@RC00763 L     @12,TEMPPTR-1                                       0767 01503000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0767 01504000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTPSIOT(@12)                                 0767 01505000
         STCM  @11,7,TEMPPTR                                       0767 01506000
*                   END;                                           0768 01507000
@DE00759 TM    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  0768 01508000
         BO    @DL00759                                            0768 01509000
*                 END;                                             0769 01510000
*               SWVA=SCTPJFCB;      /* PREPARE TO READ JFCB          */ 01511000
@RF00755 L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0770 01512000
         L     @11,SIOTPTR                                         0770 01513000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTPJFCB(@11)                           0770 01514000
*               CALL READSWA;       /* READ JFCB                     */ 01515000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0771 01516000
*               JFCBPTR=SWBLKPTR;   /* ADDRESSABILITY JFCB           */ 01517000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0772 01518000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0772 01519000
         ST    @12,JFCBPTR                                         0772 01520000
*               DSN=JFCBDSNM;       /* DSNAME TO DSENQ LIST          */ 01521000
         MVC   DSN(44),JFCBDSNM(@12)                               0773 01522000
*/*************************************************************      */ 01523000
*/* THE FOLLOWING SECTION OF CODE LOOPS THROUGH THE                  */ 01524000
*/*     SIOTS TO DETERMINE IF THERE ARE ANY MORE ENTRIES THAT        */ 01525000
*/*     REQUIRE THE SAME DATASET THAT WAS REFERENCED ON THE          */ 01526000
*/*     DD ENTRY THAT WAS JUST REMOVED. IF ANOTHER ENTRY             */ 01527000
*/*     NEEDS THE DATASET, THE CALL TO IEFAB4DC TO REMOVE THE        */ 01528000
*/*     DATASET FROM THE DSENQ TABLE WILL NOT BE MADE.               */ 01529000
*/*************************************************************      */ 01530000
*                                                                  0774 01531000
*               SIOT2ADD=SCTFSIOT;  /* PICK UP ADDR OF FIRST SIOT ON    01532000
*                                      THE CHAIN             @YM08192*/ 01533000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0774 01534000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0774 01535000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTFSIOT(@12)                                 0774 01536000
         ST    @11,SIOT2ADD                                        0774 01537000
*               IF SIOT2ADD=SCTLSIOT THEN/* DONT SEARCH PAST THE LAST   01538000
*                                      SIOT                  @YM08192*/ 01539000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0775 01540000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@12)                                 0775 01541000
         CR    @11,@09                                             0775 01542000
         BNE   @RF00775                                            0775 01543000
*                 SIOT2ADD=ZEROPTR; /* INDICATE NO MATCH             */ 01544000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0776 01545000
         ST    @12,SIOT2ADD                                        0776 01546000
*               ELSE                                               0777 01547000
*                 DO;                                              0777 01548000
         B     @RC00775                                            0777 01549000
@RF00775 DS    0H                                                  0778 01550000
*                   SIOT2ADD=(SIOT2ADD+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* @YM08191*/ 01551000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       0778 01552000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0778 01553000
         AL    @12,SIOT2ADD                                        0778 01554000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0778 01555000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTPSIOT(@12)                                 0778 01556000
         ST    @11,SIOT2ADD                                        0778 01557000
*                   PHAZ2SW=NOTON;  /* LOOP CONTROL                  */ 01558000
         NI    PHAZ2SW,B'01111111'                                 0779 01559000
*                   DO WHILE PHAZ2SW=NOTON;                        0780 01560000
         B     @DE00780                                            0780 01561000
@DL00780 DS    0H                                                  0781 01562000
*                     SWVA=(SIOT2ADD+REALADD)->SCTPJFCB;/* PICK UP 0781 01563000
*                                      JFCBADD                       */ 01564000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       0781 01565000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0781 01566000
         AL    @12,SIOT2ADD                                        0781 01567000
         L     @11,SWEPAPTR                                        0781 01568000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@11),SCTPJFCB(@12)                           0781 01569000
*                     CALL READSWA; /* READ JFCB                     */ 01570000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0782 01571000
*                     JFCBPTR=SWBLKPTR;/* ADDR'ABILITY FOR JFCB      */ 01572000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0783 01573000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0783 01574000
         ST    @12,JFCBPTR                                         0783 01575000
*                     IF JFCBDSNM=DSN THEN                         0784 01576000
         CLC   JFCBDSNM(44,@12),DSN                                0784 01577000
         BNE   @RF00784                                            0784 01578000
*                       PHAZ2SW=ON; /* WHEN MATCH IS FOUND, LEAVE  0785 01579000
*                                      SIOT2ADD NONZERO AND TURN ON     01580000
*                                      THE LOOP CONTROL SWITCH       */ 01581000
         OI    PHAZ2SW,B'10000000'                                 0785 01582000
*                     ELSE                                         0786 01583000
*                       IF EVAL(SIOT2ADD+REALADD)->SIOALIAS=ON THEN/*   01584000
*                                      IF SIOT SAYS AN ALIAS EXISTS,    01585000
*                                      (THIS WILL ONLY BE TRUE FOR 0786 01586000
*                                      AUTO RESTART) GO COMPARE    0786 01587000
*                                      AGAINST THEALIAS TOO          */ 01588000
         B     @RC00784                                            0786 01589000
@RF00784 L     @12,SIOT2ADD                                        0786 01590000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       0786 01591000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0786 01592000
         LR    @09,@12                                             0786 01593000
         ALR   @09,@11                                             0786 01594000
         TM    SIOALIAS(@09),B'10000000'                           0786 01595000
         BNO   @RF00786                                            0786 01596000
*                         DO;                                      0787 01597000
*                           JFCBPTR=(SIOT2ADD+REALADD)->SCTPJFCB;  0788 01598000

*                           SWVA=JFCBEXAD;/* INIT FOR READ           */ 01606000

*                           CALL READSWA;/* DO THE READ              */ 01609000

*                             PHAZ2SW=ON;/* STOP THE LOOP WITH     0794 01618000
*                                      NONZERO SIOT ADDR             */ 01619000

*                         END;                                     0795 01621000

*                         DO;                                      0796 01623000

*                           IF SIOT2ADD=SCTLSIOT THEN/* ALL SIOTS  0797 01626000

*                             DO;                                  0798 01634000
*                               SIOT2ADD=ZEROPTR;/* INDICATE NO MATCH*/ 01635000

*                               PHAZ2SW=ON;/* STOP THE LOOP          */ 01638000
         OI    PHAZ2SW,B'10000000'                                 0800 01639000
*                             END;                                 0801 01640000
*                           ELSE                                   0802 01641000
*                             SIOT2ADD=(SIOT2ADD+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;    01642000

*                                   /* GET LINK PTR                  */ 01650000
*                         END;                                     0803 01651000
@RC00797 DS    0H                                                  0804 01652000
*                   END;                                           0804 01653000
@RC00786 DS    0H                                                  0804 01654000

*                 END;                                             0805 01658000

*                           PHAZ3SW=ON;/* WHEN MATCH IS FOUND, LEAVE    01740000

*                               CALL READSWA;/* DO THE READ          */ 01761000

         OI    PHAZ3SW,B'10000000'                                 0833 01774000
*                             END;                                 0834 01775000
*                           ELSE                                   0835 01776000
*                             DO;                                  0835 01777000

*                             END;                                 0842 01806000

*                       END;                                       0843 01808000

@DE00821 TM    PHAZ3SW,B'10000000'                                 0843 01811000
         BZ    @DL00821                                            0843 01812000
*                     END;                                         0844 01813000
*                   IF SIOT2ADD=ZEROPTR THEN/* NO MATCH WAS FOUND FOR   01814000

         BNH   @DL00750                                            0849 01838000
*         DO;                       /* DDNTS MUST NOW BE PUT TO SWA  */ 01839000
*           SWLNGTH=LENGTH(IEFADDNT);/* SET LENGTH FOR ASSIGN        */ 01840000
*                                                                  0851 01841000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0851 01842000
         MVC   SWLNGTH(4,@12),@CF00663                             0851 01843000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01844000
*           /*                                                       */ 01845000
*           /* ?SWAREQ (AL) EPA (EPAPTR);                            */ 01846000
*           /*                                                       */ 01847000
*           /*********************************************************/ 01848000
*                                                                  0852 01849000
*           CALL SWAMGR(EPAPTR,'AL');                              0852 01850000
         LA    @12,EPAPTR                                          0852 01851000
         ST    @12,@AL00001                                        0852 01852000

*           SAVELOC=SWVA;                                          0853 01861000

*           DDNTLINK=ZEROPTR;       /* THIS IS THE LAST DDNT...FOR 0854 01864000
*                                      THE MOMENT.                   */ 01865000
         L     @12,DDNTPTR                                         0854 01866000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0854 01867000
         STCM  @11,15,DDNTLINK(@12)                                0854 01868000
*           SWBUFPTR=DDNTPTR;       /* POINT TO WRITE-FROM BUFFER    */ 01869000
         L     @11,EPAPTR                                          0855 01870000
         ST    @12,SWBUFPTR(,@11)                                  0855 01871000
*           SWROWVA=SAVELOC;        /* POINT TO WRITE-TO BUFFER      */ 01872000
         MVC   SWROWVA(3,@11),SAVELOC                              0856 01873000
*           SWWRTID=DDNT27;         /* BLOCK ID FOR 1ST WRITE        */ 01874000
         MVI   SWWRTID(@11),X'27'                                  0857 01875000
*           CALL WRITESWA;          /* WRITE-MOVE VIA SWA MANAGER    */ 01876000
         BAL   @14,WRITESWA                                        0858 01877000
*           IF SCTDDNT=ZEROPTR THEN /* IF THIS IS THE 1ST            */ 01878000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0859 01879000

         BNZ   @RF00859                                            0859 01882000
*             SCTDDNT=SAVELOC;      /* PLUG TO SCT                   */ 01883000

         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0860 01885000
         ST    @11,SCTDDNT(,@12)                                   0860 01886000
*           ELSE                                                   0861 01887000
*             DO;                   /* FIND THE LAST ONE,THEN PLUG-IN*/ 01888000
         B     @RC00859                                            0861 01889000
@RF00859 DS    0H                                                  0862 01890000
*               SWVA=SCTDDNT;       /* GET 1ST DDNT FROM SWA...      */ 01891000

         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTDDNT+1(@11)                          0862 01894000
*               CALL READSWA;       /* READ FIRST DDNT IN    @ZA09214*/ 01895000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0863 01896000
*               DO WHILE SWBLKPTR->DDNTLINK=ZEROPTR;              0864 01897000

@DL00864 DS    0H                                                  0865 01899000
*                 SWVA=DDNTLINK;    /* READ TILL LAST FOUND          */ 01900000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0865 01901000
         L     @11,DDNTPTR                                         0865 01902000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),DDNTLINK+1(@11)                         0865 01903000
*                 CALL READSWA;                                    0866 01904000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         0866 01905000
*               END;                                               0867 01906000
@DE00864 L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        0867 01907000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  0867 01908000

         BNZ   @DL00864                                            0867 01910000
*               SWBLKPTR->DDNTLINK=SAVELOC;                        0868 01911000
         L     @11,SAVELOC-1                                       0868 01912000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0868 01913000
         STCM  @11,15,DDNTLINK(@12)                                0868 01914000
*             END;                                                 0869 01915000
*         END;                                                     0870 01916000
@RC00859 DS    0H                                                  0871 01917000
*       END;                                                       0871 01918000
*   END;                                                           0872 01919000
@RC00747 DS    0H                                                  0872 01920000
@DE00744 TM    LOOPCTR,B'10000000'                                 0872 01921000
         BZ    @DL00744                                            0872 01922000
*   END DDNTPROC;                                                  0873 01923000
@EL00008 DS    0H                                                  0873 01924000
@EF00008 DS    0H                                                  0873 01925000
@ER00008 LM    @14,@06,@SA00008                                    0873 01926000
         LM    @08,@12,@SA00008+36                                 0873 01927000
         BR    @14                                                 0873 01928000
*DDNTSIOT:                                                         0874 01929000
*   PROC;                                                          0874 01930000
*                                                                  0874 01931000
DDNTSIOT STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0874 01932000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01933000
*/* THIS PROC SEARCHES THE SIOT CHAIN FOR A DDNAME THAT MATCHES      */ 01934000
*/* THE DDNAME FOUND IN THE DDNT.  IF FOUND, AND THE THE SIOT        */ 01935000
*/* IS NOT FOR A DYNAMIC ENTRY, THE SIOT IS REMOVED FROM THE         */ 01936000
*/* CHAIN.                                                           */ 01937000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01938000
*                                                                  0875 01939000
*   REALADD=LENGTH(SWAPFX);         /* CONSTANT FOR ADDR TRANSLATION */ 01940000
         LA    @12,16                                              0875 01941000
         STCM  @12,7,REALADD                                       0875 01942000
*   SIOTSIOT=ONEHEX;                /* GET A NON-ZERO VALUE          */ 01943000
         LA    @11,1                                               0876 01944000
         STCM  @11,7,SIOTSIOT                                      0876 01945000
*   FOUNDSW=NOTON;                  /* INTERNAL LOOP CONTROL - TURNED   01946000
*                                      ON WHEN MATCH FOUND           */ 01947000
         NI    FOUNDSW,B'01111111'                                 0877 01948000
*   IF(EVAL(SCTFSIOT+REALADD)->SCTDDNAM=DDNTDDNM(INDEX)/* IF THE   0878 01949000
*                                      FIRST SIOT                    */ 01950000
*       &EVAL(SCTFSIOT+REALADD)->SIOTDYAL=NOTON)                   0878 01951000
*                                                                  0878 01952000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01953000
*   /*                                                               */ 01954000
*   /* DDNAME MATCHES, AND THE ENTRY IS NOT DYNAMIC, THE CHAINING IS */ 01955000
*   /* TRIVIAL.                                                      */ 01956000
*   /*                                                               */ 01957000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01958000
*                                                                  0878 01959000
*     THEN                                                         0878 01960000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          0878 01961000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0878 01962000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTFSIOT(@11)                                 0878 01963000
         LR    @15,@09                                             0878 01964000
         ALR   @15,@12                                             0878 01965000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0878 01966000
         IC    @14,INDEX                                           0878 01967000
         SLA   @14,3                                               0878 01968000
         L     @01,DDNTPTR                                         0878 01969000
         ALR   @01,@14                                             0878 01970000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@15),DDNTDDNM-8(@01)                     0878 01971000
         BNE   @RF00878                                            0878 01972000
         LR    @15,@09                                             0878 01973000
         ALR   @15,@12                                             0878 01974000
         TM    SIOTDYAL(@15),B'01000000'                           0878 01975000
         BNZ   @RF00878                                            0878 01976000
*     DO;                                                          0879 01977000
*       SIOTSIOT=SCTFSIOT;          /* SET MATCHED SIOT ADDR FOR   0880 01978000
*                                      DDNTPROC                      */ 01979000
         STCM  @09,7,SIOTSIOT                                      0880 01980000
*       SCTFSIOT=(SCTFSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* RESET FIRST SIOT  0881 01981000
*                                      PTR. THIS REMOVES THE SIOT  0881 01982000
*                                      THAT WAS MATCHED.             */ 01983000
         ALR   @09,@12                                             0881 01984000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0881 01985000
         ICM   @12,7,SCTPSIOT(@09)                                 0881 01986000
         STCM  @12,7,SCTFSIOT(@11)                                 0881 01987000
*     END;                                                         0882 01988000
*                                                                  0882 01989000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01990000
*/* THE FOLLOWING CODE HANDLES THE SEARCH OF THE SIOT CHAIN IF       */ 01991000
*/* THE MATCH WAS NOT ON THE FIRST SIOT.                             */ 01992000
*/**************************************************************     */ 01993000
*                                                                  0883 01994000
*   ELSE                                                           0883 01995000
*     DO;                                                          0883 01996000
         B     @RC00878                                            0883 01997000
@RF00878 DS    0H                                                  0884 01998000
*       PROCSIOT=SCTFSIOT;          /* PROCSIOT WILL BE THE HOLDER 0884 01999000
*                                      FOR PREVIOUS SIOT ADDRESS.    */ 02000000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0884 02001000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0884 02002000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTFSIOT(@12)                                 0884 02003000
         ST    @11,PROCSIOT                                        0884 02004000
*       CURNSIOT=(SCTFSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* CURNSIOT HOLDS    0885 02005000
*                                      ADDRESS OF SIOT BEING EXAM'D  */ 02006000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       0885 02007000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0885 02008000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0885 02009000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0885 02010000
         ICM   @12,7,SCTPSIOT(@11)                                 0885 02011000
         ST    @12,CURNSIOT                                        0885 02012000
*       DO WHILE(SIOTSIOT=ZEROPTR&FOUNDSW=ON);                   0886 02013000
*                                                                  0886 02014000
         B     @DE00886                                            0886 02015000
@DL00886 DS    0H                                                  0887 02016000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02017000
*         /*                                                         */ 02018000
*         /* RUN THIS LOOP UNTIL DDNAME MATCHES, OR UNTIL SIOTS ARE  */ 02019000
*         /* EXHAUSTED.                                              */ 02020000
*         /*                                                         */ 02021000
*         /***********************************************************/ 02022000
*                                                                  0887 02023000
*         IF(EVAL(CURNSIOT+REALADD)->SCTDDNAM=DDNTDDNM(INDEX)&EVAL(     02024000
*             CURNSIOT+REALADD)->SIOTDYAL=NOTON) THEN/* DONT REMOVE     02025000
*                                      DYNAMIC DD ENTRY              */ 02026000
         L     @12,CURNSIOT                                        0887 02027000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       0887 02028000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0887 02029000
         LR    @09,@12                                             0887 02030000
         ALR   @09,@11                                             0887 02031000
         SLR   @15,@15                                             0887 02032000
         IC    @15,INDEX                                           0887 02033000
         SLA   @15,3                                               0887 02034000
         L     @01,DDNTPTR                                         0887 02035000
         ALR   @01,@15                                             0887 02036000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@09),DDNTDDNM-8(@01)                     0887 02037000
         BNE   @RF00887                                            0887 02038000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0887 02039000
         TM    SIOTDYAL(@11),B'01000000'                           0887 02040000
         BNZ   @RF00887                                            0887 02041000
*           DO;                     /* MATCH WAS FOUND...            */ 02042000
*             SIOTSIOT=CURNSIOT;    /* PARM FOR DDNTPROC             */ 02043000
         STCM  @12,7,SIOTSIOT                                      0889 02044000
*             FOUNDSW=ON;           /* STOP THE LOOP                 */ 02045000
         OI    FOUNDSW,B'10000000'                                 0890 02046000
*             IF SIOTSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN/* FOR LAST SIOT ON CHAIN,  0891 02047000
*                                      ONLY UPDATE LSIOT TO REMOVE 0891 02048000
*                                      THE ENTRY.                    */ 02049000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          0891 02050000
         CLC   SIOTSIOT(3),SCTLSIOT(@11)                           0891 02051000
         BNE   @RF00891                                            0891 02052000
*               DO;                                                0892 02053000
*                 PREVLAST=CURNSIOT;/* FOR SECOND SEARCH     @YM07575*/ 02054000
         ST    @12,PREVLAST                                        0893 02055000
*                 SCTLSIOT=PROCSIOT;                               0894 02056000
         MVC   SCTLSIOT(3,@11),PROCSIOT+1                          0894 02057000
*               END;                                               0895 02058000
*             ELSE                  /* FOR OTHERS, POINT THE PREVIOUS   02059000
*                                      SIOT TO TO THE SIOT POINTED TO   02060000
*                                      BY THE SIOT BEING REMOVED.    */ 02061000
*               EVAL(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT=(CURNSIOT+REALADD)->   02062000
*                   SCTPSIOT;                                      0896 02063000
         B     @RC00891                                            0896 02064000
@RF00891 L     @12,REALADD-1                                       0896 02065000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0896 02066000
         L     @11,PROCSIOT                                        0896 02067000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0896 02068000
         AL    @12,CURNSIOT                                        0896 02069000
         MVC   SCTPSIOT(3,@11),SCTPSIOT(@12)                       0896 02070000
*           END;                                                   0897 02071000
*         ELSE                                                     0898 02072000
*           DO;                     /* GET READY FOR NEXT SWING THRU */ 02073000
         B     @RC00887                                            0898 02074000
@RF00887 DS    0H                                                  0899 02075000
*             IF CURNSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN/* ALL SIOTS EXAM'D           */ 02076000
         L     @12,CURNSIOT                                        0899 02077000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          0899 02078000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0899 02079000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@11)                                 0899 02080000
         CR    @12,@09                                             0899 02081000
         BNE   @RF00899                                            0899 02082000
*               SIOTSIOT=ZEROPTR;   /* INDICATE NOT FOUND            */ 02083000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0900 02084000
         STCM  @12,7,SIOTSIOT                                      0900 02085000
*             ELSE                                                 0901 02086000
*               DO;                                                0901 02087000
         B     @RC00899                                            0901 02088000
@RF00899 DS    0H                                                  0902 02089000
*                 PROCSIOT=CURNSIOT;/* SET NEW PREVIOUS TO NEW VALUE */ 02090000
         L     @12,CURNSIOT                                        0902 02091000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        0902 02092000
*                 CURNSIOT=(CURNSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;           0903 02093000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       0903 02094000

         ST    @11,CURNSIOT                                        0903 02099000
*               END;                                               0904 02100000
*           END;                                                   0905 02101000
@RC00899 DS    0H                                                  0906 02102000
*       END;                                                       0906 02103000
@RC00887 DS    0H                                                  0906 02104000
@DE00886 L     @12,SIOTSIOT-1                                      0906 02105000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0906 02106000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0906 02107000
