         TM    FOUNDSW,B'10000000'                                 0906 02109000
         BNO   @DL00886                                            0906 02110000
@DC00886 DS    0H                                                  0907 02111000
*     END;                                                         0907 02112000
*   PROCSIOT=ZEROPTR;               /* RE-INITIALIZE FOR SIOTSCAN    */ 02113000
@RC00878 SLR   @12,@12                                             0908 02114000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        0908 02115000
*   END DDNTSIOT;                                                  0909 02116000
@EL00009 DS    0H                                                  0909 02117000
@EF00009 DS    0H                                                  0909 02118000
@ER00009 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0909 02119000
         BR    @14                                                 0909 02120000
*MERGMAIN:                                                         0910 02121000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 0910 02122000
*                                                                  0910 02123000
MERGMAIN STM   @14,@06,@SA00010                                    0910 02124000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00010+36                                 0910 02125000
*/**************************************************************     */ 02126000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE IS THE ROUTE CONTROLLER FOR THE MAIN MERGING      */ 02127000
*/*  FUNCTION OF IEFXB609.                                           */ 02128000
*/**************************************************************     */ 02129000
*/* DDNTPROC WILL HAVE LEFT ONE RECORD IN THE BUFFER...              */ 02130000
*                                                                  0911 02131000
*   TYPE1PTR=IOBUFAD;               /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR DSDR       */ 02132000
         ST    IOBUFAD,TYPE1PTR                                    0911 02133000
*   IGNORE=NOTON;                   /* INITIALIZE SWITCH FOR JOBCAT  */ 02134000
         NI    IGNORE,B'01111111'                                  0912 02135000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0913 02136000
*     T1DSDR BASED(IOBUFAD);                                       0913 02137000
*   DO WHILE(DSDRIDNT=JFCID         /* READ AND PROCESS WHILE TYPE1  */ 02138000
*         |DSDRIDNT=SIOID           /* OR SIOT RECORD        @ZA06466*/ 02139000
*         |DSDRIDNT=EOBID           /* OR END OF BLOCK               */ 02140000
*         |DSDRIDNT=IDTYPE2);       /* OR (UNWANTED) JFCBX. THE DSDRS   02141000
*                                      FOR WANTED JFCBXS WILL BE   0914 02142000
*                                      HANDLED BY JFCBXJOB           */ 02143000
         B     @DE00914                                            0914 02144000
@DL00914 DS    0H                                                  0915 02145000
*     IF DSDRIDNT=JFCID THEN        /* FOR JFCB TYPE, TEST FOR     0915 02146000
*                                      SPECIAL CASES.                */ 02147000
         ICM   @12,3,DSDRIDNT(IOBUFAD)                             0915 02148000
         BNZ   @RF00915                                            0915 02149000
*       DO;                                                        0916 02150000
*         DJFCBPTR=ADDR(DSDRJFCB);  /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR DSDR JFCB  0917 02151000
*                                      LINE DELETED          @YM08160*/ 02152000
         LA    @12,DSDRJFCB(,IOBUFAD)                              0917 02153000
         ST    @12,DJFCBPTR                                        0917 02154000
*         IF DJFCBPTR->JFCENT=ON THEN                             0918 02155000
         L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        0918 02156000
         TM    JFCENT(@12),B'00000100'                             0918 02157000
         BO    @RF00918                                            0918 02158000
*           DO;                     /* IGNORE DSDRS FOR GDG        0919 02159000
*                                      GENERATIONS OR PRIVATE      0919 02160000
*                                      CATALOGS.                     */ 02161000
*             CALL SIOTSCAN;        /* FIND MATCHING SIOT            */ 02162000
         BAL   @14,SIOTSCAN                                        0920 02163000
*             IF IGNORE=NOTON THEN  /* PROCEED TO SIOTPROC UNLESS  0921 02164000
*                                      SIOT WAS FOR JOBCAT OR STEPCAT*/ 02165000
         TM    IGNORE,B'10000000'                                  0921 02166000
         BNZ   @RF00921                                            0921 02167000
*               DO;                                                0922 02168000
*                 IF NEWCCAT=ON THEN                               0923 02169000
         TM    NEWCCAT,B'10000000'                                 0923 02170000
         BNO   @RF00923                                            0923 02171000
*                   CALL SIOTSCAN;  /* IF LAST ENTRY WAS FOR ADDED 0924 02172000
*                                      CONCAT AT DEFERRED, DSDR HASNT   02173000
*                                      BEEN PROCESSED                */ 02174000
         BAL   @14,SIOTSCAN                                        0924 02175000
*                 CALL SIOTPROC;    /* MERGE SIOT FIELDS             */ 02176000
@RF00923 BAL   @14,SIOTPROC                                        0925 02177000
*                 CALL JFCBPROC;    /* MERGE JFCB FIELDS             */ 02178000
         BAL   @14,JFCBPROC                                        0926 02179000
*               END;                                               0927 02180000
*             ELSE                                                 0928 02181000
*               IGNORE=NOTON;       /* RESET SWITCH FOR NEXT LOOP    */ 02182000
         B     @RC00921                                            0928 02183000
@RF00921 NI    IGNORE,B'01111111'                                  0928 02184000
*           END;                                                   0929 02185000
*       END;                                                       0930 02186000
*     ELSE                                                         0931 02187000
*       ;                                                          0931 02188000
@RF00915 DS    0H                                                  0932 02189000
*     DO;                           /* DYNAMIC SIOT PROCESSING     0932 02190000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02191000
@RC00915 DS    0H                                                  0933 02192000
*       IF DSDRIDNT=SIOID THEN      /* IS THIS A DYNAMIC SIOT      0933 02193000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02194000
         CLC   DSDRIDNT(2,IOBUFAD),@CH02967                        0933 02195000
         BNE   @RF00933                                            0933 02196000
*         CALL DYNAPROC;            /* NEW PROCEDURE FOR HANDLING  0934 02197000
*                                      SIOTS THAT WERE SAVED BY    0934 02198000
*                                      CHECKPOINT BECAUSE OF DYNAMIC    02199000
*                                      ALLOCATION DONE BEFORE THE  0934 02200000
*                                      CHECKPOINT WAS TAKEN. @ZA06466*/ 02201000
         BAL   @14,DYNAPROC                                        0934 02202000
*       CALL READCHEK;              /* READ NEXT RECORD              */ 02203000
@RF00933 BAL   @14,READCHEK                                        0935 02204000
*       TYPE1PTR=IOBUFAD;           /* REFRESH BUFFER POINTER        */ 02205000
         ST    IOBUFAD,TYPE1PTR                                    0936 02206000
*     END;                                                         0937 02207000
*     IF DSDRIDNT=GDGNTID THEN                                     0938 02208000
         CLC   DSDRIDNT(2,IOBUFAD),@CH02959                        0938 02209000
         BNE   @RF00938                                            0938 02210000
*       DO;                                                        0939 02211000
*         CALL GDGNTJOB;            /* HANDLE PLUG-IN FOR GDGNT      */ 02212000
         BAL   @14,GDGNTJOB                                        0940 02213000
*         CALL READCHEK;            /* READ ONE MORE FOR NOTE        */ 02214000
         BAL   @14,READCHEK                                        0941 02215000
*       END;                                                       0942 02216000
*   END MERGMAIN;                                                  0943 02217000
@RF00938 DS    0H                                                  0943 02218000
@DE00914 ICM   @12,12,DSDRIDNT(IOBUFAD)                            0943 02219000
         SRA   @12,16                                              0943 02220000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0943 02221000
         BZ    @DL00914                                            0943 02222000
         C     @12,@CF02967                                        0943 02223000
         BE    @DL00914                                            0943 02224000
         C     @12,@CF02983                                        0943 02225000
         BE    @DL00914                                            0943 02226000
         C     @12,@CF02951                                        0943 02227000
         BE    @DL00914                                            0943 02228000
@EL00010 DS    0H                                                  0944 02229000
@EF00010 DS    0H                                                  0944 02230000
@ER00010 LM    @14,@06,@SA00010                                    0944 02231000
         LM    @08,@12,@SA00010+36                                 0944 02232000
         BR    @14                                                 0944 02233000
*DYNAPROC:                                                         0945 02234000
*   PROC;                                                          0945 02235000
*                                                                  0945 02236000
DYNAPROC STM   @14,@12,@SA00011                                    0945 02237000
*/********************************************************************/ 02238000
*/*                                                                  */ 02239000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE HANDLES THE SIOTS SAVED BY CHECKPOINT     @ZA06466*/ 02240000
*/*   IN TYPE 4 DSDR RECORDS IDENTIFIED BY X'000C' AT OFFSET @ZA06466*/ 02241000
*/*   ZERO. CURRENTLY ONLY SYSOUT FIELDS ARE UPDATED AND     @ZA06466*/ 02242000
*/*   THEREFORE ONLY SIOTS IN TYPE 4 DSDR RECORDS WITH THE   @ZA06466*/ 02243000
*/*   SCTSYSOU BIT ON WILL HAVE ANY PROCESSING DONE.         @ZA06466*/ 02244000
*/* THE FIELDS BEING SET ARE: SCTOUTNM, SCTOUTNO, SCTOUTPN,  @ZA06466*/ 02245000
*/*   SIOTOUTC, SIOTDEST, SIOTSSDS, SIOTSSNM AND SIOTHOLD,   @ZA06466*/ 02246000
*/*   IF THE TYPE OF RESTART IS DEFERRED THEN TWO MORE SIOT  @ZA06466*/ 02247000
*/*   FIELDS ARE SET FOR ALLOCATION (IEFAB427) TO REQUEST A  @ZA06466*/ 02248000
*/*   NEW TRACK MASK (SIOTTRKM) AND A NEW DATA SET NAME      @ZA06466*/ 02249000
*/*   (SIOTDSNM) FROM THE SUBSYSTEM HANDLING SYSOUT.         @ZA06466*/ 02250000
*/*                                                                  */ 02251000
*/********************************************************************/ 02252000
*                                                                  0946 02253000
*   DSIOTPTR=ADDR(DSDRSIOT);        /* INPUT SIOT POINTER    @ZA06466*/ 02254000
         L     @12,TYPE1PTR                                        0946 02255000
         LA    @12,DSDRSIOT(,@12)                                  0946 02256000
         ST    @12,DSIOTPTR                                        0946 02257000
*   SIOTPTR=PROCSIOT+LENGTH(SWAPFX);/* GET CURRENT SIOT INCORE     0947 02258000
*                                      ADDRESS               @ZA06466*/ 02259000
         LA    @12,16                                              0947 02260000
         L     @11,PROCSIOT                                        0947 02261000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             0947 02262000
         ST    @11,SIOTPTR                                         0947 02263000
*   IF SIOTPTR->SCTDDNAM=DSIOTPTR->SCTDDNAM THEN/* IS THIS SIOT FOR    02264000
*                                      THIS DSDR             @ZA06466*/ 02265000
         L     @09,DSIOTPTR                                        0948 02266000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@11),SCTDDNAM(@09)                       0948 02267000
         BE    @RF00948                                            0948 02268000
*     DO;                           /* MUST SEARCH SIOTS     @ZA06466*/ 02269000
*       SIOTPTR=SCTPTR->SCTFSIOT+LENGTH(SWAPFX);/* GET FIRST SIOT  0950 02270000
*                                      INCORE ADDRESS        @ZA06466*/ 02271000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          0950 02272000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0950 02273000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTFSIOT(@11)                                 0950 02274000
         ALR   @12,@09                                             0950 02275000
         ST    @12,SIOTPTR                                         0950 02276000
*       DO WHILE(SIOTPTR=ZEROPTR&  /* END OF SIOT CHAIN?    @ZA06466*/ 02277000
*             SIOTPTR->SCTDDNAM=DSIOTPTR->SCTDDNAM);/* IS THIS SIOT    02278000
*                                      FOR THIS DSDR         @ZA06466*/ 02279000
         B     @DE00951                                            0951 02280000
@DL00951 DS    0H                                                  0952 02281000
*         SIOTPTR=SIOTPTR->SCTPSIOT+LENGTH(SWAPFX);/* GET NEXT SIOT     02282000
*                                      INCORE ADDR           @ZA06466*/ 02283000
         LA    @12,16                                              0952 02284000
         L     @11,SIOTPTR                                         0952 02285000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             0952 02286000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTPSIOT(@11)                                 0952 02287000
         ALR   @12,@09                                             0952 02288000
         ST    @12,SIOTPTR                                         0952 02289000
*       END;                        /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02290000
@DE00951 L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         0953 02291000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0953 02292000
         BZ    @DC00951                                            0953 02293000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0953 02294000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@12),SCTDDNAM(@11)                       0953 02295000
         BNE   @DL00951                                            0953 02296000
@DC00951 DS    0H                                                  0954 02297000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02298000
*   IF SIOTPTR=ZEROPTR THEN        /* WAS THE SIOT FOUND    @ZA06466*/ 02299000
@RF00948 L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         0955 02300000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0955 02301000
         BZ    @RF00955                                            0955 02302000
*     DO;                           /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02303000
*       IF SIOTPTR->SCTSYSOU=ON THEN/* IS SIOT FOR SYSOUT    @ZA06466*/ 02304000
         TM    SCTSYSOU(@12),B'00001000'                           0957 02305000
         BNO   @RF00957                                            0957 02306000
*         DO;                       /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02307000
*           SIOTPTR->SCTOUTNM=DSIOTPTR->SCTOUTNM;/* PROG NAME      0959 02308000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02309000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0959 02310000
         MVC   SCTOUTNM(8,@12),SCTOUTNM(@11)                       0959 02311000
*           SIOTPTR->SCTOUTNO=DSIOTPTR->SCTOUTNO;/* FORMS NUMBER   0960 02312000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02313000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0960 02314000
         MVC   SCTOUTNO(4,@12),SCTOUTNO(@11)                       0960 02315000
*           SIOTPTR->SCTOUTPN=DSIOTPTR->SCTOUTPN;/* SYSOUT CLASS   0961 02316000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02317000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0961 02318000
         MVC   SCTOUTPN(1,@12),SCTOUTPN(@11)                       0961 02319000
*           SIOTPTR->SIOTOUTC=DSIOTPTR->SIOTOUTC;/* NUMBER SYSOUT  0962 02320000
*                                      COPIES                @ZA06466*/ 02321000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0962 02322000
         MVC   SIOTOUTC(1,@12),SIOTOUTC(@11)                       0962 02323000
*           SIOTPTR->SIOTDEST=DSIOTPTR->SIOTDEST;/* SYSOUT         0963 02324000
*                                      DESTINATION           @ZA06466*/ 02325000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0963 02326000
         MVC   SIOTDEST(8,@12),SIOTDEST(@11)                       0963 02327000
*           SIOTPTR->SIOTSSNM=DSIOTPTR->SIOTSSNM;/* SUBSYSTEM NAME 0964 02328000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02329000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0964 02330000
         MVC   SIOTSSNM(4,@12),SIOTSSNM(@11)                       0964 02331000
*           SIOTPTR->SIOTSSDS=ON;   /* SUBSYSTEM DATASET     @ZA06466*/ 02332000
         OI    SIOTSSDS(@12),B'10000000'                           0965 02333000
*           IF DSIOTPTR->SIOTHOLD=ON THEN/* WAS HOLD SPECIFIED?    0966 02334000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02335000
         L     @11,DSIOTPTR                                        0966 02336000
         TM    SIOTHOLD(@11),B'01000000'                           0966 02337000
         BNO   @RF00966                                            0966 02338000
*             SIOTPTR->SIOTHOLD=ON; /* SET HOLD IN SIOT      @ZA06466*/ 02339000
         OI    SIOTHOLD(@12),B'01000000'                           0967 02340000
*           IF RESTYPE=ON THEN      /* IS RESTART TYPE DEFERRED?   0968 02341000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02342000
@RF00966 TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 0968 02343000
         BNO   @RF00968                                            0968 02344000
*             DO;                   /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02345000
*               SIOTPTR->SIOTTRKM=ON;/* REQUEST NEW TRACK MASK VIA 0970 02346000
*                                      ALLOCATION            @ZA06466*/ 02347000
*               SIOTPTR->SIOTDSNM=ON;/* REQUEST NEW DSNAME VIA     0971 02348000
*                                      ALLOCATION            @ZA06466*/ 02349000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         0971 02350000
         OI    SIOTTRKM(@12),B'00000110'                           0971 02351000
*             END;                  /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02352000
*         END;                      /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02353000
*     END;                          /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02354000
*   ELSE                                                           0975 02355000
*     CALL ERR37;                   /* NO SIOT FOUND FOR THE TYPE 4     02356000
*                                      DSDR                  @ZA06466*/ 02357000
         B     @RC00955                                            0975 02358000
@RF00955 BAL   @14,ERR37                                           0975 02359000
*   END DYNAPROC;                   /* TYPE 4 DSDR DONE      @ZA06466*/ 02360000
@EL00011 DS    0H                                                  0976 02361000
@EF00011 DS    0H                                                  0976 02362000
@ER00011 LM    @14,@12,@SA00011                                    0976 02363000
         BR    @14                                                 0976 02364000
*SIOTSCAN:                                                         0977 02365000
*   PROC;                                                          0977 02366000
*                                                                  0977 02367000
SIOTSCAN STM   @14,@12,@SA00012                                    0977 02368000
*/**************************************************************     */ 02369000
*/* THIS PROC SCANS THE SIOT CHAIN FOR A MATCH ON THE DDNAME         */ 02370000
*/*   FOUND IN THE DSDR.  THE CHAIN IS SEARCHED IN SUCH A WAY        */ 02371000
*/*   THAT ALREADY MATCHED AND PROCESSED SIOTS REMAIN AT THE         */ 02372000
*/*   UPPER PORTION OF THE CHAIN, AND SIOTS THAT DO NOT MATCH        */ 02373000
*/*   THE CURRENT SEARCH ARGUMENT ARE BUBBLED-DOWN TO THE            */ 02374000
*/*   BOTTOM OF THE CHAIN.  THE SIOT THAT MATCHES WILL ALWAYS        */ 02375000
*/*   BE CHAINED IN AFTER THE PREVIOUSLY MATCHED AND PROCESSED       */ 02376000
*/*   SIOT ON THE CHAIN.                                             */ 02377000
*/*   ON EXIT, PROCSIOT IS THE SVA OF THE MATCHED SIOT.              */ 02378000
*/**************************************************************     */ 02379000
*                                                                  0978 02380000
*   DCL                                                            0978 02381000
*     DOUBLDD BIT(1);               /* FLAG TO INSURE NO PROBLEMS  0978 02382000
*                                      WITH DOUBLE DDS       @YM07532*/ 02383000
*   DCL                                                            0979 02384000
*     SAVEL PTR(24) BDY(WORD);      /* HOLDER FOR LAST SIOT PTR      */ 02385000
*   DCL                                                            0980 02386000
*     NEWCCAT BIT(1);               /* FLAG FOR ADDED CONCATS AT   0980 02387000
*                                      DEFERRED                      */ 02388000
*   REALADD=LENGTH(SWAPFX);         /* CONSTANT FOR ADRESS         0981 02389000
*                                      TRANSLATION                   */ 02390000
         MVC   REALADD(3),@CF00052+1                               0981 02391000
*/***************************************************************    */ 02392000
*/* IF THE RESTART TYPE IS DEFERRED, AND THE DSDR IS FOR A DATA      */ 02393000
*/*    SET THAT WAS DYNAMICALLY ALLOCATED, THERE WILL NOT BE A       */ 02394000
*/*    SIOT/JFCB TO MATCH AGAINST - AS THE INTERPRETER WAS NOT       */ 02395000
*/*    AWARE OF ITS PRESENCE.  THE PROCEDURE NOMATCH WILL BE         */ 02396000
*/*    CALLED TO BUILD A SIOT/JFCB AND CHAIN THEM INTO SWA.          */ 02397000
*/* IF THE RESTART IS AUTOMATIC, SIOTS FOR DYNAMICALLY ALLOCATED     */ 02398000
*/*    DATASETS WILL BE BUILT ONLY IF NO MATCH CAN BE MADE.          */ 02399000
*/***************************************************************    */ 02400000
*                                                                  0982 02401000
*   SAVEL=SCTLSIOT;                 /* SAVE PTR TO LAST SIOT ON ENTRY   02402000
*                                      TO PROC                       */ 02403000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          0982 02404000
         MVC   SAVEL(3),SCTLSIOT(@12)                              0982 02405000
*   BUILDSW=NOTON;                  /* INIT SWITCH FOR NOMATCH     0983 02406000
*                                      FUNCTION                      */ 02407000
         NI    BUILDSW,B'01111111'                                 0983 02408000
*   DOUBLDD=NOTON;                  /* SHOW NO MATCH SO FAR  @YM07532*/ 02409000
         NI    DOUBLDD,B'01111111'                                 0984 02410000
*   NEWCCAT=NOTON;                  /* INITIALIZE FLAG               */ 02411000
         NI    NEWCCAT,B'01111111'                                 0985 02412000
*   IF DSDRDALC=ON THEN                                            0986 02413000
         TM    DSDRDALC(IOBUFAD),B'10000000'                       0986 02414000
         BNO   @RF00986                                            0986 02415000
*     BUILDSW=ON;                   /* TURN ON BUILD SWITCH FOR ALL     02416000
*                                      DYNAMICALLY ALLOCATED DATASETS   02417000
*                                                            @YM07048*/ 02418000
         OI    BUILDSW,B'10000000'                                 0987 02419000
*   IF(RESTYPE=ON                   /* IF DEFERRED...                */ 02420000
*       &DSDRDALC=ON) THEN          /* AND D.S. WAS DYNALLOC         */ 02421000
@RF00986 TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 0988 02422000
         BNO   @RF00988                                            0988 02423000
         TM    DSDRDALC(IOBUFAD),B'10000000'                       0988 02424000
         BNO   @RF00988                                            0988 02425000
*     DO;                                                          0989 02426000
*       CALL NOMATCH;               /* INVOKE BUILD ROUTINE          */ 02427000
         BAL   @14,NOMATCH                                         0990 02428000
*       PROCSIOT=NEWSIOT;           /* PARM FOR SIOTPROC             */ 02429000
         L     @12,NEWSIOT-1                                       0991 02430000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0991 02431000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        0991 02432000
*     END;                                                         0992 02433000
*   ELSE                            /* INSERT DECISION FOR   @YM06021*/ 02434000
*     IF PROCSIOT=SAVEL THEN                                       0993 02435000
         B     @RC00988                                            0993 02436000
@RF00988 L     @12,PROCSIOT                                        0993 02437000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             0993 02438000
         ICM   @11,7,SAVEL                                         0993 02439000
         CR    @12,@11                                             0993 02440000
         BNE   @RF00993                                            0993 02441000
*       DO;                                                        0994 02442000
*         CALL NOMATCH;             /* IF SIOTSCAN IS BEING ENTERED     02443000
*                                      AGAIN AFTER ALL SIOTS HAVE  0995 02444000
*                                      BEEN PROCESSED, CALL THE ERROR   02445000
*                                      ROUTINE               @YM05442*/ 02446000
         BAL   @14,NOMATCH                                         0995 02447000
*         PROCSIOT=NEWSIOT;         /* FOR SIOTPROC          @YM08139*/ 02448000
         L     @12,NEWSIOT-1                                       0996 02449000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         0996 02450000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        0996 02451000
*         RETURN;                   /* RETURN TO CALLER      @YM08139*/ 02452000
@EL00012 DS    0H                                                  0997 02453000
@EF00012 DS    0H                                                  0997 02454000
@ER00012 LM    @14,@12,@SA00012                                    0997 02455000
         BR    @14                                                 0997 02456000
*       END;                                                       0998 02457000
*                                                                  0998 02458000
*/***************************************************************    */ 02459000
*/* IN OTHER CASES, SEARCH SIOT CHAIN FOR MATCH AGAINST DSDRDNAM     */ 02460000
*/***************************************************************    */ 02461000
*                                                                  0999 02462000
*     ELSE                                                         0999 02463000
*       DO;                                                        0999 02464000
@RF00993 DS    0H                                                  1000 02465000
*         DO WHILE DOUBLDD=ON;     /* LOOP TIL MATCH FOUND  @YM07532*/ 02466000
         B     @DE01000                                            1000 02467000
@DL01000 DS    0H                                                  1001 02468000
*           IF PROCSIOT=ZEROPTR THEN/* IS THIS FIRST ENTRY ?         */ 02469000
         L     @12,PROCSIOT                                        1001 02470000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             1001 02471000
         BNZ   @RF01001                                            1001 02472000
*             DO;                                                  1002 02473000
*               PROCSIOT=SCTFSIOT;  /* PICK UP FIRST SIOT            */ 02474000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1003 02475000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1003 02476000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTFSIOT(@12)                                 1003 02477000
         ST    @11,PROCSIOT                                        1003 02478000
*               CURNSIOT=PROCSIOT;  /* INIT. SEARCH SIOT ADDR        */ 02479000
         ST    @11,CURNSIOT                                        1004 02480000
*             END;                                                 1005 02481000
*                                                                  1005 02482000
*/* ON OTHER THAN THE FIRST ENTRY, BEGIN SEARCH WITH THE NEXT        */ 02483000
*/* SIOT AFTER THE LAST PROCESSED.                                   */ 02484000
*                                                                  1006 02485000
*           ELSE                                                   1006 02486000
*             CURNSIOT=(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* PICK UP NEXT  */ 02487000

         AL    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1006 02491000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1006 02492000

         ST    @11,CURNSIOT                                        1006 02494000
*           IF EVAL(CURNSIOT+REALADD)->SCTDDNAM=DSDRDNAM THEN      1007 02495000

         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       1007 02497000

         ALR   @11,@12                                             1007 02499000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@11),DSDRDNAM(IOBUFAD)                   1007 02500000
         BNE   @RF01007                                            1007 02501000
*             DO;                                                  1008 02502000
*               DOUBLDD=ON;         /* SHOW MATCH FOUND      @YM07532*/ 02503000
         OI    DOUBLDD,B'10000000'                                 1009 02504000
*               PROCSIOT=CURNSIOT;  /* IF THE NEW NEXT MATCHES THE   */ 02505000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1010 02506000
*/* DSDR DDNAME, RETURN THE ADDRESS OF THE NEW SIOT TO PROCESS       */ 02507000
*                                                                  1011 02508000
*             END;                                                 1011 02509000
*           ELSE                                                   1012 02510000
*             DO;                                                  1012 02511000
         B     @RC01007                                            1012 02512000
@RF01007 DS    0H                                                  1013 02513000
*               IF(CURNSIOT=SAVEL|(RESTYPE=ON&EVAL(CURNSIOT+REALADD)->  02514000
*                   SCTDDNAM=BLANKS)) THEN                         1013 02515000
         L     @12,CURNSIOT                                        1013 02516000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1013 02517000
         ICM   @11,7,SAVEL                                         1013 02518000
         CR    @12,@11                                             1013 02519000
         BE    @RT01013                                            1013 02520000
         TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 1013 02521000
         BNO   @RF01013                                            1013 02522000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       1013 02523000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1013 02524000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             1013 02525000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@12),@CC03776                            1013 02526000
         BNE   @RF01013                                            1013 02527000
@RT01013 DS    0H                                                  1014 02528000
*                 DO;                                              1014 02529000
*                   CALL NOMATCH;   /* GO BUILD IF DYNAMIC, OR PUT 1015 02530000
*                                      OUT ERROR MSG IF NOT  @YM07048*/ 02531000
         BAL   @14,NOMATCH                                         1015 02532000
*                   PROCSIOT=NEWSIOT;/* IF RETURN WAS MADE FROM    1016 02533000
*                                      NOMATCH,SET UP PTR TO NEW SIOT*/ 02534000
         L     @12,NEWSIOT-1                                       1016 02535000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1016 02536000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1016 02537000
*                   IF NEWCCAT=ON THEN                             1017 02538000
         TM    NEWCCAT,B'10000000'                                 1017 02539000

*                     DO;                                          1018 02541000
*                       LALOCCTR=LALOCCTR+1;/*               @YM08159*/ 02542000

*                       EVAL(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTDDINO=LALOCCTR; 1020 02546000

         STH   @11,SCTDDINO(,@12)                                  1020 02550000
*                       RETURN;                                    1021 02551000
         B     @EL00012                                            1021 02552000
*                     END;                                         1022 02553000
*                 END;              /* CLOSE ERROR DO        @YM08668*/ 02554000
@RF01017 DS    0H                                                  1024 02555000
*               NEXTSIOT=(CURNSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* PICK UP ADDR   02556000
*                                      OF THE NEXT SIOT ON THE CHAIN */ 02557000
@RF01013 L     @12,REALADD-1                                       1024 02558000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1024 02559000

         ICM   @09,7,SCTPSIOT(@11)                                 1024 02563000
         ST    @09,NEXTSIOT                                        1024 02564000
*               IF NEXTSIOT=SAVEL THEN/* IF THE NEXT SIOT ON THE   1025 02565000
*                                      CHAIN IS THE LAST,TEST FOR  1025 02566000
*                                      ERROR NOW....                 */ 02567000

*                 IF EVAL(NEXTSIOT+REALADD)->SCTDDNAM=DSDRDNAM THEN    02572000
         ALR   @09,@12                                             1026 02573000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@09),DSDRDNAM(IOBUFAD)                   1026 02574000
         BE    @RF01026                                            1026 02575000
*                   DO;                                            1027 02576000
*                     CALL NOMATCH; /* GO BUILD IF DYNAMIC, OR PUT 1028 02577000
*                                      OUT ERROR MSG IF NOT  @YM07048*/ 02578000
         BAL   @14,NOMATCH                                         1028 02579000
*                     PROCSIOT=NEWSIOT;/* IF RETURN WAS MADE FROM  1029 02580000
*                                      NOMATCH,SET UP PTR TO NEW SIOT*/ 02581000
         L     @12,NEWSIOT-1                                       1029 02582000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1029 02583000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1029 02584000
*                     RETURN;                                      1030 02585000
         B     @EL00012                                            1030 02586000
*                   END;                                           1031 02587000
*                                                                  1031 02588000
*/* OTHERWISE, RECHAINING TAKES PLACE TO KEEP THE SIOT THAT          */ 02589000
*/* MATCHES (WHEN IT IS FOUND) IN THE PROPER PLACE ON CHAIN          */ 02590000
*                                                                  1032 02591000
*               EVAL(SCTLSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT=CURNSIOT;/* MAKE THE   02592000
*                                      OLD LAST ENTRY POINT TO THE 1032 02593000
*                                      NEW LAST ENTRY                */ 02594000
@RF01026 DS    0H                                                  1032 02595000
@RF01025 L     @12,CURNSIOT                                        1032 02596000

*               SCTLSIOT=CURNSIOT;  /* POINT SCT TO NEW LAST         */ 02604000

*                 DO;               /* IF THIS IS THE FIRST SIOT, AND   02611000

*                                      FOR FIRST SIOT                */ 02613000

*                   PROCSIOT=ZEROPTR;/* RESET PROCSIOT FOR TOP       */ 02621000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1038 02622000
*                 END;                                             1039 02623000
*                                                                  1039 02624000
*/* IF THIS WAS NOT THE FIRST OR THE LAST, ADJUST TO NEXT SIOT       */ 02625000
*                                                                  1040 02626000
*               ELSE                                               1040 02627000
*                 EVAL(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT=NEXTSIOT;/* PICK     02628000
*                                      UP THE NEW SIOT ADDRESS FOR 1040 02629000

*             END;                                                 1041 02636000

*         END;                                                     1042 02638000
@RC01007 DS    0H                                                  1042 02639000

         BNO   @DL01000                                            1042 02641000
*       END;                                                       1043 02642000
*   IF EVAL(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SIOTJSCT=ON/*                 @YM07584*/ 02643000
*     THEN                                                         1044 02644000

         STH   @09,SCTDDINO(,@12)                                  1047 02659000
*       IGNORE=ON;                  /* TELL MERGMAIN TO IGNORE THIS     02660000
*                                      JOBCAT OR STEPCAT SIOT        */ 02661000

*     END;                                                         1049 02663000
*   END SIOTSCAN;                                                  1050 02664000
         B     @EL00012                                            1050 02665000
*SIOTPROC:                                                         1051 02666000
*   PROC;                                                          1051 02667000
*                                                                  1051 02668000
SIOTPROC STM   @14,@12,@SA00013                                    1051 02669000
*/*************************************************************      */ 02670000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE PERFORMS THE NECESSARY UPDATES TO THE SIOT        */ 02671000
*/*    AFTER A MATCH TO THE DSDR HAS BEEN MADE.  THIS PROC IS        */ 02672000
*/*    CALLED BY MERGMAIN.  THE SVA OF THE SIOT TO BE UPDATED        */ 02673000
*/*    IS THE VARIABLE PROCSIOT PRODUCED BY THE PROC SIOTSCAN.       */ 02674000
*/*************************************************************      */ 02675000
*                                                                  1052 02676000
*   SWVA=PROCSIOT;                  /* SVA FOR READ                  */ 02677000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1052 02678000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),PROCSIOT+1                              1052 02679000
*   CALL READSWA;                   /* GET SIOT VIA SWAMGR           */ 02680000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         1053 02681000
*   SIOTPTR=SWBLKPTR;               /* ADDRESSABILITY SIOT           */ 02682000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1054 02683000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  1054 02684000
         ST    @12,SIOTPTR                                         1054 02685000
*   IF RESTYPE=ON THEN              /* IF DEFERRED, TEST DDNAME FOR     02686000
*                                      AUTO AFTER DEFERRED SETUP   1055 02687000
*                                                            @YM08167*/ 02688000
         TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 1055 02689000
         BNO   @RF01055                                            1055 02690000
*     IF SCTDDNAM=SAVEDD THEN       /* IS THE ENTRY FOR CKPT DS ?    */ 02691000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@12),SAVEDD                              1056 02692000
         BNE   @RF01056                                            1056 02693000
*       JCTCKTTR=SCTPJFCB;          /* STORE JFCB ADDR               */ 02694000
         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          1057 02695000
         MVC   JCTCKTTR(3,@11),SCTPJFCB(@12)                       1057 02696000
*   SWVA=SCTPJFCB;                  /* SET UP FOR JFCB READ          */ 02697000
@RF01056 DS    0H                                                  1058 02698000
@RF01055 L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1058 02699000
         L     @11,SIOTPTR                                         1058 02700000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTPJFCB(@11)                           1058 02701000
*   CALL READSWA;                   /* READ MATCHING JFCB            */ 02702000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         1059 02703000
*   JFCBPTR=SWBLKPTR;               /* ADDRESSABILITY FOR JFCB       */ 02704000

*   LALOCCTR=LALOCCTR+1;            /* KEEP ACCURATE COUNT OF DD'S   */ 02708000
         LA    @12,1                                               1061 02709000

*   SCTDDINO=LALOCCTR;              /* INSURE INCREMENTAL,ASCENDING     02712000
*                                      INTERNAL DD NUMBERS.          */ 02713000
         L     @11,SIOTPTR                                         1062 02714000

*   DJFCBPTR=ADDR(DSDRJFCB);        /* ADDRABILITY FOR DSDR JFCB     */ 02716000
         LA    @12,DSDRJFCB(,IOBUFAD)                              1063 02717000

*   IF DSDRCCAT=ON THEN             /* IF THE CONCAT INDICATOR WAS   */ 02719000

*     SIOTCCAT=ON;                  /* SET AT CHKPT, TURN IT ON FOR     02722000
*                                      ALLOCATION.                   */ 02723000

*   SCTSDISP=DSDRDISP;              /* RESTORE DISPOSITION FIELD     */ 02726000
@RF01064 L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1066 02727000
         MVC   SCTSDISP(1,@12),DSDRDISP(IOBUFAD)                   1066 02728000
*   SCTSBYT3=DSDRBYT3;              /* RESTORE STATUS FIELD          */ 02729000
         MVC   SCTSBYT3(1,@12),DSDRBYT3(IOBUFAD)                   1067 02730000
*   SIOTALTD=DSDRALTD;              /* RESTORE ALTERNATE DISP FIELD  */ 02731000
         MVC   SIOTALTD(1,@12),DSDRALTD(IOBUFAD)                   1068 02732000
*   IF DSDROCKP=ON THEN             /* RESTORE OPEN-AT-CHKPT BIT FOR */ 02733000
         TM    DSDROCKP(IOBUFAD),B'00100000'                       1069 02734000

*     SIOTOCKP=ON;                  /* RESTART SVC IF NECESSARY.     */ 02736000
         OI    SIOTOCKP(@12),B'10000000'                           1070 02737000
*   IF(SIOVAMDS=NOTON               /* UNITTYPE FIELD WILL NOT BE    */ 02738000
*       &SIOTSSDS=NOTON)            /* OVERLAYED FROM THE DSDR FOR   */ 02739000
*     THEN                                                         1071 02740000

         BNZ   @RF01071                                            1071 02745000
*     CALL UTYPPROC;                /* VAM DATASETS OR SUB-SYSTEM DS */ 02746000
         BAL   @14,UTYPPROC                                        1072 02747000
*   IF(SCTVREF=ON                   /* ONLY LEAVE VOL REF VALID IF   */ 02748000
*       &SCTVOLAF=ON                /* REQUESTED AND NO VOLUMES ARE  */ 02749000
*       &(DJFCBPTR->JFCBVOLS(1)=FOXES|/*                     @YM08115*/ 02750000
*       DJFCBPTR->JFCBVOLS(1)=BLANKS))/* SHOWN IN THE JFCB (OR FFTTR    02751000
*                                      EXISTS)                       */ 02752000
*     THEN                                                         1073 02753000
@RF01071 L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1073 02754000
         TM    SCTVREF(@12),B'00010000'                            1073 02755000
         BNO   @RF01073                                            1073 02756000
         TM    SCTVOLAF(@12),B'00100000'                           1073 02757000
         BNO   @RF01073                                            1073 02758000
         L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1073 02759000
         CLI   JFCBVOLS(@12),X'FF'                                 1073 02760000
         BE    @RT01073                                            1073 02761000
         L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1073 02762000
         CLI   JFCBVOLS(@12),C' '                                  1073 02763000
         BNE   @RF01073                                            1073 02764000
@RT01073 DS    0H                                                  1074 02765000
*     SCTDSNRF=NOTON;                                              1074 02766000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1074 02767000
         NI    SCTDSNRF(@12),B'01111111'                           1074 02768000
*   ELSE                                                           1075 02769000
*     IF SCTVOLAF=ON THEN                                          1075 02770000
         B     @RC01073                                            1075 02771000
@RF01073 L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1075 02772000
         TM    SCTVOLAF(@12),B'00100000'                           1075 02773000
         BNO   @RF01075                                            1075 02774000
*       DO;                         /* DO NOT PROCESS UNLESS VOLREF     02775000
*                                      WAS DIS-ALLOWED       @YM07546*/ 02776000
*         SCTVREF=NOTON;            /* TURN OFF VREF/SUBALLOC      1077 02777000
*                                                            @YM04969*/ 02778000
*         SCTDSNRF=NOTON;                                          1078 02779000
         NI    SCTVREF(@12),B'01101111'                            1078 02780000
*         SCTVOLAF=NOTON;           /* TURN OFF ALL INDICATORS       */ 02781000

*         SIOTDEVT=DSDRUTYP;        /* OVERLAY UNITTYPE      @YM06084*/ 02783000

*         SIOUCNVT=0;               /* SHOW CONVERSION DONE          */ 02785000

*         SIOUCBAD=ZEROPTR;         /* ZERO UCBADDR          @YM06084*/ 02787000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1082 02788000

*         CALL BITSOFF;             /* CHECK FOR BAD BITS    @YM06574*/ 02790000
         BAL   @14,BITSOFF                                         1083 02791000
*       END;                                                       1084 02792000
*                                                                  1084 02793000
*/* NEW DATA SETS WITH NO DISPOSITION WILL BE MARKED DELETE          */ 02794000
*                                                                  1085 02795000
*   IF SCTSNEW=ON THEN                                             1085 02796000

*                                                                  1091 02817000

*/* HANDLE PUBLIC/PRIVATE DECISION FOR TAPES                         */ 02819000
*                                                                  1092 02820000
*   IF(DSDRTAPE=ON                  /* IS THIS TAPE                  */ 02821000
*       &SIOTPRIV=ON)              /* AND PRIV NOT REQ      @YM08162*/ 02822000

@RF01089 DS    0H                                                  1092 02825000

         OI    SIOTNPRV(@12),B'00010000'                           1093 02835000
*/**************************************************************     */ 02836000
*/* SHOULD THE DATA SET'S STATUS BE CHANGED FROM NEW TO OLD ??       */ 02837000
*/**************************************************************     */ 02838000
*/**************************************                             */ 02839000
*/* HASP EXPECTS SYSOUT TO LOOK OLD...                               */ 02840000
*/**************************************                             */ 02841000
*                                                                  1094 02842000
*   IF SCTSYSOU=ON THEN             /* IS THIS SYSOUT REQUEST      1094 02843000
*                                                            @ZA06466*/ 02844000

         TM    SCTSYSOU(@12),B'00001000'                           1094 02846000
         BNO   @RF01094                                            1094 02847000
*     IF RESTYPE=NOTON THEN         /* IS RESTART DEFERRED   @ZA06466*/ 02848000

         BNZ   @RF01095                                            1095 02850000
*       DO;                         /* SETUP FOR AUTORESTART @ZA06466*/ 02851000
*         SCTSNEW=NOTON;            /* TURN NEW OFF FOR JES  @ZA06466*/ 02852000
*         SCTSOLD=ON;               /* TURN OLD ON FOR JES   @ZA06466*/ 02853000

*       END;                        /*                       @ZA06466*/ 02856000
*     ELSE                          /* RESTART IS DEFERRED   @ZA06466*/ 02857000
*       DO;                         /* SETUP FOR DEFERRED    @ZA06466*/ 02858000

*             /*                                                     */ 02890000

*             /* NO-VOLS                                             */ 02893000

*               SCTVOLCT=DJFCBPTR->JFCBNVOL;/* REPLACE VOL CT      1113 02902000

*           IF SIOUCBAD=0 THEN     /* NOT SCRATCHED                 */ 02921000

*             DO;                                                  1119 02927000
*               SCTSNEW=NOTON;      /* TURN OFF NEW                  */ 02928000
*               SCTSOLD=ON;         /* TURN ON OLD                   */ 02929000

*             END;                                                 1124 02940000
*           ELSE                                                   1125 02941000
*             ;                     /* CLOSE SIOUCBAD = 0           */ 02942000
@RF01118 DS    0H                                                  1126 02943000
*         ELSE                                                     1126 02944000

         BNH   @RF01126                                            1126 02949000
*             DO;                   /* OTHER NEW DATASETS WITH       */ 02950000
*               SCTSNEW=NOTON;      /* VOLUMES BECOME OLD.           */ 02951000
*               SCTSOLD=ON;                                        1129 02952000

*             END;                                                 1131 02960000
*     END;                                                         1132 02961000
*   ELSE                                                           1133 02962000

*     SCTVOLCT=0;                   /* FORCE CATALOG RETRIEVE        */ 02979000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1136 02980000

*   IF SCTUTYPE=BLANKS THEN         /* NO UNIT SPECIFIED ?   @YM07591*/ 02982000

*     DO;                                                          1138 02986000

*       SIOUCNVT=0;                 /* SHOW CONVERTED        @YM07591*/ 02989000

*       SIOUCBAD=ZEROPTR;           /* ZERO UCB              @YM07591*/ 02991000

         STCM  @11,7,SIOUCBAD(@12)                                 1141 02993000
*       CALL BITSOFF;               /* INSURE EDT MATCH      @YM07591*/ 02994000
         BAL   @14,BITSOFF                                         1142 02995000
*     END;                                                         1143 02996000
*   IF SCTSGDGS=NOTON THEN          /* DONT WORRY ABOUT CATALOG FOR     02997000
*                                      GDG SINGLE            @YM07511*/ 02998000
@RF01137 L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1144 02999000
         TM    SCTSGDGS(@12),B'10000000'                           1144 03000000
         BNZ   @RF01144                                            1144 03001000
*     IF(DJFCBPTR->JFCGDG=ON        /* IF THIS IS GDG MOTHER SET UP  */ 03002000
*         &DJFCBPTR->JFCENT=NOTON)  /* TO CAUSE HOUSEKEEPING TO USE     03003000
*                                      THE CATALOG                   */ 03004000
*       THEN                                                       1145 03005000

         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1145 03009000

*       DO;                                                        1146 03012000
*         JFCBNVOL=0;               /* ZERO OUT NUM OF VOLS          */ 03013000
         L     @11,JFCBPTR                                         1147 03014000
         MVI   JFCBNVOL(@11),X'00'                                 1147 03015000
*         JFCBVLCT=ONEVOL;          /* VOLUME COUNT TO ONE           */ 03016000
         MVI   JFCBVLCT(@11),X'01'                                 1148 03017000
*         JFCAVOLS(1)=BLANKS;       /* SET FIRST VOLSER TO BLANK.    */ 03018000
         MVC   JFCAVOLS(6,@11),@CC03776                            1149 03019000
*         SIOTVLCT=ONEVOL;          /* SIOT AND JFCB AGREE           */ 03020000
         MVI   SIOTVLCT(@12),X'01'                                 1150 03021000
*         SCTVOLCT=0;               /* CATALOG TRIGGER       @YM08169*/ 03022000
         MVI   SCTVOLCT(@12),X'00'                                 1151 03023000
*         JFCCAT=NOTON;             /* MAKE HSKEEP RETURN INFO-    1152 03024000
*                                      MATION IF GDGALL      @ZA12714*/ 03025000
         NI    JFCCAT(@11),B'01111111'                             1152 03026000
*       END;                                                       1153 03027000
*   END SIOTPROC;                                                  1154 03028000
@EL00013 DS    0H                                                  1154 03029000
@EF00013 DS    0H                                                  1154 03030000
@ER00013 LM    @14,@12,@SA00013                                    1154 03031000
         BR    @14                                                 1154 03032000
*UTYPPROC:                                                         1155 03033000
*   PROC;                                                          1155 03034000
*                                                                  1155 03035000
UTYPPROC STM   @14,@12,@SA00014                                    1155 03036000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03037000
*/* THIS PROC DECIDES WHETHER TO USE THE UNIT TYPE FOUND IN THE JCL  */ 03038000
*/* OR USE THE UNIT TYPE FOUND IN THE SIOT IN SWA.                   */ 03039000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03040000
*                                                                  1156 03041000
*   IF(SCTUNAFF=ON                  /* IF UNIT AFFINITY WAS        1156 03042000
*                                      ORIGINALLY REQUESTED...       */ 03043000
*       &SIOTUNAF=0) THEN           /* BUT DDNTPROC DETECTED THAT THE   03044000
*                                      AFFINITY WAS INVALID...       */ 03045000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1156 03046000
         TM    SCTUNAFF(@12),B'00000010'                           1156 03047000
         BNO   @RF01156                                            1156 03048000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1156 03049000
         CH    @11,SIOTUNAF(,@12)                                  1156 03050000
         BNE   @RF01156                                            1156 03051000
*     DO;                           /* INDICATE THAT THE DD NUMBER 1157 03052000
*                                      WAS NOT FOUND AND THE AFFINITY   03053000
*                                      REQUESTED IS ALLOWED.       1157 03054000
*                                      OTHERWISE....                 */ 03055000
*       SCTUNAFF=NOTON;             /* TURN OFF UNIT AFF REQUEST     */ 03056000
         NI    SCTUNAFF(@12),B'11111101'                           1158 03057000
*       SIOTUNAF=0;                 /* TAKE OUT THE DD NUM.          */ 03058000
         STH   @11,SIOTUNAF(,@12)                                  1159 03059000
*       JFCBUAFF=NOTON;             /* TURN OFF REQUEST IN JFCB      */ 03060000
         L     @09,JFCBPTR                                         1160 03061000
         NI    JFCBUAFF(@09),B'11111110'                           1160 03062000
*       SIOTDEVT=DSDRUTYP;          /* OVERLAY UNITTYPE WITH DSDR. 1161 03063000
*                                      (RESTORES UNIT THAT WAS IN  1161 03064000
*                                      EFFECT AT CHKPT TIME.)        */ 03065000
         MVC   SIOTDEVT(4,@12),DSDRUTYP(IOBUFAD)                   1161 03066000
*       SIOUCNVT=0;                 /* TELL HSKP'ING THAT CONVERSION    03067000
*                                      HAS ALREADY BEEN DONE         */ 03068000
         MVI   SIOUCNVT(@12),X'00'                                 1162 03069000
*       SIOUCBAD=ZEROPTR;           /* ZERO OUT UCB POINTER          */ 03070000
         STCM  @11,7,SIOUCBAD(@12)                                 1163 03071000
*       CALL BITSOFF;               /* TURN OFF UNNEEDED BITS      1164 03072000
*                                                            @YM06547*/ 03073000
         BAL   @14,BITSOFF                                         1164 03074000
*     END;                                                         1165 03075000
*                                                                  1165 03076000
*/* DO NOT ALLOW TAPE DATASETS THAT WERE WRITTEN AT 1600 OR 6250     */ 03077000
*/*    DEFAULT DENSITY TO REVERT TO ANOTHER DENSITY AT RESTART.      */ 03078000
*                                                                  1166 03079000
*   ELSE                                                           1166 03080000
*     DO;                                                          1166 03081000
         B     @RC01156                                            1166 03082000
@RF01156 DS    0H                                                  1167 03083000
*       DJFCBPTR=ADDR(DSDRJFCB);    /* INSURE ADDR'ABILITY FOR DSDR  */ 03084000
         LA    @12,DSDRJFCB(,IOBUFAD)                              1167 03085000
         ST    @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1167 03086000
*       IF S3400DSP=NOTON THEN      /* S3400DSP OFF AT CHECKPOINT  1168 03087000
*                                                            @ZA13854*/ 03088000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1168 03089000
         TM    S3400DSP(@12),B'01000000'                           1168 03090000
         BNZ   @RF01168                                            1168 03091000
*         S3400OFF=ON;              /* TELL ALLOC TO INITIALIZE    1169 03092000
*                                      S3400DSP TO OFF       @ZA13854*/ 03093000
         OI    S3400OFF(@12),B'00010000'                           1169 03094000
*       IF(SCTUTYPE(1:6)=TWTYFOUR)|(SCTUTYPE(1:6)=TWTYFOR3)|(SCTUTYPE(1 03095000
*           :6)=TRTYFOR3) THEN                                     1170 03096000
@RF01168 L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1170 03097000
         CLC   SCTUTYPE(6,@12),@CC03909                            1170 03098000
         BE    @RT01170                                            1170 03099000
         CLC   SCTUTYPE(6,@12),@CC03911                            1170 03100000
         BE    @RT01170                                            1170 03101000
         CLC   SCTUTYPE(6,@12),@CC03913                            1170 03102000
         BNE   @RF01170                                            1170 03103000
@RT01170 DS    0H                                                  1171 03104000
*         DO;                       /* IF 2400,2400-3,OR3400-3...    */ 03105000
*           IF SCTUTYPE(1:6)=TWTYFOUR THEN                         1172 03106000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1172 03107000
         CLC   SCTUTYPE(6,@12),@CC03909                            1172 03108000
         BNE   @RF01172                                            1172 03109000
*             IF DJFCBPTR->JFCDEN='C3'X THEN                       1173 03110000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1173 03111000
         CLI   JFCDEN(@11),X'C3'                                   1173 03112000
         BNE   @RF01173                                            1173 03113000
*               DO;                 /* 2400 WRITTEN AT 1600 BPI MUST    03114000
*                                      BE RESTORED FROM THE DSDR.    */ 03115000
*                 SIOTDEVT=DSDRUTYP;/* OVERLAY UNIT TYPE             */ 03116000
         MVC   SIOTDEVT(4,@12),DSDRUTYP(IOBUFAD)                   1175 03117000
*                 SIOUCNVT=0;       /* SHOW CONVERSION IS DONE       */ 03118000
         MVI   SIOUCNVT(@12),X'00'                                 1176 03119000
*                 SIOUCBAD=ZEROPTR; /* ZERO OUT UCB POINTER          */ 03120000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1177 03121000
         STCM  @11,7,SIOUCBAD(@12)                                 1177 03122000
*                 CALL BITSOFF;     /* TURN OFF UNNEEDED BITS      1178 03123000
*                                                            @YM06547*/ 03124000
         BAL   @14,BITSOFF                                         1178 03125000
*               END;                                               1179 03126000
*             ELSE                                                 1180 03127000
*               ;                                                  1180 03128000
@RF01173 DS    0H                                                  1181 03129000
*           ELSE                                                   1181 03130000
*             IF DJFCBPTR->JFCDEN='D3'X THEN                       1181 03131000
         B     @RC01172                                            1181 03132000
@RF01172 L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1181 03133000
         CLI   JFCDEN(@12),X'D3'                                   1181 03134000
         BNE   @RF01181                                            1181 03135000
*               DO;                 /* 2400-3 OR 3400-3 WRITTEN AT 1182 03136000
*                                      6250 BPI MUST BE RESTORED FROM   03137000
*                                      THE DSDR.                     */ 03138000
*                 SIOTDEVT=DSDRUTYP;/* OVERLAY UNIT TYPE             */ 03139000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1183 03140000
         MVC   SIOTDEVT(4,@12),DSDRUTYP(IOBUFAD)                   1183 03141000
*                 SIOUCNVT=0;       /* SHOW CONVERSION IS DONE.      */ 03142000
         MVI   SIOUCNVT(@12),X'00'                                 1184 03143000
*                 SIOUCBAD=ZEROPTR; /* ZERO OUT UCB POINTER          */ 03144000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1185 03145000

*                 CALL BITSOFF;     /* TURN OFF UNNEEDED BITS      1186 03147000
*                                                            @YM06547*/ 03148000
         BAL   @14,BITSOFF                                         1186 03149000
*               END;                                               1187 03150000
*         END;                                                     1188 03151000
*                                                                  1188 03152000
*/* IN OTHER CASES, THE ELIGIBLE DEVICES TABLE WILL BE SEARCHED      */ 03153000
*/*   TO DETERMINE  IF THERE ARE GENERIC GROUPING PROBLEMS.          */ 03154000
*                                                                  1189 03155000
*       ELSE                                                       1189 03156000
*         DO;                                                      1189 03157000

*           EDTPTR=ADDR(EDTTAB);    /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR EDT          */ 03160000

*           LUVPTR=EDTLUVSP+LENGTH(LUVHDR);/* INIT SEARCH PTR.       */ 03163000

*           DO I=1 TO LUVENTNO-1 WHILE SCTUTYPE=UNITNAME;         1192 03167000

*             LUVPTR=LUVPTR+LUVENTLN;/* UPDATE PTR TO NEXT ENTRY     */ 03174000

*           END;                                                   1194 03179000

@DC01192 DS    0H                                                  1195 03188000
*           IF(SCTUTYPE=UNITNAME    /* WAS MATCH FOUND? (IF NOT, THE    03189000
*                                      REQUEST WAS SPECIFIC).        */ 03190000
*               &LUVGENNO>ONEHEX    /* MORE THAN ONE GENERIC IN GRP? */ 03191000
*               &LUVMGENS=ON)      /* AND CROSS-ALLOCATION IS NOT 1195 03192000
*                                      ALLOWED, THEN OVERLAY IS NEC. */ 03193000
*             THEN                                                 1195 03194000
         L     @12,SIOTPTR                                         1195 03195000
         L     @11,LUVPTR                                          1195 03196000
         CLC   SCTUTYPE(8,@12),UNITNAME(@11)                       1195 03197000

*             DO;                                                  1196 03204000
*               SIOTDEVT=DSDRUTYP;  /* OVERLAY UNITTYPE              */ 03205000

*               SIOUCNVT=0;         /* SHOW CONVERSION DONE.         */ 03207000

*               CALL BITSOFF;       /* TURN OFF UNNEEDED BITS      1200 03212000

         BAL   @14,BITSOFF                                         1200 03214000
*             END;                                                 1201 03215000
*         END;                                                     1202 03216000
*     END;                                                         1203 03217000

@EF00014 DS    0H                                                  1204 03220000

*JFCBPROC:                                                         1205 03223000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 1205 03224000
*                                                                  1205 03225000
JFCBPROC STM   @14,@06,@SA00015                                    1205 03226000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00015+36                                 1205 03227000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03228000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE RESTORES ALL FIELDS FROM THE JFCB ON THE CKPT     */ 03229000
*/* EXCEPT THE VOLUME INFORMATION...WHICH IS DONE IN 'VOLSERS'       */ 03230000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03231000
*                                                                  1206 03232000

*     JFCBEFLG CHAR(1) BDY(BYTE);   /* TEMP JFCBEXTP FLAG    @Z40MPSJ*/ 03234000

*   JFCBTENQ=DJFCBPTR->JFCBIND2;    /* SAVE FOR ENQ          @ZA07018*/ 03243000

*             CALL READSWA;         /* READ SWA BLK          @Z40MPSJ*/ 03835000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         1364 03836000
*             JFCBEPTR=SWBLKPTR;    /* ESTABLISH ADDR        @Z40MPSJ*/ 03837000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1365 03838000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  1365 03839000
         ST    @12,JFCBEPTR                                        1365 03840000
*           END;                    /*                       @Z40MPSJ*/ 03841000
*         PREV=ADDR(JFCBEXTR);      /* RESET CHAIN LINK PTR  @Z40MPSJ*/ 03842000
@RC01347 MVC   PREV(3),JFCBEPTR+1                                  1367 03843000
*         IF DJFCXPTR->JFCBEXTR=ZEROPTR                            1368 03844000
*                                                                  1368 03845000
*         /***********************************************************/ 03846000
*         /*                                                         */ 03847000
*         /* IF DSDR HAS NO MORE JFCBES                      @Z40MPSJ*/ 03848000
*         /*                                                         */ 03849000
*         /***********************************************************/ 03850000
*                                                                  1368 03851000
*           THEN                    /*                       @Z40MPSJ*/ 03852000
         L     @12,DJFCXPTR                                        1368 03853000
         ICM   @11,7,JFCBEXTR(@12)                                 1368 03854000
         BNZ   @RF01368                                            1368 03855000
*           STPXLOOP=ON;            /* STOP PROCESSING       @Z40MPSJ*/ 03856000
         OI    STPXLOOP,B'10000000'                                1369 03857000
*       END;                        /*                       @Z40MPSJ*/ 03858000
@RF01368 DS    0H                                                  1370 03859000
@DE01343 TM    STPXLOOP,B'10000000'                                1370 03860000
         BZ    @DL01343                                            1370 03861000
*     END;                          /*                       @Z40MPSJ*/ 03862000
*   END JFCBEPRC;                   /*                       @Z40MPSJ*/ 03863000
@EL00016 DS    0H                                                  1372 03864000
@EF00016 DS    0H                                                  1372 03865000
@ER00016 LM    @14,@06,@SA00016                                    1372 03866000
         LM    @08,@12,@SA00016+36                                 1372 03867000
         BR    @14                                                 1372 03868000
*VOLSERS:                                                          1373 03869000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 1373 03870000
*                                                                  1373 03871000
VOLSERS  STM   @14,@06,@SA00017                                    1373 03872000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00017+36                                 1373 03873000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03874000
*/* THE FOLLOWING FIELDS ARE CONSIDERED IN THIS PROC:                */ 03875000
*/*  JFCBNVOL,JFCBVOLS AND JFCBVLCT                                  */ 03876000
*/* FOR AUTO RESTART, ALL FIELDS WILL BE MERGED FROM THE DSDR TO     */ 03877000
*/*     THE JFCB.  FOR DEFERRED, VOLSERS IN THE JFCB WILL BE         */ 03878000
*/*     LEFT INTACT.  ANY VOLSERS BEYOND THE NUMBER IN THE JFCB      */ 03879000
*/*      WILL BE APPENDED FROM THE DSDR(S).                          */ 03880000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03881000
*                                                                  1374 03882000
*   TYPE2PTR=IOBUFAD;               /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR TYPE 2 DSDR  */ 03883000
         ST    IOBUFAD,TYPE2PTR                                    1374 03884000
*   DJFCXPTR=ADDR(DSDJFCBX);        /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR DSDR JFCBX   */ 03885000
         L     @12,TYPE2PTR                                        1375 03886000
         LA    @12,DSDJFCBX(,@12)                                  1375 03887000
         ST    @12,DJFCXPTR                                        1375 03888000
*   IF RESTYPE=NOTON THEN           /* AUTO RESTART...EVERYTHING WILL   03889000
*                                      BE BROUGHT OVER FROM THE DSDR    03890000
*                                      TO THE JFCB.                  */ 03891000
         TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 1376 03892000
         BNZ   @RF01376                                            1376 03893000
*     DO;                                                          1377 03894000
*       JFCBNVOL=DJFCBPTR->JFCBNVOL;/* SET NUMBER OF SPECIFIC VOLS TO   03895000
*                                      NUMBER AT CHKPT.              */ 03896000
         L     @12,JFCBPTR                                         1378 03897000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1378 03898000
         MVC   JFCBNVOL(1,@12),JFCBNVOL(@11)                       1378 03899000
*       JFCBVLCT=DJFCBPTR->JFCBVLCT;/* SET TOTAL NUMBER OF REQUESTED    03900000
*                                      VOLS TO NUM. AT CHKPT.        */ 03901000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1379 03902000
         MVC   JFCBVLCT(1,@12),JFCBVLCT(@11)                       1379 03903000
*       JFCBVOLS=DJFCBPTR->JFCBVOLS;/* MERGE THE FIRST 5 VOLSERS.    */ 03904000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1380 03905000
         MVC   JFCBVOLS(30,@12),JFCBVOLS(@11)                      1380 03906000
*       IF JFCBEXAD=0 THEN         /* IF NVOL IS NOT< 6 THEN THERE     03907000
*                                      ARE JFCBXS TO PROCESS.        */ 03908000
         L     @11,JFCBEXAD-1(,@12)                                1381 03909000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1381 03910000
         LTR   @11,@11                                             1381 03911000
         BZ    @RF01381                                            1381 03912000
*         DO;                                                      1382 03913000
*           PREV=ADDR(JFCBEXAD);    /* USED BY JFCBXJOB FOR CHAINING */ 03914000
         LA    @12,JFCBEXAD(,@12)                                  1383 03915000
         STCM  @12,7,PREV                                          1383 03916000
*           SWAXADD=JFCBEXAD;       /* ADDRESS OF SWA JFCBX (IF ANY) */ 03917000
         STCM  @11,7,SWAXADD                                       1384 03918000
*           CALL JFCBXJOB;          /* DO THE JFCBX PROCESSING.      */ 03919000
         BAL   @14,JFCBXJOB                                        1385 03920000
*         END;                                                     1386 03921000
*     END;                                                         1387 03922000
*                                                                  1387 03923000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03924000
*/* REMAINDER OF PROCEDURE IS FOR DEFERRED RESTARTS.                 */ 03925000
*/**************************************************************     */ 03926000
*                                                                  1388 03927000
*   ELSE                                                           1388 03928000
*     DO;                                                          1388 03929000
         B     @RC01376                                            1388 03930000
@RF01376 DS    0H                                                  1389 03931000
*       IF DJFCBPTR->JFCBNVOL>JFCBNVOL/* ONLY PROCESS EXTRA VOLUMES  */ 03932000
*         THEN                      /* FROM THE DSDR IS THERE ARE    */ 03933000
         L     @12,JFCBPTR                                         1389 03934000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1389 03935000
         CLC   JFCBNVOL(1,@11),JFCBNVOL(@12)                       1389 03936000
         BNH   @RF01389                                            1389 03937000
*         DO;                       /* MORE ON THE DSDR THAN JFCB    */ 03938000
*           SAVEVOL=JFCBNVOL;       /* SAVEVOL REPRESENTS THE NUMBER    03939000
*                                      OF VOLSERS THAT WILL NOT BE 1391 03940000
*                                      OVERLAYED.                    */ 03941000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1391 03942000
         IC    @11,JFCBNVOL(,@12)                                  1391 03943000
         STH   @11,SAVEVOL                                         1391 03944000
*           JFCBNVOL=DJFCBPTR->JFCBNVOL;/* MERGE NEW NVOL FROM DSDR     03945000
*                                      TO JFCB.                      */ 03946000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1392 03947000
         MVC   JFCBNVOL(1,@12),JFCBNVOL(@11)                       1392 03948000
*           IF DJFCBPTR->JFCBVLCT   /* THE VLCT MUST REFLECT THE     */ 03949000
*               >JFCBVLCT THEN      /* LARGEST USED VALUE, AS THE  1393 03950000
*                                      NUMBER OF JFCBX'S IS BASED ON    03951000
*                                      IT                            */ 03952000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1393 03953000
         CLC   JFCBVLCT(1,@11),JFCBVLCT(@12)                       1393 03954000
         BNH   @RF01393                                            1393 03955000
*             JFCBVLCT=DJFCBPTR->JFCBVLCT;                         1394 03956000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1394 03957000
         MVC   JFCBVLCT(1,@12),JFCBVLCT(@11)                       1394 03958000
*           IF SAVEVOL<SIX THEN     /* IF LESS THAN 6, VOLSERS ONLY     03959000
*                                      EXIST ON THE JFCB...NO NEED TO   03960000
*                                      SEARCH FOR JFCBX'S.           */ 03961000
@RF01393 LH    @12,SAVEVOL                                         1395 03962000
         C     @12,@CF02926                                        1395 03963000
         BNL   @RF01395                                            1395 03964000
*             DO;                                                  1396 03965000
*               XADD=DJFCBPTR->JFCBEXAD;/* NON-ZERO VALUE INDICATES     03966000
*                                      THERE ARE MORE JFCBX'S ON D.S.*/ 03967000
         L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1397 03968000
