*               DO I=1 TO 5;        /* THIS LOOP WILL NOT OVERLAY A     03970000
*                                      VOLSER IN THE JFCB. WHEN THE     03971000
*                                      JFCB GOES BLANK,ANY REMAINING    03972000
*                                      VOLSERS IN THE DSDR ARE     1398 03973000
*                                      BROUGHT OVER TO THE JFCB.     */ 03974000
         LA    @12,1                                               1398 03975000
         ST    @12,I                                               1398 03976000
@DL01398 DS    0H                                                  1399 03977000
*                 IF(JFCAVOLS(I)=BLANKS/* IF JFCB SLOT IS BLANK...   */ 03978000
*                     &DJFCBPTR->JFCAVOLS(I)=BLANKS)/* AND        1399 03979000
*                                      CORRESPONDING                 */ 03980000

*                   JFCAVOLS(I)=DJFCBPTR->JFCAVOLS(I);/* OVERLAY.    */ 03992000

         L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1400 03994000
         AL    @12,@TF00001                                        1400 03995000
         MVC   JFCAVOLS-6(6,@11),JFCAVOLS-6(@12)                   1400 03996000
*               END;                                               1401 03997000
@RF01399 LA    @12,1                                               1401 03998000
         AL    @12,I                                               1401 03999000
         ST    @12,I                                               1401 04000000
         C     @12,@CF00034                                        1401 04001000
         BNH   @DL01398                                            1401 04002000
*               IF XADD=0 THEN     /* THE JFCB HAD NO VOLSERS IN A     04003000
*                                      JFCBX. THE DSDR MAY HAVE SOME.   04004000
*                                      GO INSURE THAT THE PROPER   1402 04005000
*                                      AMOUNT OF JFCBX'S REACH SWA.     04006000
*                                      THIS CORRELATES TO THE NEW  1402 04007000
*                                      JFCBVLCT VALUE.               */ 04008000

         BZ    @RF01402                                            1402 04012000
*                 DO;                                              1403 04013000
*                   PREV=ADDR(JFCBEXAD);/* INPUT TO JFCBXJOB       1404 04014000
*                                      CHAINING.                     */ 04015000

*                   SWAXADD=JFCBEXAD;/* POINTER TO SWA JFCBX (IF ANY)*/ 04019000

*                   CALL JFCBXJOB;  /* GO PROCESS JFCBXS             */ 04021000

*                 END;                                             1407 04023000
*             END;                                                 1408 04024000
*           ELSE                                                   1409 04025000
*             DO;                                                  1409 04026000
*                                                                  1409 04027000

@RF01395 DS    0H                                                  1410 04029000
*               /*****************************************************/ 04030000
*               /*                                                   */ 04031000
*               /* REMAINDER OF PROCEDURE PROCESSES CASES WHERE THERE*/ 04032000

*               /*                                                   */ 04034000

*               DO WHILE SAVEVOL>FIVE;/* READ JFCBXS FROM SWA AND  1411 04041000

*               END;                                               1418 04062000

*               XADD=DJFCXPTR->JFCBXTTR;/* TO REMEMBER IF ANYMORE  1419 04066000

*               DO I=1 TO FIFTEEN;  /* DONT OVERLAY ANY SWA VOLSERS,    04070000
*                                      BUT PICK UP ANY EXTRAS ON DSDR*/ 04071000
         LA    @12,1                                               1420 04072000

@DL01420 DS    0H                                                  1421 04074000
*                 IF(JFCBXVOL(I)=BLANKS/* IF SWA VOLSER IS BLANK...  */ 04075000
*                     &DJFCXPTR->JFCBXVOL(I)=BLANKS)/* & DSDR     1421 04076000

*               END;                                               1423 04102000

*               IF XADD=0 THEN     /* IF THERE ARE MORE JFCBXS ON 1424 04108000

*JFCBXJOB:                                                         1434 04134000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 1434 04135000
*                                                                  1434 04136000
JFCBXJOB STM   @14,@06,@SA00018                                    1434 04137000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00018+36                                 1434 04138000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04139000
*/* THIS PROC PROCESSES THE VOLSERS IN JFCBXS AFTER IT HAS BEEN      */ 04140000
*/* DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE JFCBXS ON THE CKPT DS.  IF THERE       */ 04141000
*/* ARE JFCBXS EXISTING IN SWA, THEY WILL BE OVERLAYED RATHER        */ 04142000
*/* THAN ASSIGNING SPACE FOR NEW ONES.                               */ 04143000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04144000
*                                                                  1435 04145000
*   STPXLOOP=NOTON;                 /* LOOP CONTROL                  */ 04146000
         NI    STPXLOOP,B'01111111'                                1435 04147000
*   DO WHILE STPXLOOP=NOTON;                                       1436 04148000

@DL01436 DS    0H                                                  1437 04150000
*     CALL READCHEK;                /* GET JFCBX FROM CHKPT D.S.     */ 04151000
         BAL   @14,READCHEK                                        1437 04152000
*     TYPE2PTR=IOBUFAD;             /* REFRESH BUFFER POINTER        */ 04153000
         ST    IOBUFAD,TYPE2PTR                                    1438 04154000
*     DJFCXPTR=ADDR(DSDJFCBX);      /* RE-INITIALIZE DSDR ADDRABILITY*/ 04155000
         L     @12,TYPE2PTR                                        1439 04156000
         LA    @12,DSDJFCBX(,@12)                                  1439 04157000
         ST    @12,DJFCXPTR                                        1439 04158000
*     IF SWAXADD=0 THEN            /* A JFCBX EXISTS IN SWA. USE IT */ 04159000
         L     @12,SWAXADD-1                                       1440 04160000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1440 04161000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             1440 04162000
         BZ    @RF01440                                            1440 04163000
*       DO;                         /* INSTEAD OF ASSIGNING NEW SPACE*/ 04164000
*         SWVA=SWAXADD;             /* PREPARE FOR READ.             */ 04165000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1442 04166000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SWAXADD                                 1442 04167000
*         CALL READSWA;             /* READ SWA JFCBX.               */ 04168000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         1443 04169000
*         JFCBXPTR=SWBLKPTR;        /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR JFCBX.       */ 04170000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1444 04171000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  1444 04172000
         ST    @12,JFCBXPTR                                        1444 04173000
*         SWAXADD=JFCBXTTR;         /* FOR NEXT TIME THRU THE LOOP,     04174000
*                                      IF ANOTHER SWA JFCBX EXISTS.  */ 04175000
         MVC   SWAXADD(3),JFCBXTTR(@12)                            1445 04176000
*         DO I=1 TO FIFTEEN;        /* MOVE THE VOLSERS OVER.        */ 04177000
         LA    @12,1                                               1446 04178000
         ST    @12,I                                               1446 04179000
@DL01446 DS    0H                                                  1447 04180000
*           JFCBXVOL(I)=DJFCXPTR->JFCBXVOL(I);                     1447 04181000
         LR    @11,@12                                             1447 04182000
         MH    @11,@CH00035                                        1447 04183000
         L     @09,JFCBXPTR                                        1447 04184000

*         END;                                                     1448 04193000

         MVC   JFCBXDEV(4,@12),JFCBXDEV(@11)                       1449 04201000
*         JFCBXNAM=DJFCXPTR->JFCBXNAM;/* ALIAS NAME FROM CAT @YM08616*/ 04202000
         MVC   JFCBXNAM(44,@12),JFCBXNAM(@11)                      1450 04203000
*       END;                                                       1451 04204000
*     ELSE                                                         1452 04205000
*       DO;                         /* NO JFCBX IN SWA- ASSIGN ONE   */ 04206000
         B     @RC01440                                            1452 04207000
@RF01440 DS    0H                                                  1453 04208000
*         CALL ASGNPROC;            /* DO THE ASSIGN                 */ 04209000
         BAL   @14,ASGNPROC                                        1453 04210000
*         SLOT=ASGNADD;             /* PLUG IN NEW BLOCK - SLOT IS 1454 04211000
*                                      BASED ON PREV...              */ 04212000
         L     @12,PREV-1                                          1454 04213000
         MVC   SLOT(3,@12),ASGNADD                                 1454 04214000
*         SWAXADD=0;                /* LOOP CONTROL...PREVENTS SEARCH   04215000
*                                      FOR ANY MORE SWA JFCBX'S.     */ 04216000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1455 04217000

*         SWBUFPTR=DJFCXPTR;        /* PREPARE FOR WITE MOVE MODE    */ 04219000

*         SWROWVA=ASGNADD;          /* INPUT TO MOVE MODE            */ 04223000
         MVC   SWROWVA(3,@12),ASGNADD                              1457 04224000
*         SWWRTID=JFCBX1D;          /* SET JFCBX ID INTO INPUT       */ 04225000
         MVI   SWWRTID(@12),X'1D'                                  1458 04226000
*         CALL WRITESWA;            /* DO THE WRITE.                 */ 04227000
         BAL   @14,WRITESWA                                        1459 04228000
*         REALADD=LENGTH(SWAPFX);                                  1460 04229000
         LA    @12,16                                              1460 04230000
         STCM  @12,7,REALADD                                       1460 04231000
*         JFCBXPTR=(ASGNADD+REALADD);/* TRANSLATE PAST PREFIX...     */ 04232000
         L     @11,ASGNADD-1                                       1461 04233000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1461 04234000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             1461 04235000
         ST    @12,JFCBXPTR                                        1461 04236000
*       END;                                                       1462 04237000
*     PREV=ADDR(JFCBXTTR);          /* RE-SET BACK-LINK PTR          */ 04238000
@RC01440 L     @12,JFCBXPTR                                        1463 04239000
         STCM  @12,7,PREV                                          1463 04240000
*     IF(DJFCXPTR->JFCBXTTR=0       /* IF DSDR HAS NO JFCBX          */ 04241000
*         &JFCBXTTR=0) THEN         /* AND SWA HAS NO JFCBX          */ 04242000

*       DO;                         /*                       @YM08181*/ 04253000
*         STPXLOOP=ON;              /* STOP THE LOOP                 */ 04254000

*         SLOT=0;                                                  1467 04256000
         STCM  @11,7,SLOT(@12)                                     1467 04257000
*       END;                                                       1468 04258000
*     ELSE                                                         1469 04259000
*       IF(DJFCXPTR->JFCBXTTR=0     /* IF DSDR HAS NONE...           */ 04260000
*           &JFCBXTTR=0) THEN      /* BUT SWA DOES...               */ 04261000

@RF01464 SLR   @12,@12                                             1469 04263000

*         STPXLOOP=ON;              /* STOP THE LOOP BUT TEST        */ 04274000

*/***********************************************************@ZA20563*/ 04276000
*/*  CODE TO ZERO THE JFCBXTTR FIELD ON A DEFERRED CHECKPOINT@ZA20563*/ 04277000
*/*  RESTART WAS REMOVED TO ALLOW THE VOLUME COUNT TO BE     @ZA20563*/ 04278000
*/*  INCREASED WHEN THE JOB WAS RESUMED                      @ZA20563*/ 04279000

*   END;                                                           1471 04282000

*GDGNTJOB:                                                         1473 04293000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 1473 04294000
*                                                                  1473 04295000
GDGNTJOB STM   @14,@06,@SA00019                                    1473 04296000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00019+36                                 1473 04297000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04298000
*/* THE GDG NAME TABLE WILL BE MADE TO APPEAR AS IT DID AT THE       */ 04299000
*/* CHECKPOINT. NEW SPACE FOR A GDGNT WILL BE ASSIGNED ONLY IF       */ 04300000
*/* NONE EXISTS IN SWA TO BE OVERLAYED.                              */ 04301000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04302000
*                                                                  1474 04303000
*   TYPE3PTR=IOBUFAD;               /* ADDR'ABILITY TYPE3 DSDR       */ 04304000
         ST    IOBUFAD,TYPE3PTR                                    1474 04305000
*   DGDGPTR=ADDR(DSGDGNT);          /* ADDR'ABILITY DSDR GDGNT       */ 04306000
         L     @12,TYPE3PTR                                        1475 04307000
         LA    @12,DSGDGNT(,@12)                                   1475 04308000
         ST    @12,DGDGPTR                                         1475 04309000
*   GDGSWTCH=NOTON;                 /* LOOP CONTROL.                 */ 04310000
         NI    GDGSWTCH,B'01111111'                                1476 04311000
*   PREV=ADDR(JCTGDGNT);            /* INITIALIZE BACK-CHAIN BASE.   */ 04312000
         L     @12,JCTPTR                                          1477 04313000
         LA    @11,JCTGDGNT(,@12)                                  1477 04314000
         STCM  @11,7,PREV                                          1477 04315000
*   GDGSWA=JCTGDGNT;                /* INIT ADDR SWA GDGNT           */ 04316000
         MVC   GDGSWA(3),JCTGDGNT(@12)                             1478 04317000
*   DO WHILE GDGSWTCH=NOTON;                                       1479 04318000
         B     @DE01479                                            1479 04319000
@DL01479 DS    0H                                                  1480 04320000
*     IF GDGSWA=0 THEN             /* A GDGNT EXISTS IN SWA. USE IT */ 04321000
         L     @12,GDGSWA-1                                        1480 04322000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1480 04323000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             1480 04324000
         BZ    @RF01480                                            1480 04325000
*       DO;                         /* INSTEAD OF ASSIGNING SPACE    */ 04326000
*         SWVA=GDGSWA;              /* PREPARE FOR READ              */ 04327000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1482 04328000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),GDGSWA                                  1482 04329000
*         CALL READSWA;             /* READ GDGNT FROM SWA           */ 04330000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         1483 04331000
*         GDGNTPTR=SWBLKPTR;        /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR SWA GDGNT    */ 04332000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1484 04333000

         ST    @12,GDGNTPTR                                        1484 04335000
*         GDGSWA=GNTNEXTP;          /* PREPARE FOR NEXT POSSIBLE   1485 04336000
*                                      LOOPTHRU.                     */ 04337000
*                                                                  1485 04338000
         MVC   GDGSWA(3),GNTNEXTP(@12)                             1485 04339000
*         /***********************************************************/ 04340000
*         /*                                                         */ 04341000
*         /* NOW OVERLAY VARIABLE GDG INFO BUT NOT LINK FIELD        */ 04342000
*         /*                                                         */ 04343000
*         /***********************************************************/ 04344000
*                                                                  1486 04345000
*         DO I=1 TO DIM(GNTGRPEN);                                 1486 04346000
         LA    @12,1                                               1486 04347000
         ST    @12,I                                               1486 04348000
@DL01486 DS    0H                                                  1487 04349000
*           GNTGRPEN(I)=DGDGPTR->GNTGRPEN(I);                      1487 04350000
         LR    @11,@12                                             1487 04351000
         MH    @11,@CH03357                                        1487 04352000
         L     @09,GDGNTPTR                                        1487 04353000
         ALR   @09,@11                                             1487 04354000
         AL    @09,@CF04570                                        1487 04355000
         L     @01,DGDGPTR                                         1487 04356000
         ALR   @01,@11                                             1487 04357000
         AL    @01,@CF04570                                        1487 04358000
         MVC   GNTGRPEN-8(39,@09),GNTGRPEN-8(@01)                  1487 04359000
*         END;                                                     1488 04360000
         AL    @12,@CF00069                                        1488 04361000
         ST    @12,I                                               1488 04362000
         C     @12,@CF00033                                        1488 04363000
         BNH   @DL01486                                            1488 04364000
*         GNTENT=DGDGPTR->GNTENT;                                  1489 04365000
         L     @12,DGDGPTR                                         1489 04366000
         IC    @11,GNTENT(,@12)                                    1489 04367000
         L     @12,GDGNTPTR                                        1489 04368000
         STC   @11,GNTENT(,@12)                                    1489 04369000
*       END;                                                       1490 04370000
*     ELSE                                                         1491 04371000
*       DO;                         /* NO GDGNT EXISTS IN SWA. ASSIGN   04372000
*                                      AND CHAIN.                    */ 04373000
         B     @RC01480                                            1491 04374000
@RF01480 DS    0H                                                  1492 04375000
*         CALL ASGNPROC;            /* DO THE ASSIGN.                */ 04376000
         BAL   @14,ASGNPROC                                        1492 04377000
*         SLOT=ASGNADD;             /* CHAIN NEW TO OLD              */ 04378000
         L     @12,PREV-1                                          1493 04379000
         MVC   SLOT(3,@12),ASGNADD                                 1493 04380000
*         GDGSWA=0;                 /* LOOP CONTROL - PREVENTS SEARCH   04381000
*                                      ANY MORE SWA GDGNTS           */ 04382000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1494 04383000
         STCM  @12,7,GDGSWA                                        1494 04384000
*         SWBUFPTR=DGDGPTR;         /* POINT TO DSDR GDG BUFFER      */ 04385000
         L     @12,EPAPTR                                          1495 04386000
         L     @11,DGDGPTR                                         1495 04387000
         ST    @11,SWBUFPTR(,@12)                                  1495 04388000
*         SWROWVA=ASGNADD;          /* POINT TO SWA BLOCK PREFIX     */ 04389000
         MVC   SWROWVA(3,@12),ASGNADD                              1496 04390000
*         SWWRTID=GDGID;            /* SET BLOCK ID FOR WRITE        */ 04391000
         MVI   SWWRTID(@12),X'23'                                  1497 04392000
*         CALL WRITESWA;                                           1498 04393000
         BAL   @14,WRITESWA                                        1498 04394000
*         REALADD=LENGTH(SWAPFX);                                  1499 04395000
         LA    @12,16                                              1499 04396000
         STCM  @12,7,REALADD                                       1499 04397000
*         GDGNTPTR=(ASGNADD+REALADD);/* TRANSLATE PAST PREFIX        */ 04398000
         L     @11,ASGNADD-1                                       1500 04399000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1500 04400000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             1500 04401000
         ST    @12,GDGNTPTR                                        1500 04402000
*       END;                                                       1501 04403000
*     PREV=ADDR(GNTNEXTP);          /* RE-SET BACK-CHAIN BASE        */ 04404000
@RC01480 L     @12,GDGNTPTR                                        1502 04405000
         STCM  @12,7,PREV                                          1502 04406000
*     IF DGDGPTR->GNTNEXTP=0 THEN   /* IF LAST DSDR GDGNT...         */ 04407000
         L     @11,DGDGPTR                                         1503 04408000
         ICM   @09,7,GNTNEXTP(@11)                                 1503 04409000

*       DO;                                                        1504 04411000
*         SLOT=0;                   /* CLOSE OFF SWA CHAIN           */ 04412000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1505 04413000
         STCM  @11,7,SLOT(@12)                                     1505 04414000
*         GDGSWTCH=ON;              /* LOOP CONTROL - ALL DONE       */ 04415000
         OI    GDGSWTCH,B'10000000'                                1506 04416000
*       END;                                                       1507 04417000
*     ELSE                                                         1508 04418000
*       CALL READCHEK;              /* MORE TO GO...READ CHKPT D.S., */ 04419000
         B     @RC01503                                            1508 04420000
@RF01503 BAL   @14,READCHEK                                        1508 04421000
*     TYPE3PTR=IOBUFAD;             /* REFRESH BUFFER PTR AND START     04422000
*                                      THE LOOP OVER.                */ 04423000
@RC01503 ST    IOBUFAD,TYPE3PTR                                    1509 04424000
*     DGDGPTR=ADDR(DSGDGNT);        /* REFRESH GDG PTR       @ZA02560*/ 04425000
         L     @12,TYPE3PTR                                        1510 04426000
         LA    @12,DSGDGNT(,@12)                                   1510 04427000
         ST    @12,DGDGPTR                                         1510 04428000
*   END;                                                           1511 04429000
@DE01479 TM    GDGSWTCH,B'10000000'                                1511 04430000
         BZ    @DL01479                                            1511 04431000
*   END GDGNTJOB;                                                  1512 04432000
@EL00019 DS    0H                                                  1512 04433000
@EF00019 DS    0H                                                  1512 04434000
@ER00019 LM    @14,@06,@SA00019                                    1512 04435000
         LM    @08,@12,@SA00019+36                                 1512 04436000
         BR    @14                                                 1512 04437000
*SCTXPROC:                                                         1513 04438000
*   PROC;                                                          1513 04439000
*                                                                  1513 04440000
SCTXPROC STM   @14,@12,@SA00020                                    1513 04441000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04442000
*/* THE SCTX, WHICH NORMALLY CONTAINS PARAMETER INFORMATION FROM     */ 04443000
*/* THE EXEC CARD IS USED TO PASS THE RESTART PARAMETER LIST TO      */ 04444000
*/* THE RESTART SVC.  A 'NOTE' IS DONE ON THE CKPT DS, AND THE       */ 04445000
*/* 'NOTED' TTR IS PLACED IN THE PARM LIST.  THE REST OF THE         */ 04446000
*/* LIST CONSISTS OF THE CHR INFORMATION LEFT BY THE CHECKPOINT      */ 04447000
*/* SVC. IF THERE IS A AN OLD SCTX, IT WILL BE OVERLAYED.            */ 04448000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04449000
*                                                                  1514 04450000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   1514 04451000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 04452000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1515 04453000
*      (GPR02F) RESTRICTED;                                        1515 04454000
*     IPK;                          /* SAVE CURRENT PSW KEY          */ 04455000
         IPK                                                       1516 04456000
*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             1517 04457000
         STC   GPR02F,SAVEKEYA                                     1517 04458000
*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 04459000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1518 04460000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              1518 04461000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1519 04462000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      1519 04463000
*   END;                            /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   1520 04464000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR) KEY = 0      */ 04465000
*   CALL READCHEK;                  /* READ THE CIR FOR NOTE @YM04748*/ 04466000
         BAL   @14,READCHEK                                        1521 04467000
*   R1=DCBPARM;                     /* SET R1 PTR TO DCB FOR NOTE    */ 04468000
         L     R1,DCBPARM                                          1522 04469000
*   GEN(NOTE (1));                  /* GET TTR OR BLOCKNO FOR RESTART*/ 04470000
         NOTE (1)                                                       04471000
*   NOTEPARM=R1;                    /* PUT INTO RESTART PARAMETER  1524 04472000
*                                      LIST                          */ 04473000
         ST    R1,NOTEPARM                                         1524 04474000
*/**************************************                             */ 04475000
*/* XB609 IS NOW THROUGH WITH CKPT DS                                */ 04476000
*/**************************************                             */ 04477000
*                                                                  1525 04478000
*   SAVEJSCB=JSCBACT;               /* SAVE JSCBACT FIELD    @YM01981*/ 04479000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1525 04480000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1525 04481000
         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1525 04482000
         ST    @12,SAVEJSCB                                        1525 04483000
*   JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;                /* FORCE CLOSE TO INIT JSCB      */ 04484000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1526 04485000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1526 04486000
         ST    @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1526 04487000
*   DO;                             /* POST (ECB610)                 */ 04488000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1528 04489000
*      (GPR00F,                                                    1528 04490000
*       GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                        1528 04491000
*     GPR00F=0;                     /* POST CODE IN R0               */ 04492000
         SLR   GPR00F,GPR00F                                       1529 04493000
*     GPR01P=ADDR(ECB610);          /* ECB ADDRESS                   */ 04494000
         LA    GPR01P,ECB610                                       1530 04495000
*     SVC(2);                       /* ISSUE POST SVC                */ 04496000
         SVC   2                                                   1531 04497000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1532 04498000
*      (GPR00F,                                                    1532 04499000
*       GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      1532 04500000
*   END;                            /* POST (ECB610) POST 610 TO   1533 04501000
*                                      CLOSE AND TERM                */ 04502000
*/*************************************************                  */ 04503000
*/*NOW WAIT FOR XB610 TO COMPLETE THE CLOSE...                       */ 04504000
*/* OTHERWISE 609 WILL TERM AND FREE THE DCB                         */ 04505000
*/************************************************                   */ 04506000
*                                                                  1534 04507000
*   HIBITC1=ON;                     /* SETUP WAIT ECBLIST END        */ 04508000
         OI    HIBITC1,B'10000000'                                 1534 04509000
*   DO;                             /* WAIT ECBLIST(ADECBC1)         */ 04510000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1536 04511000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    1536 04512000
*       GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                        1536 04513000
*     GPR00P=1;                     /* LOAD WAIT COUNT               */ 04514000
         LA    GPR00P,1                                            1537 04515000
*     GPR01P=-ADDR(ADECBC1);        /* ADDRESS OF LIST OF ECB'S      */ 04516000
         LA    GPR01P,ADECBC1                                      1538 04517000
         LCR   GPR01P,GPR01P                                       1538 04518000
*     SVC(1);                       /* WAIT SVC                      */ 04519000
         SVC   1                                                   1539 04520000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1540 04521000
*      (GPR00P,                                                    1540 04522000
*       GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      1540 04523000
*   END;                            /* WAIT ECBLIST(ADECBC1) ISSUE 1541 04524000
*                                      WAIT FOR CLOSE COMPLETE       */ 04525000
*   JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;               /* RESTORE PP JSCB       @YM01981*/ 04526000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1542 04527000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1542 04528000
         L     @11,SAVEJSCB                                        1542 04529000
         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1542 04530000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)     */ 04531000
*     SPKA(SAVEKEYA);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 04532000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1544 04533000
         IC    @12,SAVEKEYA                                        1544 04534000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              1544 04535000
*   END;                            /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA) KEY    04536000
*                                      BACK TO SCHED                 */ 04537000
*/* READY TO COMPLETE 609 PROCESSING NOW                             */ 04538000
*                                                                  1546 04539000
*   DO;                             /* DETACH (SAVETCB)              */ 04540000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1547 04541000
*      (GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                        1547 04542000
*     GPR01P=ADDR(SAVETCB);         /* TCB ADDRESS                   */ 04543000
         LA    GPR01P,SAVETCB                                      1548 04544000
*     SVC(62);                      /* DETACH SVC                    */ 04545000
         SVC   62                                                  1549 04546000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1550 04547000
*      (GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      1550 04548000
*   END;                            /* DETACH (SAVETCB)      @YM06577*/ 04549000
*   IF SCTXBTTR=0 THEN             /* IF AN OLD SCTX EXISTS,USE IT  */ 04550000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1552 04551000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTXBTTR(@12)                                 1552 04552000
         BZ    @RF01552                                            1552 04553000
*     DO;                                                          1553 04554000
*       SWVA=SCTXBTTR;              /* SET UP FOR READ               */ 04555000
         L     @11,SWEPAPTR                                        1554 04556000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@11),SCTXBTTR(@12)                           1554 04557000
*       CALL READSWA;               /* GET SCTX FROM SWA             */ 04558000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         1555 04559000
*       SCTXPTR=SWBLKPTR;           /* ADDR'ABILITY SCTX             */ 04560000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1556 04561000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  1556 04562000
         ST    @12,SCTXPTR                                         1556 04563000
*       PARMX(1:LENGTH(RSTRTLST))=RSTRTLST;/* OVERLAY SWA WITH NEW 1557 04564000
*                                      LIST                          */ 04565000
         MVC   PARMX(49,@12),RSTRTLST                              1557 04566000
*     END;                                                         1558 04567000
*   ELSE                                                           1559 04568000
*     DO;                                                          1559 04569000
         B     @RC01552                                            1559 04570000
@RF01552 DS    0H                                                  1560 04571000
*       CALL ASGNPROC;              /* NO SCTX IN SWA...ASSIGN ONE   */ 04572000
         BAL   @14,ASGNPROC                                        1560 04573000
*       SCTXBTTR=ASGNADD;           /* PLUG IN TO SCT.               */ 04574000
         L     @12,ASGNADD-1                                       1561 04575000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1561 04576000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          1561 04577000
         STCM  @12,7,SCTXBTTR(@11)                                 1561 04578000
*       SCTXSVA=ASGNADD;            /* SCTX SELF PTR                 */ 04579000
         STCM  @12,7,SCTXSVA                                       1562 04580000
*       SCTXID1=SCTXID;             /* PUT IDENTIFIER IN BLOCK       */ 04581000
         MVI   SCTXID1,X'0C'                                       1563 04582000
*       SWBUFPTR=ADDR(SCTX);        /* FROM ADDRESS FOR WRITE        */ 04583000
         L     @11,EPAPTR                                          1564 04584000
         LA    @09,SCTX                                            1564 04585000
         ST    @09,SWBUFPTR(,@11)                                  1564 04586000
*       SWROWVA=ASGNADD;            /* TO BUFFER ADDRESS FOR WRITE   */ 04587000
         STCM  @12,7,SWROWVA(@11)                                  1565 04588000
*       SWWRTID='00'X;              /* ZERO ID IN EPA, ITS IN BLOCK  */ 04589000
         MVI   SWWRTID(@11),X'00'                                  1566 04590000
*       CALL WRITESWA;              /* WRITE THE BLOCK               */ 04591000
         BAL   @14,WRITESWA                                        1567 04592000
*     END;                                                         1568 04593000

*   END SCTXPROC;                                                  1570 04597000

*ASGNPROC:                                                         1571 04602000
*   PROC;                                                          1571 04603000

*   QMPOP=ASSIGN;                   /* SET FUNCTION = 'ASSIGN'       */ 04605000

*   QMPCM=ONEBLOK;                  /* NUMBER BLOCKS TO WRITE = 1    */ 04608000

*WRITESWA:                                                         1581 04634000

*READSWA:                                                          1588 04660000
*   PROC;                                                          1588 04661000
*                                                                  1588 04662000
READSWA  STM   @14,@12,@SA00023                                    1588 04663000
*/***************************************************************    */ 04664000
*/* THIS PROC ISSUES ONE READ (LOCATE MODE) TO THE SWA MANAGER.      */ 04665000
*/* THE EPA WILL HAVE BEEN SET UP BY THE CALLER.                     */ 04666000
*/***************************************************************    */ 04667000

*READCHEK:                                                         1591 04686000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE(IOBUFAD));                                 1591 04687000
*                                                                  1591 04688000
READCHEK STM   @14,@06,@SA00024                                    1591 04689000
         STM   @08,@12,@SA00024+36                                 1591 04690000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04691000
*/* THIS PROC WILL ISSUE THE READ AND CHECK MACROS FOR ONE           */ 04692000
*/*   COMPLETE RECORD  FROM THE CHECKPOINT D.S. OR UPDATE            */ 04693000
*/*   AND SET IOBUFAD AS A POINTER TO THE NEW RECORD                 */ 04694000
*/* WITHIN THE READ BUFFER.                                          */ 04695000
*/*************************************************************      */ 04696000
*                                                                  1592 04697000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   1592 04698000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 04699000

*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             1595 04704000

*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 04706000

         SPKA  0(@12)                                              1596 04708000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1597 04709000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      1597 04710000

*   DCBREG=ADDR(DCBCKPT);           /* RE-SET DCB BASE REGISTER      */ 04722000

*   TYPE1PTR=IOBUFAD;               /* SETUP FOR ID CHECK            */ 04724000

*   CHRPTR=IOBUFAD;                 /* SETUP FOR ID CHECK            */ 04726000
         ST    IOBUFAD,CHRPTR                                      1603 04727000
*   IF READCHR=ON                  /* PROCESS ALL RECORDS EXCEPT CHR*/ 04728000
*       &DSDRIDNT=IDCIR THEN       /* OR CIRNEXT IND.       @YM04748*/ 04729000

         BE    @RF01604                                            1604 04733000
*     DO;                                                          1605 04734000
*                                                                  1605 04735000
*       /*************************************************************/ 04736000
*       /*                                                           */ 04737000
*       /* TEST TO SEE WHAT THE PREVIOUS RECORD WAS, AND INCREMENT TO*/ 04738000
*       /* THE NEW RECORD ACCORDINGLY                                */ 04739000
*       /*                                                           */ 04740000
*       /*************************************************************/ 04741000
*                                                                  1606 04742000
*       IF CHRCHKID=JCTCKIDT THEN   /* IF THE OLD RECORD WAS A CHR,  */ 04743000

         L     @11,JCTPTR                                          1606 04745000
         CLC   CHRCHKID(16,@12),JCTCKIDT(@11)                      1606 04746000
         BNE   @RF01606                                            1606 04747000
*         DO;                       /* A NEW READ IS NECESSARY       */ 04748000
*           GEN;                                                   1608 04749000
    READ CKDECB,SF,(DCBREG),IOBUF,'S','S',,MF=E                         04750000
    CHECK CKDECB                                                        04751000
*           IF SYNFLAG=ON THEN                                     1609 04752000
         TM    SYNFLAG,B'10000000'                                 1609 04753000
         BNO   @RF01609                                            1609 04754000
*             CALL ERR8;                                           1610 04755000
         BAL   @14,ERR8                                            1610 04756000
*           IOBUFAD=ADDR(IOBUF);    /* RESET RECORD ADDRESS POINTER  */ 04757000
@RF01609 LA    IOBUFAD,IOBUF                                       1611 04758000
*         END;                      /* CLOSE READ CHR                */ 04759000
*       ELSE                                                       1613 04760000
*         IF DSDRIDNT=IDTYPE0 THEN  /* OLD RECORD = DDNT?            */ 04761000

         BNE   @RF01613                                            1613 04764000
*           IOBUFAD=IOBUFAD+LENGTH(IEFADDNT);                      1614 04765000
         AL    IOBUFAD,@CF00663                                    1614 04766000
*         ELSE                                                     1615 04767000
*           IF DSDRIDNT=JFCID THEN  /* OLD RECORD = JFCB(TYPE 1)?    */ 04768000

*               IOBUFAD=IOBUFAD+LENGTH(T2DSDR);                    1618 04779000

         AL    IOBUFAD,@CF03978                                    1622 04796000
*/*  IOBUFAD NOW POINTS TO A NEW RECORD EITHER THROUGH A READ OR     */ 04797000
*/* THROUGH BUMPING THE POINTER WITHIN THE BUFFER.  NOW TEST TO      */ 04798000
*/* INSURE THAT THE RECORD IS VALID.                                 */ 04799000
*                                                                  1623 04800000

@RC01615 DS    0H                                                  1623 04805000
@RC01613 DS    0H                                                  1623 04806000
@RC01606 CLC   DSDRIDNT(2,IOBUFAD),@CH02983                        1623 04807000
         BNE   @RF01623                                            1623 04808000
*         DO;                                                      1624 04809000
*           GEN;                                                   1625 04810000
        READ CKDECB,SF,(DCBREG),IOBUF,'S','S',,MF=E                     04811000
        CHECK CKDECB                                                    04812000
*           IF SYNFLAG=ON THEN                                     1626 04813000

@RF01623 ST    IOBUFAD,TYPE1PTR                                    1630 04825000

*           DSDRIDNT=SIOID&        /* ...SIOT               @ZA06466*/ 04827000
*           DSDRIDNT=IDTYPE2&      /* ...JFCBX                      */ 04828000
*           DSDRIDNT=GDGNTID&      /* ...GDGNT                      */ 04829000

*         CALL ERR35;               /* IF NONE OF THE ABOVE PUT OUT     04847000
*                                      ERROR MSG                     */ 04848000
         BAL   @14,ERR35                                           1632 04849000
*     END;                          /* CLOSE MAIN READ               */ 04850000
*   ELSE                                                           1634 04851000
*     DO;                           /* READ THE CHR                  */ 04852000
         B     @RC01604                                            1634 04853000

*       GEN;                                                       1635 04855000

        CHECK CKDECB                                                    04857000
*       IF SYNFLAG=ON THEN                                         1636 04858000

         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1640 04870000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)     */ 04871000

*ERRPROC:                                                          1645 04884000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVEAREA);                                      1645 04885000

*SCRTYERR:                                                         1677 04952000
*   R2=ADDR603;                     /* PICK UP MSG MODULE ADDRESS    */ 04953000
SCRTYERR L     R2,ADDR603                                          1677 04954000
*   R2=R2+24;                       /* INDEX PAST MODULE HEADER      */ 04955000

*   DO WHILE ID=M7;                /* SEARCH FOR IHJ0007I IDENT.    */ 04957000

*DYNERROR:                                                         1687 04980000

         BAL   @14,CANPROC                                         1803 05305000
