*     R2 UNRESTRICTED;                                             1804 05307000
*   END ERRPROC;                                                   1805 05308000
@EL00025 DS    0H                                                  1805 05309000
@EF00025 DS    0H                                                  1805 05310000
@ER00025 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     1805 05311000
         BR    @14                                                 1805 05312000
*NOMATCH:                                                          1806 05313000
*   PROC;                                                          1806 05314000
*                                                                  1806 05315000
NOMATCH  STM   @14,@12,@SA00026                                    1806 05316000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05317000
*/*  THE PURPOSE OF THIS PROC IS : 1) TO BUILD A SIOT/JFCB PAIR      */ 05318000
*/*     FOR A DYN ALLOCED DATA SET.                     2) TO        */ 05319000
*/* INVOKE THE ERROR PROC IF IT HAS BEEN FOUND THAT A DD ENTRY       */ 05320000
*/* WAS MISSING FROM THE JCL SUBMITTED FOR THE RESTART.              */ 05321000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05322000
*                                                                  1807 05323000
*   DCL                                                            1807 05324000
*     UNITS FIXED(8) DEFINED(SCTNMBUT) BDY(BYTE);/* NUMERIC UNIT CT  */ 05325000
*   DCL                                                            1808 05326000
*     CCATEND BIT(1);                                              1808 05327000
*   IF BUILDSW=ON THEN              /* SIOTSCAN DETERMINED THAT SIOT    05328000
*                                      WAS NEEDED BECAUSE OF A     1809 05329000
*                                      DYNALLOC AT DEFERRED RESTART  */ 05330000
         TM    BUILDSW,B'10000000'                                 1809 05331000
         BNO   @RF01809                                            1809 05332000
*     DO;                                                          1810 05333000
*       DJFCBPTR=ADDR(DSDRJFCB);    /* INSURE ADDR'ABILITY DSDRJFCB  */ 05334000
         LA    @12,DSDRJFCB(,IOBUFAD)                              1811 05335000
         ST    @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1811 05336000
*       IF DJFCBPTR->JFCVRDS=ON THEN/* IF DATA SET IS VAM....        */ 05337000
         L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1812 05338000
         TM    JFCVRDS(@12),B'00000100'                            1812 05339000
         BNO   @RF01812                                            1812 05340000
*         CALL VAMERR;              /* THE UCBADD CANNOT BE RECOVERED   05341000
*                                                            @YM08170*/ 05342000
         BAL   @14,VAMERR                                          1813 05343000
*       CALL ASGNPROC;              /* GET A NEW BLOCK ASSIGNED      */ 05344000
@RF01812 BAL   @14,ASGNPROC                                        1814 05345000
*       NEWPTR=ASGNADD+REALADD;     /* SWA ADDRESSABILITY NEW SIOT   */ 05346000
         L     @12,ASGNADD-1                                       1815 05347000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1815 05348000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       1815 05349000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1815 05350000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             1815 05351000
         STCM  @11,7,NEWPTR                                        1815 05352000
*       IF PROCSIOT=ZEROPTR THEN    /* THE ADDED SIOT MAY NEED TO BE    05353000
*                                      ADDED AS FIRST SIOT           */ 05354000
         L     @09,PROCSIOT                                        1816 05355000
         LTR   @09,@09                                             1816 05356000
         BNZ   @RF01816                                            1816 05357000
*         DO;                                                      1817 05358000
*           NEWPTR->SCTPSIOT=SCTFSIOT;/* MAKE THE OLD FIRST THE NEW     05359000
*                                      FIRST'S NEXT.                 */ 05360000
         L     @09,SCTPTR                                          1818 05361000
         MVC   SCTPSIOT(3,@11),SCTFSIOT(@09)                       1818 05362000
*           SCTFSIOT=ASGNADD;       /* PLUG IN NEW AS FIRST          */ 05363000
         STCM  @12,7,SCTFSIOT(@09)                                 1819 05364000
*           IF SCTLSIOT=ZEROPTR THEN/* FOR ONLY DD SET               */ 05365000
         ICM   @12,7,SCTLSIOT(@09)                                 1820 05366000
         BNZ   @RF01820                                            1820 05367000
*             SCTLSIOT=SCTFSIOT;    /* FIRST AND LAST =              */ 05368000
         MVC   SCTLSIOT(3,@09),SCTFSIOT(@09)                       1821 05369000
*         END;                                                     1822 05370000
*       ELSE                                                       1823 05371000
*         DO;                       /* THIS IS NOT THE FIRST.        */ 05372000
         B     @RC01816                                            1823 05373000
@RF01816 DS    0H                                                  1824 05374000
*           IF PROCSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN/* IS IT THE LAST?              */ 05375000
         L     @12,PROCSIOT                                        1824 05376000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          1824 05377000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             1824 05378000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@11)                                 1824 05379000
         CR    @12,@09                                             1824 05380000
         BNE   @RF01824                                            1824 05381000
*             DO;                                                  1825 05382000
*               EVAL(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT=ASGNADD;/* MAKE THE    05383000
*                                      OLD LAST POINT TO THE NEW   1826 05384000
*                                      LAST.                         */ 05385000
         L     @09,REALADD-1                                       1826 05386000
         LA    @09,0(,@09)                                         1826 05387000
         ALR   @12,@09                                             1826 05388000
         MVC   SCTPSIOT(3,@12),ASGNADD                             1826 05389000
*               SCTLSIOT=ASGNADD;   /* SET 'LAST' PTR IN SCT.        */ 05390000
         MVC   SCTLSIOT(3,@11),ASGNADD                             1827 05391000
*             END;                                                 1828 05392000
*           ELSE                                                   1829 05393000
*             DO;                   /* NEW SIOT WON'T BE THE 1ST OR     05394000
*                                      THE LAST                      */ 05395000
         B     @RC01824                                            1829 05396000
@RF01824 DS    0H                                                  1830 05397000
*               NEWPTR->SCTPSIOT=   /* PICK UP THE PREV SIOT'S       */ 05398000
*                   (PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* LINK POINTER     */ 05399000
         L     @12,NEWPTR-1                                        1830 05400000
         L     @11,PROCSIOT                                        1830 05401000
         L     @09,REALADD-1                                       1830 05402000
         LA    @09,0(,@09)                                         1830 05403000
         LR    @15,@11                                             1830 05404000
         ALR   @15,@09                                             1830 05405000
         MVC   SCTPSIOT(3,@12),SCTPSIOT(@15)                       1830 05406000
*               EVAL(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->/* PLUG IN PREV SIOT'S NEW   */ 05407000
*                   SCTPSIOT=ASGNADD;/* 'NEXT' POINTER.              */ 05408000
         ALR   @11,@09                                             1831 05409000
         MVC   SCTPSIOT(3,@11),ASGNADD                             1831 05410000
*             END;                                                 1832 05411000
*         END;                      /* CLOSE 'PLUG-IN' SECTION       */ 05412000
@RC01824 DS    0H                                                  1834 05413000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05414000
*/* NOW FILL IN  VITAL FIELDS IN THE NEW SIOT THAT WON'T BE          */ 05415000
*/*    FILLED IN BY THE NORMAL SIOTPROC PROCESSING.                  */ 05416000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05417000
*                                                                  1834 05418000
*       NEWPTR->SIOTDSKA=ASGNADD;   /* PLUG-IN SELFPTR               */ 05419000
@RC01816 L     @12,NEWPTR-1                                        1834 05420000
         MVC   SIOTDSKA(3,@12),ASGNADD                             1834 05421000
*       NEWSIOT=ASGNADD;            /* SAVE ADDRESS FOR RETURN TO  1835 05422000
*                                      SIOTSCAN. IT WILL BE DESTROYED   05423000
*                                      BY THE NEXT ASSIGN.           */ 05424000
         MVC   NEWSIOT(3),ASGNADD                                  1835 05425000
*       CALL ASGNPROC;              /* GET SPACE FOR THE JFCB.       */ 05426000
         BAL   @14,ASGNPROC                                        1836 05427000
*       NEWJFCB=ASGNADD;            /* SAVE ADDR FOR WRITE-OUT       */ 05428000
         MVC   NEWJFCB(3),ASGNADD                                  1837 05429000
*       NEWPTR->SCTPJFCB=ASGNADD;   /* PLUG-IN JFCB ADDRESS          */ 05430000
         L     @12,NEWPTR-1                                        1838 05431000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1838 05432000
         MVC   SCTPJFCB(3,@12),ASGNADD                             1838 05433000
*       NEWPTR->SIOTTYPE=SIOT03;    /* SET BUILT-IN BLOCKID          */ 05434000
         MVI   SIOTTYPE(@12),X'03'                                 1839 05435000
*       NEWPTR->SCTDDNAM=DSDRDNAM;  /* PLUG-IN DDNAME                */ 05436000
         MVC   SCTDDNAM(8,@12),DSDRDNAM(IOBUFAD)                   1840 05437000
*       NEWPTR->SIOTDYAL=ON;        /* TURN ON 'DYNAMICALLY        1841 05438000
*                                      ALLOCATED' BIT.               */ 05439000
         OI    SIOTDYAL(@12),B'01000000'                           1841 05440000
*       NEWPTR->SIOTVLCT=           /* SET TOTAL NUM REQUESTED VOLS  */ 05441000
*           DJFCBPTR->JFCBVLCT;                                    1842 05442000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1842 05443000
         MVC   SIOTVLCT(1,@12),JFCBVLCT(@11)                       1842 05444000
*       NEWPTR->SCTANAME=BLANKS;    /* ASSIGN DEFAULT TEMP NAME      */ 05445000
         MVC   SCTANAME(8,@12),@CC03776                            1843 05446000
*       NEWPTR->UNITS=ONEVOL;       /* DEFAULT TO 1 UNIT     @YM07510*/ 05447000
         MVI   UNITS(@12),X'01'                                    1844 05448000
*       NEWPTR->SIOTDEVT=DSDRUTYP;  /* PUT UNIT TYPE IN      @YM07581*/ 05449000
         MVC   SIOTDEVT(4,@12),DSDRUTYP(IOBUFAD)                   1845 05450000
*       NEWPTR->SIOUCNVT=0;         /* CONV DONE             @YM07581*/ 05451000
         MVI   SIOUCNVT(@12),X'00'                                 1846 05452000
*       NEWPTR->SIOUCBAD=ZEROPTR;   /* UCB ADDR = 0          @YM07581*/ 05453000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1847 05454000
         STCM  @11,7,SIOUCBAD(@12)                                 1847 05455000
*       SIOTPTR=NEWPTR;             /* PARM FOR BITSOFF      @YM08140*/ 05456000
         ST    @12,SIOTPTR                                         1848 05457000
*       CALL BITSOFF;               /* INSURE EDT            @YM07581*/ 05458000
         BAL   @14,BITSOFF                                         1849 05459000
*/**************************************                             */ 05460000
*/* IT IS NOT NECESSARY TO SET SIOCLUNL                              */ 05461000
*/* AS ITS ONLY USE IS TO SET THE CORR-                              */ 05462000
*/* ESSPONDING BIT IN THE DSAB. THE                                  */ 05463000
*/* DSAB BIT WILL BE RESTORED BY THE                                 */ 05464000
*/* RESTART SVC.                                                     */ 05465000
*/**************************************                             */ 05466000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05467000
*/* THE FOLLOWING CODE  LOOPS THROUGH THE REMAINING SIOTS            */ 05468000
*/* SEARCHING FOR UNIT AFFINITY REQUESTS TO DD NUMBERS GREATER       */ 05469000
*/* THAN THE NUMBER OF THE SIOT PREVIOUS TO THE ONE ADDED. IF        */ 05470000
*/* ANY ARE FOUND, THE NUMBER IS BUMPED BY ONE SINCE THE             */ 05471000
*/* CORRESPONDING DD NUMBER  WILL BE ONE GREATER WHEN                */ 05472000
*/* RE-NUMBERED IN SIOTPROC. (GOT THAT???)                           */ 05473000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05474000
*                                                                  1850 05475000
*       IF NEWPTR->SIOTDSKA=SCTLSIOT THEN/* DONT TRY TO LOOK PAST 1850 05476000
*                                      LAST                          */ 05477000
         L     @12,NEWPTR-1                                        1850 05478000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1850 05479000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          1850 05480000
         CLC   SIOTDSKA(3,@12),SCTLSIOT(@11)                       1850 05481000
         BE    @RF01850                                            1850 05482000
*         DO;                                                      1851 05483000
*           TEMPSW=ON;              /* LOOP CONTROL                  */ 05484000
         OI    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  1852 05485000
*           TEMPPTR=NEWPTR->SCTPSIOT;/* PICK UP NEXT SIOT ADDRESS    */ 05486000
         MVC   TEMPPTR(3),SCTPSIOT(@12)                            1853 05487000
*           DO WHILE TEMPSW=ON;                                    1854 05488000
         B     @DE01854                                            1854 05489000
@DL01854 DS    0H                                                  1855 05490000
*             IF TEMPPTR=SCTLSIOT THEN/* CLOSE THE LOOP AFTER THE  1855 05491000
*                                      LAST                          */ 05492000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1855 05493000
         CLC   TEMPPTR(3),SCTLSIOT(@12)                            1855 05494000
         BNE   @RF01855                                            1855 05495000
*               TEMPSW=NOTON;       /* SIOT HAS BEEN EXAMINED        */ 05496000
         NI    TEMPSW,B'01111111'                                  1856 05497000
*             TEMPPTR=TEMPPTR+REALADD;/* SWA ADDR'ABILITY            */ 05498000
@RF01855 L     @12,TEMPPTR-1                                       1857 05499000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1857 05500000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       1857 05501000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1857 05502000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             1857 05503000
         STCM  @12,7,TEMPPTR                                       1857 05504000
*             IF TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF  /* IF REQUESTED AFFINITY NUMBER  */ 05505000
*                 >LALOCCTR THEN    /* IS GREATER THAN LAST DD NUMBER*/ 05506000
         LH    @11,SIOTUNAF(,@12)                                  1858 05507000
         CH    @11,LALOCCTR                                        1858 05508000
         BNH   @RF01858                                            1858 05509000
*               TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF=TEMPPTR->SIOTUNAF+ONEHEX;/* BUMP IT   05510000
*                                      BY ONE                        */ 05511000
         AL    @11,@CF02945                                        1859 05512000
         STH   @11,SIOTUNAF(,@12)                                  1859 05513000
*             TEMPPTR=TEMPPTR->SCTPSIOT;/* PICK UP NEW 'NEXT' PTR    */ 05514000
@RF01858 L     @12,TEMPPTR-1                                       1860 05515000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1860 05516000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTPSIOT(@12)                                 1860 05517000
         STCM  @11,7,TEMPPTR                                       1860 05518000
*           END;                    /* CLOSE SEARCH LOOP             */ 05519000
@DE01854 TM    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  1861 05520000
         BO    @DL01854                                            1861 05521000
*         END;                      /* CLOSE UNIT-AFFINITY-BUMP CODE */ 05522000
*/**************************************                             */ 05523000
*/* AN ENTRY MUST BE MADE IN THE DSENQ                               */ 05524000
*/* TABLE FOR THE NEW DATASET                                        */ 05525000
*/**************************************                             */ 05526000
*                                                                  1863 05527000
*       DSN=DJFCBPTR->JFCBDSNM;     /* PLUG IN THE DSNAME            */ 05528000
@RF01850 L     @12,DJFCBPTR                                        1863 05529000
         MVC   DSN(44),JFCBDSNM(@12)                               1863 05530000
*       CALL ADDDSNQ;               /* ADD THE ENTRY                 */ 05531000
         BAL   @14,ADDDSNQ                                         1864 05532000
*/**************************************                             */ 05533000
*/* WRITE THE SIOT TO SWA. IT WAS BUILT                              */ 05534000
*/* IN SWA,SO LOCATE MODE WILL BE USED                               */ 05535000
*/**************************************                             */ 05536000
*                                                                  1865 05537000
*       SWLNGTH=LENGTH(INDMSIOT);   /* SET LENGTH FOR WRITE          */ 05538000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1865 05539000
         MVC   SWLNGTH(4,@12),@CF04526                             1865 05540000
*       SWBLKPTR=NEWPTR;            /* SET ACTUAL BLOCK ADDRESS      */ 05541000
         L     @11,NEWPTR-1                                        1866 05542000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1866 05543000
         ST    @11,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  1866 05544000
*       SWVA=NEWSIOT;               /* SET PREFIX ADDRESS            */ 05545000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),NEWSIOT                                 1867 05546000
*       SWBLKID='00'X;              /* BLOCKID IS IN BLOCK           */ 05547000
         MVI   SWBLKID(@12),X'00'                                  1868 05548000
*/* ?SWAREQ (WL) EPA (EPAPTR);                                       */ 05549000
*                                                                  1869 05550000
*       CALL SWAMGR(EPAPTR,'WL');                                  1869 05551000
*                                                                  1869 05552000
         LA    @12,EPAPTR                                          1869 05553000
         ST    @12,@AL00001                                        1869 05554000
         LA    @12,@CC04369                                        1869 05555000
         ST    @12,@AL00001+4                                      1869 05556000
         LA    @12,16                                              1869 05557000
         L     @12,CVTPTR(,@12)                                    1869 05558000
         L     @12,CVTJESCT(,@12)                                  1869 05559000
         L     @15,JESWAA(,@12)                                    1869 05560000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        1869 05561000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             1869 05562000
*/**************************************                             */ 05563000
*/* WRITE OUT THE JFCB. IT IS IN IOBUF                               */ 05564000
*/* SO MOVE MODE IS USED.                                            */ 05565000
*/**************************************                             */ 05566000
*                                                                  1870 05567000
*       SWBUFPTR=DJFCBPTR;          /* SET 'FROM' ADDRESS            */ 05568000
         L     @12,EPAPTR                                          1870 05569000
         L     @11,DJFCBPTR                                        1870 05570000
         ST    @11,SWBUFPTR(,@12)                                  1870 05571000
*       SWROWVA=NEWJFCB;            /* SET 'TO' ADDRESS              */ 05572000
         MVC   SWROWVA(3,@12),NEWJFCB                              1871 05573000
*       SWWRTID=JFCB1C;             /* SET THE BLOCK ID              */ 05574000
         MVI   SWWRTID(@12),X'1C'                                  1872 05575000
*       CALL WRITESWA;              /* WRITE THE BLOCK               */ 05576000
         BAL   @14,WRITESWA                                        1873 05577000
*       EVAL(NEWJFCB+REALADD)->JFCBEXAD=ZEROPTR;/* THE JFCBX ADDRESS    05578000
*                                      IN THE JFCB JUST WRITTEN IS NO   05579000
*                                      LONGER VALID. IT WILL BE    1874 05580000
*                                      RESOLVED IN JFCBXJOB          */ 05581000
         L     @12,NEWJFCB-1                                       1874 05582000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1874 05583000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       1874 05584000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1874 05585000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             1874 05586000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1874 05587000
         STCM  @11,7,JFCBEXAD(@12)                                 1874 05588000
*     END;                          /* CLOSE ADD-SIOT PORTION        */ 05589000
*   ELSE                            /* IF NOMATCH WAS NOT ENTERED FOR   05590000
*                                      CONSTRUCTION OF A SIOT/ JFCB     05591000
*                                      PAIR, IT WAS ENTERED BECAUSE A   05592000
*                                      MATCH COULD NOT BE FOUND FOR A   05593000
*                                      DSDR ENTRY. THIS INDICATES  1876 05594000
*                                      THAT A DD CARD WAS OMITTED  1876 05595000
*                                      FROM THE RESTART DECK, OR THAT   05596000
*                                      A DD WAS ADDED AS A MEMBER OF    05597000
*                                      A CONCAT GROUP                */ 05598000
*     IF(RESTYPE=ON                 /* IF DEFERRED....               */ 05599000
*         &PROCSIOT=SAVEL          /* AND AND NOT END OF CHAIN      */ 05600000
*         &PROCSIOT=ZEROPTR) THEN  /* OR BEGINNING OF CHAIN         */ 05601000
         B     @RC01809                                            1876 05602000
@RF01809 TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 1876 05603000
         BNO   @RF01876                                            1876 05604000
         L     @12,PROCSIOT                                        1876 05605000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1876 05606000
         ICM   @11,7,SAVEL                                         1876 05607000
         CR    @12,@11                                             1876 05608000
         BE    @RF01876                                            1876 05609000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             1876 05610000
         BZ    @RF01876                                            1876 05611000
*       DO;                         /* TEST FOR ADDED CONCAT         */ 05612000
*         CCATEND=NOTON;            /* FLAG = END NOT FOUND          */ 05613000
         NI    CCATEND,B'01111111'                                 1878 05614000
*         NEWSIOT=(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* GET NEXT           */ 05615000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       1879 05616000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1879 05617000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             1879 05618000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             1879 05619000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTPSIOT(@12)                                 1879 05620000
         STCM  @09,7,NEWSIOT                                       1879 05621000
*         IF EVAL(NEWSIOT+REALADD)->SCTDDNAM=BLANKS THEN           1880 05622000
         ALR   @09,@11                                             1880 05623000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@09),@CC03776                            1880 05624000
         BNE   @RF01880                                            1880 05625000
*           DO;                     /*                       @YM08662*/ 05626000
*             NEWCCAT=ON;           /* TELL SIOTSCAN ADDED CONCAT    */ 05627000
         OI    NEWCCAT,B'10000000'                                 1882 05628000
*             DO WHILE CCATEND=NOTON;/* FIND END OF GROUP            */ 05629000
         B     @DE01883                                            1883 05630000
@DL01883 DS    0H                                                  1884 05631000
*               IF NEWSIOT=SAVEL THEN                             1884 05632000
         CLC   NEWSIOT(3),SAVEL                                    1884 05633000
         BE    @RF01884                                            1884 05634000
*                 DO;                                              1885 05635000
*                   NEWPTR=(NEWSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* GET NEW  1886 05636000
*                                      NEXT                          */ 05637000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       1886 05638000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1886 05639000
         L     @11,NEWSIOT-1                                       1886 05640000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1886 05641000
         ALR   @11,@12                                             1886 05642000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             1886 05643000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTPSIOT(@11)                                 1886 05644000
         STCM  @09,7,NEWPTR                                        1886 05645000
*                   IF EVAL(NEWPTR+REALADD)->SCTDDNAM=BLANKS THEN  1887 05646000
         ALR   @12,@09                                             1887 05647000
         CLC   SCTDDNAM(8,@12),@CC03776                            1887 05648000
         BNE   @RF01887                                            1887 05649000
*                     NEWSIOT=NEWPTR;/* UPDATE UNTIL END OF GRP      */ 05650000
         STCM  @09,7,NEWSIOT                                       1888 05651000
*                   ELSE                                           1889 05652000
*                     CCATEND=ON;   /* SIGNAL END OF GROUP           */ 05653000
         B     @RC01887                                            1889 05654000
@RF01887 OI    CCATEND,B'10000000'                                 1889 05655000
*                 END;                                             1890 05656000
@RC01887 DS    0H                                                  1891 05657000
*             END;                                                 1891 05658000
@RF01884 DS    0H                                                  1891 05659000
@DE01883 TM    CCATEND,B'10000000'                                 1891 05660000
         BZ    @DL01883                                            1891 05661000
*           END;                                                   1892 05662000
*         ELSE                                                     1893 05663000
*           CALL ERR37;                                            1893 05664000
         B     @RC01880                                            1893 05665000
@RF01880 BAL   @14,ERR37                                           1893 05666000
*       END;                                                       1894 05667000
*     ELSE                                                         1895 05668000
*       CALL ERR37;                                                1895 05669000
         B     @RC01876                                            1895 05670000
@RF01876 BAL   @14,ERR37                                           1895 05671000
*   END NOMATCH;                                                   1896 05672000
@EL00026 DS    0H                                                  1896 05673000
@EF00026 DS    0H                                                  1896 05674000
@ER00026 LM    @14,@12,@SA00026                                    1896 05675000
         BR    @14                                                 1896 05676000
*LEFTOVER:                                                         1897 05677000
*   PROC;                                                          1897 05678000
*                                                                  1897 05679000
LEFTOVER STM   @14,@12,@SA00027                                    1897 05680000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05681000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE HANDLES ANY SIOTS THAT REMAIN ON THE CHAIN        */ 05682000
*/*   AFTER ALL THE DSDRS HAVE BEEN PROCESSED. FOR DEFERRED          */ 05683000
*/*   RESTARTS, THESE EXTRAS REPRESENT ADDED DD ENTRIES.  THEY       */ 05684000
*/*   WILL BE LEFT ON THE CHAIN, AND THE NUMBER OF DD'S UPDATED      */ 05685000
*/*   TO REFLECT THEM. FOR AUTO REATARTS, THEY MAY REPRESENT         */ 05686000
*/*   EITHER GDG ALL GENERATIONS (IN WHICH CASE THEY ARE DELETED     */ 05687000
*/*   FROM THE CHAIN) OR DYNAMIC ALLOCATIONS AFTER THE CHKPT         */ 05688000
*/*   WAS TAKEN.  THESE DYNALLOCS WILL BE TESTED TO DETERMINE IF     */ 05689000
*/*   THEY WERE NEW.  IF NEW,THEY ARE UNCATALOGED AND SCRATCHED      */ 05690000
*/* SO THE USER MAY RE-ALLOCATE THEM.                                */ 05691000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05692000
*                                                                  1898 05693000
*   DCL                                                            1898 05694000
*     1 NULLSIOT CHAR(70),          /* DUMMY SIOT FOR SPECIAL CASE 1898 05695000
*                                                            @YM03604*/ 05696000
*      2 * CHAR(28),                                               1898 05697000
*      2 NULPSIOT PTR(24) BDY(WORD),                               1898 05698000
*      2 * CHAR(39);                                               1898 05699000
*   IF PROCSIOT=ZEROPTR THEN                                       1899 05700000
         L     @12,PROCSIOT                                        1899 05701000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             1899 05702000
         BNZ   @RF01899                                            1899 05703000
*     DO;                           /* ALL SIOTS NOT PROCESSED     1900 05704000
*                                                            @YM03604*/ 05705000
*       PROCSIOT=ADDR(NULLSIOT)-LENGTH(SWAPFX);/* TO PICK UP 1ST SIOT   05706000
*                                      WHEN LOOP STARTS      @YM03604*/ 05707000
         LA    @12,NULLSIOT                                        1901 05708000
         SL    @12,@CF00052                                        1901 05709000
         ST    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1901 05710000
*       NULPSIOT=SCTFSIOT;          /* IF NONE OF THE SIOTS HAVE BEEN   05711000
*                                      PROCESSED, START LOOKING FROM    05712000
*                                      THE 1ST.              @YM03604*/ 05713000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1902 05714000
         MVC   NULPSIOT(3),SCTFSIOT(@12)                           1902 05715000
*     END;                          /* CLOSE SPECIAL DO LOOP @YM03604*/ 05716000
*   IF RESTYPE=ON THEN              /* THIS IS DEFERRED...           */ 05717000
@RF01899 TM    RESTYPE,B'10000000'                                 1904 05718000
         BNO   @RF01904                                            1904 05719000
*     DO;                           /* ADD THE LEFTOVERS             */ 05720000
*       IF PROCSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN  /* ARE THERE ANY LEFTOVERS?      */ 05721000
         L     @12,PROCSIOT                                        1906 05722000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          1906 05723000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             1906 05724000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@11)                                 1906 05725000
         CR    @12,@09                                             1906 05726000
         BE    @RF01906                                            1906 05727000
*         DO;                       /* YES                           */ 05728000
*           TEMPSW=ON;              /* LOOP CONTROL                  */ 05729000
         OI    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  1908 05730000
*           DO WHILE TEMPSW=ON;                                    1909 05731000
         B     @DE01909                                            1909 05732000
@DL01909 DS    0H                                                  1910 05733000
*             PROCSIOT=(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* PICK UP     1910 05734000
*                                      NEXTSIOT                      */ 05735000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       1910 05736000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1910 05737000
         AL    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1910 05738000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1910 05739000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTPSIOT(@12)                                 1910 05740000
         ST    @11,PROCSIOT                                        1910 05741000
*             IF PROCSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN/* IF THIS IS LAST SIOT,      */ 05742000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1911 05743000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             1911 05744000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@12)                                 1911 05745000
         CR    @11,@09                                             1911 05746000
         BNE   @RF01911                                            1911 05747000
*               TEMPSW=NOTON;       /* CLOSE THE LOOP                */ 05748000
         NI    TEMPSW,B'01111111'                                  1912 05749000
*             LALOCCTR=LALOCCTR+ONEHEX;/* BUMP TOTAL NUM DD'S        */ 05750000
@RF01911 LA    @12,1                                               1913 05751000
         AH    @12,LALOCCTR                                        1913 05752000
         STH   @12,LALOCCTR                                        1913 05753000
*             EVAL(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTDDINO=/* ASSIGN NEW DDNUMBER*/ 05754000
*                 LALOCCTR;                                        1914 05755000
         L     @11,REALADD-1                                       1914 05756000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         1914 05757000
         AL    @11,PROCSIOT                                        1914 05758000
         STH   @12,SCTDDINO(,@11)                                  1914 05759000
*           END;                    /* CLOSE ADD-ON LOOP             */ 05760000
@DE01909 TM    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  1915 05761000
         BO    @DL01909                                            1915 05762000
*         END;                      /* CLOSE SEARCH                  */ 05763000
*     END;                          /* CLOSE DEFERRED SECTION        */ 05764000
*   ELSE                                                           1918 05765000
*     DO;                           /* THIS IS AUTOMATIC... DELETE 1918 05766000
*                                      THE LEFTOVERS                 */ 05767000
         B     @RC01904                                            1918 05768000
@RF01904 DS    0H                                                  1919 05769000
*       SAVELAST=PROCSIOT;          /* RETAIN ADDR OF LAST PROCESSED    05770000
*                                      SIOT. IT BECOMES SCTLSIOT WHEN   05771000
*                                      OTHER ARE PROCESSED OUT.      */ 05772000
         L     @12,PROCSIOT                                        1919 05773000
         ST    @12,SAVELAST                                        1919 05774000
*       IF PROCSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN  /* ARE THER ANY LEFTOVER SIOTS/  */ 05775000
         L     @11,SCTPTR                                          1920 05776000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             1920 05777000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@11)                                 1920 05778000
         CR    @12,@09                                             1920 05779000
         BE    @RF01920                                            1920 05780000
*         DO;                                                      1921 05781000
*           TEMPSW=ON;                                             1922 05782000
         OI    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  1922 05783000
*           DO WHILE TEMPSW=ON;                                    1923 05784000
         B     @DE01923                                            1923 05785000
@DL01923 DS    0H                                                  1924 05786000
*             PROCSIOT=(PROCSIOT+REALADD)->SCTPSIOT;/* PICK UP     1924 05787000
*                                      NEXTSIOT                      */ 05788000
         L     @12,REALADD-1                                       1924 05789000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1924 05790000
         AL    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1924 05791000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             1924 05792000
         ICM   @11,7,SCTPSIOT(@12)                                 1924 05793000
         ST    @11,PROCSIOT                                        1924 05794000
*             IF PROCSIOT=SCTLSIOT THEN/* IF THIS IS THE LAST,       */ 05795000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1925 05796000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             1925 05797000
         ICM   @09,7,SCTLSIOT(@12)                                 1925 05798000
         CR    @11,@09                                             1925 05799000
         BNE   @RF01925                                            1925 05800000
*               TEMPSW=NOTON;       /* MAKE THIS LAST TIMETHRU LOOP  */ 05801000
         NI    TEMPSW,B'01111111'                                  1926 05802000
*             NEWPTR=PROCSIOT+REALADD;/* TEMPORARY ADDRESSABILITY    */ 05803000
@RF01925 L     @12,REALADD-1                                       1927 05804000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1927 05805000
         AL    @12,PROCSIOT                                        1927 05806000
         STCM  @12,7,NEWPTR                                        1927 05807000
*             IF(NEWPTR->SCTSNEW=ON /* IS THE DATA SET NEW ?         */ 05808000
*                 |NEWPTR->SIOTCNEW=ON)/* OR CONVERTED FROM NEW?     */ 05809000
*                 &NEWPTR->SIOTDYAL=ON THEN                        1928 05810000
         TM    SCTSNEW(@12),B'00000100'                            1928 05811000
         BO    @GL00053                                            1928 05812000
         TM    SIOTCNEW(@12),B'00001000'                           1928 05813000
         BNO   @RF01928                                            1928 05814000
@GL00053 L     @12,NEWPTR-1                                        1928 05815000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1928 05816000
         TM    SIOTDYAL(@12),B'01000000'                           1928 05817000
         BNO   @RF01928                                            1928 05818000
*               DO;                                                1929 05819000
*                 IF NEWPTR->SIOTCALC=ON THEN/* IF CAT AT          1930 05820000
*                                      ALLOC...@YM08190              */ 05821000
         TM    SIOTCALC(@12),B'00010000'                           1930 05822000
         BNO   @RF01930                                            1930 05823000
*                   CALL UNCATLOG(NEWPTR);/* UNCATALOG THE DATASET   */ 05824000
         LA    @12,NEWPTR                                          1931 05825000
         ST    @12,@AL00001                                        1931 05826000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        1931 05827000
         BAL   @14,UNCATLOG                                        1931 05828000
*                 IF(NEWPTR->SIOTSSDS=ON/* IF NOT SUBSYSTEM @YM08190*/ 05829000
*                     &NEWPTR->SIOUCBAD->UCB3DACC=ON) THEN/* & UCB 1932 05830000
*                                      SAYS DA               @YM08190*/ 05831000
@RF01930 L     @12,NEWPTR-1                                        1932 05832000
         LA    @12,0(,@12)                                         1932 05833000
         TM    SIOTSSDS(@12),B'10000000'                           1932 05834000
         BO    @RF01932                                            1932 05835000
