         TM    UCB3DACC(@12),B'00100000'                           1932 05837000
         BNO   @RF01932                                            1932 05838000
*                   CALL SCRATCH(NEWPTR);                          1933 05839000
         LA    @12,NEWPTR                                          1933 05840000
         ST    @12,@AL00001                                        1933 05841000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                        1933 05842000
         BAL   @14,SCRATCH                                         1933 05843000
*               END;                                               1934 05844000
@RF01932 DS    0H                                                  1935 05845000
*           END;                                                   1935 05846000
@RF01928 DS    0H                                                  1935 05847000
@DE01923 TM    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  1935 05848000
         BO    @DL01923                                            1935 05849000
*         END;                                                     1936 05850000
*       SCTLSIOT=SAVELAST;          /* RESTORE REAL SCTLSIOT.        */ 05851000
@RF01920 L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1937 05852000
         MVC   SCTLSIOT(3,@12),SAVELAST+1                          1937 05853000
*     END;                                                         1938 05854000
*   END LEFTOVER;                                                  1939 05855000
@EL00027 DS    0H                                                  1939 05856000
@EF00027 DS    0H                                                  1939 05857000
@ER00027 LM    @14,@12,@SA00027                                    1939 05858000
         BR    @14                                                 1939 05859000
*FREECHEK:                                                         1940 05860000
*   PROC;                                                          1940 05861000
*                                                                  1940 05862000
FREECHEK STM   @14,@12,@SA00028                                    1940 05863000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05864000
*/* FREECHEK WILL DYNAMICALLY UNALLOCATE THE CHECKPOINT DATASET      */ 05865000
*/*     IT WILL USE THE SAME PARAMETER LIST THAT WAS USED TO         */ 05866000
*/*     ALLOCATE IT.                                                 */ 05867000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05868000
*                                                                  1941 05869000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   1941 05870000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 05871000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1942 05872000
*      (GPR02F) RESTRICTED;                                        1942 05873000
*     IPK;                          /* SAVE CURRENT PSW KEY          */ 05874000
         IPK                                                       1943 05875000
*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             1944 05876000
         STC   GPR02F,SAVEKEYA                                     1944 05877000
*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 05878000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1945 05879000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              1945 05880000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1946 05881000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      1946 05882000
*   END;                            /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   1947 05883000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR) KEY = 0      */ 05884000
*   S99VERB=S99VRBUN;               /* PARM VERB = UNALLOCATE        */ 05885000
         LA    @12,EDBRBPTR                                        1948 05886000
         L     @12,S99RBPTR(,@12)                                  1948 05887000
         MVI   S99VERB(@12),X'02'                                  1948 05888000
*   TUPLAST(1)=ON;                  /* DDNAME IS ALL THAT IS       1949 05889000
*                                      NECESSARY FOR AN UNALLOC SO 1949 05890000
*                                      USE ONLY ONE TEXT UNIT.       */ 05891000
         OI    TUPLAST,B'10000000'                                 1949 05892000
*   SAVEJSCB=JSCBACT;               /* FORCE DYNALLOC TO USE INIT'S  */ 05893000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1950 05894000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1950 05895000
         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1950 05896000
         ST    @12,SAVEJSCB                                        1950 05897000
*   JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;                /* CORE FOR CONTROL BLOCKS       */ 05898000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1951 05899000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1951 05900000
         ST    @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1951 05901000
*   PARMPTR=ADDR(S99RBPTR);         /* RE-INITIALIZE R1 FOR UNALLOC  */ 05902000
         LA    PARMPTR,EDBRBPTR                                    1952 05903000
*/*  MACDATE Y-2 73082                                               */ 05904000
*                                                                  1953 05905000
*   SVC(99);                        /* INVOKE DYN (UN)ALLOCATION     */ 05906000
         SVC   99                                                  1953 05907000
*   CALL UNALOCAT;                  /* CLOSE & FREE ANY PVT CATS   1954 05908000
*                                                            @YM06575*/ 05909000
         BAL   @14,UNALOCAT                                        1954 05910000
*   JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;               /* RESTORE JSCBACT FOR PP CORE   */ 05911000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1955 05912000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1955 05913000
         L     @11,SAVEJSCB                                        1955 05914000
         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1955 05915000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)     */ 05916000
*     SPKA(SAVEKEYA);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 05917000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1957 05918000
         IC    @12,SAVEKEYA                                        1957 05919000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              1957 05920000
*   END;                            /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA) KEY    05921000
*                                      BACK TO SCHED                 */ 05922000
*   END FREECHEK;                                                  1959 05923000
@EL00028 DS    0H                                                  1959 05924000
@EF00028 DS    0H                                                  1959 05925000
@ER00028 LM    @14,@12,@SA00028                                    1959 05926000
         BR    @14                                                 1959 05927000
*UNCATLOG:                                                         1960 05928000
*   PROC(PTRSIOT);                                                 1960 05929000
*                                                                  1960 05930000
UNCATLOG STM   @14,@12,@SA00029                                    1960 05931000
         MVC   @PC00029(4),0(@01)                                  1960 05932000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05933000
*/* USING THE SIOT POINTER PASSED AS A PRAM, THIS PROC WILL READ     */ 05934000
*/*   A JFCB FROM SWA AND ISSUE AN UNCATALOG MACRO FOR THE DSNAME    */ 05935000
*/*   FOUND IN THAT JFCB.                                            */ 05936000
*/**************************************************************     */ 05937000
*                                                                  1961 05938000
*   DCL                                                            1961 05939000
*     PTRSIOT PTR(24);                                             1961 05940000
*   DCL                                                            1962 05941000
*     UNCATNAM CHAR(44);                                           1962 05942000
*   DCL                                                            1963 05943000
*     LCSTATNM CHAR(4) LOCAL STATIC BDY(WORD);                     1963 05944000
*   DCL                                                            1964 05945000
*     REMOVE CHAR(*) GEND;                                         1964 05946000
*   DCL                                                            1965 05947000
*     REMOVE1 CHAR(*) LOCAL STATIC GEND;                           1965 05948000
*   DCL                                                            1966 05949000
*     LENX PTR(31) LOCAL STATIC GEND;                              1966 05950000
*   SWVA=PTRSIOT->SCTPJFCB;         /* PREPARE FOR JFCB READ.        */ 05951000
         L     @12,@PC00029                                        1967 05952000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               1967 05953000
         L     @12,PTRSIOT(,@12)                                   1967 05954000
         L     @11,SWEPAPTR                                        1967 05955000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@11),SCTPJFCB(@12)                           1967 05956000
*   CALL READSWA;                   /* GET THE JFCB                  */ 05957000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         1968 05958000
*   JFCBPTR=SWBLKPTR;               /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR THE JFCB     */ 05959000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        1969 05960000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  1969 05961000
         ST    @12,JFCBPTR                                         1969 05962000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(REMOVE);                                         1970 05963000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(REMOVE1,LENX);                                   1971 05964000
*   UNCATNAM=JFCBDSNM;              /* SET NAME TO BE UNCATALOGED    */ 05965000
         L     @12,JFCBPTR                                         1972 05966000
         MVC   UNCATNAM(44),JFCBDSNM(@12)                          1972 05967000
*   REMOVE(1:LENX)=REMOVE1(1:LENX); /* MOVE LOCAL TO GEN'D FOR RE-ENT*/ 05968000
         L     @12,LENX                                            1973 05969000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               1973 05970000
         EX    @12,@SM04577                                        1973 05971000
*   REMOVE(5:8)=ADDR(UNCATNAM);     /* INSERT RELOCATABLE ADDRESS    */ 05972000
         LA    @12,UNCATNAM                                        1974 05973000
         STCM  @12,15,REMOVE+4                                     1974 05974000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   1975 05975000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 05976000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1976 05977000
*      (GPR02F) RESTRICTED;                                        1976 05978000
*     IPK;                          /* SAVE CURRENT PSW KEY          */ 05979000
         IPK                                                       1977 05980000
*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             1978 05981000
         STC   GPR02F,SAVEKEYA                                     1978 05982000
*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 05983000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1979 05984000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              1979 05985000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    1980 05986000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      1980 05987000
*   END;                            /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   1981 05988000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)      @YM07301*/ 05989000
*   SAVEJSCB=JSCBACT;               /* SAVE OLD ACTIVE       @YM06121*/ 05990000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1982 05991000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1982 05992000
         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1982 05993000
         ST    @12,SAVEJSCB                                        1982 05994000
*   JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;                /* USE INITS JSCB        @YM06121*/ 05995000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1983 05996000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1983 05997000
         ST    @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1983 05998000
*   GEN(  CATALOG REMOVE);          /* ISSUE EXECUTABLE MACRO        */ 05999000
           CATALOG REMOVE                                               06000000
*   JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;               /* RESTORE PP JSCB       @YM06121*/ 06001000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          1985 06002000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   1985 06003000
         L     @11,SAVEJSCB                                        1985 06004000
         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   1985 06005000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)     */ 06006000
*     SPKA(SAVEKEYA);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 06007000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             1987 06008000
         IC    @12,SAVEKEYA                                        1987 06009000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              1987 06010000
*   END;                            /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)   1988 06011000
*                                                            @YM07301*/ 06012000
*   END UNCATLOG;                                                  1989 06013000
@EL00029 DS    0H                                                  1989 06014000
@EF00029 DS    0H                                                  1989 06015000
@ER00029 LM    @14,@12,@SA00029                                    1989 06016000
         BR    @14                                                 1989 06017000
*MSGPROC:                                                          1990 06018000
*   PROC;                                                          1990 06019000
*                                                                  1990 06020000
MSGPROC  STM   @14,@12,@SA00030                                    1990 06021000
*/* THIS PROC ISSUES THE WTO MACRO. THE VARIABLE MSGAREA HAS         */ 06022000
*/*   SET UP BY THE CALLER.                                          */ 06023000
*                                                                  1991 06024000
*   R1=ADDR(MSGAREA);               /* INPUT TO WTO MACRO            */ 06025000
         LA    R1,MSGAREA                                          1991 06026000
*   GEN(WTO MF=(E,(R1)));                                          1992 06027000
         WTO MF=(E,(R1))                                                06028000
*   END MSGPROC;                                                   1993 06029000
@EL00030 DS    0H                                                  1993 06030000
@EF00030 DS    0H                                                  1993 06031000
@ER00030 LM    @14,@12,@SA00030                                    1993 06032000
         BR    @14                                                 1993 06033000
*WRAPUP:                                                           1994 06034000
*   PROC;                                                          1994 06035000
WRAPUP   STM   @14,@12,@SA00031                                    1994 06036000
*   SCTLALOC=LALOCCTR;              /* SET TOTAL NUMBER OF DD'S IN 1995 06037000
*                                      STEP                          */ 06038000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          1995 06039000
         LH    @11,LALOCCTR                                        1995 06040000
         STH   @11,SCTLALOC(,@12)                                  1995 06041000
*   SCTSYSCK=ON;                    /* SIGNAL THE RESTART SVC THAT 1996 06042000
*                                      THE CKPT D.S. IS SECURE.      */ 06043000
         OI    SCTSYSCK(@12),B'00100000'                           1996 06044000
*/********************************                                   */ 06045000
*/*   PUT OUT SUCCESS MESSAGE                                        */ 06046000
*/********************************                                   */ 06047000
*                                                                  1997 06048000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      1997 06049000
*     R2 RESTRICTED;                                               1997 06050000
*   R2=ADDR603;                     /* POINT TO MESSAGE MODULE       */ 06051000
         L     R2,ADDR603                                          1998 06052000
*   R2=R2+SIXTEEN;                  /* GET PAST MODULE IDENTIFIER    */ 06053000
         AL    R2,@CF03784                                         1999 06054000
*   DO WHILE ID=M6;                /* SEARCH FOR SUCCESS MSG ID     */ 06055000
         B     @DE02000                                            2000 06056000
@DL02000 DS    0H                                                  2001 06057000
*     R2=R2+ENTLEN;                 /* BUMP BY LENGTH OF ENTRY       */ 06058000
         AL    R2,@CF03780                                         2001 06059000
*   END;                                                           2002 06060000
@DE02000 CLC   ID(4,R2),@CC04059                                   2002 06061000
         BNE   @DL02000                                            2002 06062000
*   MSGAREA(ONEHEX:MSGLEN)=MSGTEXT(ONEHEX:MSGLEN);/* MOVE MESSAGE  2003 06063000
*                                      SKELETON FROM MODULE TO BUFFER*/ 06064000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2003 06065000
         IC    @12,MSGLEN(,R2)                                     2003 06066000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               2003 06067000
         L     @11,MSGADD-1(,R2)                                   2003 06068000
         EX    @12,@SM04574                                        2003 06069000
*   JNAME=JCTJNAME;                 /* INSERT JOBNAME FROM JCT       */ 06070000
         L     @12,JCTPTR                                          2004 06071000
         MVC   JNAME(8),JCTJNAME(@12)                              2004 06072000
*   JSTART=JBSTART;                 /* INSERT START ADDR AS SAVED BY    06073000
*                                      MSGSETUP                      */ 06074000
         MVC   JSTART(4),JBSTART                                   2005 06075000
*   JEND=JBEND;                     /* SAME...FOR ENDING ADDRESS     */ 06076000
         MVC   JEND(4),JBEND                                       2006 06077000
*   FILLER1=FILL1;                  /* INSERT K INTO MSG             */ 06078000
         MVC   FILLER1(3),@CC04065                                 2007 06079000
*   FILLER2=FILL2;                  /* INSERT FINAL K                */ 06080000
         MVC   FILLER2(2),@CC04067                                 2008 06081000
*   CALL MSGPROC;                   /* ISSUE WTO MACRO               */ 06082000
         BAL   @14,MSGPROC                                         2009 06083000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      2010 06084000
*     R2 UNRESTRICTED;                                             2010 06085000
*   GEN REFS(STAELIST);                                            2011 06086000
*                             /* CLEAN UP STAE  */                      06087000
    ESTAE 0,MF=(E,STAELIST)                                             06088000
*   END WRAPUP;                                                    2012 06089000
@EL00031 DS    0H                                                  2012 06090000
@EF00031 DS    0H                                                  2012 06091000
@ER00031 LM    @14,@12,@SA00031                                    2012 06092000
         BR    @14                                                 2012 06093000
*MSGSETUP:                                                         2013 06094000
*   PROC;                                                          2013 06095000
*                                                                  2013 06096000
MSGSETUP STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     2013 06097000
*/*************************************************************      */ 06098000
*/* MSGSETUP WILL CONVERT THE START AND END ADDRESSES TO K           */ 06099000
*/*    BOUNDARIES AND STORE THEM FOR THE SUCESS MESSAGE.             */ 06100000
*/*    OUTPUT CONSISTS OF THE VARIABLES JBSTART AND JBEND IN         */ 06101000
*/*    PRINTABLE FORM.                                               */ 06102000
*/*************************************************************      */ 06103000
*                                                                  2014 06104000
*   DCL                                                            2014 06105000
*     TEMP1 CHAR(3);                                               2014 06106000
*   DCL                                                            2015 06107000
*     HOLDSTRT FIXED(15);                                          2015 06108000
*   DCL                                                            2016 06109000
*     SIGNOUT BIT(8) CONSTANT('F0'X);                              2016 06110000
*   HOLDSTRT=(SCTMSADR+KROUND)/KBOUND;/* CONVERT START ADDR TO K     */ 06111000
         L     @12,SCTPTR                                          2017 06112000
         LA    @00,1023                                            2017 06113000
         AL    @00,SCTMSADR(,@12)                                  2017 06114000
         SRDA  @00,32                                              2017 06115000
         D     @00,@CF04089                                        2017 06116000
         STH   @01,HOLDSTRT                                        2017 06117000
*   CVD(HOLDSTRT,TEMP1);            /* CONVERT TO DECIMAL            */ 06118000
         CVD   @01,@TS00001                                        2018 06119000
         MVC   TEMP1(3),@TS00001+5                                 2018 06120000
*   UNPK(JBSTART,TEMP1);            /* UNPACK- ALMOST PRINTABLE...   */ 06121000
         UNPK  JBSTART(4),TEMP1(3)                                 2019 06122000
*   JBSTART(4)=JBSTART(4)|SIGNOUT;  /* MAKE SIGN PRINTABLE           */ 06123000
         OI    JBSTART+3,X'F0'                                     2020 06124000
*   HOLDSTRT=HOLDSTRT+SCTMSSZE;     /* CALCULATE END ADDRESS IN K    */ 06125000
         AH    @01,SCTMSSZE(,@12)                                  2021 06126000
         STH   @01,HOLDSTRT                                        2021 06127000
*   CVD(HOLDSTRT,TEMP1);            /* CONVERT TO DECIMAL            */ 06128000
         CVD   @01,@TS00001                                        2022 06129000
         MVC   TEMP1(3),@TS00001+5                                 2022 06130000
*   UNPK(JBEND,TEMP1);              /* UNPACK- ALMOST PRINTABLE      */ 06131000
         UNPK  JBEND(4),TEMP1(3)                                   2023 06132000
*   JBEND(4)=JBEND(4)|SIGNOUT;      /* MAKE SIGN PRINTABLE           */ 06133000
         OI    JBEND+3,X'F0'                                       2024 06134000
*   END MSGSETUP;                                                  2025 06135000
@EL00032 DS    0H                                                  2025 06136000
@EF00032 DS    0H                                                  2025 06137000
@ER00032 LM    @14,@12,12(@13)                                     2025 06138000
         BR    @14                                                 2025 06139000
*SCRATCH:                                                          2026 06140000
*   PROC(SIOTIN);                                                  2026 06141000
*                                                                  2026 06142000
SCRATCH  STM   @14,@12,@SA00033                                    2026 06143000
         MVC   @PC00033(4),0(@01)                                  2026 06144000
*/**************************************************************     */ 06145000
*/* THIS PROC SETS UP THE PARMETER LIST NECESSARY FOR ISSUANCE       */ 06146000
*/* OF THE 'SCRATCH' MACRO, AND ISSUES THE MACRO.                    */ 06147000
*/**************************************************************     */ 06148000
*                                                                  2027 06149000
*   DCL                                                            2027 06150000
*     SIOTIN PTR(24);               /* MAKE PARM ALIGNED CORRECTLY   */ 06151000
*   DCL                                                            2028 06152000
*     LISTPTR PTR(31);              /* PTR TO PARM LIST FOR SCRATCH  */ 06153000
*   DCL                                                            2029 06154000
*     LISTLEN FIXED(31);            /* HOLDER FOR LENGTH OF LIST     */ 06155000
*   DCL                                                            2030 06156000
*     SCRCHDSN CHAR(44);            /* DSNAME FOR SCRATCH MACRO      */ 06157000
*   DCL                                                            2031 06158000
*     LCLDSN CHAR(4) LOCAL STATIC BDY(WORD);                       2031 06159000
*   DCL                                                            2032 06160000
*     LCLLST CHAR(4) LOCAL STATIC BDY(WORD);                       2032 06161000
*   DCL                                                            2033 06162000
*     LENY PTR(31) LOCAL STATIC GEND;                              2033 06163000
*   DCL                                                            2034 06164000
*     NEWVOLS CHAR(*) GEND;         /* DEFINE GENERATED AREA         */ 06165000
*   DCL                                                            2035 06166000
*     NEWVOLS1 CHAR(*) LOCAL STATIC GEND;/* DEFINE LOCAL FOR INIT    */ 06167000
*   DCL                                                            2036 06168000
*     1 VOLIST CHAR(*) BASED(LISTPTR),/* LIST FOR SCRATCH            */ 06169000
*      2 NUMVOLS FIXED(15),         /*                       @YM08609*/ 06170000
*      2 VOLENTRY(*) CHAR(12),      /* ARRAY OF VOLSERS              */ 06171000
*        4 UNIT CHAR(4),                                           2036 06172000
*        4 SERIAL CHAR(6),                                         2036 06173000
*        4 SEQNO FIXED(15);                                        2036 06174000
*   DCL                                                            2037 06175000
*     TWELVE BIT(8) CONSTANT('0C'X);                               2037 06176000
*   DCL                                                            2038 06177000
*     TWO BIT(8) CONSTANT('02'X);                                  2038 06178000
*   DCL                                                            2039 06179000
*     VOLHOLD FIXED(15);                                           2039 06180000
*   DCL                                                            2040 06181000
*     HOLDI FIXED(8);                                              2040 06182000
*   DCL                                                            2041 06183000
*     HOLDX FIXED(8);                                              2041 06184000
*   DCL                                                            2042 06185000
*     XVOLI FIXED(8);                                              2042 06186000
*   VOLHOLD=ZEROPTR;                /* INSURE ARITH AND ZERO @YM07552*/ 06187000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2043 06188000
         STH   @12,VOLHOLD                                         2043 06189000
*   SWVA=SIOTIN->SCTPJFCB;          /* PREPARE FOR JFCB READ         */ 06190000
         L     @12,@PC00033                                        2044 06191000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               2044 06192000
         L     @12,SIOTIN(,@12)                                    2044 06193000
         L     @11,SWEPAPTR                                        2044 06194000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@11),SCTPJFCB(@12)                           2044 06195000
*   CALL READSWA;                   /* READ JFCB TO GET VOLSERS      */ 06196000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         2045 06197000
*   JFCBPTR=SWBLKPTR;               /* ADDR'ABILITY FOR JFCB         */ 06198000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2046 06199000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  2046 06200000
         ST    @12,JFCBPTR                                         2046 06201000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      2047 06202000
*     R0 RESTRICTED;                                               2047 06203000
*   R0=(JFCBNVOL*TWELVE)+TWO;       /* CALCULATE SPACE NEEDED        */ 06204000
         SLR   R0,R0                                               2048 06205000
         IC    R0,JFCBNVOL(,@12)                                   2048 06206000
         MH    R0,@CH03846                                         2048 06207000
         AL    R0,@CF02918                                         2048 06208000
*   LISTLEN=R0;                     /* SAVE THE LENGTH FOR FREEMAIN  */ 06209000
         ST    R0,LISTLEN                                          2049 06210000
*   GEN(GETMAIN R,LV=(R0));         /* GET SPACE FOR PARMLIST        */ 06211000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(R0)                                              06212000
*   LISTPTR=R1;                     /* PARMLIST ADDR'ABILITY         */ 06213000
         ST    R1,LISTPTR                                          2051 06214000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      2052 06215000
*     R0 UNRESTRICTED;                                             2052 06216000
*   NUMVOLS=JFCBNVOL;               /* SET NUM VOLSERS INTO LIST     */ 06217000
         L     @12,LISTPTR                                         2053 06218000
         L     @11,JFCBPTR                                         2053 06219000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             2053 06220000
         IC    @09,JFCBNVOL(,@11)                                  2053 06221000
         STCM  @09,3,NUMVOLS(@12)                                  2053 06222000
*   SCRCHDSN=JFCBDSNM;              /* SET DSNAME INTO LIST          */ 06223000
         MVC   SCRCHDSN(44),JFCBDSNM(@11)                          2054 06224000
*   VOLHOLD=JFCBNVOL;               /* USE VALUE W/OUT DESTROYING  2055 06225000
*                                      NVOL                          */ 06226000
         STH   @09,VOLHOLD                                         2055 06227000
*   DO I=1 TO VOLHOLD WHILE I<6;    /* PLUG IN THE FIRST 5 VOLSERS   */ 06228000
         LA    @12,1                                               2056 06229000
         B     @DE02056                                            2056 06230000
@DL02056 LA    @11,6                                               2056 06231000
         CR    @12,@11                                             2056 06232000
         BNL   @DC02056                                            2056 06233000
*     UNIT(I)=SIOTIN->SIOTDEVT;     /* INSERT UNIT TYPE      @YM06121*/ 06234000
         L     @09,LISTPTR                                         2057 06235000
         LR    @15,@12                                             2057 06236000
         MH    @15,@CH00558                                        2057 06237000
         ST    @15,@TF00001                                        2057 06238000
         ALR   @15,@09                                             2057 06239000
         AL    @15,@CF04579                                        2057 06240000
         L     @14,@PC00033                                        2057 06241000
         BCTR  @14,0                                               2057 06242000
         L     @01,SIOTIN(,@14)                                    2057 06243000
         MVC   UNIT-2(4,@15),SIOTDEVT(@01)                         2057 06244000
*     SERIAL(I)=JFCAVOLS(I);        /* INSERT VOLSER                 */ 06245000
         LR    @01,@09                                             2058 06246000
         AL    @01,@TF00001                                        2058 06247000
         AL    @01,@CF04580                                        2058 06248000
         LR    @15,@11                                             2058 06249000
         MR    @14,@12                                             2058 06250000
         L     @11,JFCBPTR                                         2058 06251000
         ALR   @11,@15                                             2058 06252000
         MVC   SERIAL-6(6,@01),JFCAVOLS-6(@11)                     2058 06253000
*     SEQNO(I)=0;                   /* SEQUENCE ALWAYS ZERO FOR DA   */ 06254000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             2059 06255000
         AL    @09,@TF00001                                        2059 06256000
         STCM  @11,3,SEQNO-12(@09)                                 2059 06257000
*     HOLDI=I;                      /* RETAIN POSITION IN LIST       */ 06258000
         STC   @12,HOLDI                                           2060 06259000
*   END;                                                           2061 06260000
*                                                                  2061 06261000
         AL    @12,@CF00069                                        2061 06262000
@DE02056 ST    @12,I                                               2061 06263000
         CH    @12,VOLHOLD                                         2061 06264000
         BNH   @DL02056                                            2061 06265000
@DC02056 DS    0H                                                  2062 06266000
*/**************************************                             */ 06267000
*/* IF THERE ARE LESS THAN 5 VOLUME                                  */ 06268000
*/* SERIALS FOR THIS DATA SET, PROCESS                               */ 06269000
*/* IS COMPLETE EXCEPT TO ISSUE THE                                  */ 06270000
*/* SCRATCH MACRO. FOLLOWING CODE                                    */ 06271000
*/* PULLS VOLSERS OUT OF THE JFCBX(S)                                */ 06272000
*/**************************************                             */ 06273000
*                                                                  2062 06274000
*   VOLHOLD=VOLHOLD-5;              /* DEDUCT JFCB CAPACITY          */ 06275000
         LH    @12,VOLHOLD                                         2062 06276000
         SL    @12,@CF00034                                        2062 06277000
         STH   @12,VOLHOLD                                         2062 06278000
*   IF VOLHOLD>0 THEN               /* MORE VOLSERS IN JFCBX(S)??    */ 06279000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             2063 06280000
         BNP   @RF02063                                            2063 06281000
*     DO;                           /* YES...                        */ 06282000
*       SWVA=JFCBEXAD;              /* SETUP FOR INITIAL READ        */ 06283000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2065 06284000
         L     @11,JFCBPTR                                         2065 06285000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),JFCBEXAD(@11)                           2065 06286000
*       TEMPSW=ON;                  /* LOOP CONTROL                  */ 06287000
         OI    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  2066 06288000
*       DO WHILE TEMPSW=ON;                                        2067 06289000
         B     @DE02067                                            2067 06290000
@DL02067 DS    0H                                                  2068 06291000
*         CALL READSWA;             /* GET 1ST (NEXT) JFCBX          */ 06292000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         2068 06293000
*         IF VOLHOLD>FIFTEEN THEN                                  2069 06294000
         LH    @12,VOLHOLD                                         2069 06295000
         C     @12,@CF03927                                        2069 06296000
         BNH   @RF02069                                            2069 06297000
*           DO;                     /* HANDLE FULL JFCBX             */ 06298000
*             XVOLI=0;              /* PRIME FOR JFCBXVOL INDEX      */ 06299000
         MVI   XVOLI,X'00'                                         2071 06300000
*             SWVA=JFCBXTTR;        /* PREPARE FOR POSSIBLE NXTREAD  */ 06301000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2072 06302000
         L     @11,JFCBXPTR                                        2072 06303000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),JFCBXTTR(@11)                           2072 06304000
*             HOLDX=HOLDI;          /* PICK UP POSITION IN LIST      */ 06305000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2073 06306000
         IC    @12,HOLDI                                           2073 06307000
         STC   @12,HOLDX                                           2073 06308000
*             DO I=HOLDX TO(HOLDX+FIFTEEN);/* LOOP THRU 15 VOLS      */ 06309000
         B     @DE02074                                            2074 06310000
@DL02074 DS    0H                                                  2075 06311000
*               XVOLI=XVOLI+ONEHEX; /* JFCBXVOL INDEX                */ 06312000
         LA    @11,1                                               2075 06313000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             2075 06314000
         IC    @09,XVOLI                                           2075 06315000
         ALR   @09,@11                                             2075 06316000
         STC   @09,XVOLI                                           2075 06317000
*               UNIT(I)=SIOTIN->SIOTDEVT;/* INSERT UNIT TYPE @YM06121*/ 06318000
         L     @15,LISTPTR                                         2076 06319000
         LR    @14,@12                                             2076 06320000
         MH    @14,@CH00558                                        2076 06321000
         ST    @14,@TF00001                                        2076 06322000
         ALR   @14,@15                                             2076 06323000
         AL    @14,@CF04579                                        2076 06324000
         L     @01,@PC00033                                        2076 06325000
         BCTR  @01,0                                               2076 06326000
         L     @01,SIOTIN(,@01)                                    2076 06327000
         MVC   UNIT-2(4,@14),SIOTDEVT(@01)                         2076 06328000
*               SERIAL(I)=JFCBXVOL(XVOLI);/* INSERT VOLSER           */ 06329000
         LR    @14,@15                                             2077 06330000
         AL    @14,@TF00001                                        2077 06331000
         AL    @14,@CF04580                                        2077 06332000
         MH    @09,@CH00035                                        2077 06333000
         L     @01,JFCBXPTR                                        2077 06334000
         ALR   @01,@09                                             2077 06335000
         BCTR  @01,0                                               2077 06336000
         BCTR  @01,0                                               2077 06337000
         MVC   SERIAL-6(6,@14),JFCBXVOL-4(@01)                     2077 06338000
*               SEQNO(I)=0;         /* SEQUENCE ALWAYS 0 FOR DA      */ 06339000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             2078 06340000
         AL    @15,@TF00001                                        2078 06341000
         STCM  @09,3,SEQNO-12(@15)                                 2078 06342000
*               VOLHOLD=VOLHOLD-ONEHEX;/* CORRECT NUM VOLS LEFT      */ 06343000
         LCR   @11,@11                                             2079 06344000
         AH    @11,VOLHOLD                                         2079 06345000
         STH   @11,VOLHOLD                                         2079 06346000
*               HOLDI=I;            /* MAINTAIN PROPER PLACE IN LIST */ 06347000
         STC   @12,HOLDI                                           2080 06348000
*             END;                  /* CLOSE FULL JFCBX LOOP         */ 06349000
         AL    @12,@CF00069                                        2081 06350000
@DE02074 ST    @12,I                                               2081 06351000
         LA    @11,15                                              2081 06352000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             2081 06353000
         IC    @09,HOLDX                                           2081 06354000
         ALR   @11,@09                                             2081 06355000
         CR    @12,@11                                             2081 06356000
         BNH   @DL02074                                            2081 06357000
*           END;                    /* CLOSE FULL JFCBX(S) LOOP      */ 06358000
*         ELSE                                                     2083 06359000
*           DO;                     /* HANDLE PARTIALLY FILLED JFCBX */ 06360000
         B     @RC02069                                            2083 06361000
@RF02069 DS    0H                                                  2084 06362000
*             XVOLI=0;              /* PRIME JFCBXVOL INDEX AGAIN    */ 06363000
         MVI   XVOLI,X'00'                                         2084 06364000
*             TEMPSW=NOTON;         /* WILL STOP JFCBX PROCESSING    */ 06365000
         NI    TEMPSW,B'01111111'                                  2085 06366000
*             HOLDX=HOLDI;          /* GET PROPER PLACE IN LIST      */ 06367000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2086 06368000
         IC    @12,HOLDI                                           2086 06369000
         STC   @12,HOLDX                                           2086 06370000
*             DO I=HOLDX TO(HOLDX+VOLHOLD);                        2087 06371000
         B     @DE02087                                            2087 06372000
@DL02087 DS    0H                                                  2088 06373000
*               XVOLI=XVOLI+ONEHEX; /* JFCBXVOL INDEX                */ 06374000
         LA    @11,1                                               2088 06375000
         SLR   @09,@09                                             2088 06376000
         IC    @09,XVOLI                                           2088 06377000
         ALR   @11,@09                                             2088 06378000
         STC   @11,XVOLI                                           2088 06379000
*               UNIT(I)=SIOTDEVT;   /* INSERT UNIT TYPE              */ 06380000
         L     @09,LISTPTR                                         2089 06381000
         LR    @15,@12                                             2089 06382000
         MH    @15,@CH00558                                        2089 06383000
         ST    @15,@TF00001                                        2089 06384000
         ALR   @15,@09                                             2089 06385000
         AL    @15,@CF04579                                        2089 06386000
         L     @14,SIOTPTR                                         2089 06387000
         MVC   UNIT-2(4,@15),SIOTDEVT(@14)                         2089 06388000
*               SERIAL(I)=JFCBXVOL(XVOLI);/* INSERT VOLSER           */ 06389000
         LR    @01,@09                                             2090 06390000
         AL    @01,@TF00001                                        2090 06391000
         AL    @01,@CF04580                                        2090 06392000
         MH    @11,@CH00035                                        2090 06393000
         L     @15,JFCBXPTR                                        2090 06394000
         ALR   @15,@11                                             2090 06395000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               2090 06396000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               2090 06397000
         MVC   SERIAL-6(6,@01),JFCBXVOL-4(@15)                     2090 06398000
*               SEQNO(I)=0;         /* SEQUENCE ALWAYS 0 FOR DA      */ 06399000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             2091 06400000
         AL    @09,@TF00001                                        2091 06401000
         STCM  @11,3,SEQNO-12(@09)                                 2091 06402000
*             END;                  /* END INSERT VOLSER LOOP        */ 06403000
         AL    @12,@CF00069                                        2092 06404000
@DE02087 ST    @12,I                                               2092 06405000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             2092 06406000
         IC    @11,HOLDX                                           2092 06407000
         AH    @11,VOLHOLD                                         2092 06408000
         CR    @12,@11                                             2092 06409000
         BNH   @DL02087                                            2092 06410000
*           END;                    /* END PARTIAL JFCBX GROUP       */ 06411000
*       END;                        /* END TOTAL JFCBX GROUP         */ 06412000
@RC02069 DS    0H                                                  2094 06413000
@DE02067 TM    TEMPSW,B'10000000'                                  2094 06414000
         BO    @DL02067                                            2094 06415000
*     END;                          /* END JFCBXTEST GROUP           */ 06416000
*/**************************************                             */ 06417000
*/* NOW ISSUE THE SCRATCH MACRO...                                   */ 06418000
*/**************************************                             */ 06419000
*                                                                  2096 06420000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      2096 06421000
*    (R0,                                                          2096 06422000
*     R1) RESTRICTED;                                              2096 06423000
@RF02063 DS    0H                                                  2097 06424000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(NEWVOLS);                                        2097 06425000
*   GEN DATA DEFS(NEWVOLS1,LENY);                                  2098 06426000
*   NEWVOLS(1:LENY)=NEWVOLS1(1:LENY);/* COPY LOCAL TO RE-ENTRANT     */ 06427000
         L     @12,LENY                                            2099 06428000
         BCTR  @12,0                                               2099 06429000
         EX    @12,@SM04581                                        2099 06430000
*   NEWVOLS(5:8)=ADDR(SCRCHDSN);    /* SET RELOCATABLE ADDR OF DSN   */ 06431000
         LA    @12,SCRCHDSN                                        2100 06432000
         STCM  @12,15,NEWVOLS+4                                    2100 06433000
*   NEWVOLS(13:16)=LISTPTR;         /* SET RELOCATABLE LIST ADDR     */ 06434000
         MVC   NEWVOLS+12(4),LISTPTR                               2101 06435000
*   R0=ZEROPTR;                     /* INDICATE NO UCB PASSED FOR  2102 06436000
*                                      MOUNTS                        */ 06437000
         SLR   R0,R0                                               2102 06438000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   2103 06439000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 06440000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2104 06441000
*      (GPR02F) RESTRICTED;                                        2104 06442000
*     IPK;                          /* SAVE CURRENT PSW KEY          */ 06443000
         IPK                                                       2105 06444000
*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             2106 06445000
         STC   GPR02F,SAVEKEYA                                     2106 06446000
*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 06447000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2107 06448000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              2107 06449000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2108 06450000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      2108 06451000
*   END;                            /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   2109 06452000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)      @YM07301*/ 06453000
*   SAVEJSCB=JSCBACT;               /* SAVE OLD ACTIVE       @YM06121*/ 06454000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          2110 06455000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   2110 06456000
         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2110 06457000
         ST    @12,SAVEJSCB                                        2110 06458000
*   JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;                /* USE INITS JSCB        @YM06121*/ 06459000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          2111 06460000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   2111 06461000
         ST    @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2111 06462000
*   GEN( SCRATCH NEWVOLS);          /* ISSUE EXECUTABLE MACRO        */ 06463000
          SCRATCH NEWVOLS                                               06464000
*   JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;               /* RESTORE PP JSCB       @YM06121*/ 06465000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          2113 06466000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   2113 06467000
         L     @11,SAVEJSCB                                        2113 06468000
         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2113 06469000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)     */ 06470000
*     SPKA(SAVEKEYA);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 06471000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2115 06472000
         IC    @12,SAVEKEYA                                        2115 06473000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              2115 06474000
*   END;                            /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)   2116 06475000
*                                                            @YM07301*/ 06476000
*/**************************************                             */ 06477000
*/* FREE THE AREA USED FOR THE LIST                                  */ 06478000
*/**************************************                             */ 06479000
*                                                                  2117 06480000
*   R1=LISTPTR;                     /* SET AREA ADDRESS FOR FREEMAIN */ 06481000
         L     R1,LISTPTR                                          2117 06482000
*   R0=LISTLEN;                     /* SET LENGTH OF AREA            */ 06483000
         L     R0,LISTLEN                                          2118 06484000
*   GEN(FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1));   /* ISSUE THE FREEMAIN            */ 06485000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        06486000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      2120 06487000
*    (R0,                                                          2120 06488000
*     R1) UNRESTRICTED;                                            2120 06489000
*   END SCRATCH;                                                   2121 06490000
@EL00033 DS    0H                                                  2121 06491000
@EF00033 DS    0H                                                  2121 06492000
@ER00033 LM    @14,@12,@SA00033                                    2121 06493000
         BR    @14                                                 2121 06494000
*STAEPROC:                                                         2122 06495000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               2122 06496000
STAEPROC DS    0H                                                  2123 06497000
*   DCL                                                            2123 06498000
*     M10 CHAR(4) CONSTANT('MG10');                                2123 06499000
*   DCL                                                            2124 06500000
*     DUMPLIST CHAR(*) GEND BDY(WORD);/* DYNAMIC LIST                */ 06501000
*   DCL                                                            2125 06502000
*     DLIST1 CHAR(*) GEND LOCAL STATIC BDY(WORD);/* LOCAL LIST       */ 06503000
*   DCL                                                            2126 06504000
*     LENLIST1 PTR(31) LOCAL STATIC GEND;                          2126 06505000
*   DCL                                                            2127 06506000
*     ADDRDATA PTR(31) DEF(DUMPLIST) POS(13);                      2127 06507000
*   DCL                                                            2128 06508000
*     DUMPDATA CHAR(*) DEF(DUMPLIST) POS(25);                      2128 06509000
*   DCL                                                            2129 06510000
*     JINSERT CHAR(8) DEF(MSGAREA) POS(39);                        2129 06511000
*   DCL                                                            2130 06512000
*     REG9X REG(9) PTR(31) RESTRICTED;                             2130 06513000
*   DCL                                                            2131 06514000
*     REGPICUP PTR(31) BASED(SDWAPARM);                            2131 06515000
*   DCL                                                            2132 06516000
*     SDWAPTR REG(1) PTR(31) RESTRICTED;                           2132 06517000
*   DCL                                                            2133 06518000
*     SAVEONE PTR(31) ABNL;                                        2133 06519000
*   DCL                                                            2134 06520000
*     SAVE14 PTR(31) ABNL;                                         2134 06521000
*   DCL                                                            2135 06522000
*     R14 REG(14) RESTRICTED;                                      2135 06523000
*   DCL                                                            2136 06524000
*     R15 PTR(31) REG(15);                                         2136 06525000
*   DCL                                                            2137 06526000
*     NOSDWA BIT(1);                                               2137 06527000
*                                                                  2137 06528000
*/**************************************                             */ 06529000
*/* PUT OUT A MESSAGE TO THE OPER AND                                */ 06530000
*/* THE PROGRAMMER THAT THE RESTART HAS                              */ 06531000
*/* ABENDED.(UNLESS THIS IS CANCEL)                                  */ 06532000
*/**************************************                             */ 06533000
*                                                                  2138 06534000
*   GENERATE;                                                      2138 06535000
*         /*                                                            06536000
    BALR 15,0       ADRESSABILITY                                       06537000
    LA   9,12       FOR SDWA COMPARE                                    06538000
    CR   9,0        SDWA PRESENT ?                                      06539000
    BNE  18(15)     YES, GO GET REGS FROM SDWA                          06540000
    L    9,0(2)     NO, PICKUP  FROM R2                                 06541000
    B    26(15)     NOW GET REGS                                        06542000
    L    9,0(1)     PICK UP PARM POINTER                                06543000
    L    9,0(9)     PICK UP PARM                                        06544000
    LM   2,13,8(9)  GET THE REGS                                        06545000
    STM 0,15,136(1)  STORE FOR RETRY ROUTINE                            06546000
*   IF R0=12 THEN                                                  2139 06547000
         C     R0,@CF00558                                         2139 06548000
         BNE   @RF02139                                            2139 06549000
*     NOSDWA=ON;                    /* INDICATE TYPE OF EXIT         */ 06550000

*     NOSDWA=NOTON;                 /* INSURE ZERO FLAG              */ 06553000

*   SAVEONE=R1;                                                    2142 06556000

*   SAVE14=R14;                                                    2143 06558000

*   TCBJSCB->JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;      /* P/P JSCB              @YM08127*/ 06562000
         L     @15,TCBPTR                                          2145 06563000

         L     @12,SAVEJSCB                                        2145 06565000
         ST    @12,JSCBACT(,@15)                                   2145 06566000
*   R2=ADDR603;                                                    2146 06567000

*   R2=R2+16;                       /* GET PAST HEADER FOR MSG MOD   */ 06569000

*   DO WHILE ID=M10;               /* LOOP TILL CORRECT MSG FOUND   */ 06571000

*     R2=R2+ENTLEN;                 /* BUMP PAST THIS ENTRY          */ 06574000
         AL    R2,@CF03780                                         2149 06575000
*   END;                                                           2150 06576000

*   MSGAREA(ONEHEX:MSGLEN)=MSGTEXT(ONEHEX:MSGLEN);/* MOVE MSG IN     */ 06579000

         IC    @15,MSGLEN(,R2)                                     2151 06581000
         BCTR  @15,0                                               2151 06582000

*   JINSERT=JCTJNAME;               /* PUT JOB NAME TO MESSAGE       */ 06585000
         L     @15,JCTPTR                                          2152 06586000

*   R1=ADDR(MSGAREA);               /* INPUT TO WTO MACRO            */ 06588000
         LA    R1,MSGAREA                                          2153 06589000
*   GEN(WTO MF=(E,(R1)));           /* PERFORM THE WTO AND WTP       */ 06590000
         WTO MF=(E,(R1))                                                06591000
*/*************************************                              */ 06592000
*/* NOW TAKE A DUMP OF SQA,NUCLEUS,LSQA                              */ 06593000
*/*  REGION,LPA ACTIVE MODULES, TRACE                                */ 06594000
*/*  AREAS,AND SWA.                                                  */ 06595000
*/*************************************                              */ 06596000
*                                                                  2155 06597000
*   DUMPLIST(1:LENLIST1)=DLIST1(1:LENLIST1);/* INIT LIST     @YM08194*/ 06598000

         BCTR  @15,0                                               2155 06600000
         EX    @15,@SM04585                                        2155 06601000
*   ADDRDATA=ADDR(DUMPDATA);                                       2156 06602000

*   R14=SAVE14;                     /* RESTORE R14 FROM MACROS       */ 06609000

*   IF NOSDWA=ON THEN               /* IF NO SDWA WAS GOTTEN,SETUP 2161 06611000
*                                      RETURN                @YM08607*/ 06612000

*     DO;                                                          2162 06615000
*       R0=ADDR(CANPROC);           /* SETUP RETRY ADDRESS           */ 06616000

*       GPR01P,                                                    2176 06647000
*       GPR14P,                                                    2176 06648000
*       GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                            2176 06649000

*   END STAEPROC;                                                  2178 06651000

@EF00034 DS    0H                                                  2178 06653000
@ER00034 BR    @14                                                 2178 06654000
*CANPROC:                                                          2179 06655000
*   PROC;                                                          2179 06656000
*                                                                  2179 06657000
CANPROC  STM   @14,@12,@SA00035                                    2179 06658000
*/***************************************************                */ 06659000
*/* CANPROC IS ENTERED TO ABNORMALLY EXIT FROM 609                   */ 06660000
*/*   IN THE FOLLOWING CASES:                                        */ 06661000
*/*   1) ERROR CONDITION DETECTED                                    */ 06662000
*/*   2) RESTARTING JOB WAS CANCELLED                                */ 06663000
*/*   3) RETRY EXIT FROM STAE                                        */ 06664000
*/***************************************************                */ 06665000
*                                                                  2180 06666000
*   DCL                                                            2180 06667000
*     CLOSPARM CHAR(4) DEFINED(ADOKECB);                           2180 06668000
*   DCL                                                            2181 06669000
*     CANP CHAR(4) CONSTANT('XXXX');                               2181 06670000
*   DCL                                                            2182 06671000
*     BADVOL CHAR(3) CONSTANT('238');                              2182 06672000
*   DCL                                                            2183 06673000
*     MSGSLOT CHAR(3) DEF(MSGAREA) POS(50);/*                @YM03484*/ 06674000
*   DCL                                                            2184 06675000
*     DYNMSG CHAR(3) CONSTANT('231');/*                      @YM03484*/ 06676000
*/* DO NOT DO NORMAL CANPROC PROCESSING IF THE ERROR WAS ON          */ 06677000
*/* DYNAMIC ALLOC OF THE CKPT DS, AS NO DCB WAS INITIALIZED          */ 06678000
*                                                                  2185 06679000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   2185 06680000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 06681000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2186 06682000
*      (GPR02F) RESTRICTED;                                        2186 06683000
*     IPK;                          /* SAVE CURRENT PSW KEY          */ 06684000
         IPK                                                       2187 06685000
*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             2188 06686000
         STC   GPR02F,SAVEKEYA                                     2188 06687000
*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 06688000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2189 06689000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              2189 06690000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2190 06691000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      2190 06692000
*   END;                            /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   2191 06693000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR) KEY = 0      */ 06694000
*   DCBREG=ADDR(DCBCKPT);           /* INIT DCB POINTER              */ 06695000
         LA    DCBREG,DCBCKPT                                      2192 06696000
*   IF(MSGSLOT=DYNMSG&MSGSLOT=BADVOL/*                     @YM06575*/ 06697000
*       &GOODOPEN=ON                /* DONT DETACH IF NOT OPEN       */ 06698000
*       &STAENTR=ON) THEN          /*                       @YM08127*/ 06699000

         BNO   @RF02193                                            2193 06705000
         TM    STAENTR,B'10000000'                                 2193 06706000
         BO    @RF02193                                            2193 06707000
*     DO;                           /*                       @YM03484*/ 06708000
*       CLOSPARM=CANP;              /* TELL 610 TO CLOSE WITHOUT   2195 06709000
*                                      REREAD                @YM08125*/ 06710000
         MVC   CLOSPARM(4),@CC04467                                2195 06711000
*       SAVEJSCB=JSCBACT;           /* PRESERVE PP JSCBACT           */ 06712000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          2196 06713000

         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2196 06715000

*       JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;            /* CLOSE NEEDS INITS JSCB        */ 06717000

*       HIBITC1=ON;                 /* PREPARE TO WAIT FOR CLOSE     */ 06721000
         OI    HIBITC1,B'10000000'                                 2198 06722000
*       DO;                         /* POST (ECB610)                 */ 06723000
*         RESPECIFY                                                2200 06724000
*          (GPR00F,                                                2200 06725000
*           GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                    2200 06726000
*         GPR00F=0;                 /* POST CODE IN R0               */ 06727000
         SLR   GPR00F,GPR00F                                       2201 06728000
*         GPR01P=ADDR(ECB610);      /* ECB ADDRESS                   */ 06729000
         LA    GPR01P,ECB610                                       2202 06730000
*         SVC(2);                   /* ISSUE POST SVC                */ 06731000
         SVC   2                                                   2203 06732000
*         RESPECIFY                                                2204 06733000
*          (GPR00F,                                                2204 06734000
*           GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                  2204 06735000
*       END;                        /* POST (ECB610) LET 610 GO AWAY    06736000
*                                      GRACEFULLY                    */ 06737000
*       DO;                         /* WAIT ECBLIST(ADECBC1)         */ 06738000
*         RESPECIFY                                                2207 06739000
*          (GPR00P,                                                2207 06740000
*           GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                    2207 06741000
*         GPR00P=1;                 /* LOAD WAIT COUNT               */ 06742000
         LA    GPR00P,1                                            2208 06743000
*         GPR01P=-ADDR(ADECBC1);    /* ADDRESS OF LIST OF ECB'S      */ 06744000
         LA    GPR01P,ADECBC1                                      2209 06745000

*         SVC(1);                   /* WAIT SVC                      */ 06747000

*         RESPECIFY                                                2211 06749000
*          (GPR00P,                                                2211 06750000
*           GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                  2211 06751000
*       END;                        /* WAIT ECBLIST(ADECBC1)         */ 06752000
*/* LINE DELETED FOR PTM                     @YM08183                */ 06753000
*                                                                  2213 06754000
*     END;                          /* DETACH DAUGHTER       @ZA06240*/ 06755000
*   IF TCBLTC=ZEROPTR THEN         /* TASK IF ONE EXISTS    @ZA06240*/ 06756000

         BZ    @RF02214                                            2214 06760000
*     DO;                           /* DETACH (SAVETCB)              */ 06761000

         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2221 06775000
*   IF ALOCPARM=ON THEN             /* DONT GO TO FREECHEK IF DYN  2222 06776000

*     CALL FREECHEK;                /* GO DYNAMICALLY UNALLOCATE THE */ 06781000
*                                                                  2223 06782000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 06784000
*   /*                                                               */ 06785000
*   /* THE SYSCHK DD TO REMOVE IT FROM INITS TIOT            @YM03546*/ 06786000
*   /*                                                       @YM08157*/ 06787000
*   /*                                                               */ 06788000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 06789000
*                                                                  2224 06790000
*   ELSE                            /* ELSE                  @YM30475*/ 06791000
*     DO;                           /*                       @YM30475*/ 06792000
         B     @RC02222                                            2224 06793000
@RF02222 DS    0H                                                  2225 06794000
*       SAVEJSCB=JSCBACT;           /* SAVE ACTIVE JSCB      @YM30475*/ 06795000

*       JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;            /* USE INIT JSCB         @YM30475*/ 06800000

         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   2226 06802000

*       CALL UNALOCAT;              /* FREE CATALOGS         @YM30475*/ 06804000
         BAL   @14,UNALOCAT                                        2227 06805000
*       JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;           /* RESTORE JSCB PTR      @YM30475*/ 06806000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          2228 06807000

         L     @11,SAVEJSCB                                        2228 06809000
         ST    @11,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2228 06810000
*     END;                          /*                       @YM30475*/ 06811000
*   GEN REFS(STAELIST);                                            2230 06812000
@RC02222 DS    0H                                                  2230 06813000
   ESTAE 0,MF=(E,STAELIST)                                              06814000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET EXTKEY(SCHED)         */ 06815000
*     SPKA(16);                     /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 06816000
         LA    @12,16                                              2232 06817000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              2232 06818000
*   END;                            /* MODESET EXTKEY(SCHED) KEY BACK   06819000
*                                      TO SCHED                      */ 06820000
*   GENERATE;                                                      2234 06821000
     IC @02,CALLKEY           PICK UP CALLERS KEY                       06822000
     L 13,@SA00001+4        PICK UP ORIGINAL REG 13                     06823000
     L @00,@SIZDATD             PICK UP SIZE TO FREE                    06824000
     LR @01,@03                 PICK UP AREA ADDR TO FREE               06825000

*BITSOFF:                                                          2236 06836000
*   PROC;                                                          2236 06837000
*                                                                  2236 06838000
BITSOFF  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     2236 06839000
*/*************************************************************      */ 06840000
*/* THIS PROC MAKES DECISIONS CONCERNING WHAT BITS IN THE            */ 06841000
*/* RESTORED SIOT UNIT TYPE FIELD MUST BE TURNED OFF TO LET THE      */ 06842000
*/* SIOTUTYP AND THE EDTTAB MATCH FOR ALLOCATION PURPOSES            */ 06843000
*/*************************************************************      */ 06844000
*                                                                  2237 06845000
*   IF SIO3DACC=ON THEN                                            2237 06846000

         BNO   @RF02237                                            2237 06849000
*     DO;                                                          2238 06850000

*FREEEPA:                                                          2252 06892000
*   PROC;                                                          2252 06893000
FREEEPA  STM   @14,@12,@SA00037                                    2252 06894000
*   DCL                                                            2253 06895000
*     HEX10 BIT(16) CONSTANT('0010'X);                             2253 06896000
*   DCL                                                            2254 06897000
*     FREELEN FIXED(15);                                           2254 06898000
*   DCL                                                            2255 06899000
*     FREEAREA BASED(SWCHNPTR);                                    2255 06900000
*   IF SWCHNPTR=0 THEN             /* IF AREA EXIST, FREE IT      2256 06901000
*                                                            @YM08161*/ 06902000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2256 06903000
         L     @12,SWCHNPTR(,@12)                                  2256 06904000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             2256 06905000
         BZ    @RF02256                                            2256 06906000
*     DO;                                                          2257 06907000
*       FREELEN=HEX10;                                             2258 06908000
         LA    @12,16                                              2258 06909000
         STH   @12,FREELEN                                         2258 06910000
*       DO;                         /* FREEMAIN(R)                 2259 06911000
*                                      LV(FREELEN)SP(230)A(FREEAREA) */ 06912000
*         RESPECIFY                                                2260 06913000
*          (GPR01F,                                                2260 06914000
*           GPR00F) RESTRICTED;                                    2260 06915000
*         GPR00F=FREELEN;           /* LENGTH REQUESTED              */ 06916000
         LR    GPR00F,@12                                          2261 06917000
*         GPR01F=230;               /* SP IN REG 1                   */ 06918000
         LA    GPR01F,230                                          2262 06919000
*         GEN(SLL   GPR01F,24)                                     2263 06920000
*         NODEFS NOREFS NOSETS NOEXIT NOFLOWS SEQFLOW;             2263 06921000
         SLL   GPR01F,24                                                06922000
*         GPR00F=GPR00F|GPR01F;     /* SP IN HI BYTE                 */ 06923000
         OR    GPR00F,GPR01F                                       2264 06924000
*         GPR01F=ADDR(FREEAREA);    /* SET REGISTER ONE              */ 06925000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2265 06926000
         L     GPR01F,SWCHNPTR(,@12)                               2265 06927000
*         SVC(10);                  /* R-FORM OF GETMAIN             */ 06928000
         SVC   10                                                  2266 06929000
*         RESPECIFY                                                2267 06930000
*          (GPR01F,                                                2267 06931000
*           GPR00F) UNRESTRICTED;                                  2267 06932000
*       END;                        /* FREEMAIN(R)                 2268 06933000
*                                      LV(FREELEN)SP(230)A(FREEAREA) */ 06934000
*       SWCHNPTR=ZEROPTR;                                          2269 06935000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2269 06936000
         SLR   @11,@11                                             2269 06937000
         ST    @11,SWCHNPTR(,@12)                                  2269 06938000
*     END;                                                         2270 06939000
*   END FREEEPA;                                                   2271 06940000
@EL00037 DS    0H                                                  2271 06941000
@EF00037 DS    0H                                                  2271 06942000
@ER00037 LM    @14,@12,@SA00037                                    2271 06943000

*REMDSNQ:                                                          2272 06945000
*   PROC;                                                          2272 06946000
*                                                                  2272 06947000
REMDSNQ  STM   @14,@12,@SA00038                                    2272 06948000
*/****************************************************************   */ 06949000
*/* THIS PROCEDURE PERFORMS A DELETE FROM THE DSENQ TABLE FOR        */ 06950000
*/* WHATEVER DSNAME THE CALLER PLACES IN DSN                         */ 06951000
*/****************************************************************   */ 06952000
*                                                                  2273 06953000
*   BITMAP=''B;                     /* INIT FUNCTION MAP             */ 06954000
         XC    BITMAP(2),BITMAP                                    2273 06955000
*   DELEONLY=ON;                    /* FUNC. FLAG = DELETE NO DEQ    */ 06956000
         OI    DELEONLY,B'00010000'                                2274 06957000
*   DO;                             /* LINK EP('IEFAB4DC') PARAM(BITM   06958000
*                                      AP,PASSJCT,PASSDSNM,PASSEPA,PA   06959000
*                                      SSTCB,STEPNO,PAD1,PAD2,RETPARM   06960000
*                                      )                             */ 06961000
*     I00601='00'X;                 /* EP/DE FLAG                    */ 06962000
         MVI   I00601,X'00'                                        2276 06963000
*     I00602=ADDR('IEFAB4DC');      /* ADDR OF EP/DE                 */ 06964000

*     I00604=0;                     /* DCB PTR                       */ 06967000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2278 06968000
         STCM  @12,7,I00604                                        2278 06969000
*     I00603='00'X;                 /* ERRET FLAG                    */ 06970000
         MVI   I00603,X'00'                                        2279 06971000

*     IOPTLIST(2)=ADDR(PASSJCT);    /* ADDR OF PROB PROG PARM        */ 06975000
         LA    @12,PASSJCT                                         2281 06976000
