*     IOPTLIST(3)=ADDR(PASSDSNM);   /* ADDR OF PROB PROG PARM        */ 06978000
         LA    @12,PASSDSNM                                        2282 06979000
         ST    @12,IOPTLIST+8                                      2282 06980000
*     IOPTLIST(4)=ADDR(PASSEPA);    /* ADDR OF PROB PROG PARM        */ 06981000
         LA    @12,PASSEPA                                         2283 06982000
         ST    @12,IOPTLIST+12                                     2283 06983000
*     IOPTLIST(5)=ADDR(PASSTCB);    /* ADDR OF PROB PROG PARM        */ 06984000
         LA    @12,PASSTCB                                         2284 06985000
         ST    @12,IOPTLIST+16                                     2284 06986000
*     IOPTLIST(6)=ADDR(STEPNO);     /* ADDR OF PROB PROG PARM        */ 06987000

*     IOPTLIST(7)=ADDR(PAD1);       /* ADDR OF PROB PROG PARM        */ 06990000

         LA    @12,RETPARM                                         2288 06997000

*     IOPTLIST(9)=IOPTLIST(9)|'80000000'X;/* SET VL BIT              */ 06999000
         O     @12,@CF04255                                        2289 07000000
         ST    @12,IOPTLIST+32                                     2289 07001000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2290 07002000
*      (GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                                        2290 07003000
*     GPR01P=ADDR(IOPTLIST);        /* ADDR OF OPTLIST               */ 07004000
         LA    GPR01P,IOPTLIST                                     2291 07005000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2292 07006000
*      (GPR15P) RESTRICTED;                                        2292 07007000
*     GPR15P=ADDR(I006);            /* ADDR OF LINK LIST             */ 07008000

*     SVC(6);                       /* ISSUE LINK SVC                */ 07010000

*     RESPECIFY                                                    2295 07012000
*      (GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      2295 07013000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2296 07014000
*      (GPR15P) UNRESTRICTED;                                      2296 07015000

*ADDDSNQ:                                                          2300 07027000
*   PROC;                                                          2300 07028000
*                                                                  2300 07029000
ADDDSNQ  STM   @14,@12,@SA00039                                    2300 07030000
*/***************************************************************    */ 07031000
*/* THIS PROC ADDS THE DSN PASSED IN 'DSN' TO THE DSENQ TABLE        */ 07032000
*/***************************************************************    */ 07033000
*                                                                  2301 07034000
*   BITMAP=''B;                     /* INIT FUNCTION MAP             */ 07035000

*   ADCHONLY=ON;                    /* FUNC. FLAG = ADD - NO ENQ     */ 07037000

*   IF SHAREBIT=ON THEN             /* USER SAVED JFCBIND2   @ZA07018*/ 07039000

         BNO   @RF02303                                            2303 07041000
*     ENQSHR=ON;                    /* TELL DSENQ TO USE SHARE       */ 07042000
         OI    ENQSHR,B'00000010'                                  2304 07043000
*   ELSE                                                           2305 07044000
*     ENQEXCL=ON;                   /* OTHERS GET EXCLUSIVE USE      */ 07045000

*   DO;                             /* LINK EP('IEFAB4DC') PARAM(BITM   07048000

*     IOPTLIST(5)=ADDR(PASSTCB);    /* ADDR OF PROB PROG PARM        */ 07075000

*ALOCAT:                                                           2331 07118000
*   PROC;                           /*                       @YA00081*/ 07119000
ALOCAT   STM   @14,@12,@SA00040                                    2331 07120000
*/* THIS PROC WILL SET UP FOR UNALOCAT & ALLOCATE                    */ 07121000
*/* ALL CATALOGS ON THE JOB/STEPCAT CHAIN.                           */ 07122000
*                                                                  2332 07123000
*   DCL                                                            2332 07124000
*     SAVEPCCB PTR(31) ABNL;        /* HOLDER FOR PCCB -> ON ENTRY   */ 07125000
*   DCL                                                            2333 07126000
*     TTRPCAT PTR(24) DEFINED(SCTPCAT) BDY(BYTE);/* GET NUMERIC VALUE*/ 07127000
*   DCL                                                            2334 07128000
*     SIOTCAT PTR(24) BDY(WORD);    /* SVA OF PVT CAT SIOT           */ 07129000
*   DCL                                                            2335 07130000
*     CATCT FIXED(15) DEFINED(SCTCATCT) BDY(BYTE);/* GET NUMERIC VALU*/ 07131000
*   DCL                                                            2336 07132000
*     COUNT FIXED(15);              /* NUMBER OF PVT CATS            */ 07133000
*   DCL                                                            2337 07134000
*     1 LIST4F5 CHAR(20),           /* PARM LIST FOR IEFAB4F5        */ 07135000
*      2 RTINFOP PTR(31),           /* PTR TO R.C. AREA              */ 07136000
*      2 JSCBPTRP PTR(31),          /* PTR TO JSCB (INIT)            */ 07137000
*      2 CTGDSNP PTR(31),           /* PTR TO CAT NAME               */ 07138000
*      2 CTGCONP PTR(31),           /* NOT USED                      */ 07139000
*      2 DDNAME PTR(31);            /* NOT USED                      */ 07140000
*   DCL                                                            2338 07141000
*     RCAREA FIXED(31);             /* WORD FOR RETURN CODE          */ 07142000
*   DCL                                                            2339 07143000
*     CTGDSN CHAR(44);              /* HOLDER FOR DSN                */ 07144000
*   DCL                                                            2340 07145000
*     SIOTCPTR PTR(31);             /* IN CORE SIOT CAT PTR          */ 07146000
*   DCL                                                            2341 07147000
*     JFCBCPTR PTR(31);             /* IN CORE JFCB CAT PTR          */ 07148000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   2342 07149000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 07150000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2343 07151000
*      (GPR02F) RESTRICTED;                                        2343 07152000
*     IPK;                          /* SAVE CURRENT PSW KEY          */ 07153000
         IPK                                                       2344 07154000
*     SAVEKEYA=GPR02F;                                             2345 07155000
         STC   GPR02F,SAVEKEYA                                     2345 07156000
*     SPKA(ZEROPTR);                /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 07157000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2346 07158000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              2346 07159000
*     RESPECIFY                                                    2347 07160000
*      (GPR02F) UNRESTRICTED;                                      2347 07161000
*   END;                            /* MODESET SAVEKEY(SAVEKEYA)   2348 07162000
*                                      KEYADDR(ZEROPTR)              */ 07163000
*   SAVEJSCB=TCBJSCB->JSCBACT;      /* SAVE OLD ACTIVE               */ 07164000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          2349 07165000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   2349 07166000
         L     @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2349 07167000
         ST    @12,SAVEJSCB                                        2349 07168000
*   TCBJSCB->JSCBACT=TCBJSCB;       /* USE INIT JSCB AS ACTIVE       */ 07169000
         L     @12,TCBPTR                                          2350 07170000
         L     @12,TCBJSCB(,@12)                                   2350 07171000
         ST    @12,JSCBACT(,@12)                                   2350 07172000
*   QDBPTR=JSCDSABQ;                /* ADDRESSABILITY QDB            */ 07173000
         L     @11,JSCDSABQ(,@12)                                  2351 07174000

*   LASTDSAB=QDBLELMP;              /* SAVE CURRENT LAST DSAB PTR    */ 07176000

         ST    @11,LASTDSAB                                        2352 07178000
*   SAVEPCCB=JSCBPCC;               /* SAVE OLD PCCB CHAIN           */ 07179000
         L     @12,JSCBPCC(,@12)                                   2353 07180000
         ST    @12,SAVEPCCB                                        2353 07181000
*   JSCBPCC=ZEROPTR;                /* CUT OFF OTHER PCCBS           */ 07182000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2354 07183000
         L     @11,TCBPTR                                          2354 07184000
         L     @11,TCBJSCB(,@11)                                   2354 07185000
         ST    @12,JSCBPCC(,@11)                                   2354 07186000
*   IF SCTPCAT=0 THEN              /* IF JOB/STEP CATS EXIST...     */ 07187000
         L     @09,SCTPTR                                          2355 07188000
         CL    @12,SCTPCAT(,@09)                                   2355 07189000
         BE    @RF02355                                            2355 07190000
*     DO;                           /* GO GET THEM ALLOC'D (DO/A)    */ 07191000
*       SIOTCAT=TTRPCAT;            /* PICK UP 1ST PVT CAT SVA       */ 07192000
         MVC   SIOTCAT(3),TTRPCAT(@09)                             2357 07193000
*       COUNT=CATCT;                /* PICK UP NUMBER OF CATS        */ 07194000
         LH    @09,CATCT(,@09)                                     2358 07195000
         STH   @09,COUNT                                           2358 07196000
*/* INITIALIZE FUNCTION MAP AS REQUIRED                              */ 07197000
*                                                                  2359 07198000
*       ACNODD=ON;                  /* CREATE NO DD                  */ 07199000
*       ACDVWAIT=NOTON;             /* NO WAIT FOR DEVICE            */ 07200000
*       ACRECOVR=NOTON;             /* DONT WAIT FOR UNIT            */ 07201000
*       ACOSCVOL=NOTON;             /* NO OS CVOL PROCESS            */ 07202000
*       ACVLWAIT=NOTON;             /* NO WAIT FOR VOLUMES           */ 07203000
*       ACOFLINE=ON;                /* CONSIDER OFFLINE DEVICES      */ 07204000
*       ACNOENQ=NOTON;              /* DONT ENQ ON TIOT              */ 07205000
*       ACNUJSCB=NOTON;             /* DONT CHANGE JSCB TO ACTIVE    */ 07206000
         OI    ACNODD,B'10000100'                                  2366 07207000
         NI    ACDVWAIT,B'10000100'                                2366 07208000
*       ACOK2MNT=ON;                /* MOUNT THE CATALOG             */ 07209000
*       ACSTPCAT=ON;                /* THIS IS STEP/JOBCAT           */ 07210000
*       ACALCTLG=ON;                /* ALLOCATE CATALOG              */ 07211000
*       ACOPNACB=ON;                /* HAVE CATALOG OPENED           */ 07212000
*       ACCCPCCB=ON;                /* INSURE PCCB BUILT             */ 07213000
*       ACRECOVD=NOTON;             /* NO CAT RECOVERY PROCESSING    */ 07214000
         OI    ACOK2MNT,B'11111000'                                2372 07215000
         NI    ACRECOVD,B'11111011'                                2372 07216000
*/* INITIALIZE IEFAB4F5 PARAMETER LIST                               */ 07217000
*                                                                  2373 07218000
*       RCAREA=0;                   /* INITIALIZE R.C. AREA          */ 07219000
         ST    @12,RCAREA                                          2373 07220000
*       RTINFOP=ADDR(RCAREA);       /* POINT TO IT                   */ 07221000
         LA    @09,RCAREA                                          2374 07222000
         STCM  @09,15,RTINFOP                                      2374 07223000
*       JSCBPTRP=TCBJSCB;           /* POINT TO INIT JSCB            */ 07224000
         STCM  @11,15,JSCBPTRP                                     2375 07225000
*       CTGDSNP=ADDR(CTGDSN);       /* POINT TO NAME HOLDER          */ 07226000
         LA    @11,CTGDSN                                          2376 07227000
         STCM  @11,15,CTGDSNP                                      2376 07228000
*       CTGCONP=0;                  /* INITIALIZE UNUSED             */ 07229000
         STCM  @12,15,CTGCONP                                      2377 07230000
*       DDNAME=0;                   /* INITIALIZE UNUSED             */ 07231000
         STCM  @12,15,DDNAME                                       2378 07232000
*/* ALLOCATE THE CATALOGS                                            */ 07233000
*                                                                  2379 07234000
*       DO WHILE COUNT>0;           /* LOOP THRU ALL CATS (DO/B)     */ 07235000
         B     @DE02379                                            2379 07236000
@DL02379 DS    0H                                                  2380 07237000
*         SWVA=SIOTCAT;             /* INPUT TO SWA MGR              */ 07238000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2380 07239000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SIOTCAT                                 2380 07240000
*         CALL READSWA;             /* READ SIOT                     */ 07241000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         2381 07242000
*         SIOTCPTR=SWBLKPTR;        /* ADDRESSABILITY                */ 07243000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2382 07244000
         L     @11,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  2382 07245000
         ST    @11,SIOTCPTR                                        2382 07246000
*         SWVA=SIOTCPTR->SCTPJFCB;  /* INPUT SWA MGR                 */ 07247000
         MVC   SWVA(3,@12),SCTPJFCB(@11)                           2383 07248000
*         CALL READSWA;             /* READ JFCB                     */ 07249000
         BAL   @14,READSWA                                         2384 07250000
*         JFCBCPTR=SWBLKPTR;        /* ADDRESSABILITY                */ 07251000
         L     @12,SWEPAPTR                                        2385 07252000
         L     @12,SWBLKPTR(,@12)                                  2385 07253000
         ST    @12,JFCBCPTR                                        2385 07254000
*         CTGDSN=JFCBCPTR->JFCBDSNM;/* DSN TO PARM LIST              */ 07255000
         MVC   CTGDSN(44),JFCBDSNM(@12)                            2386 07256000
*         DO;                       /* LINK EP('IEFAB4F5') PARAM(ACCN   07257000
*                                      TRLS,RTINFOP,JSCBPTRP,CTGDSNP,   07258000
*                                      CTGCONP,DDNAME)               */ 07259000
*           I00601='00'X;           /* EP/DE FLAG                    */ 07260000
         MVI   I00601,X'00'                                        2388 07261000
*           I00602=ADDR('IEFAB4F5');/* ADDR OF EP/DE                 */ 07262000
         LA    @12,@CC04505                                        2389 07263000
         STCM  @12,7,I00602                                        2389 07264000
*           I00604=0;               /* DCB PTR                       */ 07265000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             2390 07266000
         STCM  @12,7,I00604                                        2390 07267000
*           I00603='00'X;           /* ERRET FLAG                    */ 07268000

*           RESPECIFY                                              2399 07291000

*         IF RCAREA=0 THEN                                        2407 07308000

*           DO;                                                    2408 07312000

*             TCBJSCB->JSCBACT=SAVEJSCB;                           2410 07316000

*   END;                            /* MODESET KEYADDR(SAVEKEYA)     */ 07352000
*   END ALOCAT;                                                    2424 07353000
@EL00040 DS    0H                                                  2424 07354000
@EF00040 DS    0H                                                  2424 07355000
@ER00040 LM    @14,@12,@SA00040                                    2424 07356000
         BR    @14                                                 2424 07357000
*UNALOCAT:                                                         2425 07358000
*   PROC;                           /*                       @YA00081*/ 07359000
UNALOCAT STM   @14,@12,@SA00041                                    2425 07360000
*/* THIS PROC WILL CALL IEFAB4F4 TO CLOSE AND FREE ANY               */ 07361000
*/* CATALOGS ALLOCATED FOR USE DURING IEFXB609.                      */ 07362000
*                                                                  2426 07363000
*   DCL                                                            2426 07364000
*     UNCATSW BIT(1);               /* SW FOR NON RECURSION          */ 07365000
*   DCL                                                            2427 07366000
*     WORKTODO BIT(1);              /* INTERNAL SW                   */ 07367000
*   DCL                                                            2428 07368000
*     1 LIST4F4 CHAR(20) DEFINED(LIST4F5),                         2428 07369000
*      2 RTCDPTR PTR(31),                                          2428 07370000
*      2 PCCBPTR PTR(31),                                          2428 07371000
*      2 DDNAMPTR PTR(31),                                         2428 07372000
*      2 ACBPTR PTR(31),                                           2428 07373000
*      2 JSCBP PTR(31);                                            2428 07374000
*   IF UNCATSW=NOTON THEN           /* IF NOT ENTERED BEFORE...      */ 07375000
         TM    UNCATSW,B'10000000'                                 2429 07376000
         BNZ   @RF02429                                            2429 07377000
*     DO;                           /* DO/A PROCESS CATALOGS, IF ANY */ 07378000
*       UNCATSW=ON;                 /* PREVENT RECURSION             */ 07379000
         OI    UNCATSW,B'10000000'                                 2431 07380000
*       IF LASTDSAB=ZEROPTR        /* IF DSABS EXISTED      @YM30475*/ 07381000
*         THEN                      /* THEN                  @YM30475*/ 07382000

         LTR   @12,@12                                             2432 07384000

*         DSABPTR=LASTDSAB->DSABFCHN;/* OBTAIN ADDED DSAB    @YM30475*/ 07386000

         B     @RC02432                                            2434 07391000

         L     @12,QDBFELMP(,@12)                                  2434 07393000
         ST    @12,DSABPTR                                         2434 07394000
*       WORKTODO=NOTON;             /* INITIALIZE SWITCH             */ 07395000
@RC02432 NI    WORKTODO,B'01111111'                                2435 07396000
*       DO WHILE DSABPTR=0;        /* PROCESS DSABS UNTIL NONE LEFT    07397000
*                                      DO/B                          */ 07398000

@DL02436 DS    0H                                                  2437 07400000
*         DSABCATL=NOTON;           /* UNALLOC WONT FREE PVTCATS     */ 07401000

*         DSABPTR=DSABFCHN;         /* GET NEXT PTR                  */ 07404000

*         WORKTODO=ON;              /* SIGNAL UNALLOCS TO PERFORM    */ 07407000

*       END;                        /* DO/B                          */ 07409000

         BNE   @DL02436                                            2440 07412000
*       IF WORKTODO=ON THEN         /* GO DO UNCATALOG IF NECESSARY  */ 07413000
         TM    WORKTODO,B'10000000'                                2441 07414000
         BNO   @RF02441                                            2441 07415000
*         DO;                       /* DO/C                          */ 07416000
*/* INITIALIZE FUNCTION MAP AS REQUIRED                              */ 07417000
*                                                                  2443 07418000
*           UCCAJSCB=NOTON;         /* DONT CHANGE JSCB TO ACTIVE    */ 07419000
*           UCNTIONQ=NOTON;         /* DO NOT ENQ ON TIOT            */ 07420000
*           UCONECAT=NOTON;         /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07421000
*           UCALLCAT=ON;            /* UNALLOC ALL CATALOGS          */ 07422000
*           UCONEACB=NOTON;         /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07423000
*           UCALLACB=ON;            /* CLOSE ALL CATALOGS            */ 07424000
*           UCONPCCB=NOTON;         /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07425000
*           UCALPCCB=ON;            /* FREE ALL PCCBS                */ 07426000
         OI    UCALLCAT,B'00010101'                                2450 07427000
         NI    UCCAJSCB,B'00010101'                                2450 07428000
*           UCTEMP=NOTON;           /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07429000
*           UCSWTIOT=NOTON;         /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07430000

*/* INITIALIZE PARM LIST FOR IEFAB4F4                                */ 07432000
*                                                                  2453 07433000
*           RCAREA=0;               /* INIT RETURN CODE              */ 07434000

*           RTCDPTR=ADDR(RCAREA);   /* POINT TO R.C. AREA            */ 07436000

         STCM  @11,15,RTCDPTR                                      2454 07438000
*           PCCBPTR=0;              /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07439000

*           DDNAMPTR=0;             /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07441000
         STCM  @12,15,DDNAMPTR                                     2456 07442000
*           ACBPTR=0;               /* NOT REQUIRED                  */ 07443000

         L     @11,TCBPTR                                          2458 07446000
         MVC   JSCBP(4),TCBJSCB(@11)                               2458 07447000
*           DO;                     /* LINK EP('IEFAB4F4') PARAM(UCCN   07448000

*                             /* EXPAND NON-RE-ENT MACRO      */        08132000
NEWVOLS CAMLST SCRATCH,SCRCHDSN,,LISTPTR,,OVRD                          08133000
IEFXB609 CSECT                                                          08134000
*                             /* EXPAND LOCAL COPY OF MACRO   */        08135000
NEWVOLS1 CAMLST SCRATCH,LCLDSN,,LCLLST,,OVRD                            08136000
LENY     DC     A(*-NEWVOLS1)                                           08137000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          08138000
DUMPLIST SDUMP HDR='ERROR DURING RESTART PROCESSING - IEFXB609',      XX08139000
               SDATA=(SQA,NUC,LSQA,RGN,LPA,TRT,SWA),MF=L                08140000
IEFXB609 CSECT                                                          08141000
DLIST1  SDUMP HDR='ERROR DURING RESTART PROCESSING - IEFXB609',       XX08142000
               SDATA=(SQA,NUC,LSQA,RGN,LPA,TRT,SWA),MF=L                08143000
LENLIST1 DC A(*-DLIST1)                                                 08144000
@DATD    DSECT                                                          08145000
         ORG   *+1-(*-@DATD)/(*-@DATD) INSURE DSECT DATA                08146000
@ENDDATD EQU   *                                                        08147000

./  ADD  SSI=40850164,NAME=IEFXB610
         TITLE ' IEFXB610: PROC  OPTIONS(REENTRANT);                   *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEFXB610 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                     0001 00004000
         BALR  @12,0                                               0001 00005000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00006000
         USING @PSTART,@12                                         0001 00007000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0001 00008000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                               00009000
         LR    @11,@01                                             0001 00010000
         USING @DATD,@11                                           0001 00011000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                      0001 00012000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                     0001 00013000
         ST    @11,8(,@13)                                         0001 00014000
         LR    @13,@11                                             0001 00015000
         XC    @ZTEMPS(@ZLEN),@ZTEMPS                                   00016000
*                                                                  0016 00017000
*INPTR = R1;                    /* INITIALIZE PARM LIST BASE    */ 0017 00018000
         LR    INPTR,R1                                            0017 00019000
*DCBADDR = DCBPARM;             /* PUT DCB ADDRESS TO LIST      */ 0018 00020000
         MVC   DCBADDR(4),DCBPARM(INPTR)                           0018 00021000
*LISTEND = ONBIT;               /* ONLY ONE DCB TO OPEN         */ 0019 00022000
*                                                                  0019 00023000
         OI    LISTEND,B'10000000'                                 0019 00024000
*GEN (OPEN MF=(E,OPENLIST));    /* ISSUE OPEN MACRO             */ 0020 00025000
         OPEN MF=(E,OPENLIST)                                           00026000
*/***************************************************************/ 0021 00027000
*/* NOW POST IEFXB609 INDICATING THAT THE OPEN HAS COMPLETED.   */ 0021 00028000
*/***************************************************************/ 0021 00029000
*  DO; /*POST (OKECB)*/                                            0021 00030000
*    RESPECIFY (GPR00F,GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                         0022 00031000
*    GPR00F = 0; /* POST CODE IN R0*/                              0023 00032000
         SLR   GPR00F,GPR00F                                       0023 00033000
*    GPR01P = ADDR(OKECB); /*ECB ADDRESS*/                         0024 00034000
         L     GPR01P,ADOKECB(,INPTR)                              0024 00035000
*    SVC (2); /*ISSUE POST SVC*/                                   0025 00036000
         SVC   2                                                   0025 00037000
*    RESPECIFY (GPR00F,GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                       0026 00038000
*  END; /*POST (OKECB)*/                                           0027 00039000
*/**********************************************/                  0028 00040000
*/* NOW WAIT FOR XB609 TO FINISH WITH DATASET  */                  0028 00041000
*/**********************************************/                  0028 00042000
*                                                                  0028 00043000
*BIT1 = ONBIT;                /* SET END OF LIST               */  0028 00044000
         OI    BIT1(INPTR),B'10000000'                             0028 00045000
*  DO; /* WAIT ECBLIST(AWAIT610) */                                0029 00046000
*    RESPECIFY (GPR00P,GPR01P) RESTRICTED;                         0030 00047000
*    GPR00P = 1; /* LOAD WAIT COUNT */                             0031 00048000
         LA    GPR00P,1                                            0031 00049000
*    GPR01P = -ADDR(AWAIT610); /* ADDRESS OF LIST OF ECB'S */      0032 00050000
         LA    GPR01P,AWAIT610(,INPTR)                             0032 00051000
         LCR   GPR01P,GPR01P                                       0032 00052000
*    SVC(1); /* WAIT SVC */                                        0033 00053000
         SVC   1                                                   0033 00054000
*    RESPECIFY (GPR00P,GPR01P) UNRESTRICTED;                       0034 00055000
*  END; /* WAIT ECBLIST(AWAIT610) */                               0035 00056000
*                                                                  0035 00057000
*GEN DATA DEFS(CLIST) REFS(DCBPARM);                               0036 00058000
*GEN DATA DEFS(CLIST1,LENCLIST);                                   0037 00059000
*                                                                  0037 00060000
*CLIST(1:LENCLIST)=CLIST1(1:LENCLIST); /* COPY TO AUTO STORAGE */  0038 00061000
         L     @10,LENCLIST                                        0038 00062000
         BCTR  @10,0                                               0038 00063000
         EX    @10,@SM00083                                        0038 00064000
*/*********************************************/                   0039 00065000
*/* 609 IS THROUGH WITH DATASET. ISSUE CLOSE. */                   0039 00066000
*/*********************************************/                   0039 00067000
*                                                                  0039 00068000
*ADCBPARM = DCBPARM;       /* DCB ADDR TO LIST        */           0039 00069000
         MVC   ADCBPARM(3),DCBPARM+1(INPTR)                        0039 00070000
*CEND = ONBIT;              /* INDICATE END OF LIST     */         0040 00071000
         OI    CEND,B'10000000'                                    0040 00072000
*IF CLOSPARM=CANP THEN                                             0041 00073000
         CLC   CLOSPARM(4,INPTR),@CC00036                          0041 00074000
         BNE   @RF00041                                            0041 00075000
*DO;                                     /* @YM8125*/              0042 00076000
*GEN ( CLOSE MF=(E,CLIST));              /* @YA65280*/             0043 00077000
          CLOSE MF=(E,CLIST)                                            00078000
*END;                                                              0044 00079000
*ELSE DO;                                                          0045 00080000
         B     @RC00041                                            0045 00081000
@RF00041 DS    0H                                                  0046 00082000
*GEN ( CLOSE (,REREAD),MF=(E,CLIST));                              0046 00083000
          CLOSE (,REREAD),MF=(E,CLIST)                                  00084000
*END;                                                              0047 00085000
*                                                                  0047 00086000
*/* READY FOR EXIT */                                              0048 00087000
*                                                                  0048 00088000
*                                                                  0048 00089000
*  DECLARE /*GENERAL PURPOSE REGISTERS */                          0048 00090000
*    GPR00F FIXED(31) REG(0),                                      0048 00091000
*    GPR00P PTR(31) REG(0),                                        0048 00092000
*    GPR01P PTR(31) REG(1);                                        0048 00093000
*                                                                  0048 00094000
*  DECLARE /* COMMON VARIABLES */                                  0049 00095000
*    I256C CHAR(256) BASED,                                        0049 00096000
*    I031F FIXED(31) BASED,                                        0049 00097000
*    I031P PTR(31)   BASED,                                        0049 00098000
*    I015F FIXED(15) BASED,                                        0049 00099000
*    I015P PTR(15)   BASED,                                        0049 00100000
*    I008P PTR(8)    BASED,                                        0049 00101000
*    I001C CHAR(1)   BASED;                                        0049 00102000
*END IEFXB610;                                                     0050 00103000
@EL00001 L     @13,4(,@13)                                         0050 00104000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                        0050 00105000

         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00107000
